name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000001
text: We were deployed here from headquarters to support the Knights of Kaliss.{nl}If you want to know more, head over to our headquarters at Verkti Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000002
text: I've been a merchant all my life. {nl}After Medzio Diena, this seemed like the safest place to be, so I settled here... {nl}But I guess I was wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000003
text: I've met many Revelators during my travels.{nl}In my opinion... there is something special about them, and it's not just their strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000004
text: I'm not blaming the goddesses and the priests.{nl}But I think it's too much when they tell us to just trust them and wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000005
text: The seals in the village are supposed to be sealed - that's why they're called seals, {nl}so what's the big deal? The priests are just trying to scare us for no reason.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000006
text: The priests don't want everyone to know how important the seals in the village are.{nl}They think that they can just take the burden upon themselves, {nl}and then everything will be alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000007
text: Some of the priests want to be truthful and open with the villagers.{nl}At this rate, if something really bad happens...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000008
text: The evil energy is making this forest decay into a lifeless place.{nl}It is easily the biggest problem this village is facing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000009
text: Goddess...{nl}Please tell me the village's seal is really okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000010
text: Demons will continue to target the seal and attack endlessly.{nl}With Goddess Austeja still missing, how long will we be able to last...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150323_000011
text: It was a mistake for us to try to handle this by ourselves.{nl}From now on, we will tell the villagers the whole truth and include them in a {nl}deliberate discussion on how to handle the matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000012
text: Check the Detector's Functionality (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000013
text: Demons, Goddesses, and the Petrified City (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000014
text: Check the Detector's Functionality (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000015
text: Demons, Goddesses, and the Petrified City (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000016
text: Check the Detector's Functionality (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000017
text: Check the Detector's Functionality (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000018
text: About the Guidance of Souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000019
text: Repair the Petrification Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000020
text: Repairing/MAKING/3/TRACK_AFTER/None

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000021
text: Check the Detector's Functionality (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000022
text: Repairing/MAKING/3/TRACK_BEFORE

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000023
text: Notice/!/One of the parts is not fastened very well{nl}You'll need something like a string to tie it in place!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000024
text: Notice/!/You need to find a string.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000025
text: For the Guidance of Souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000026
text: Now you can relax

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000027
text: Examining the Device/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000028
text: Notice/!/When you touch the device, it feels as if your soul is being sucked out!{nl}You begin to feel weaker and weaker!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000029
text: Notice/!/Now you feel reenergized.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000030
text: His Only Desire (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000031
text: About The Reason Behind His Deathwish

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000032
text: His Only Desire (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000033
text: His Only Desire (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000034
text: Go to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000035
text: Now You Are Unable to Work Together

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000036
text: Destroy the Terminal (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000037
text: About the Mainframe and the Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000038
text: Avoid the monsters' attacks and destroy the terminal!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000039
text: Destroy the Terminal (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000040
text: Igniting explosive powder/FIRE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000041
text: Notice/The terminal was destroyed in the explosion!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000042
text: Destroy the Terminal (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000043
text: And, Eternal Repose (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000044
text: If You Have Any Final Words

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000045
text: And, Eternal Repose (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000046
text: Placing the Orb/MAKING/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000047
text: And, Eternal Repose (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000048
text: Greetings

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000049
text: Notice/It looks like Svitrigaila's wish was granted#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000050
text: Inspect the Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000051
text: Talk to Kupole Meile

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000052
text: Talk to the Kupole whom you saved from the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000053
text: Examine the Petrification Detectors

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000054
text: Check the detectors in areas you haven't been to yet to help Kupole Meile guide the souls safely from the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000055
text: Return to Kupole Meile

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000056
text: You checked all 4 detectors except the one at the entrance. Now return to Kupole Meile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000057
text: You have something to say about reactivating the malfunctioning detector. Talk to Kupole Meile again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000058
text: Meet with Royal Army Guard Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000059
text: Kupole said that the Royal Army installed the petrification detectors. Meet Royal Army Guard Retia at Verkti Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000060
text: Talk some more with Royal Army Guard Retia about the malfunctioning detector at the Coastal Fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000061
text: Find a part for the petrification detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000062
text: Listen to Royal Army Guard Retia and look for the soldiers that were dispatched to the Coastal Fortress. If something has happened to them, you'll have to retrieve the part for the detector from their corpses. Also, try hunting the monsters in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000063
text: Meet with Kupole Meile

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000064
text: Unfortunately, the Royal Army soldiers did not survive, but you were able to collect all the necessary parts for the detector. Now, go tell Kupole what has happened, and then go repair the petrification detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000065
text: Before you go to repair the petrification detector, talk to Kupole Meile about the situation at hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000066
text: Repair the Petrification Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000067
text: Repair the first petrification detector that wasn't working.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000068
text: You have defeated all of the monsters that began to attack when you tried to repair the petrification detector. Now you can go back to repairing the petrification detector in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000069
text: Repair the Third Petrification Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000070
text: Now go repair the third petrification detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000071
text: Find Fastening String

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000072
text: You'll need some string to attach and secure the part to the detector. Try hunting some from monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000073
text: You have collected enough string to fasten the part. Now repair the third petrification detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000074
text: Hunt monsters and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000075
text: Hunt monsters and collect string

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000076
text: Go let Kupole Meile know that you have repaired all of the petrification detectors.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000077
text: Examine the Mysterious Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000078
text: As you approach the unknown device, you feel strangely drawn to it and can't help but inch closer. What could this device be? Maybe you'd find out if you try touching it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000079
text: Find Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000080
text: You begin to feel weaker and weaker, as if your soul is being drained from your body. Find someone who can help you out of this situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000081
text: His Only Desire

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000082
text: Talk with Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000083
text: It looks like you're going to have to listen to Svitrigaila's story.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000084
text: Gather Poisonous Weeds

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000085
text: Svitrigaila tells you that, as a Revelator, it wouldn't be bad for you to help him commit suicide, and he asks you to gather some poisonous herbs for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000086
text: Give Svitrigaila the Poisonous Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000087
text: You have gathered all of the poisonous herbs that Svitrigaila asked you to get. Now return to Svitrigaila and give him the poisonous herbs you've collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000088
text: Talk to the Cleric Master to get the holy water that Svitrigaila needs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000089
text: Return to Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000090
text: The Cleric Master stubbornly refused your request. That's unfortunate. Well anyhow, go tell Svitrigaila what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000091
text: You gave Svitrigaila the poisonous herbs, and it appears that he ate them, but you don't see any change in him. Try speaking to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000092
text: Seeing as there was no effect on Svitrigaila when he ate the poisonous herbs, it must be that he needs to mix them with holy water first, and then eat them to get the desired result. Find the Cleric Master and get the holy water from him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000093
text: Destroy the Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000094
text: Talk with Svitrigaila some more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000095
text: Destroy the Soul Compactor Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000096
text: In order to help Svitrigaila, you'll have to destroy the Soul Compaction Device. You'll need to gather some tools to help you destroy the Soul Compaction Device terminal, and then its the mainframe, beforehand. First things first, destroy the first terminal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000097
text: Inform Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000098
text: You have destroyed the terminal. And you successfully retrieved the Terminal Core. Give the core to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000099
text: Destroy the Terminal and retrieve its core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000100
text: Ask Svitrigaila how to destroy the terminal in the next area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000101
text: Scrape off and collect Petrification Particles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000102
text: According to Svitrigaila, you need to amplify the power of the explosive powder in order to destroy the next terminal, and for that, you'll need to scrape off and collect particles from petrified objects in this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000103
text: Blow up the Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000104
text: Use the explosive powder Svitrigaila gave you and the petrification particles you collected to blow up the second terminal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000105
text: Ask Svitrigaila what you need to do to destroy the next terminal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000106
text: Destroy the Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000107
text: Svitrigaila says that the third terminal will get knocked out if anything comes near it. Retrieve the core from the petrified monsters nearby and throw it at the terminal to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000108
text: And Eternal Repose

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000109
text: Now that you've gotten rid of all the terminals, return to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000110
text: Find materials to craft the Magic Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000111
text: Svitrigaila gave you a manual to create a magic orb that can free the trapped souls from the Soul Compactor. Gather the necessary crafting materials that Svitrigaila  was unable to get from monsters and then use the manual to craft Svitrigaila's Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000112
text: Destroy the Soul Compactor

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000113
text: You have crafted Svitrigaila's Orb. Now take the orb to the Soul Compactor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000114
text: Destroy the Soul Compactor

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000115
text: Destroy the Soul Compactor with Svitrigaila's Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000116
text: Once you placed Svitrigaila's Orb, monsters started turning wild and rushing towards you! {nl}Fight off the monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000117
text: The Soul Compactor has been destroyed. Now return to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000118
text: Say your final farewell to Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150717_000119
text: It looks like it's time to grant Svitrigaila's wish.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000120
text: If you help me die, I'll release you from that curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000121
text: Who cares what happens to this body that I can't move, or even escape from.{nl}I just want to rest a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000122
text: You just need to gather the poisonous weeds from the area above us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000123
text: That area's known for its Bluebane...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000124
text: Thank you. Let me try eating these one by one...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000125
text: Just as I feared... I'm still here.{nl}I heard the Cleric Master has holy water that, when mixed with Bluebane, {nl}can easily kill any demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000126
text: Cleric Master!{nl}Go to him and get some holy water.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000127
text: Have a safe journey to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000128
text: ...?{nl}The soulkeeper of Dingofasil District?{nl}Isn't he a demon?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000129
text: Are you helping a demon?{nl}I won't pry into your personal affairs, but as a master serving the goddess, {nl}I cannot get involved in this. Please leave this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000130
text: I will never involve myself in a demon's work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000131
text: I see... I should have expected that...{nl}I was a fool to hope otherwise.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000132
text: If it comes down this, I guess I'll have to try that method now.{nl}Destroying the Soul Compactor that's here... The beings that sent me here told me.{nl}The Soul Compactor and I are one and the same. Why didn't I remember this until now?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000133
text: Somewhere in this area is a Soul Compactor that absorbs human souls.{nl}It condenses their energy and uses it.{nl}This is a really suitable location for the Soul Compactor because, {nl}even after the Petrifying Frost blew through, it's still bustling with the activity of the {nl}Knights of Kaliss, grave robbers, and the soldiers of the Royal Army.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000134
text: {nl}{nl}If I think about it, the beings that sent me here must have linked my life with the Soul Compactor so that I could collect souls for them forever. So if the Soul Compactor is destroyed, wouldn't I die with it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000135
text: The Soul Compactor has 3 terminals from which it absorbs souls.{nl}That bad feeling you had earlier was also a terminal trying to absorb your soul.{nl}For now, try to wipe out those terminals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000136
text: {nl}If you succeed in destroying a terminal, you should be able to retrieve its core.{nl}You need to collect those cores to craft an orb that will help you destroy the Soul Compactor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000137
text: Good job. This core will be used to make an orb that will overload the mainframe of the Soul Compactor.{nl}Now I can feel my death drawing near.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000138
text: Try blowing up the second terminal.{nl}Here, I'll give you some explosives, but you'll need to scrape off some particles from petrified{nl}objects in this area to amplify the power of the explosives.{nl}Since the Petrifying Frost blows through here often, there are plenty of petrified objects {nl}everywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000139
text: Again, you'll need to retrieve the core from this terminal too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000140
text: Now there's only one terminal left... I feel myself getting weaker...{nl}The last terminal is probably short-circuiting.{nl}Try getting cores from petrified monsters in the area and throwing them at the terminal.{nl}That should be enough to make it collapse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000141
text: And of course, bring back the core from the last terminal.{nl}Condensed souls are concentrated within those cores... {nl}We just need to use them to craft an orb that will overload the Soul Compactor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000142
text: Now you've collected them all. Here, I'll give you the manual.{nl}Use this to craft the orb to overload the Soul Compactor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000143
text: I just want to rest...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000144
text: Is this the last time? Really.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000145
text: Let's see if we have all the detonators.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000146
text: You've come... but it's already time for me to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000147
text: I feel drained.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000148
text: Yes. That's it. Give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000149
text: Notice/!/When you touch the device, it feels like your soul is being drained!{nl}You must find someone who can fix this situation!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000150
text: I'll cooperate

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000151
text: Relationship between the Spirit Integration Device and Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000152
text: Perhaps your soul is draining, you are gradually losing energy and stamina!! Hurry and search for anyone who fix this situation!!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000153
text: Obtain %s by destroying the Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000154
text: Bring the Terminal Core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000155
text: Bring the Terminal Core to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150729_000156
text: Craft %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150730_000157
text: As I expected, we have to get the Terminal Core again.{nl}Hmm... I'll cast a protection spell on you so the terminal won't defeat you like before.{nl}I have enough strength left for that, at least.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150730_000158
text: I guide petrified souls in accordance with the will of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150730_000159
text: The Petrifying Frost will blow here soon. But we don't know when...{nl}I wonder if the Petrification Detector is working properly at Supply Route.{nl}Could you please check it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150730_000160
text: Craft %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000161
text: They might get killed since there's no word from them.{nl}If you find their bodies... please bring them with their mementos.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000162
text: Entire troops were killed. Thank you for the help.{nl}There should be a part in the mementos.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000163
text: You need to move on to repair.{nl}Be careful of the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000164
text: Holy water?{nl}What do you need it for?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000165
text: There is a demon who needs holy water at Dingofasil District?{nl}...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000166
text: I won't concern myself with your personal matters, but I can't help demons as a cleric.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000167
text: Maybe this is the only way...{nl}Destroying the Spirit Integration Device...{nl}The ones who sent me here told me that the Spirit Integration Device and I are one. {nl}{nl}How could I forget that?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000168
text: The Spirit Integration Device absorbs souls from 3 terminals.{nl}The curse from a while ago was the process to absorb souls.{nl}Let's destroy the terminals one by one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000169
text: Then bring the core.{nl}Oh, I'll cast a spell on you so you won't be cursed again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000170
text: We should destroy the second terminal. {nl}I will give you some bombs, but to amplify the effects of the bombs, {nl}you will need some petrified water powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000171
text: We should get the core of the terminal this time as well.{nl}Hmm... the spell has been released so that we won't get hurt by the spell. I will lock it again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000172
text: Here it is.{nl}The broken detector can be easily fixed with these parts.{nl}If the parts don't stay in place very well, get some strings from the nearby monsters and {nl}use them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000173
text: The repair, itself, isn't that hard. It is hard to obtain necessary parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000174
text: You've come back from a long journey. So these are the parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000175
text: Let's go repair it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000176
text: The demons and the goddesses, and about the Petrified City

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000177
text: The reason why the goddesses weren't able to save the Petrified City

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000178
text: Send the words of appreciation

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000179
text: Check the Detector's Functionality (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000180
text: Notice/The curse has been released#5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000181
text: Collect the corpses of the guards

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000182
text: By the words of the Royal Army Guard Retia, let's look for the other guards who had been {nl}dispatched to the Coastal Fortress. If they got into an accident, please collect their keepsakes. {nl}The monsters might have taken them so it would be a good idea to hunt for the monsters{nl}at the Coastal Fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000183
text: Return to Royal Army Guard Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000184
text: The guards of the Royal Army have unfortunately died. {nl}You've collected their corpses so go back to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000185
text: Since you've collected all the corpses of the guards who left to the Coastal Fortress to {nl}fix the detector, it seems that you will be able to obtain some parts of the detector from Retia. {nl}Talk with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000186
text: Obtain some parts

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000187
text: Obtain some parts from Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150803_000188
text: Acquired some parts from Retia. Now, go back to Kupole Meile at the Coastal Fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000189
text: Repairing

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000190
text: The detector started to activate!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000191
text: The parts aren't well secured.{nl}You need some kind of strap!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000192
text: You should obtain some straps.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000193
text: Looking at the device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000194
text: You feel like your spirit is moving out from your body as you touch the device!{nl}You should look for someone who can help you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000195
text: The curse has been released

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000196
text: Avoid the monsters' attacks and destroy the terminal!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000197
text: Placing the ignition for the explosive powder

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000198
text: The terminal has exploded and disappeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000199
text: Placing the Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000200
text: It seems that what Svitrigaila wanted has been fulfilled

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000201
text: Collecting

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000202
text: You've collected the corpses and obtained their keepsakes!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000203
text: You've collected the corpses!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000204
text: You've extracted the poisonous flowers!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000205
text: You've failed to extract anything!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000206
text: Collecting the petrification powder

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000207
text: You've collected petrification powder!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000208
text: You've failed to collect pertification powder!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000209
text: Extracting the core of the monster

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000210
text: Acquired the core!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20150908_000211
text: You obtained nothing

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000212
text: Revelator! Are you okay?{nl}The Petrifying Frost, it's really dangerous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000213
text: I am guiding the spirits that suffered from the Petrifying Frost long ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000214
text: But the Petrifying Frost is the curse of the Demon Queen Gesti...{nl}It make us Kupoles turn into stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000215
text: We should at least find out when the Petrifying Frost will blow.{nl}There are some petrification detectors which humans left behind, but some seem to be broken.{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000216
text: The detector you saw seems to be working well.{nl}Please look at how the other detectors are working.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000217
text: The Petrifying Frost turns everything into stone. Even spirits.{nl}We, Kupoles, are no exception.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000218
text: Ah, that's it.{nl}Two of them are broken.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000219
text: We better ask about the soldiers who created the detectors about them.{nl}I heard the person named Retia is the officer so we may receive some help from her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000220
text: He is at Verkti Square.{nl}Human matters cannot be resolved by the Kupoles, so we are counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000221
text: Are you talking about the petrification detector at the Coastal Fortress?{nl}We are already aware of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000222
text: It hasn't arrived yet? {nl}I've already dispatched the soldiers there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000223
text: I don't have a good feeling about this.{nl}Due to numerous monster attacks here, we don't have additional forces to send.{nl}Can I ask you to follow the guards who were dispatched for the repair?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000224
text: Maybe they have been attacked at the Coastal Fortress.{nl}But, they are the guards of the kingdom. Their dead bodies should be brought here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000225
text: The Petrifying Frost is reported frequently at the entrance of the Coastal Fortress,{nl}so I think they will be around there. In case you find some corpses, please collect them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000226
text: I guess it was too late. Thanks for collecting the corpses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000227
text: Please come back after fixing the petrification detector.{nl}I have something to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000228
text: I am counting on you to guide all the spirits to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000229
text: Lastly, there's some story that they want to tell to the Revelator.{nl}You will want to know why humans are suffering from this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000230
text: The rumor that the Petrifying Frost is the sin of the revolt is just a made-up story.{nl}The curse came after the revolt so they may well think so.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000231
text: No, however. {nl}Everything was their plot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000232
text: The ones who broke it first were the demons, however.{nl}That's the Petrifying Frost... they died and their spirits have become stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000233
text: Demon Queen Gesti brought the curse of the petrification on this land,{nl}and the goddesses tried to save the humans. But, the demons asked us whether {nl}we had forgotten not to interfere with each other's matters and...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000234
text: Wait. This memory is too horrible..{nl}A horrible catastrophe has landed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000235
text: Like a big disaster that the goddess might abandon to save this petrified place.{nl}The Petrifying Frost... All of that... This is what we must suffer through to save that which {nl}we abandoned.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000236
text: I will try to save the spirits from now on.{nl}Since you fixed all the detectors, we will be able to guide the spirits to eternal sleep.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000237
text: We will do our best to guide each and every one of them.{nl}I hope the goddesses bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000238
text: I guess you can't trust me since a demon like me is asking you a favor.{nl}But, look at me closely. It doesn't matter if you laugh at me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000239
text: I've tried my best to escape for hundreds of years.{nl}But, the curse of the petrification is the power of the Demon Queen. {nl}This endless depression is suffocating me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000240
text: Even if you escape, you're still a traitor.{nl}You'll be called a "traitor" while at the feet of the colleagues who mocked you...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000241
text: If you cooperate towards my death, I will definitely remove your curse.{nl}I promise in the name of Giltine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000242
text: It doesn't matter what happens to my body.{nl}I just want to rest...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000243
text: The poisonous plant that grows up there would be able to take my life away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000244
text: I will pray that a plant that is poisonous to humans brings me eternal rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000245
text: Thanks. Now, I will pray for the end of my agonizing life.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000246
text: So nothing occurs as I expected.{nl}If that's the case... We can't say we are in distress. We just have to rely on the one{nl}that we demons want to eliminate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000247
text: Please bring the holy water from the one who follows the call of the goddesses.{nl}That sacred power will lead me to death.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000248
text: I heard the Cleric Master handles the holy water.{nl}I don't know if he's going to give me any.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000249
text: Are you talking about holy water?{nl}I am sorry, but may I ask you where you are going to use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000250
text: There are demons who need the holy water?{nl}I am sorry, but I can't help you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000251
text: I am not going to be involved in your personal matter.{nl}No matter what the reasons are, I can't help a demons' matters as a priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000252
text: As a priest, I can't cooperate on the tasks of the demons.{nl}I hope you understand this as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000253
text: So... that's it.{nl}Maybe, we came to expect something that we shouldn't expect.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000254
text: The people who I believed to be my colleagues betrayed me. {nl}Then, there is no reason for me to hold on to this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000255
text: The Demon Lord has ordered me to collect the spirits of humans that will be dedicated to God.{nl}That's why we began working on creating the integrator which would collect the spirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000256
text: The process was smooth, but I suffered from the curse of the Petrifying Frost.{nl}Frozen freak, they said while laughing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000257
text: That I will be the soure of magic of the integrator.{nl}How did I come to forget this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000258
text: You must know by now.{nl}The curse that has been put on the barrier stone... we use it to pull spirits from humans.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000259
text: The spirits that were pulled will be gathered to the integrator and dedicated to the god.{nl}The god... it is like me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000260
text: The integrator is being protected by three barrier stones.{nl}Destroy the barrier stones down there and obtain the cores from them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000261
text: I will cast a spell on you so that you won't get cursed again.{nl}The integrator moves by consuming my vitality so it's easy for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000262
text: The guys who abandoned me and laughed at me can't be called our colleagues.{nl}I will get my revenge by killing them. I will make them regret that they treated me {nl}like a source of magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000263
text: Well done. My death is near.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000264
text: The next barrier stone is up there. {nl}We have to put in great power all at once. Like an explosion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000265
text: Okay... there was a grave robber among the ones who were sacrificed.{nl}I tried to lead myself into death using a bomb, but it was useless.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000266
text: We should not forget about the core of the barrier stone.{nl}To avoid being cursed again, I will cast a spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000267
text: How come I never thought about this.{nl}Maybe my loyalty has surpassed the fear of loneliness.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000268
text: The last barrier stone must be exploding by now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000269
text: As the monsters were being petrified, their last breaths were also solidified... {nl}Throw those against barrier stones.{nl}They will gradually collapse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000270
text: The core of the barrier stone is composed of condensed spirits.{nl}We will make orbs by collecting those that would destroy the integrator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000271
text: I will put the last of my power into the cores of the barrier stones which you've collected.{nl}Pull out monsters' detonators with this and make an orb.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000272
text: Of course, I will give you a method to make the orb.{nl}The orb that would destroy the integrator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000273
text: And, please fulfill my last wish.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000274
text: I've handed over the method to make the orb with my power.{nl}It will be easy to make an orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000275
text: Succeeded...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000276
text: Do you know the meaning of the name Giltine?{nl}Her name means death. The only thing that I can rely on at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000277
text: I once thought that I didn't care what I turn myself into if it was for the demons long ago.{nl}But, only the Petrifying Frost blew to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000278
text: I started to slowly harden over hundreds of years.{nl}My name has been erased from everyone's minds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000279
text: Even if she doesn't bring me eternal rest, it will be better than now.{nl}I just want to rest...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000280
text: Death is coming to me.{nl}I feel good.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000281
text: Yes. That's it. Give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000282
text: Within the keepsakes you've found for me...{nl}There must be some parts that will fix the detector at the Coastal Fortress.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000283
text: Here it is. {nl}The repair shouldn't be that hard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000284
text: The Royal Army was taught that they should be loyal and honorable to the kingdom.{nl}And to be committed to due diligence when engaging in their duties.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000285
text: You came back a long way.{nl}So these are the parts to fix the petrification detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000286
text: It must have been hard to obtain the parts, but the repair itself shouldn't be that hard.{nl}Let's return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000287
text: Pillar

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000288
text: (It seems like something is written on the pillar.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000289
text: (It seems that some letters are visible, but I can't clearly see them.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000290
text: To be able to read the letters, you must have a piece of the symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000291
text: {nl}You can obtain the piece of the symbol somewhere in Galeed Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000292
text: (Something is written, but is not legible.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000293
text: (It seems that something is written on it, but it can't be read in this condition.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000294
text: That ring was given to me by my mother.{nl}I want to go back home with it, back to where my mother is...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000295
text: Our house is in the inner castle district...{nl}Please... I want to go back home with the ring...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000296
text: Yes. Gailus Legwyn is my old friend...{nl}But even an old friend shouldn't just take a precious object and not return it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000297
text: If her father is dead, then she should pay for the debt!{nl}Besides, I didn't even see that lady named Justina.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000298
text: I don't care who she is. It doesn't matter as long as she brings back my object.{nl}I don't care if that woman really is his daughter or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000299
text: I'm not doing any more trades.{nl}Why do I have to experience this kind of shame?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000300
text: I want to see Justina...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000301
text: I feel like I age a hundred years whenever I deal with Pardoners.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000302
text: If I can get back what's mine, I won't return to this place.{nl}His daughter is a successful woman, so she can take care of it.{nl}You better not get involved with these guys.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000303
text: Mesafasla Assistant Commander Gomen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000304
text: This place is a military strategic point and it is also a dangerous area.{nl}You should be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000305
text: It is hard to maintain the army after the supplies stopped coming from the lower land.{nl}The problem is that the circumstances down there are more severe.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000306
text: We better do our duty fast...{nl}We just have to hang tight a little longer...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000307
text: I am not sure how to return to the army.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000308
text: Soldier Baskez

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000309
text: It will be our end if we sleep here.{nl}We better move our unit a little bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000310
text: We are going to freeze to death instead of dying from hunger.{nl}Are there any better options?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000311
text: Thank you so much for saving me last time.{nl}I want to help you, but I am tied to the army...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000312
text: This place is too cold.{nl}You can clearly see that I can't even move my neck an inch.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000313
text: Military Courier Rochez

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000314
text: I have an important duty to do, but those guys are troubling me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000315
text: Mesafasla is suffering because of the monsters, though this place is also harsh.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000316
text: I was able to return to the army because of you. Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000317
text: I don't know why I volunteered myself to be a military courier.{nl}My tasks are becoming harder ever since the monsters went crazy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000318
text: Supply Officer Ronda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000319
text: Supplies are running out, but we still have many people.{nl}You know, I actually rather wish that they would all run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000320
text: We get some supplies from hunting the monsters nearby... It's not enough, though...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000321
text: There are some potatoes that are growing at Skaika Supply Route.{nl}It's not hard to pick them up...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000322
text: I am the only supply officer on duty, so I don't have time to pick those potatoes.{nl}If by any chance you visit that place, I would appreciate if you got me some potatoes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000323
text: I feel embarassed to have asked you this...{nl}I'm sorry, but I don't have any other choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000324
text: I won't have any strength to fight by just eating meat.{nl}Everyone knows it's important to eat a variety of food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000325
text: Since this place is colder than other areas, it is important to consume nutritious food.{nl}As a supply officer, I am having a hard time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000326
text: An outsider is better at going down the mountains.{nl}You will either freeze to death or die from hunger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000327
text: Although the kingdom has become famous, we are still soldiers.{nl}This is a military zone. Please leave you are not an official.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000328
text: I heard that this place was used as a workshop.{nl}We are able to find old materials easily, but the problem is the food shortage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000329
text: I am worried since the number of my men who are running away is increasing.{nl}Our supplies will last longer, but I am worried that I may become the only one left.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000330
text: Injured People in the Tent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000331
text: Rrr... Master...{nl}The pain is too much for me...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000332
text: Mom... I miss you... Urgg...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000333
text: Mage Horace

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000334
text: Thanks for saving me.{nl}But, if we don't act now, we won't be able to hold out much longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000335
text: I am still an apprentice, so there isn't much I can do.{nl}I'd have to utilize my knowledge that I gained from reading books.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000336
text: Soldier Motimer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000337
text: If he didn't have a firm control on the workshop's warehouse, {nl}we wouldn't have suffered so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000338
text: Are they suffering like us because of the monsters down there?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000339
text: Where has Goddess Zemyna gone to...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000340
text: We came this far so it must not be wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000341
text: Avoiding the Petrifying Frost

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000342
text: Ask what happens if we help

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000343
text: Thanks for saving me, but I will leave now

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000344
text: Look for another way

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000345
text: I can't help you

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000346
text: I will stay here for a while

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000347
text: I will go fix the petrification detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000348
text: I need a moment to prepare more

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000349
text: The detector starts to activate!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000350
text: The parts aren't well secured.{nl}We should obtain some kind of straos from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000351
text: Something that will hold the parts together is needed

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000352
text: Ask her to guide the spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000353
text: Listen closely

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000354
text: Looking at the barrier stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000355
text: You feel like your spirit is being pulled into the barrier stone!{nl}We should look for someone who can fix this quickly!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000356
text: I can't help the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000357
text: I will go back

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000358
text: I will think about it for a while

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000359
text: I will go get some holy water

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000360
text: I can't cooperate with that

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000361
text: For Death (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000362
text: I will destroy the integrator

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000363
text: I will stop helping

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000364
text: About the integrator

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000365
text: You hear the movement of monsters!{nl}Destroy the barrier stones by avoiding the monster's attacks!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000366
text: For Death (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000367
text: I will go collect some explosives

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000368
text: Lighting up the explosive

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000369
text: The barrier stone has been destroyed due to a great explosion!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000370
text: For Death( 3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000371
text: Putting the orb in place

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000372
text: Say Farewell

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000373
text: Help

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000374
text: Look at the petrification detector at the entrance of the Coastal Fortress

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000375
text: Escape from the Petrifying Frost

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000376
text: The Petrifying Frost blows against you as you try to check the detector. {nl}Get to a safe place to avoid the Petrifying Frost!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000377
text: You were able to escape safely from the Petrifying Frost thanks to Kupole Meile. {nl}Talk with Kupole Meile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000378
text: In order for Kupole Meile to guide the spirits safely from the Petrifying Frost, {nl}check all the detectors that you haven't been to in this region.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000379
text: Discuss the circumstances with Kupole Meile

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000380
text: You've checked all four detectors except for the detector at the entrance. {nl}Now, go back to Kupole Meile and tell her about the circumstances.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000381
text: It seems that Kupole Meile will be able to guide the spirits safely after repairing the detector. {nl}Talk with Kupole Meile again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000382
text: Meet Soldier Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000383
text: Kupole Meile told you that the kingdom soldiers would know the most since they set the {nl}detectors. Go meet Retia at Verkti Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000384
text: It seems that Retia knows that the detector at the Coastal Fortress is already broken. {nl}Talk with Retia about the detector that is not activating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000385
text: Look for the reinforcement's whereabouts at the Coastal Fortress

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000386
text: Chase after the volunteers who had been dispatched to the Coastal Fortress. {nl}If there are no survivors, then we should at least collect their keepsakes. {nl}There's a possibility that monsters stole them so you better hunt the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000387
text: Hand them over to the soldier, Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000388
text: Unfortunately, there aren't any survivors. Go back to Retia since you've collected all keepsakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000389
text: Go meet Retia and talk about the repair of the detector at the Coastal Fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000390
text: Go meet Retia and talk about the repair of the detector at the Coastal Fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000391
text: Return to Kupole Meile

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000392
text: You are now ready to fix the detector. Talk with Kupole Meile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000393
text: Repair the detector at the dock

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000394
text: Help Kupole Meile to guide the spirits safely by repairing the detector at the dock.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000395
text: You've defeated all the monsters that suddenly appeared. Now, you will be able to repair the detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000396
text: Repair the detector at Skida Bastion

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000397
text: Go repair the detector at Skida Bastion in order for Kupole Meile to guide the spirits safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000398
text: Collect the straps

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000399
text: In order to fix the detector, you will need some kind of strap that will hold the parts well in place. Obtain some straps from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000400
text: Acquired all the straps that will be used to hold the parts. To help Kupole Meile to guide the spirit safely, repair the detector at Skida Bastion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000401
text: Look at the suspicious barrier stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000402
text: It seems like an unknown barrier stone keeps calling me. {nl}Are we going to know more if we look at it more carefully?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000403
text: Look for someone who will be helpful

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000404
text: Your stamina keeps decreasing as if you are losing your spirit. Quickly find someone who can fix this situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000405
text: Talk with Demon Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000406
text: Demon Svitrigaila is muttering something that that is difficult to understand. I hope you somehow heard his story.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000407
text: Collect the Poisonous Plant growing in the Zinios Survey Office

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000408
text: Demon Svitrigaila told you that he will remove the curse from you if you help him die. Obtain Poisonous Plant from the Zinios Survey Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000409
text: Hand over the Poisonous Plant to Demon Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000410
text: It seems like you've obtained all the Poisonous Plant Demon Svitrigaila wanted. Hand them over to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000411
text: Talk with the Cleric Master on how to obtain the crystal that Svitrigaila needs

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000412
text: Return to Demon Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000413
text: The Cleric Master has told you that he can't help the demons. It is unfortunate, but please tell this to Demon Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000414
text: It seems that the Poisonous Plant isn't effective on Demon Svitrigaila. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000415
text: Demon Svitrigaila wants to die using the crystal since the Poisonous Plant isn't effective. {nl}Meet with the Cleric Master and obtain the holy water.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000416
text: For Death

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000417
text: It seems that Demon Svitrigaila already knows about it. Talk to him again what he should do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000418
text: Destroy the barrier stone at Dvus Street

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000419
text: Demon Svitrigaila will die when you destroy the integrator using the barrier stone. Destroy the barrier stone that is protecting the integrator and collect the cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000420
text: You've collected the cores by destroying the barrier stones at Dvus Street. and over the core to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000421
text: Destroy the barrier stone and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000422
text: Destroy the barrier stone and collect the cores

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000423
text: Talk with Svitrigaila what you should do to destroy the next barrier stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000424
text: Collect the bombs from the petrified grave robbers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000425
text: Demon Svitrigaila told you that the next barrier stone can be destroyed using the bomb. Collect the bombs from the petrified grave robbers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000426
text: Destroy the barrier stone at Bakaleja Market Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000427
text: It seems like you would be able to destroy the barrier stone using those bombs. Destroy the barrier stone using the bombs at Bakaleja Market Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000428
text: Talk with Svitrigaila about what you should do to destroy the last barrier stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000429
text: Destroy the barrier at the Watchtower

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000430
text: In order to destroy the last barrier stone, Svitrigaila has told you that she needs the last breath of the monsters. Obtain the last breath that turned into a stone from the petrified monsters and throw it against the barrier stone at the surveillance watch tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000431
text: Hand over the core of the barrier stone to Demon Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000432
text: You've destroyed all the barrier stones and obtained the cores. Hand over the cores of the barrier stones to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000433
text: You've destroyed all the barrier stones and obtained the cores so talk with Demon Svitrigaila about what you should do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000434
text: Craft Svitrigaila's Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000435
text: Demon Svitrigaila has asked you to create the orbs that would destroy the integrator. Obtain detonators from the petrified monsters and use the craft manuals to create Svitrigaila's Orbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000436
text: Destroy the integrator at the Collapsed Temple Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000437
text: You've created Svitrigaila's Orb. Take this orb to the integrator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000438
text: Destroy the integrator

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000439
text: The time to destroy the integrator has come. {nl}Take Svitrigaila's Orb and destroy the integrator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000440
text: As Svitrigaila puts down the orb, the monsters who felt the power are gathering near it. {nl}Defeat the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000441
text: The integrator has been destroyed. Return to Svitrigaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000442
text: Listen to the last words of Demon Svitrigaila

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000443
text: Now is the time to listen to the wishes of Demon Svitrigaila. Listen to his words.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000444
text: You've pulled out the Poisonous Plant!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000445
text: Collecting the Last Breath

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151001_000446
text: Acquired the last breath!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000447
text: That ring was given to me by my mom. {nl}She told me to help Ruklys and win.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000448
text: Although Ruklys has passed away, this long lasting war doesn't look like it's going to end.{nl}He... Where is Eminent?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000449
text: I don't care what happens now.{nl}I want to return to the house where my mom is with this ring.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000450
text: Examining the Soldier's Grave

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000451
text: Let's help

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000452
text: Putting down the ring

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000453
text: Examine the Soldier's Grave

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000454
text: There is a grave of a soldier that looks very old. Take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000455
text: Defeat the resentment that rushed in

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000456
text: Suddenly a monster came to attack the soldier's spirit. You better destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000457
text: The Resentful Soldier's Spirit seems to be somewhat calm. {nl}Talk with the Resentful Soldier's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000458
text: The spirit seems to have some story. Talk with the Resentful Soldier's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151016_000459
text: The Resentful Soldier's Spirit wants to go back to the house where his mother is with the ring. Go to the soldier's house which is located inside the castle walls with the ring.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000460
text: This city... is very sad.{nl}I am guiding the spirits that were attacked by the {nl}Petrifying Frost with the wishes of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000461
text: The sound of sighs from the spirits that weren't able to {nl}go near the goddesses breaks my heart.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000462
text: (It seems that something is written on it.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000463
text: (It seems that something is written on it, but you can't see it clearly due to a shadow.){nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000464
text: (If I can get something that shines brightly, will I be able to read what's written on it?)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000465
text: (You can see a hole which you can insert something into.){nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000466
text: (Are we going to look for it somewhere around here?)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000467
text: (Something is written on it, but it is too vague.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000468
text: (Something is written on it, but you can't see it clearly.)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000469
text: If you meet someone who is related to the kingdom, please tell him this.{nl}We are still diligently working on our duties.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000470
text: May the goddesses protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000471
text: You are a rude, arrogant man.{nl}I suffered a loss, why can't you understand this?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000472
text: You are a shameless swindler.{nl}I don't know why Justina's father has a friend like him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000473
text: It is so fortunate that we found the Justina's family treasures.{nl}However I have a few things to say to that Pardoner!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000474
text: Who really was that girl.{nl}Justina though... should we tell her the truth?.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000475
text: Be careful. Soon, the Petrifying Frost will blow. {nl}But, we don't know when...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000476
text: Is the detector at the supply route working alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000477
text: We may receive some help from Retia at Verkti Square.{nl}It's hard for us, Kupoles, to be related in human matters so I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000478
text: We've already given up one salvation, and we couldn't do anything on Medzio Diena.{nl}We can't give up anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000479
text: Are you the Revelator?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000480
text: That's sad. So sad.{nl}You are like me. They can't get out of it even if they are tied up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000481
text: Don't be afraid.{nl}I can't hurt you and you can't hurt me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000482
text: If your friend really is a Bokor, he might be able to identify {nl}the true nature of that sacred object.{nl}I want to find out what this is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000483
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth went into Carlyle's Mausoleum.{nl}Be careful. They're not crazy as you might think.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000484
text: They are making fun of it by using the name of the goddesses. {nl}They shouldn't insult the dead like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000485
text: We want to find that regious body and punish them... {nl}The eternal rest of the deads is the first thing that we should do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000486
text: Margiris is on the way to Carlyle's Mausoleum.{nl}If you take the proof of the truth I gave to you to Margiris,{nl}he will acknowledge your achievements.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000487
text: Margiris is one of the greatest leaders in our Order.{nl}He is the one who raised me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000488
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth has already relieved {nl}the spirits whose bodies have rotted away.{nl}Relieve the sins of Carlyle. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000489
text: The documents with his sins written on it would lead his spirit to the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000490
text: Carlyle is a sinful spirit.{nl}Similarly sinful spirits will soon become one with the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000491
text: Damn, what was that explosion?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000492
text: Suddenly, an explosion was heard from somewhere and the monsters started to go crazy.{nl}You didn't cause those, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000493
text: Thank you so much for helping me back then.{nl}But, an outsider should not enter this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000494
text: Originally outsiders were chased out of here...{nl}Since Delus needs your help, theres nothing we can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000495
text: The monsters suddenly rushed out so we lost the post and many of our colleagues were hurt.{nl}There hasn't been anything like this before...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000496
text: While I was protecting the Fortress of the Land, this thing never occurred even once.{nl}I was scouted as an elite from my kingdom, but my pride was hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000497
text: This is the first time that I receive help from outsiders.{nl}We have to drive them out, but I don't know how I can accept this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000498
text: Delus must have some ideas.{nl}Thanks for saving me, but I don't know what I should do in this situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000499
text: If I take little more rest, I can move fast.{nl}I can fight little more even if I don't receive help from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000500
text: Are the guys at the outpost really patrolling?{nl}Letting in an outsider... I say you don't need any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000501
text: I know that you've saved me. However, an outsider is an outsider.{nl}I don't know what Delus is thinking, but please leave quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000502
text: If I a get little more rest, this wound will be fine.{nl}I don't need your help so please go after you finish the task Delus requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000503
text: We are ready to charge into the enemy's position.{nl}If you're scared, you better back out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000504
text: Now is the time to get our revenge on those guys.{nl}We will charge in as soon as we receive the order!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000505
text: I was careless due to the sudden attack.{nl}I am not scared of those kind of monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000506
text: My injuries don't hurt much now that I've gotten enough rest.{nl}I just want to reclaim the outpost quickly!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000507
text: We can reclaim the outpost ourselves without your help.{nl}I don't know what Delus is worried about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000508
text: If we begin to think about losing, then we will lose.{nl}We are going reclaim the outpost!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000509
text: I am waiting for Delus' orders.{nl}Now is the time to get our revenge!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000510
text: I am not going to lose the outpost again.{nl}For the honor of the Royal Army!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000511
text: You fight better than I expected.{nl}I'm a bit surprised.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000512
text: I feel good, but I also feel uncomfortable since we've received help from an outsider.{nl}Now, please get going.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000513
text: Delus said he won't ask why you came here so we aren't going to say anything.{nl}However please leave now since we've reclaimed the outpost.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000514
text: It starts now.{nl}We can't be relaxed since we don't know when they will come again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000515
text: Outsiders are forbidden to enter this place due to the king's command.{nl}We really appreciate for your help, but there is nothing we can about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000516
text: Now, you better go to the outpost area.{nl}Or how long are you planning to stay at the Fortress of the Land?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000517
text: That outpost was to be recovered without your help.{nl}However, you fought well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000518
text: We are not going to lose the outpost anymore.{nl}There won't be anymore instances where we would receive help from an {nl}outsider like you again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000519
text: I'm thinking of suggesting plans to Delus about strengthening our outpost.{nl}I don't want to experience such shames again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000520
text: I can't just sit around forever.{nl}All because we don't know when the monsters will attack again while having to {nl}block outsiders like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000521
text: Damn, theres nothing we can do.{nl}We better just follow their instructions for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000522
text: That thing is giving me a headache.{nl}However, I can't just leave someone who is in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000523
text: Those soldiers just don't listen to us.{nl}We've helped them so far, are they just going to cast us away?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000524
text: I've listened to him as much as I can... now what do we do?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000525
text: My god... How could this happen...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000526
text: No. We should get a grip on ourselves. {nl}We would have never entered here if we were going to lose our energy like this.{nl}Let's enter the portal for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000527
text: What is this terrible curse?{nl}And that demon earlier... What the hell is going on here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000528
text: Although I've seen the Petrifying Frost many times, {nl}seeing something like this for the first time was really surprising.{nl}Let's get in the portal for now. We can't stop for things like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000529
text: It was something ridiculously huge and powerful.{nl}I'm sure this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000530
text: That was a fearful amount of power.{nl}What is this Monocle seeing...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000531
text: Don't forget to leave a message about creating a verification ticket.{nl}If you don't have that then I'll have to pointlessly wait for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000532
text: Please get the attention of that old man.{nl}I have something else I'd like to know. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000533
text: Let's go our separate ways, but we'll keep in touch. Alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000534
text: You told me that you will meet someone called Eminent at the battlefield right?{nl}Let's go together. We'll be sure when we see the Monocle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000535
text: The person who used to live 600 years ago may be alive? and He has allied with demons?{nl}These facts are so unbelievable that its giving me a headache.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000536
text: Just listen to whatever Eminent has to say for now.{nl}Then we'll meet at the Paramiso Battle Field in secret. Okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000537
text: I'm really glad Eminent doesn't know that I'm here.{nl}I will prepare it so please don't forget to come to Paramiso Battle Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000538
text: Me? I'm about to start my work.{nl}We've found some clues so we should be able to find it quickly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000539
text: Thanks to Eminent, we found a lot of things that the Knights of Kaliss may like.{nl}I haven't gotten my share yet, so I'll stay here little longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000540
text: We should retreat...{nl}Or else we'll get wiped out...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000541
text: Come blow the horn to retreat...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000542
text: We need to destroy all these tombstones.{nl}Now, we should stop looking for the goddesses and look at the reality.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000543
text: That's disgusting. There must be more people who've crossed paths with these hooligans.{nl}They're not trying to use brute force, but rather take it apart from the inside...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000544
text: The demon's control over the area is getting weaker.{nl}No, it's not prominent, but I smell something very dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000545
text: Unless we hear from Damiyonas again, we'll be stopping here.{nl}Don't break the tombstones anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000546
text: When someone has an emptiness in their heart,{nl}it makes it very easy for evil to force themselves in.{nl}To prevent this you must have strong faith.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000547
text: That's really creepy.{nl}Now those demons are blending in with the humans and causing trouble...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000548
text: Next time, don't ever destroy the tombstones. {nl}How were these tombstones even created...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000549
text: We should look for another way while we wait for Fabijus.{nl}Can you ask Barte for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000550
text: I've heard the name Albinas before.{nl}Moreover, Nestoses and Anstoses still respect each other.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000551
text: Fabijus...{nl}I hope nothing happens to him...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000552
text: Nestoses knows how to face the demons.{nl}If you explain your situation, he'll help for sure!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000553
text: It would have been really dangerous without you.{nl}Demons... If we don't get any help we won't be able to advance from my position.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000554
text: The symbol of Baiga, that symbol is being used by the demons' minions.{nl}I've never seen any human use that symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000555
text: The demons among the humans, what can we rely on now?{nl}What can we trust outside of the goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000556
text: Have you ever seen the Great Cathedral or the Mage Tower before?{nl}How about a gigantic goddess statue like the one in Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000557
text: Do you think construction of that size can be completed by one individual?{nl}Of course not. Even if the kingdom does it, it's going to be difficult acquiring all the materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000558
text: There's a famous merchants' organization that used to supply the {nl}materials of the great construction

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000559
text: Until now, we've been secretly helping the kingdom in the shadows {nl}in the name of the goddesses...{nl}From now on, we are going to help the world as much as we can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000560
text: Well, now that we've been revealed, it will be nothing but awful and tough times ahead.{nl}Such as becoming a target of the demons, for example.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000561
text: However that's a common thing. We've done it once in danger before.{nl}Let's do well comrades, for the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000562
text: The rest can be easily done, so we'll take care of it.{nl}Thank you for helping me so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000563
text: There are lots of objects to retrieve here, aside from Manahas.{nl}Some objects should not fall into the hands of demons so I am worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000564
text: There will be more newcomers from now on, so I am planning to make more manuals.{nl}We've obtained all we could so we don't have to worry anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000565
text: It's good that the merchants are coming out to the world, {nl}but I am not sure if they would be able to keep their lives.{nl}But, even so, we are not doing something that we are not familiar with so it doesn't matter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000566
text: The kingdom hasn't been fallen to the demons yet.{nl}If we do our best, we will find peace again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000567
text: The rest of the work is in Orsha.{nl}Thank you so much for helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000568
text: Nestoses are making tombstones without countermeasures.{nl}When the corrupted tombstones are corrupted, it'll start attracting monsters too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000569
text: That's not us, and I am sure there isn't such name in Anastoses.{nl}Though, who is Albinas anyways?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000570
text: She is so disgraceful. The woman named Albinas...{nl}I don't know why she broke the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000571
text: We were making a tombstone that would help the goddesses.{nl}We are going to collect the sacred energy and {nl}send it to the goddesses through the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000572
text: We're going to collapse easily if we don't have something to rely on.{nl}That's why the belief of the goddesses is more important.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000573
text: I don't have any energy.{nl}I am investigating about the differences in views between Nestoses and Anastoses... {nl}I miss my research room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000574
text: There is only one belief, but the views can be diverse.{nl}Like Nestoses and Anastoses there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000575
text: Even so, this won't cause a big difference or an argument.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000576
text: I am on a pilgrimage to the former kingdom.{nl}I recently arrived to this camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000577
text: When I first started my pilgrimage, I would hear the sounds of sighs wherever I go...{nl}It seems things look a little more hopeful now thanks to the reveletors.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000578
text: Everyone misses the peaceful world four years ago.{nl}Anastoses told us that we should look more into reality if we want to go back to those days.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000579
text: If we don't believe in the goddesses, then who else is going to trust the goddesses.{nl}Us Nestoses think this is the reality.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000580
text: Are you the one who broke the tombstone?{nl}Is it really...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000581
text: I've heard that the demons are impersonating Anastoses.{nl}But, we are not going to argue for such matters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000582
text: We Anastoses are focusing more on the realities than Nestoses.{nl}We can't just do nothing while waiting for the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000583
text: However we all serve the goddesses and focus on our faith.{nl}That's why we are on our pilgrimage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000584
text: It was so scary when Albinas turned into a Fire Lord and started to attack me.{nl}Thank you so much for helping us returning to the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000585
text: Kedora Merchants welcome you.{nl}If you have anything to ask, come to me anytime!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000586
text: Ah, is this the first time you've seen our merchants?{nl}I fully understand. It's because we've only done our business in secret.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000587
text: More details can be heard from Leopoldas.{nl}I'm very busy so I will take my leave...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000588
text: We, of the Kedora Merchant Alliance, follow the will of the goddesses, {nl}but we only acted behind the scenes.{nl}Now that the world is in chaos, we can't just stand still.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000589
text: That's why we've decided to be more engaged in it.{nl}Even if we become a target of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000590
text: We, of the Kedora Merchant Alliance, will actively recruit newcomers.{nl}Are you interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000591
text: There are many things to learn since we are still newcomers.{nl}Although, Leopoldas only insists on the pride...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000592
text: There are still many notice boards to set, but I can do the rest myself.{nl}I can do it. Probably...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000593
text: I am a newcomer of the Kedora Merchant Alliance. I will serve them well!{nl}I decided to join as soon as I heard that the Kedora Merchant Alliance {nl}was recruiting newcomers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000594
text: It is my duty to help the Revelators in the name of the Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}From now on, I will be keep doing this task until I become more experienced.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000595
text: Collection Member

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000596
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance is retrieving the objects that were lost on Medzio Diena.{nl}Jurate is in charge of this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000597
text: Record Member

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000598
text: I do all the work related to the Kedora Merchant Alliance records.{nl}Such as identifying the quantities of the things that need to be recorded.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000599
text: I am managing the manuals that will be used to teach the newcomers.{nl}This too, is part of the Kedora Merchant Alliance records.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000600
text: I am praying all the time for the return of the goddesses.{nl}Although I am old, I am trying to do everythig I can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000601
text: I've never heard of it, but it doesn't matter that much.{nl}They concentrate on their religious belief quietly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000602
text: I couldn't stand anymore so I came out to look for the materials of the scriptures.{nl}The goddesses would... come back one day right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000603
text: I want to go back to Fasika Plateau fast after finding what I lost...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000604
text: When I talk to him, I feel like I'm aging 100 years.{nl}I don't know what to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000605
text: If I only got mine back, I would've never come back here.{nl}He can go do whatever he wants since his daughter's career is so successful!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000606
text: You better not get involved with those guys.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000607
text: This is a strategic military point and it is a dangerous place.{nl}You better be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000608
text: After the supplies stopped coming from the mountain below, {nl}it became harder to maintain the army.{nl}However, the bigger problem is that the situation down there seem worse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000609
text: We better get to our mission fast...{nl}Just a little bit more...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000610
text: It is so freezing cold.{nl}I am not sure how long we can stand...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000611
