text: This will be the end if we fall asleep here.{nl}We better move our bodies constantly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000612
text: We do our task everyday amidst life and death.{nl}But, if I hadn't met you today... I can only say that I was lucky.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000613
text: The unfinished mission is still bothering me.{nl}The assistant commander says it's okay, but I don't think it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000614
text: Shh, please lower your voice.{nl}I'm hiding to avoid getting detected by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000615
text: If I take a quick rest, I should be able to move out...{nl}What to do with this letter...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000616
text: I was able to complete the mission and return to the camp safely.{nl}I knew the goddesses haven't abandoned me yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000617
text: I don't know why I applied to become a messenger.{nl}Regardless of the weather, the monsters are going crazy so my task is getting harder.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000618
text: The supplies are running out, but I haven't received any contact from the kingdom yet.{nl}But, since I am a supply officer, I am thinking how we would endure more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000619
text: We're really lacking a lot. In everything.{nl}Although, we are self-sufficient enough from hunting monsters nearby...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000620
text: Oh, I shouldn't think about negative things.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000621
text: Civilians better go down the mountains.{nl}If they stay here, they would either die of hunger or freeze to death.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000622
text: Although the kingdom has become ineffective, we are still soldiers.{nl}This is a military zone and if you are not related to the military, please leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000623
text: Thanks to you, Horace's condition has improved.{nl}I hope he can relax a bit now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000624
text: Although orders from the kingdom have stopped, {nl}we are staying here because we are soldiers.{nl}The same holds true for Horace. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000625
text: If someone doesn't do it, the kingdom will collapse.{nl}Our homes too, there will be no one left to protect our families.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000626
text: I thought... I was going to enter the goddesses' embrace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000627
text: Though, I learned something as a result.{nl}Some things that the monsters eat aren't always edible.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000628
text: I'm planning to stay here until I receive contact from the kingdom.{nl}We need to rely on each other despite being cornered so the soldiers won't give up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000629
text: Although this place is known as an important strategic military point, {nl}there are not many soldiers around.{nl}This place is that harsh.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000630
text: This place used to be a forced labor camp.{nl}I don't know how people worked in this extreme cold, {nl}but I personally would have survived well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000631
text: I've come here after hearing that the goddesses blessed the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}Though I only see the dead.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000632
text: I thought I would be able to find out the whereabouts of Goddess Zemyna, {nl}but this place is full of the dead...{nl}I've never seen something like this. We have to hurry and meet with Zemyna.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000633
text: The dead have suddenly risen.{nl}The Bokor is going around destroying the coffins. What the hell is going on...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000634
text: I've never seen this in my life.{nl}It was such a chaos on Medzio Diena, but those dead as well?{nl}It can't be...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000635
text: I think those people in the Order are all scammers.{nl}I am certain that Zemyna would've never blessed this church.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000636
text: Those people went crazy on the graves...{nl}I'm very embarassed to see Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000637
text: The Divine Tree is not a symbol of disaster.{nl}It is the symbol of the great determination that will save us all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000638
text: There will soon be a day where you will recognize the grace of the Divine Tree.{nl}How about you join the Order of the Tree of Truth?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000639
text: Ahh... I... could not be saved...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000640
text: I was foolish... I was really foolish...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000641
text: Do you believe in salvation?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000642
text: Those who believe in the goddesses are fools. {nl}The Divine Tree, which still stands in the kingdom's capital, will save you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000643
text: You should't want salvation that easily.{nl}Think about what you've done for the Divine Tree before you {nl}request something from the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000644
text: The act of awakening the dead and disturbing their eternal rest is what they call the truth?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000645
text: While I was alive, I managed the lands of the kingdom, {nl}yet they called me someone guilty of high treason.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000646
text: Ayaya... The claws of those ferrets are so sharp...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000647
text: The villagers here are not fond of outsiders.{nl}Would it be better to not ask for their favor?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000648
text: I've never seen you before... Who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000649
text: The Revelator from the folklore has appeared to save us...{nl}Thank you... Everyone was waiting for you...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000650
text: Uh-huh... Why are you still here...?{nl}You better not miss the girl.{nl}Go after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000651
text: Who are you? I've never seen you around here.{nl}Even with just the village men it's tiring,{nl}if you don't have anything to do can you tell them to stop talking...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000652
text: Oh! The Revelator...{nl}It is so good to see you.{nl}Please take care of the village...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000653
text: Let's go see if those ferrets ate the beef jerky...{nl}Would it be dangerous?{nl}I am curious...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000654
text: Who are you? Is this your first time here?{nl}Have you gotten the permission from the village headman?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000655
text: The Revelator from folklore...{nl}I've heard it from the village priest. You saved him using some kind of light, right?{nl}That light... I want to see it one day too!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000656
text: Ah... After setting up the sculpture, those ferrets became more violent?{nl}That's probably because the sculpture wasn't completed yet...{nl}My apologies Widas...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000657
text: Oh... Hello...{nl}I am sorry... but if you don't have any business here please leave now...{nl}Right now, the atmosphere in this town is bad...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000658
text: Revelator! Are you the Revelator from folklore who will save the village with the light?{nl}I saw it. Your splendid light...{nl}If it wasn't for that light, I would have already been attacked by those ferrets.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000659
text: Great Priest of the Village

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000660
text: What... If you don't have any business here, please go back...{nl}This village is already done for...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000661
text: Revelator... Revelator... No... our village is already done...{nl}You came too late... it won't make any difference now...{nl}Our village was already done for when Goddess Lada was captured...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000662
text: ...No... This isn't it...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000663
text: It's so good to hear that you've come here to save the village.{nl}Welcome. I am Dievdirbys Widas.{nl}I am creating sculptures to turn those ferrets back to what they used to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000664
text: The ferrets have become more violent... I feel like I've made demonic totems...{nl}I guess I better create new ones from scratch...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000665
text: Uh? Revelator... Why did you arrive so early...{nl}I will take a look at this place, so please help the villagers first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000666
text: Please follow the girl and save the villagers and Goddess Lada...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000667
text: I knew that you could do it!{nl}Thank you. Thank you so much.{nl}I want to thank Goddess Laima who guided you to this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000668
text: Thank you for saving this village.{nl}However, since those ferrets are still going crazy, I better make the sculpture quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000669
text: Thank you for saving the village and Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000670
text: That is so amazing that you managed to defeat the Demon Lord!{nl}Because of you, the ferrets won't steal our food anymore.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000671
text: Thanks. I am grateful of Goddess Laima who has brought you here.{nl}You are a blessing to our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000672
text: I hope those ferrets get a hold of themselves soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000673
text: If those ferrets are attacking us with that in mind...{nl}We wouldn't need to fight... Right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000674
text: Thank you for saving this village.{nl}You have defeated the Demon Lord and rescued the goddess.{nl}Now, we can concentrate on the ferrets.{nl}I thank you from the bottom of my heart for reducing the worries of this village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000675
text: Thank you for defeating the Demon Lord and saving the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000676
text: Since the goddesses have come back now, we can rebuild the shrine with our villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000677
text: Thank you for resolving the village's disaster.{nl}I underestimated you... and for that, I apologize...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000678
text: As Goddess Laima foretold, you've saved our village... {nl}Thank you... Really, thank you...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000679
text: Dear Savior... I've heard that you helped the villagers while {nl}I was captured by the Demon Lord.{nl}You've completed a task that I was supposed to do...{nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151022_000680
text: Savior... The future of this world depends on the path you take from here on.{nl}Go... Walk the way of salvation by following the revelation of Laima...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151102_000681
text: Patient in the Tent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151102_000682
text: Hurk... Don't talk to me.{nl}I feel like throwing up...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151102_000683
text: I shouldn't lie around in a time like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000684
text: Of course I won!{nl}However, I said I dropped the necklace I recieved as evidence from the guy into the sea.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000685
text: Back then, I gave up because the sea was too deep...{nl}Even now I'm not sure if I can still find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000686
text: If I can find it, I think I will be able to deal a blow to those who says I am a bluff.{nl}It's near Kranto Coast. I recognized you as a Corsair, so you should be able to find it quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000687
text: A Centurion knows how to dedicate himself for the kingdom...{nl}He should know its honor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000688
text: I am looking for the flags of a few soldiers who were annihilated on Medzio Diena.{nl}I want you to help me with this, for the honor of these soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000689
text: I've heard that there were soldiers who lost contact at the Drill Ground of Confliction{nl}on Medzio Diena. We didn't expect them to be alive though...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000690
text: At least we will be able to remember the dedicated loyalty the army had towards the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000691
text: If you are a Doppelsoeldner, there is a task that you should do for the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000692
text: I want to do it myself, but I'm doing some quiet work. {nl}I will be spotted easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000693
text: I appreciate you telling me that. {nl}Please look for Commander Ramin's delegate secretly. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000694
text: The last contact we had was receieved from Fasika Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000695
text: That's so unfortunate. They've probably been attacked by the demons.{nl}Anyways, you have all of my support now that you've {nl}become a valuable member of the Doppelsoeldners.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000696
text: Ah, please keep this a secret from the others.{nl}I will find another way to contact General Ramin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000697
text: It is recorded. {nl}This is good, I will pass this to Vaidotas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000698
text: It is my turn to help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000699
text: I don't know why, but there is a strong grudge swirling at Videntis Shrine.{nl}If you could get me that, I will lead you to a higher level.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000700
text: Ah, you've arrived at a good time.{nl}I am investigating the Crystal Mine, but the toxic gas is leaking out again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000701
text: Good.{nl}Let's first create the neutralizer to neutralize the toxic gas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000702
text: First, I need you to get me the materials so we can prepare it.{nl}I'll write down the necessary materials and where you cand find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000703
text: This will be enough.{nl}We were able to finish this quickly because of your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000704
text: It will take some time before we can extract the substances...{nl}In the meantime, I will teach you alchemy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000705
text: You're here. Good.{nl}The last stage to becoming a Rogue... This is what you really want, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000706
text: To prove your skills as a Rogue...{nl}I have an idea that will also solve my problem.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000707
text: The Scout Master and I used be the best friends.{nl}However, our relationship now is not as close as it used to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000708
text: In an effort to become closer, I want to give him a present...{nl}I want to give something that the Scout Master likes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000709
text: Are you prepared for what I am going to request of you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000710
text: Good! Get me some pieces with floral fragrances on it from monsters at Alemeth Forest.{nl}All you have to do is secretly put those pieces into this pocket.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000711
text: However, what if the monsters die...{nl}Unfavorable scents may get mixed unless you pull them out when they are alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000712
text: To give you a little hint, this is something you do behind their backs.{nl}Understood?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000713
text: You've collected enough of them as expected.{nl}By fulfilling this request, I can tell that you won't have a problem learning the last skill.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000714
text: There are many people who have the same level of competence as you...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000715
text: Well, alright.{nl}Though, you need to understand that this will be very difficult for you {nl}if you want to learn this at your current level.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000716
text: I've been searching for the arrows that the first Fletcher Master created a long time ago.{nl}Those arrows were given to Lydia Schaffen as a present.{nl}I think they contain some sort of advanced technology.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000717
text: Recently, I've obtained useful information about the whereabouts of those arrows...{nl}There is a person who is able to identify the true value of those arrows.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000718
text: I've heard they were at Galeed Plateau.{nl}However, they were used when facing some violent monster, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000719
text: Oh. I've only seen it for a short period of time, but I can tell how amazing it is.{nl}I want to do some research on this arrow immediately, {nl}but I've made a promise with you, so that's the first thing I'm going to do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000720
text: Okay... Let's get started.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000721
text: As a Falconer Master, I am always looking at different options to make Falconers stronger.{nl}Recently, I've been thinking how I can make those flying monsters of use to us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000722
text: Of course I am satisfied with my partner, Rith..{nl}I think these attempts are helpful to Falconers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000723
text: When we tame a hawk, maybe we should feed it something?{nl}I don't have high expectations, but we better go there and try it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000724
text: I've placed some food for you to try it on at least three different types of monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000725
text: Did we fail... {nl}I expected it though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000726
text: Regardless of the result, I should reward you for your effort.{nl}The biggest reward I can give to you would be teaching you new skills.{nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000727
text: Shoot at an enemy and hit it...{nl}That's one of the basics of a Schwarzer Reiter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000728
text: So you want to learn new skills, huh? {nl}Hitting an enemy with our eyes closed? How does that sound?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000729
text: Hahaha. However, we aren't blind. {nl}We shouldn't go that far, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000730
text: I'm liking your confidence!{nl}I like it so much that we're going to put it to the test.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000731
text: Your objective is to accurately hit the targets multiple times.{nl}If you're able to do that, I will acknowledge your skills.{nl}So... I'd say about 200 times? Personally I think thats quite easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000732
text: I knew it wasn't a bluff! It was the confidence, am I right?!{nl}As promised, I will gladly become your teacher.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000733
text: The way of a true Monk...{nl}One should push oneself to extreme limits and endure the harsh training.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000734
text: If you are willing to take the challenge, then we will start immediately.{nl}Talk to me once you are ready for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000735
text: If I were you I'd hurry up.{nl}If you don't defeat enough enemies within the time limit, we'll start from the beginning again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000736
text: Very good.{nl}Now is the time for you to learn something from me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000737
text: I know that you are ready to be a good Pardoner...{nl}But I'm kind of in big trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000738
text: Well, those impious monsters ripped apart the book of offerings.{nl}Because of that, I can't proceed with my other tasks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000739
text: I will tell you the location if you can get me that first book.{nl}I think of you as a trustworthy person since we are close...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000740
text: The first book is at Elgos Monastery Hospital.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000741
text: In order to prevent someone from taking them, I've hidden them in the books...{nl}And I've prepared several fake books, so I want you to find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000742
text: This is the right place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000743
text: Welcome.{nl}I am looking for someone who is willing to help me with my research.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000744
text: Four years have passed after Medzio Diena...{nl}The aftermath of this disaster hasn't gone down at all, instead it's grown larger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000745
text: Especially the plants that have grown so big turned into monsters and dealt a lot of damage.{nl}I am continuously doing research to resolve this issue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000746
text: If you can help me with my research, I will teach you the next level of the Druid.{nl}I believe this will be an adequate assignment for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000747
text: Please get me samples from the plants who have turned into monsters.{nl}You can obtain more samples the stronger the monster is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000748
text: I know that my request was not easy to complete, but you've done it!{nl}These samples that you've brought are excellent and helpful in my research.{nl}As promised, I will help you since you helped me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000749
text: I know what business you have with me...{nl}That aside, we have something more important going on right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000750
text: Suddenly, the evil energy has become stronger in the place I used to look {nl}at using divine power. Using Clairvoyance doesn't even work anymore for me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000751
text: I'm asking you if you could get rid of the evil energy that's lurking there?{nl}If you do, I promise you that I will help you reach the next level.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000752
text: The location is Galeed Plateau.{nl}Please put the Purification of Namott that I gave you to the area {nl}where the evil energy is strong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000753
text: I knew you were the right person to do this.{nl}As promised, I will lead you to the next level of the Oracle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000754
text: Good. Let's get started right away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000755
text: You need to fight the monsters until the time limit expires.{nl}As you defeat stronger monsters, I will acknowledge that you've went through hard training..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000756
text: If you don't defeat them within the time limit, you start from scratch. {nl}Be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000757
text: Dragoon Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000758
text: A Dragoon should never move too far away from an enemy when in danger.{nl}The Dragoon needs to have the courage to fight harder, better, faster, and stronger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000759
text: We reject the courage of those who fight without skills.{nl}The path of the Dragoon is a difficult path.{nl}So if you've come here without a strong sense of determination, I suggest you leave now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000760
text: Alright, let's see if you really are worthy enough to become one of us.{nl}Show me your skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000761
text: Your objective is to battle monsters and embrace the pain. Do not move away from them.{nl}That's the determination of a courageous Dragoon. {nl}So, attack and defeat the monsters even if you take damage from them. {nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000762
text: What's this? We don't want anyone with a careless mind.{nl}Since I like you, I am giving you another chance. {nl}Come on, show me your courage and your skills!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000763
text: Excellent. You did good.{nl}From this day forward, I will acknowledge you as a member of the Dragoons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000764
text: Are you interested in becoming a Templar?{nl}I can already tell that you're very smart for making this choice.{nl}Now, let me give you a walkthrough of what you need to be aware of.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000765
text: A Templar is a leader to many people. We need people with strong leadership skills.{nl}Especially during these times, a Templar's leadership is the most likely required.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000766
text: Don't get me wrong, though. This is often misunderstood as 'authority'.{nl}No, I'm leaning more towards 'cooperation'.{nl}You should cooperate with your followers in order to maintain a group.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000767
text: Do you understand what I am trying to tell you?{nl}With that being said, let's see your skills as a Templar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000768
text: A person in authority makes orders, but a Templar should make requests.{nl}Your task is to recruit five people and become their leader in that group.{nl}While being the leader of the group, you have to lead them for quite some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000769
text: The fuel that drives people is the respect.{nl}So, to confirm if you possess this charm, I will put you up to the test.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000770
text: Oh, I absolutely do not like to be deceived by tricks or anything like that.{nl}Recruit five people all by yourself and become the leader of the group.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000771
text: Well done.{nl}You are certainly much more charming than I expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000772
text: It can be tough to make other people follow you.{nl}The more people following you, the tougher it becomes.{nl}It's not easy, but a Templar with great respect and admiration can pull it off.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000773
text: I will tell you the things that a Templar must have knowledge in.{nl}I hope you will make wise and careful decisions in the future, so do not forget this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000774
text: Warlock Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000775
text: We will take any measures by any means for the goddesses...{nl}That is the strict rule that we, Warlocks, must abide by.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000776
text: There are many people who misunderstand our interpretations.{nl}A Warlock and its evil spirits are not equally contracted.{nl}We have to rule over them and able to control the evil spirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000777
text: In order to do so, you need to possess strong magic able to rule and control the evil spirits.{nl}Unless... you want to end up consumed by them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000778
text: Since you don't know these evil spirits as well as I do...{nl}I will give you a scroll that will wake them up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000779
text: Use this scroll on monsters at Valius' Eternal Resting Place{nl}to wake up the sleeping evil spirits.{nl}To add another part of this challenge, you need to defeat a monster and the evil spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000780
text: Get rid of the poison with poison. {nl}Anything else that is evil should be gotten rid of by the evil spirits. {nl}I am waiting for the day when we, the Warlocks, are not needed anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000781
text: Excellent.{nl}This is much better than I had expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000782
text: From now on, you will tread the path of the Warlock. {nl}Oh, and please remember this...{nl}If you don't stand on top of them, you will be consumed by them...{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000783
text: Featherfoot Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000784
text: I don't know how you found out about the curse of the Featherfoot, but...{nl}This curse should not be overused. Rather, it needs some detailed calculations.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000785
text: Of course, I can teach you if you still want to. However...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000786
text: Since you don't know anything about the curse, I ask you to take these incantation tools.{nl}I told you that it requires detailed calculations before using the curse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000787
text: Find out what there is to lose and what there is to gain...{nl}Use these incantation tools to cast the curse on a monster to find out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000788
text: If you learn something here, you will become a great Featherfoot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000789
text: The curse should not be overused, but instead it requires some detailed calculations.{nl}Experience what the magic used by a Featherfoot is like with help of the tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000790
text: Now, do you have a broader understanding of the Featherfoot's curse?{nl}You should not consider it like the curse that is used by Demon Lords like Naktis.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000791
text: The arrows of the curse shall only be used on the enemies of the goddesses.{nl}For us, that is our most important guideline. Please keep that in mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000792
text: Cannoneer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000793
text: You enrolled to become a Cannoneer? Good choice, hotshot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000794
text: Listen up! The most important attribute of the Cannoneer is firepower, a lot of it!{nl}If a Cannoneer cannot distinguish between aerial attacks and ground attacks, {nl}he or she isn't a valuable asset to the team!{nl}Enemies that are flying in the air should only be attacked by aerial attacks,{nl}and enemies that are on the ground should only be attacked by ground attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000795
text: I figured you should know about this if you want to become a skilled Cannoneer, like me.{nl}What about it, hotshot? You interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000796
text: Good! Alright, hotshot. {nl}I can only assume that you will remember what I will teach you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000797
text: Do you have a paper and pen with you? Remember this.{nl}There are many types of enemies, but the ones that are flying in the air are all aerial-type.{nl}In contrast, the ones that are moving on the ground are considered a walking-type.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000798
text: Alright, face against monsters with both these types.{nl}You need to understand how each enemy moves and which attacks are effective.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000799
text: The flying monsters are aerial-types and {nl}the ones that move on the ground are walking-types.{nl}Face against both types of monsters. Understood?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000800
text: Good.{nl}Was this a good lesson? Am I a good teacher?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000801
text: Alrighty then! Theoretically, you should know all the logic about what I've taught you.{nl}It's time to put the theory into practice!{nl}The skills of a Cannoneer are not easy, so make sure to focus!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000802
text: Musketeer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000803
text: A Musketeer should know how to handle a rifle.{nl}Not many enemies can stand against simultaneous firing by well trained Musketeers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000804
text: That is why marksmanship is really important.{nl}Finishing enemies before they come anywhere nearby is the start of marksmanship.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000805
text: One of the basic aspects of marksmanship is to procure range.{nl}Give it a shot. Attack an enemy at maximum range.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000806
text: It's not just extending the range, but to extend it up the {nl}maximum distance where you are able to shoot.{nl}I am going to put you to the test to see how well you perform.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000807
text: It's not just extending the range, but being able to extend it up the {nl}maximum distance where you are still able to shoot.{nl}If you want to become a Musketeer, you will accept my challenge.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000808
text: Now that you know the basics of the Musketeer, it's time to put this in practice.{nl}Alright, let's teach you how to use a rifle!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000809
text: Plague Doctor Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000810
text: Hm, how to describe Plague Doctors...{nl}It's a combination of the authority of the goddesses and the knowledge of humans.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000811
text: Enhancing the harmful effects even further and to cure allies who are hurt by these effects.{nl}To put it simply, we are an expert in harmful effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000812
text: Of course I am willing to teach you even if you are not in such a hurry.{nl}But before that, I want you to experience the harmful effect yourself.{nl}It'll be quicker that way, don't you agree?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000813
text: Use this mask on a poisoned monster at Coastal Fortress.{nl}And use it on a sleeping monster at Dingofasil District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000814
text: Go there and experience the effects of poison and sleep.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000815
text: It is better to see it with your own eyes than hear about it.{nl}Getting used to it is the best way of learning.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000816
text: Wasn't it dangerous?{nl}If you don't do it, you won't be able to learn a thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000817
text: That kind of danger is reduced if you become a Plague Doctor.{nl}Now that you've personally experienced it... {nl}I don't have to repeat myself to emphasize the importance of it, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000818
text: Kabbalist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000819
text: Hey there. Are you also interested in numbers?{nl}I am quite surprised that you know about the Kabbalist. Not many people know about it.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000820
text: Everything in this world can be expressed by numbers.{nl}In order to become a Kabbalist, you would need to understand every hidden number {nl}of all the substances that exist throughout this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000821
text: But you are a newcomer...{nl}I have a great idea! Instead of explaining it to you, {nl}I want you to experience the wonder by yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000822
text: Take this crystal sphere with you to Nahash Forest. {nl}Once you are there, a number will appear.{nl}The number that you will see means a specific monster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000823
text: The challenge is that you solve the secret of the number,{nl}and defeat the monster that the number will indicate.{nl}The clue is to think which part of the monster is indicated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000824
text: If you really don't know, you can always use the crystal sphere again.{nl}It will show another number of a monster for you to be able to find the rules quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000825
text: At Nahash Forest, defeat the monsters indicated by the sphere.{nl}However, you have to find out which specific monster was indicated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000826
text: When you realize it, it's nothing special. But it is a duty of the Kabbalist to study on the process.{nl}If you keep trying, you will realize the meanings of the numbers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000827
text: In order to use more accurate and critical swordsmanship, {nl}you will need faster and more accurate attacks.{nl}The skills of a Fencer that you will learn from now on requires you to {nl}use such swordsmanship.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000828
text: Your determination to learn is good, but...{nl}You must be first competent enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000829
text: Good.{nl}When you go right from here, there is a pole to practice your swordsmanship.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000830
text: When the light reflects off from the pole, attack the pole accurately.{nl}You should not attack it too late nor when the light doesn't shine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000831
text: I can only let go three time.{nl}If you make mistakes more than three times, then you should do it again from the beginning.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000832
text: You should also possess some sense of rhythm.{nl}Every move in swordsmanship emphasizes the importance of smoothness.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000833
text: Your level of swordsmanship has increased a lot.{nl}I am glad to see you progressing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000834
text: Since you are that competent, you will have no problem in learning new skills.{nl}I will teach you each movement slowly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000835
text: Shinobi Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000836
text: So you've finally decided become a Shinobi?{nl}Well, although I'd promised to teach you...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000837
text: Even if I teach you, there is the issue of whether or not you can do it.{nl}What do you think? Are you prepared?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000838
text: Defeat an enemy and move out safely.{nl}That is one of the basics of the Shinobi.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000839
text: After defeating the monsters at Ruklys Hall, secure your safety immediately.{nl}You shouldn't take any damage from other monsters. {nl}Hide and avoid the attacks from other monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000840
text: If you get used to this, you will be able to walk out safely {nl}after defeating the target in any dangerous location.{nl}If one puts himself into a danger every time when defeating monsters,{nl} even ten lives won't be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000841
text: Bravo.{nl}I admit that I didn't expect you to be this talented.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000842
text: I always welcome a talented lad like you.{nl}Congratulations on becoming an offical Shinobi.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000843
text: I still remember Medzio Diena. The horrors...{nl}First, my allies escaped. Now I'm all alone...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000844
text: It is not just a form to make while using Ninjutsu.{nl}It must be required in order to activate the Ninjutsu.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000845
text: We should first reduce the fever.{nl}A long time ago, Horace told me that the spotted mushrooms {nl}of the Blue Lapasapes reduces fevers, so let's test it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000846
text: Umm... Isn't it the mask of a Siaulav?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000847
text: That's right. Many of our allies were attacked by Blue Siaulavs.{nl}I feel like collecting their masks and burn them in front of their graves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000848
text: So can't you give me those masks?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000849
text: Thanks.{nl}I hope the resentment of our allies are reduced by this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000850
text: I want to calm the spirits of our allies by burning their masks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000851
text: It seems hard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000852
text: I am not confident enough

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000853
text: I can do it

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000854
text: I don't want to do it

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000855
text: I will start right away

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000856
text: I will go find the book

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000857
text: I will return next time

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000858
text: The Bravery That Never Backs Down [Dragoon Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000859
text: Shouldn't be a problem

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000860
text: I wish to avoid the difficult path

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000861
text: Basic Leadership [Templar Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000862
text: It seems too hard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000863
text: The Power That Even Controls Evil Spirits [Warlock Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000864
text: I am ready

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000865
text: I will quit since I am scared

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000866
text: The Power Imbued In The Curse [Featherfoot Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000867
text: You better back off

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000868
text: From Ground to Air, From Ground to Ground [Cannoneer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000869
text: I will learn it

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000870
text: Procuring Distance [Musketeer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000871
text: I'll do it, I understand

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000872
text: It doesn't seem to fit for me

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000873
text: Detrimental Effects [Plague Doctor Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000874
text: I want to learn for sure

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000875
text: A World Composed of Numbers [Kabbalist Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000876
text: I want to experience it

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000877
text: I decline complicated things

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000878
text: Timing Attacks [Fencer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000879
text: In Secret [Shinobi Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000880
text: I will think about it for a moment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000881
text: Honoring Allies

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000882
text: Defeat monsters and obtain a piece of Legwyn's seal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000883
text: The Corsair Master wants to obtain the Great Pirate Vladislovas's necklace, which he had won before and used as a proof of victory. Look for the necklace at Krantos Coast, which used to be a sea.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000884
text: The Doppelsoeldner Master told you that he lost contact with the envoy from Pasaka Plateau that he was to meet. Look for the whereabouts of the envoy to find out what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000885
text: Defeat the monster to obtain the relic that possesses a strong grudge

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000886
text: The Necromancer Master wants to obtain the relic that possesses a strong grudge. Defeat the monsters at Videntis Shrine to obtain the relic that possesses a strong grudge.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000887
text: Collect the materials for the neutralizer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000888
text: Vaidotas told you that in order to neutralize the toxic gas in the Crystal Mine, you should make a neutralizer. Obtain digested soil from Alemeth Forest, lime powder from Cranto Coast, and charcoal powder from Nahash Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000889
text: Acquired all materails for the neutralizer. Return to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000890
text: Obtain %s from monsters at Alemeth Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000891
text: Obtain %s from monsters at Nahash Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000892
text: Obtain %s from monsters at Cranto Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000893
text: Use the pocket behind the monsters and collect the pieces that possess a fruity fragrance

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000894
text: The Rogue Master wants to give a gift to the Scout Master to restore their relationship. Use the pocket behind the monsters at Alemeth Forest and collect the pieces that possess a fruity fragrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000895
text: You've collected all pieces that possess a fruity fragrance. Return to the Rogue Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000896
text: The Fletcher Master wants to look for the arrows that the first Fletcher Master created for Lydia Schaffen. Find the arrows of the first Fletcher Master from Galeed Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000897
text: The Schwarzer Reiter Master wants to see if you can hit the enemies consecutively. Hit the enemies 200 times consecutively.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000898
text: Without a single mistake, you successfully landed all attacks consecutively. Return to the Schwarzer Reiter Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000899
text: Defeat the number of monsters within the time limit

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000900
text: The Monk Master told you that you can grow as a monk after enduring harsh training. Defeat enough monsters within 20 minutes of time limit. Defeating a strong monster will be acknowledged as you complete the harsh training. If the time limit expires, you will start again from the beginning.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000901
text: You've successfully completed the training. Return to the Monk Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000902
text: The Pardoner Master told you that the book which you have is ripped up, so it is useless now. Get the first book that the Pardoner Master hid at Elkosh Abbey Hospital.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000903
text: Collect the samples of Plant-type monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000904
text: Set the Namott of Purification at Galeed Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000905
text: The Oracle Master told you that the evil energy has grown stronger recently so her abilities are being disturbed by it. Go to Galeed Plateau where the energy is especially stronger and place the Namott of Purification.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000906
text: Talk with the Dragoon Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000907
text: Talk with the Dragoon Master at Istora Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000908
text: Attack the monsters alone, defeat them or shoot them

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000909
text: The Dragoon Master told you that you would need stronger courage and competence without backing off from enemies. Attack the monsters, defeat them, while also taking damage from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000910
text: Report to the Dragoon Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000911
text: It seems that you've shown enough competence. Return to the Dragoon Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000912
text: Talk to Knight Commander Uska in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000913
text: Maintain 5 people in a party for 5 minutes as a leader

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000914
text: The Templar Master wants your leadership. Create a party consisting of 5 people including you as the leader and maintain the party for 5 minutes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000915
text: You've led the 5 person party successfully. Return to Knight Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000916
text: Talk with the Warlock Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000917
text: Talk to the Warlock Master in Mokusul Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000918
text: Defeat the monsters whose evil sprits have awakened

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000919
text: The Warlock Master told you that you should possess enough magical power to control the evil spirits. Use the scroll to the monsters at Valius' Eternal Resting Place to awaken their evil spirits and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000920
text: Report to the Warlock Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000921
text: You've defeated all monsters whose evil spirits have awakened. Return to the Warlock Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000922
text: Talk with the Featherfoot Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000923
text: Talk with the Featherfoot Master at Mokusul Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000924
text: Cast a curse on the monsters using the Incantation Tools

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000925
text: The Featherfoot Master has asked you to experience the curse spell. Use the Incantation Tools on the monsters to cast a curse on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000926
text: Report to the Featherfoot Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000927
text: I fully understood what the curse spell is like. Return to the Featherfoot Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000928
text: Talk with the Canonneer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000929
text: Talk with the Canonneer Master at the Inner Fortress District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000930
text: Defeat Flying-type and Walking-type monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000931
text: The Cannoneer Master told you that Cannoneers are adept at both aerial attacks and ground attacks. In order to use both attacks efficiently, you better search for the targets for each attack. Defeat both a flying-type monster and a walking-type monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000932
text: Report to the Canonneer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000933
text: You've studied enough on Flying-type monsters and Walking-type monsters. Return to the Canonneer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000934
text: Talk with the Musketeer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000935
text: Talk with the Musketeer Master at the Inner Fortress District

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000936
text: Attack the monsters from the maximum distance

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000937
text: The Musketeer Master told you that in order to use a rifle, you need to procure the shooting distance. Since you won't be able to attack enemies close ranged properly, attack the enemies from a long distance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000938
text: Report to the Musketeer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000939
text: It seems that you've completed the assignment well. Return to the Musketeer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000940
text: Talk with the Plague Doctor Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000941
text: Talk with the Plague Doctor Master at Istora Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000942
text: Experience Poison and Sleep

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000943
text: The Plague Doctor told you that in order to cure the detrimental effects or use them, you should understand the effects well. Experience Poison at Coastal Fortress and Sleep at Dingofasil District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000944
text: Report to the Plague Doctor Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000945
text: You've gained enough experience on Poison and Sleep. Return to the Plague Doctor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000946
text: Talk with the Kabbalist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000947
text: Talk with the Kabbalist Master at Istora Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000948
text: Defeat the monster indicated by the number displayed on the crystal sphere

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000949
text: The Kabbalist Master told you that in order to become a Kabbalist, you should be able to understand all the numbers hidden in all properties of the world. Use the crystal sphere that has appeared at Cranto Coast and defeat the monster which the number on the sphere indicates.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000950
text: Report to the Kabbalist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000951
text: You've discovered what the crystal sphere indicates. Return to the Kabbalist Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000952
text: Talk with the Fencer Master at the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000953
text: Hit the practice pole of Fencers at right times

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000954
text: The Fencer Master wants you to attack at the right moments. Move to the practice pole and attack when the pole shines. If you make three mistakes, you start anew.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000955
text: You've completed the training. Return to the Fencer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000956
text: Talk with the Shinobi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000957
text: Talk with the Shinobi Master at Mesafasla.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000958
text: After defeating monsters, run away for 10 seconds without being attacked

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000959
text: The Shinobi Master told you that you need an ability to escape safely without being detected by other enemies after defeating the target. Defeat the monster at Ruklys Hall and reach safety without being attacked by other monsters for 10 seconds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000960
text: Report to the Shinobi Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000961
text: You've completed the assignment of the Shinobi Master. Return to the Shinobi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000962
text: Activate only the designated shrines

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000963
text: When you activate one of the shrines of Romiva Magic Circles, one other shrine will also react. Use it to activate the shrine which Gomen has told you. If you forgot to which shrine to activate, check the memo which Gomen has given to you. The memo can only be checked when you activate the shrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000964
text: Baskez told you that him and his colleagues would be able to withstand the severe cold if they had the hairy leathers of Lepusbunny Assassin. Hunt for Green Lepusbunny Assassins and bring back their hairy leathers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000965
text: You've collected enough food. Hand them over to Supply Officer Ronda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000966
text: Collect the spotted mushrooms of Blue Lapasapes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000967
text: Ades wants to cure a magician who is sick with fever. Collect the spotted mushrooms of Blue Lapasapes known for curing fever.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000968
text: You've collected enough spotted mushrooms of Blue Lapasapes. Hand them over to Stogas Squad Commander Ades.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000969
text: Mortimer seems to be interested in the masks. Talk with Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000970
text: Collect the masks of Blue Siaulavs

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000971
text: Mortimer wants to resolve the resentment of the soldiers by burning the masks of Blue Siaulavs. When you obtain the masks while hunting for Blue Siaulavs, hand them over to Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20151224_000972
text: You better give the masks of Blue Siaulavs to Soldier Mortimer. Give them to Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000973
text: Oh, hello? It's been a long time since I've seen an outsider.{nl}My name is Gatre, and I help Sarma with research here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000974
text: Sarma is trying to restore Alemeth Forest to its original state.{nl}The fruits here have become inedible after they grew to enormous sizes you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000975
text: At least we're managing to get by after Sarma came here to help out.{nl}He promised that I won't have to starve as long as I help him with his research...{nl}I owe him so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000976
text: The only problem is that the research is being delayed by {nl}monster attacks that are becoming more frequent these days.{nl}I just had a bunch of research materials stolen by monsters as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000977
text: I was told that they are very important to his research... This is worrying.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000978
text: Could you really do that?{nl}Then... Could you retrieve the research material from the monsters at Angis Trail?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000979
text: The monsters around here are too fierce for me to handle.{nl}Just turn around and run if you happen to think they're too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000980
text: Wow, you've actually retrieved all the materials!{nl}I knew you were kind, but I guess I underestimated your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000981
text: Um... I know this may sound rude, but could you help me a bit more?{nl}It's a really simple task, but I can see myself getting robbed by monsters again...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000982
text: You just have to tidy up the research materials you've retrieved {nl}in the Tidying Chest at the Temporary Research Facility.{nl}I'm sure I can be at ease with someone of your skill doing it... Would it be too much to ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000983
text: Thank you so much!{nl}I'll give you the instruction manual so don't forget {nl}to check the last part before you start tidying up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000984
text: There is a strict order to tidying it...{nl}So, don't forget to read it thoroughly!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000985
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I'm glad I asked you for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000986
text: It seems as if I am in a daze because of the monster attacks.{nl}I think I discarded invaluable research materials while I was tidying them up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000987
text: The discarded documents should be gathered at Menka Knoll... Could you look for them?{nl}I can't manage to get there because of the increase in monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000988
text: I'm sure that you'll be able to find them if you take a close look at the {nl}discarded documents there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000989
text: The documents you need to find is the Research Material List for Alemeth Forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000990
text: You can leave the rest of the documents behind.{nl}Please check carefully not to get them mixed up with anything else.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000991
text: Did you check them carefully?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000992
text: It seems like you've brought the correct documents.{nl}Go see Sarma after you give me the documents.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000993
text: I think he's kept an eye on your skills.{nl}I think he wants to ask you something after seeing you help me out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000994
text: Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000995
text: Ah, greetings.{nl}I assume you've heard of me from Gatre.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000996
text: I've been keeping a close eye on you since you helped Gatre.{nl}At first I was merely curious of an outsider here, but you seem to be quite talented.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000997
text: As you may be well aware of, it is hard to do any research because of the monsters.{nl}I think I'll be able to finish my research if you help me out a bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000998
text: It's for the wellbeing of the people here so I beg that you help out.{nl}Of course I shall pay handsomely when the research is finished.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_000999
text: I thank you.{nl}My first request is for you to gather the blood of Green Eldigos.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001000
text: I need to extract the blood from a live Green Eldigo for my research, but that's no easy task.{nl}I'll give you some Tranquilizer Powder to knock {nl}the Green Eldigos out and bring some blood back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001001
text: So, how did it go?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001002
text: Very good. Excellent.{nl}With the skills you've shown me, I think I can be confident in assigning you more tasks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001003
text: I'll go to the Forest of Prayer Entrance and prepare for the final experiment.{nl}You can go and gather the ingredients needed for the last experiment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001004
text: Gatre has the list for the ingredients I need for the final experiment so you can get it from him.{nl}I have faith in you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001005
text: Sarma said that he needed all of the ingredients on the list?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001006
text: Oh no, it seems as if he's already beginning the final experiment!{nl}We have to find more evidence before it's too late.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001007
text: It would be strange to not collect the ingredients without proper evidence.{nl}Collect the listed ingredients since you can't risk him suspecting anything.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001008
text: Why don't we gather some evidence together since Sarma seems to be absent.{nl}I know just what to look for.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001009
text: There are research notes from a person that used to help Sarma's experiments.{nl}His name was Boldas... and is in a coma because of an unfortunate accident.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001010
text: Sarma had those notes until he lost them in a monster attack.{nl}Come to think of it, I think Sarma was especially nervous about losing those notes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001011
text: There may be important information in those notes.{nl}He lost the notes towards the Juice Collection Site, so try searching that area first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001012
text: Don't forget the listed ingredients either.{nl}I'll do what Sarma asked in order to avoid suspicion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001013
text: Do you have all of the ingredients?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001014
text: Hmm. There seems to be something missing...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001015
text: Ah! It seems that it's missing from the list.{nl}I thought I had written everything down, but mistakes where made...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001016
text: I'm sorry, but could you go get some fermented fruit tree sap from Gatre?{nl}I can't proceed with the experiment without it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001017
text: Sarma told you that he needed fermented fruit tree sap right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001018
text: He really has come close to finishing the experiments.{nl}You see, I had removed the sap from the list on purpose.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001019
text: By the way, how does Sarma's research seem to you?{nl}Did you find anything suspicious in the research notes?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001020
text: I think that's a good idea.{nl}We might be able to find some clues as to what Sarma is really up to.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001021
text: That was written in the notes?{nl}I'll need to take a look at the notes myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001022
text: Oh my...{nl}If these notes are true, then Sarma definitely has other plans for his research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001023
text: But the matter still stands that we don't have any actual proof.{nl}I'll look for some solid evidence if you can manage to stall the experiments for a bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001024
text: Take something that is similar to the sap in order to ruin Sarma's experiment.{nl}Meanwhile, I'll check all of his research documents.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001025
text: I'll give you this tree sap.{nl}All you have to do is to go to the Research Material Warehouse {nl}and find something that looks similar to this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001026
text: He has to mix all the ingredients before commencing the last stage anyways.{nl}So he won't be able to tell them apart as long as they look similar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001027
text: Is this water from... near Pelke Shrine Ruins?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001028
text: I've heard that something bad happened there...{nl}Well, I suppose it will be alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001029
text: Take this to Sarma since they look almost identical at a glance.{nl}I'll take a peek at his research documents and try to find out his true purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001030
text: Be careful just in case.{nl}I'll get to you as soon as I find something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001031
text: What took you so long in bringing me one more ingredient?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001032
text: Well, it seems as if you've brought the proper ingredient.{nl}This is the last stage of the experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001033
text: Now all that is left is to put this on the Transmutation Magic Circle and add magic.{nl}I've set it so that anyone can power it with magic, so you shouldn't have trouble. {nl}Now go and power the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001034
text: T-That's... because I have other things to do.{nl}I have to leave records of the experiment and observe the situation you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001035
text: Now stop stalling and go power up the Transmutation Magic Circle.{nl}All you have to do is put the ingredients on the circle {nl}and emancipate the magic from the tombstone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001036
text: But remember that the magic in the tombstone can only be emancipated from the front.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001037
text: Has the liquid properly been created?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001038
text: Ahah.{nl}It seems that I finally have results for this research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001039
text: Now all I have to do is check to see if the liquid has the intended effect.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001040
text: Thanks to you, I've been able to get the research, which had been progressing slowly, this far.{nl}With this, we'll be able to restore the enlarged fruit trees back to normal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001041
text: How about you spray the liquid onto the trees yourself since you've helped me so far?{nl}If it has been properly made, it will make the trees go back to their original states.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001042
text: Here, I'll give you some of the liquid.{nl}We'll be able to see if it has any effect immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001043
text: Try spraying it on the Pile of Leaves just ahead of you.{nl}You'll be able to see something quite interesting.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001044
text: I'm sorry.{nl}I wasn't able to catch Sarma.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001045
text: Thankfully, the liquid wasn't created as Sarma planned.{nl}Even though he seems to think that it is perfect.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001046
text: Sarma's original plan was to create monsters that he could command.{nl}Thankfully, they don't seem to listen to him since we switched the ingredients a bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001047
text: I'll go looking for Sarma.{nl}Even though the liquid is a failure, it's still quite dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001048
text: I hope that the hidden items will be found and used by whomever sees this inside the pot.{nl}There is another pot at the Old Camp that shows the location of the hidden items.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001049
text: Monster attacks have been too frequent lately.{nl}That's why Sarma's research is also being delayed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001050
text: Don't forget to read the last part of the instruction manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001051
text: It will be hard to find the documents at Menka Knoll if you don't read them carefully.{nl}There's a lot of documents that are actually being disposed there as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001052
text: I've put my whole life's achievements on restoring Alemeth Forest to its original state.{nl}This research must succeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001053
text: Anyone would be upset about losing their notes.{nl}But Sarma... seemed to be much more than upset at the loss.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001054
text: The contents of those notes might prove to be important evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001055
text: If you do get caught, just say that it was a simple mistake.{nl}The important thing is to buy us some more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001056
text: First, help Sarma with his experiments.{nl}I'll try to find some evidence in the meantime.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001057
text: The magic from the tombstone must be emancipated from the front.{nl}The front is the side with the letters on it, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001058
text: It is finally time for my research to come to fruition...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001059
text: I had merely panicked a bit because of the sudden attack.{nl}I am not frightened of such monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001060
text: I'm conducting research in order to restore the forest to its original state.{nl}Those fruits are inedible you see...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001061
text: It was hard getting a chance to talk to you because of Sarma.{nl}Now, I can tell you everything since he's gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001062
text: I can't believe he was researching how to control monsters...{nl}I'm having a hard time believing how a person could even {nl}think of doing so even after witnessing it with my two eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001063
text: They've all left because the fruits were inedible even though they were so large.{nl}But how could you turn your back on your hometown?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001064
text: What do you think the real purpose for Sarma's research is?{nl}I just hope that I'm worrying over nothing...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001065
text: The villagers all believed in Sarma and his research...{nl}How could he do such a thing?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001066
text: You're an outsider that I haven't seen before.{nl}I don't know what you're doing here, but please don't interrupt my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001067
text: Everything is going as planned except for those monsters.{nl}They're hindering my research so much that it's become more than a mere nuisance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001068
text: I wish to show you the research once it's complete.{nl}Of course I will show it to Gatre who's been helping me all along as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001069
text: At last, the day that my research reaches fruition has come...{nl}It is a relief that I was able to receive help from someone as able as you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001070
text: Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001071
text: Adomas is late...{nl}Where could he be?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001072
text: Where have Adomas and Faustas gone to when we have so much to do...{nl}Have you seen any Necromancers around here by any chance?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001073
text: It would have been hard even if we all worked together...{nl}But now, doing so is impossible.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001074
text: That Lord Lieutenant... He deserves to be attacked by monsters just like them.{nl}I'm only holding back because the mayor is too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001075
text: The goddesses are so merciless...{nl}I had only started to collect coral after giving up fishing for a living...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001076
text: I think everyone is shocked by the Lord Lieutenant.{nl}Well... At least I'm glad that things turned out alright in the end.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001077
text: Just look at them.{nl}They were attacked by monsters trying to gather tributes...{nl}It's just so wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001078
text: I'll be fine as long as I get some proper rest thanks to the first aid.{nl}You've been a great help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001079
text: It's just pathetic.{nl}We don't even have basic amenities, but we're worrying about making tributes...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001080
text: That Lord Lieutenant will bring the wrath of the goddesses upon himself soon enough.{nl}He not only tried to get more tributes for himself, but also disgraced the lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001081
text: There is nothing more important to a merchant than credibility.{nl}I need to acquire the necessary coral in time... but it seems like I'm in trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001082
text: I've heard. You've dealt with the terrifying monster that the Lord Lieutenant summoned.{nl}I wish that someone like you was in our merchant alliance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001083
text: Don't stray too far from here if you can help it.{nl}The monster density increased so much that it's too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001084
text: I never would've thought that my colleagues were also in league with the Lord Lieutenant...{nl}My head's still numb when I think of all those years we've served together.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001085
text: Please stay here where it's safe, if possible.{nl}There's no way for us to help if you stray too far away from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001086
text: We're going to transport that Lord Lieutenant to the lord soon.{nl}I doubt that he'll get off easy...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001087
text: Please refrain from going too far away because there has been an increase of monsters.{nl}We won't be able to guarantee your safety due to our orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001088
text: An outsider helped out with something that we should have done ourselves...{nl}This is shameful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001089
text: Do you think I won't do anything after all of this humility? Wait and see. {nl}I'll show the merchant alliance and the refugees here who gets the last laugh some day!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001090
text: This guy, he still seem to be delusional.{nl}Does he really not know what situation he is in?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001091
text: It's all gone upside down because of that Lord Lieutenant and a few soldiers.{nl}I'm certain that they'll make inquiries into us as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001092
text: Merchant Alliance Worker

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001093
text: It was nice having a bit of a rest, but we weren't quite at ease either.{nl}I guess we can finally go to the customers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001094
text: I haven't been working here long, but that is a sight to behold.{nl}An ocean without any water... I've never seen anything like it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001095
text: I've heard that coral is really popular.{nl}I think it's said to be used in very expensive medicines... {nl}How much do you think it is worth?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001096
text: I guess anything can happen when the world is in such disarray.{nl}He's lucky the people here are gentle, he'd be thoroughly beaten if it was back where I'm from.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001097
text: What's going on?{nl}There are people willing to work and soldiers to protect them, {nl}yet we can't get the coral because of monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001098
text: This used to be the bottom of the sea, but they say {nl}that all the water was drained after Medzio Diena.{nl}It's quite a sight don't you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001099
text: It's chilling to think that the Lord Lieutenant was the reason we weren't able to gather coral.{nl}I'm glad it's over now. All's well that ends well as they say.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001100
text: People like us have never even held a sword before, so all we can do is to envy your skills.{nl}Isn't it impressive that our leader found out that it {nl}was the Lord Lieutenant who was behind all of this?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001101
text: It's a shame about what happened to Faustas... But his crimes cannot be forgiven.{nl}He murdered... he murdered Adomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001102
text: I'm planning on carrying out the rest of the mission.{nl}I'll have to tell the master about what happened... But I don't feel too comfortable.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001103
text: Search for the Monk

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001104
text: It seems as if returning to the annex is out of the question.{nl}Look for the monk that's trapped in the principal building.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001105
text: You have found a labeled reagent bottle in a pile of leaves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001106
text: Base reagent. Nahash Sample.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001107
text: {nl}Look for the reagent's owner.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001108
text: A tent that appears to have been attacked by monsters... Check to see what happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001109
text: Missing Lucienne

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001110
text: Lucienne is missing!{nl}It seems as if she has gone to the Ownerless Reclaimed Land to use the reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001111
text: Searching past the Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001112
text: It seems as if only Dominikas can pass through the black wall.{nl}Dominikas seems to be hiding something beyond the wall and lying about it.{nl}Search past the wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001113
text: Elgos Monk

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001114
text: I'm so... hungry...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001115
text: Starved

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001116
text: It seems as if there is nothing more to eat.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001117
text: Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001118
text: Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}Whew, I was in a tight spot with my tent being attacked and all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001119
text: Oh, my name is Lucienne Winterspoon by the way.{nl}I am a member of the Winterspoon family which is renown for its alchemical prowess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001120
text: Vaidotas. You know him right?{nl}Alchemist Master Vaidotas is my older cousin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001121
text: Have you heard that Vaidotas was kidnapped by the Vubbes?{nl}I mean, he's the Alchemist Master... {nl}I think I was more ashamed of the kidnapping than he was.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001122
text: That's why I've decided that I should take his place.{nl}Don't you think it's obvious that I'm more suitable for the position?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001123
text: The family elders are holding me back though.{nl}Would you believe that they're saying that they can't {nl}acknowledge my skill without distinct research results!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001124
text: That's why I came here.{nl}I'm trying to do some research on why the regions near Nahash Forest{nl}received less damage than other places on Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001125
text: But I've been unable to make much headway because there are so many monsters.{nl}It turns out that the only reason it was damaged less is because the bedrock is more solid.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001126
text: Then I discovered something amazing in Nahash Forest!{nl}There was an enormous plant rooted to the Ownerless Reclaimed Land, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001127
text: I thought it was perfect for my experiments because it wouldn't react to most substances.{nl}Think about it! Making a reagent that can get rid of such a large plant.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001128
text: I'll be able to restore damaged regions like Orsha or the Thorn Forest back to normal...{nl}It might even open a path to being able to prevent a second Medzio Diena from happening.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001129
text: Don't you think that the family elders will also acknowledge me as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001130
text: The problem is that the over abundant monster population is hindering my research.{nl}There should be less monsters if I could get to Pamesti Village...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001131
text: Of course. You seemed to be quite skilled back there...{nl}I'm sorry, but could you get me to Pamesti Village?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001132
text: I promise I won't forget you if you help me out this time after I become the Alchemist Master!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001133
text: Thanks! You've brought me to the village safely.{nl}Now I have to get ready for the experiments again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001134
text: ...Oh! Whoops!{nl}I must have dropped my base reagent somewhere {nl}while I was running away from the testing tent...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001135
text: I can't do any more experiments without it, what a stupid mistake.{nl}What should I do...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001136
text: Yes! That's it!{nl}How on earth did you get a hold of it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001137
text: Oh... I must have dropped it in the tent I was conducting experiments in.{nl}It's a relief to have it back. Thank you so much. You're absolutely the best!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001138
text: Now I have to collect the remaining ingredients.{nl}I can get most of the herbs on my own, but I don't think I can take on the Blue Spion by myself...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001139
text: So do you think that you could get some Spion Tree Leaves for me?{nl}I'll try to gather the other herbs in the meantime.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001140
text: Thanks a lot.{nl}Let's meet up back here once we've finish gathering the ingredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001141
text: You're back earlier than I expected.{nl}I hope you didn't have too hard a time dealing with the Blue Spion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001142
