text: Now all I have to do is to mix the reagent with these ingredients.{nl}The only problem is that the monsters seem to be attracted to the smell of the reagent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001143
text: Could you deal with any monsters that happen to come near me while I mix the reagent?{nl}So that I can focus entirely on mixing the reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001144
text: It's finally finished! Thank you so much. {nl}I couldn't have dreamed of finishing the reagent without your help!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001145
text: Now all that's left is to test the reagent.{nl}Luckily, I've seen an appropriate vine near the Herb Broker Tent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001146
text: Tree vines don't usually grow in Nahash Forest, but that place seems to be the exception.{nl}Strange isn't it? It almost seems like someone is raising them there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001147
text: It just doesn't seem right just like that enormous plant.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001148
text: Well whatever the case, that tree vine seems to be perfect to test the reagent on.{nl}How about doing the last experiment together since we've crafted the reagent together?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001149
text: Did you see that? The vine grew and then crumbled!{nl}It's a success! Our reagent actually worked!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001150
text: I can't believe that I completed a reagent without the help of Vaidotas...{nl}I'm so happy. The next Alchemist Master will be me when I show the family this reagent!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001151
text: So. Let's go the the Ownerless Reclaimed Land. {nl}I'm sure that we'll be able to get rid of the enormous {nl}plant there and stop the plants from expanding further.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001152
text: Alchemist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001153
text: Lucienne Winterspoon...{nl}May I ask how you came to learn of the name of that troublemaker?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001154
text: What? You've brought me a reagent that she made in Nahash Forest?{nl}Please give that to me. What has she concocted up this time...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001155
text: ...Oh dear. {nl}Did you perhaps test this reagent? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001156
text: This reagent accelerates plant growth.{nl}The plant will crumble if it doesn't have the strength to withstand it but if it does...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001157
text: We don't have time for this.{nl}Knowing Lucienne, she might have already gone to use the reagent somewhere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001158
text: I'll give you this counteragent. Please hurry and give this to Lucienne.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001159
text: What took you so long?{nl}You said you'd ask Vaidotas didn't you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001160
text: Having a healthy amount of scholarly ambition is something to be commemorated.{nl}But passion past her skills is not good for Lucienne.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001161
text: ...Okay. I guess I was wrong this time.{nl}Something bad could have happened without Vaidotas' help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001162
text: That doesn't mean that I've lost to Vaidotas though!{nl}Don't you know that failure is the mother of success?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001163
text: I've failed miserably this time so I'm going to get a great breakthrough soon!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001164
text: There's no time for this.{nl}I think I can do the rest of the experiments by myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001165
text: Farewell then. I thank you for all the help you've given me. {nl}I never forget my debts, so I will repay it one day by helping you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001166
text: No... Wait...{nl}Why is Vaidotas being brought up in this?!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001167
text: It's me who succeeded in the experiment, so why should Vaidotas get to see this?{nl}I've mixed this reagent, so why should Vaidotas...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001168
text: Is it because the vine we tested it on grew a bit?{nl}What does that have to do with anything. It's gone thanks to my reagent!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001169
text: ...If it bothers you that much, you go by yourself.{nl}I don't want to go. Do as you please.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001170
text: Even though it's a bit infuriating, but Vaidotas took {nl}a look at my reagent's ingredients and mix ratio.{nl}It seems that I should have used Spion Teeth instead of the leaves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001171
text: I can get the rest of the materials, but Spions are still to much for me...{nl}Could you get me some Spion Teeth?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001172
text: Well... It would be nice if this mix ratio succeeds..{nl}It will mean that Vaidotas is wrong if it fails so...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001173
text: It would seem rude to not proceed with the experiment when he's being so considerate...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001174
text: Thanks. {nl}I'm going to humiliate Vaidotas after succeeding and improving the reagent!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001175
text: Are you planning on going elsewhere?{nl}Hm... Well then...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001176
text: I took a look at the soil from a farm on the Ownerless Reclaimed Land, and it was superb.{nl}I think that if I plant some experimental herbs there, they'll do well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001177
text: I'll give you the herb seeds. {nl}Could you plant them if you happen to pass by the Ownerless Reclaimed Land?{nl}Come on, you can help me out just a bit more can't you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001178
text: I wouldn't have been able to get this far with the research without you.{nl}Even though I don't want to admit it, V-Vaidotas helped as well...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001179
text: Villager Nella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001180
text: Thank you for saving us at the monastery.{nl}I can't imagine what that swindler would've done to us if it wasn't for you...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001181
text: Still, the swindler's incantation seems to be having a bit of an effect.{nl}We haven't been attacked by monsters for a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001182
text: Well, that doesn't mean that we can live in harmony with the monsters.{nl}We also don't know when we'll be attacked by the monsters again because the incantation's effect will wear off later.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001183
text: Could you help deal with the monsters near the town?{nl}It'll be much safer if you could help out a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001184
text: The village has been totally destroyed while we were trapped at the monastery.{nl}Well this... I suppose it was our own fault for getting tricked like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001185
text: Thank you.{nl}Oh, I don't think you'll have to worry about the rest of the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001186
text: Lucienne Winterspoon said that she'll craft us monster repellant while she stays here.{nl}I hope you'll stay safe on your travels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001187
text: Welcome. Brother.{nl}Have you come to be redeemed by us of the Tree of Truth?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001188
text: If so, welcome.{nl}I was just educating the believers of our creed.{nl}How about you join us for a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001189
text: Good. {nl}Now, I shall begin the sermon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001190
text: Oh yes... It might be a bit dizzy at first.{nl}That is all part of the process in receiving the Divine Tree's blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001191
text: How was your first sermon about the creed? {nl}Was it alright?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001192
text: Good, good.{nl}I welcome you once more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001193
text: Although the Divine Tree is benevolent, redemption does not come for free.{nl}You must work for the chance to be redeemed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001194
text: Helping other believers might be a good place to start since you are new.{nl}I hope to see you soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001195
text: Greetings. Brother.{nl}Have you received the Demon Soul Orb from Dominikas?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001196
text: The demons will not attack you on sight if you hold an orb filled with their souls.{nl}It seems as if you have yet to receive the orb from Dominikas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001197
text: I have an extra Soul Orb.{nl}But... you'll have to fill it with demon souls yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001198
text: Still, you won't have to worry about demons attacking you once it's filled with demon souls.{nl}The benevolent Divine Tree shall protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001199
text: I've learned that although demons are our enemies, they are also to be redeemed just like us.{nl}We will all become one in the blessings of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001200
text: I see you've filled the orb.{nl}How was it? I assume the demons didn't attack you on the way back?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001201
text: What? You were attacked?{nl}That's strange. It is most likely due to your lack of faith.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001202
text: Ah, look at the time...{nl}Pardon me, I must prepare to attend an important ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001203
text: Welcome. You're the newcomer, right?{nl}I am selecting scriptures here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001204
text: To us, the goddesses are immoral as only the Divine Tree can offer true redemption.{nl}We no longer need the old scriptures that worship the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001205
text: What do we do with the useless scriptures?{nl}We usually gather them and burn them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001206
text: Thank you for saving me!{nl}Of course, this is all because of the blessing of the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001207
text: Why do you think the demons attacked us?{nl}That is strange... This has never happened before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001208
text: Farewell then... I need to attend a ritual.{nl}Make sure you're not late either, brother. I will see you later.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001209
text: Villager James

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001210
text: Oh, so you are the newcomer.{nl}It's a pleasure to meet you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001211
text: I am purifying the corrupted power of the goddesses with the red blood of the demons. {nl}However, it seems that I've run out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001212
text: Normally Dominikas gets it for me but he seems to be busy at the moment.{nl}Not to mention the fact that we are currently under {nl}their protection so we can't attack them either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001213
text: That's why I want you to go get some red demon blood.{nl}As a recruit you can do this much, no?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001214
text: Thank you.{nl}Demon blood has a special power that can purify the corrupted power of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001215
text: Look around you, all of this was the result of my purification.{nl}How about it, beautiful isn't it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001216
text: Well it's about time I leave.{nl}You're free to wander the monastery but try not to go near {nl}the black wall in the Annex Laboratory up there.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001217
text: That wall is full of holy energy so that only those chosen {nl}by the Divine Tree such as Dominikas can go there.{nl}Well then, see you later.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001218
text: ...How did you get in here?{nl}This is a sacred place that only those who are chosen by the Divine Tree may enter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001219
text: Oh my, it appears that the Divine Tree has already chosen you.{nl}I knew you were something special the moment I laid my eyes upon you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001220
text: To think that you were chosen the moment you joined, this is quite an amazing turn of events.{nl}There is a very important ritual coming up... a ritual to bestow the Divine Tree's blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001221
text: All the other followers are waiting at the passage that leads to the annex.{nl}Although I must go ahead in order to prepare for the ritual, please take your time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001222
text: Hurry and deliver this.{nl}I can no longer stand to see the corrupted power of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001223
text: I feel an evil presence coming from the vines that Dominikas left behind.{nl}To think that our monastery might have been covered in such a thing, how frightening.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001224
text: Is there any way to get rid of those vines?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001225
text: Hmm...You say that you need a particular reagent to get rid of the vines?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001226
text: You've arrived at just the right time.{nl}The reagent that Vaidotas was working on is done.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001227
text: Here!{nl}I'll call it "Lucienne's Special Reagent"!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001228
text: ...What's wrong?{nl}It's real this time! I made sure it's safe this time!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001229
text: Even if you can't trust me you should trust Vaidotas!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001230
text: Welcome back.{nl}Please hurry, I don't want to look at the terrible vines any longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001231
text: That's Winterspoon for you!{nl}It's almost like that vine was never there, thank you so much, Revelator!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001232
text: Sorry for making you help us so much...{nl}We owe you our sincere thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001233
text: I am talking about the scripture from the Order of the Tree of Truth left by Dominikas.{nl}It turns out that the impious thing still remains in the monastery.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001234
text: If you see the fake scripture, could you bring it to me?{nl}We're too short-handed to spare anyone at the moment...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001235
text: Those at the Order of the Tree of Truth... to think they would corrupt the power of the goddesses...{nl}This is just blasphemy to the goddesses!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001236
text: So you've found the fake scripture. Thank you.{nl}Give it to me and I will take care of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001237
text: S-Stop...!{nl}I will do whatever you ask me, so please stop!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001238
text: Should I just join the Order of the Tree of Truth?{nl}If I did, would I be able to escape this hunger?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001239
text: Lies...{nl}If not... How... The black wall...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001240
text: It seems that he's been malnourished for a long time.{nl}I can't talk to him now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001241
text: Thank you so much...{nl}I am so sorry for misunderstanding you. I thought something was going wrong...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001242
text: After I regained my consciousness, I felt this mysterious energy from you.{nl}What happened?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001243
text: Ah... So you're the Revelator.{nl}I guess this is why the black wall couldn't block you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001244
text: Thank you. I was able to survive because of you.{nl}Dominikas... He's more cruel than the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001245
text: It hasn't been a long time since Dominikas visited the Elgos Monastery.{nl}I thought he was just an accompanying monk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001246
text: Not so long after he came here, the tree vines and the {nl}demons suddenly swept the monastery annex.{nl}The villagers fled there... But, he stopped them appropriately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001247
text: When I think about it, it was all a facade.{nl}The raid of the tree vines and the sudden attacks of the demons...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001248
text: As the villagers started to follow him, he quickly showed his true nature.{nl}He asked us to create a sinister idol and believe in the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001249
text: Of course, we resisted... But he locked us into that black wall.{nl}He gave us just enough water to stay alive and tried to convert us to his religion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001250
text: I felt so painful since I didn't know what to do.{nl}Ah... The abbot!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001251
text: The abbot must be locked inside the monastery.{nl}I was hoping that the goddesses would protect us... {nl}But we will be in trouble if we don't quickly give you the food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001252
text: Elgos Abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001253
text: This energy... Yes, it's you. The Revelator.{nl}It seems the goddesses finally answered my prayer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001254
text: Ah, nothing. If the other monks are alright, the food will be okay...{nl}I don't think I'll be able to swallow the food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001255
text: He's too old... Is he going to be alright...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001256
text: As expected, Revelator, you're not blocked by the black wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001257
text: The sinister idol that was created by Dominikas in front of Pagarba Chapel...{nl}The black wall started to cover the monastery because of that idol.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001258
text: If we destroy that sinister idol...{nl}There might be a good chance that the whole wall may disappear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001259
text: I just don't know how I can destroy it...{nl}There is nothing I can think of at the moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001260
text: No, wait...{nl}I can sense the demons' souls from you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001261
text: That sphere you have...{nl}Is a demon's soul locked inside it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001262
text: That's it.{nl}Maybe we can use this to destroy the sinister idol.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001263
text: The idea is to purify the demons' souls and use their power.{nl}Unfortunately, we lack the right amount of souls to destroy the idol.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001264
text: Can you fill it with a little bit more of the demons' souls?{nl}As you already may know, defeating demons will automatically absorb their souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001265
text: Without a doubt the demons are strong... that's why I guess that their souls are strong as well.{nl}My sacred energy is not strong enough to purify this much power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001266
text: We should somehow borrow the power of holy water...{nl}Like I told you before though, I have nothing at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001267
text: I am so sorry, but can you get me Holy Water from the Priest Master in Klaipeda?{nl}If we have enough holy water, we'll be able to purify the demons' fallen souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001268
text: Please use the statue of Goddess Vakarine near Viyme Fountain.{nl}You can quickly come back from Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001269
text: With this, you'll be able to purify the souls contained within the Soul Sphere.{nl}Now, give me a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001270
text: Since the power of a demon's soul is strong, the residual power after purification possesses strength as well.{nl}This power has the capability to destroy the sinister idol.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001271
text: Put the purified Soul Sphere's power into the sinister idol.{nl}I hope the idol can't endure this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001272
text: Finally!{nl}Now, we can be freed from the black wall.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001273
text: It's been such a long time...{nl}I think my prayer to the goddesses was not in vain...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001274
text: Now, we'll need to focus on the main culprit of the Order of the Tree of Truth, Dominikas...{nl}Everything will be over once we drive him out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001275
text: Please lend me your power a little longer.{nl}Even if we have the methods to catch him, we can't use our powers {nl}since the villagers have been possessed from being tortured so long...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001276
text: He seems to have some sort of power that allows him to control plants.{nl}I sincerely warn you that he is not to be underestimated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001277
text: Dominikas... He ran away...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001278
text: We shouldn't worry too much.{nl}It's a big blow that we drove out the Order of the Tree of Truth from the Elgos Monastery.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001279
text: And the monsters instead of plants' explosion, I guess it stopped since the spell was unstable.{nl}We were able to protect the villagers because of you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001280
text: When we get better, we will clean up the monastery.{nl}Of course, we should drive out the demons as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001281
text: Even if the world collapses, we believe in people like you who give hope...{nl}You give us the power to endure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001282
text: I don't want to imagine what would've happened without you...{nl}On behalf of the whole monastery, we greatly appreciate your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001283
text: You've done it!{nl}The black wall disappeared...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001284
text: Thank you for saving the monastery.{nl}Ah, is the abbot alright?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001285
text: ...So that is it. {nl}Your faith is as strong as I imagined.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001286
text: Good! Anything. {nl}Just tell me what I can do for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001287
text: What? {nl}So the villagers think we ran away after abandoning the monastery?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001288
text: Those people at the Order of the Tree of Truth... {nl}They locked others inside and alienated them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001289
text: Can you go to the villagers with me?{nl}If you are with me, all misunderstandings will be solved.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001290
text: Hmm... It seems that the villagers found out the true identity of Dominikas.{nl}It is fortunate that the task was solved easier than expected...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001291
text: I will send the villagers back to the village.{nl}I really appreciate that you've reclaimed the Elgos Monastery from the Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001292
text: The demons here are very strong. {nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001293
text: Don't underestimate the power of the sinister idol.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001294
text: Now, the Revelator will continue the journey by following the will of the goddesses.{nl}But before you leave, can you do me one more favor for this old man?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001295
text: Although we got rid of the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}The evil demons still prevail.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001296
text: If you lend me your power, we'll be able to drive out the demons much faster.{nl}Can you defeat the demons here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001297
text: There is something that is bothering me.{nl}I think driving out the Order of the Tree of Truth was wonderful, but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001298
text: Dominikas ran away.{nl}I think he may come back by leading the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001299
text: I want to prepare something for this...{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001300
text: If Dominikas comes back again...{nl}Then, I will not stand idly by.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001301
text: Thank you. {nl}I can relax now because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001302
text: Good. You should do it.{nl}I was actually going to Veyrhas Hall to burn the scripture...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001303
text: It's better to see it once than to hear it a hundred times.{nl}Let's go together. Brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001304
text: I didn't know that one of people of the Winterspoon family came to Nahash Forest.{nl}Even so, since you know this person, he or she must be reliable.{nl}I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001305
text: I can't exactly remember what I did back then.{nl}It's as if I was possessed by something...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001306
text: Yes! {nl}I wouldn't have done such a disrespectful act with a conscious mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001307
text: I will apologize to the other monks later.{nl}I can't believe what I did.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001308
text: Look around you.{nl}Don't you think it's beautiful?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001309
text: The red blood of demons contain special powers.{nl}That's why only their blood can wash away the corrupted power of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001310
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth turned the monastery into a complete mess...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001311
text: We have to clean up the blood of the demons and tidy up the scripture...{nl}We have many things to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001312
text: It will be effective!{nl}Even so... If it goes wrong, you should tell me... For sure...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001313
text: Revelator, I am eternally thankful to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001314
text: Dominikas opened my eyes to a new light.{nl}Only the Divine Tree can save us...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001315
text: I need to save my power since we don't know when {nl}the Order of the Tree of Truth will attack the monastery again.{nl}I really thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001316
text: How could we lose the monastery to a heresy like the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}I am sorry to the goddess and I am thankful to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001317
text: I won't be deceived by the lies of the goddess anymore.{nl}You also think so, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001318
text: You really are...{nl}You might be the envoy that was sent by the goddess...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001319
text: What's strange is that Dominikas often visited Pagarba Chapel.{nl}It could very well mean that he may have hidden something important there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001320
text: If you hide there, you will definitely manage to ambush Dominikas.{nl}I will pray for you in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001321
text: As we cleaned up the monastery...{nl}I found a bunch of the Soul Spheres that were left by Dominikas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001322
text: Can you remember when you broke the sinister idol?{nl}How about I put the demon souls into the sphere and purify them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001323
text: I will give you the Soul Sphere if you could defeat the demons with these, please.{nl}You can put the souls into this sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001324
text: One day, I will become the Alchemist Master!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001325
text: I'll receive help from Vaidotas until I become the Alchemist Master.{nl}It's not because I lost to Vaidotas, it's just that I'm trying to use him!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001326
text: Really!!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001327
text: I sense something strange in the villagers. As he said, let's help the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001328
text: Believe in the Divine Tree and let it save you.{nl}The door of the Order of the Tree of Truth is always open.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001329
text: Fake goddesses, untruthful doctrines... Are you sure that your belief in them has become quite strong?{nl}But that's the wrong path to salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001330
text: Tell me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001331
text: I regret that I may have done something wrong due to hunger.{nl}If Dominikas came instead of you... we wouldn't have been able to go back...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001332
text: I am worried about the abbot.{nl}He is old... I hope the goddesses take care of him...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001333
text: Ahah... No matter how much I think, there is no way.{nl}Now, everything may be ruined...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001334
text: I haven't seen you before.{nl}What has brought you this far?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001335
text: It doesn't matter.{nl}If you have time, could you listen to this old man for a while?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001336
text: This was... originally a sea...{nl}We were fishers who caught fishes in this sea.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001337
text: But, as you can see...{nl}The land suddenly soared upwards.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001338
text: At first, I was thinking whether I should quit fishing, but... it soon turned out alright.{nl}I've earned a lot of money by picking up corals. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001339
text: The monsters were, without a doubt, a bit scary, but the lord was there to help us.{nl}The lord sent her army and the Lord Lieutenant in exchange for a offering.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001340
text: But not too long ago, the monsters went crazy.{nl}We couldn't pick up the corals and even had to evacuate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001341
text: Of course, we have told the Lord Lieutenant about this.{nl}However, he said protecting the town and defeating the monsters {nl}were two different things, and the latter would cost additional tributes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001342
text: We've ran out of the corals that we've collected. {nl}The merchants are waiting for us... What should we do...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001343
text: I'm just saying it is.{nl}Thank you for listening to the complaints of an old man.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001344
text: Hmm... Are you the rumored Revelator?{nl}I've heard you possess quite talented skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001345
text: Have you heard of the coral named Lhu'uvik?{nl}It's a valuable coral used for creating magical tools or for finding magic principles.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001346
text: I've come all this way to trade it...{nl}But as you can probably see, I've gotten in to trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001347
text: There is nothing more important than the schedules and the promises of a merchant.{nl}If we go empty-handed like this, we will suffer from tremendous damage.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001348
text: It's not only us, but it also counts for those villagers.{nl}If it continues like this, they will lose their jobs and {nl}be forced to look for other places to live.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001349
text: I want to borrow your power to help those poor villagers.{nl}Can you help me so that they can start collecting coral again?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001350
text: Thank you for accepting.{nl}First, that lieutenant doesn't want to receive anything besides the corals for tributes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001351
text: Eventually, we will have to get rid of the monsters so that the villagers can gather corals.{nl}You are the only one I can trust, please get rid of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001352
text: I hope this clears things up...{nl}In case something happens, while you are taking care of it, {nl}I will send a person to look at the status of the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001353
text: It will be great if we could just drive out the monsters, but...{nl}Something's up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001354
text: Oh, you've come back already?{nl}You're just as great as I've heard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001355
text: I knew it wouldn't be that easy.{nl}It's so strange that many monsters are rushing in so quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001356
text: This is not just related to the monsters. There must be a different reason.{nl}I will investigate this seperately. Can you ask people here if they saw anything strange?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001357
text: You would think the Lord Lieutenant would be the first one to help, but no!{nl}He would rather waste his time threatening us... How strange.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001358
text: If it was just a matter of taxing additional tributes,{nl}why doesn't the Lord Lieutenant take some measures.{nl}Anyway, how did the investigation go?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001359
text: So as the number of monsters increased, the strange smell started to spread.{nl}Hmm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001360
text: I can't think that the monsters are not related to the smell.{nl}Can you check where that smell is coming from?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001361
text: If we are lucky enough, we might be able to find the source of the smell.{nl}If you find it, please bring it to me. I will get rid of it right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001362
text: I am counting on you.{nl}Please check the coast for spots where the smell is coming from.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001363
text: The smell and the monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001364
text: Just as I thought! In the contents of the pouch was a powder that allures monsters.{nl}Somebody must have deliberately used them to draw the monsters in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001365
text: If the smell disappears, there will be no reason for the monsters to go crazy.{nl}Can you dig out the same pouches from the pit?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001366
text: I will find out more about the pouch in the meantime.{nl}I don't know yet whether it someone left it on accident or on purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001367
text: Oh my god... This many...{nl}I can see why so many monsters are being drawn in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001368
text: Someone is definitely disturbing the coral harvesting.{nl}I don't know why, but whoever behind it must be evil.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001369
text: Yes.{nl}I told you that the Lord Lieutenant is little strange.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001370
text: It would've been quite efficient if the Lord Lieutenant would personally go out and defeat the monsters.{nl}Even if this delays the tribute delivery a bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001371
text: Yet, he didn't do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001372
text: If he knows defeating the monsters is a waste of time...{nl}I think everything is coming together, now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001373
text: If what I am thinking is correct, the Lord Lieutenant will try to steal the tributes.{nl}However we don't have the evidence to support that claim.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001374
text: Alright... Let's answer our suspicions right now. Do we lure the suspect out?{nl}I want you to be responsible for the most important role.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001375
text: I've told the Lord Lieutenant in advance.{nl}The smell was spreading badly in the pit, making it unable to bear.{nl}I've gotten rid of the source and he thanked me for that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001376
text: In the meantime, please hide with the mayor.{nl}Of course, the soldier who will catch the culprit should join. {nl}He should act like an observer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001377
text: Of course, we can't rule out that some of the soldiers may have had a hand in this...{nl}But, you don't have to worry since Basilius is reliable and a very close friend of mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001378
text: Anyway, since the Lord Lieutenant found out that all the pouches were removed...{nl}He will appear again and bury the pocket.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001379
text: Let's strike all at once, then.{nl}I will block the retreat route in case something happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001380
text: I am counting on you then.{nl}When you go, I will start my task as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001381
text: You're safe.{nl}Don't worry, the Lord Lieutenant was caught with the villagers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001382
text: What a cruel and cunning man. Cowardly and dishonorable as well. {nl}He also ratted other soldiers out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001383
text: As I expected, they were stealing the tributes.{nl}They lured the monsters and began to steal in earnest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001384
text: He was blinded by greed and endangered everyone...{nl}I am well acquainted with the lord. Let me take the other soldiers to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001385
text: Due to your help, I was able to keep to the schedule and start picking up the corals again.{nl}Thank you so much. You've saved us and the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001386
text: After you have removed all the pouches from the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef,{nl}the number of monsters have decreased quite significantly.{nl}Such a blessing... It's truly a blessing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001387
text: But what if some pouches are still out there...{nl}The monsters are coming more slowly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001388
text: Thank you.{nl}You keep helping us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001389
text: You are a godsend to us.{nl}Without you, we would have turned into refugees once again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001390
text: You found them all? {nl}What a relief.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001391
text: Hmm, maybe... This is just an idea,{nl}but how about we throw the powder from the pouches away from the pit?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001392
text: Then, the monsters will be directed there. Right?{nl}Can you help us out?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001393
text: Near the Atskiles Cay would be the ideal spot.{nl}Godspeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001394
text: As mayor, it's embarrassing, but I almost gave up on everything.{nl}Whatever it is, I think we made the right choice with staying put.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001395
text: A large number of monsters came? {nl}Damn it... It was very effective, but it puts us in danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001396
text: I am so sorry to give you a hard task.{nl}I'll tell everyone not to touch the pouch.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001397
text: That coral... Where did you get it?{nl}That's called Arnim. It's a very important coral used in medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001398
text: There must be a habitat near the place where you obtained it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001399
text: I am sorry, but can you look for their habitat?{nl}If you could look for the habitat of the Arnim coral, it would help the villagers a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001400
text: If you could find the habitat of the Arnim coral, it would be of great help to the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001401
text: Nugara Sandbank?{nl}That deep... We will have hard time extracting it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001402
text: We better let the refugees know. We should find a way together.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001403
text: I am sorry, but can you help us out?{nl}A lot of us are wounded, but we're short on medicine... {nl}Things are getting worse the longer we go without help...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001404
text: We've already used all the medicine the merchants could offer,{nl}and we have no way of getting any more.{nl}We can make an ointment if we have the ingredients...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001405
text: Please, get me Greentoshell Shell Fragments and Blue Lapasape Mosses.{nl}With those I can make an emergency ointment for the injuries.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001406
text: It's not a severe cut, but if we leave it, it will decay.{nl}There are many people hurt, but I can't do a thing...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001407
text: Thank you. Thank you so much.{nl}This will help you a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001408
text: I am sorry. I found a small box that looked like it fell from a wrecked ship...{nl}Do you know anything about it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001409
text: Ahah... So you don't know.{nl}This is sealed with magic so it can't be opened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001410
text: Something important seems to be inside...{nl}Can you help me open the box?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001411
text: The ship that this box was on probably also has the device to unseal it.{nl}But we have only found the box. So, we have no idea from which ship it came from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001412
text: It must be buried somewhere around the wrecked ship or the area near it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001413
text: What could possibly be inside it for someone to go this far to seal it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001414
text: What is this bag?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001415
text: Ah, there is a small magical stone in the bag!{nl}Thank you for finding it for me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001416
text: What's going to come out? {nl}I hope it's some jewelry or an accessory...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001417
text: The Lord Lieutenant was behind all this? {nl}I would teach him a lesson myself, but the lord will do a better job.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001418
text: I am so sorry to disturb you...{nl}Can I ask you something?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001419
text: At least we can take some comfort in the fact that we don't have to be on the run again.{nl}Our normal lives will return. This is too good to be true.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001420
text: Now, everything is screwed up.{nl}Our coral picking is ruined, and our village is finished for...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001421
text: Everything was suspicious.{nl}The soldiers wouldn't leave if they didn't receive tributes; does that make any sense?{nl}It's good that you solved all of this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001422
text: Although we said we'd pay on the behalf of the townspeople,{nl}the soldiers would only leave if the tributes were given.{nl}Without any means to gather the coral that composed the tributes,{nl}the townspeople couldn't catch a break...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001423
text: What should we do...?{nl}We should quickly gather some coral and hurry back...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001424
text: I told them that there are a lot of monsters there, but they still went and got hurt.{nl}We are so desperate, but it seems the tributes are more important for the Lord Lieutenant than people.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001425
text: This pouch was buried in the spot where the smell was coming from?{nl}Let's see...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001426
text: Since so many monsters are attacking, the number of wounded is increasing as well.{nl}We don't have enough medicine...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001427
text: If it weren't you...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001428
text: I knew it was strange.{nl}It was a smell we couldn't understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001429
text: These are hard times.{nl}The deadline is coming up, but we can't get any coral...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001430
text: Putting all of us in danger for such petty motives, truly there can't be a more vile act than that.{nl}Thank heavens, you were here to save the town.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001431
text: Since the number of monsters has increased recently, I'm getting worried.{nl}They never came down this far before...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001432
text: He didn't even bat an eye when they were injured.{nl}I hope the next lieutenant is nicer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001433
text: The villagers are giving up on their work because the number of monsters increased a lot.{nl}I know it's an order, but it's so unfortunate to just watch it happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001434
text: Will it be futile no matter how hard we try...{nl}I cannot accept that we have to leave this place...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001435
text: Thank you!{nl}I can work again because of you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001436
text: It was strange.{nl}We waited because we thought there must be some reason...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001437
text: We were being used, but we should regret the fact that we just waited for orders.{nl}I want to apologize to the villagers if I have the opportunity.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001438
text: I can't do this anymore.{nl}I tried to have a fresh start putting aside everything I've got...{nl}But, I don't know what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001439
text: Thank you for helping me get back to work!{nl}Humans are more scarier than monsters, sometimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001440
text: The soldiers involved have already been evacuated and it's the lieutenant's turn next.{nl}What in the world? To think that he wanted to use monsters... {nl}It would've been much better if he used his head for a good purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001441
text: He will receive a big punishment from the lord.{nl}He hid a lot of corals in his bedroom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001562

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001563

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001566
text: Request for the secretive rescue

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001567
text: Although you've brought the research materials, Gatre seems he has more to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001568
text: Find the cleanup box, read the manual and arrange the research materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001569
text: Gatre feels scared because if he acts himself, he is afraid that he may get attacked by the monsters again.  Find the cleanup box on behalf of Gatre and read the manual to arrange the objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001570
text: Report to Gatre

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001571
text: In the manual, it is written that Gatre is secretly asking for the help. Go back to Gatre and and tell him that you've arranged the research materials after reading it thoroughly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001572
text: It seems that Gatre understood the fact that there was request for the rescue that was written on the manual. Talk with Gatre again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001573
text: Check the abandoned document at Menka Knoll

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001574
text: Gatre asked you to look for the research materials that were thrown away by mistakes while reading Sarma's face. If you look at the abandoned document at Menka Knoll, you would understand whether what Gatre told you is true.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001575
text: Hand over the research materials to Gatre

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001576
text: As you were looking at the abandoned documents, you can see there are many things that are suspicious as Gatre told you. Since you can't be confident yet, hand over the documents to Gatre and listen to his story again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001577
text: True Nature of the Research

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001578
text: Talk with Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001579
text: Gatre told you to go meet Sarma as he is looking for you. Talk to him and find out whether he knows that you were investigating on him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001580
text: Use the paralysis powder to extract Green Weldigo Blood

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001581
text: Sarma told you that the completion of the research is not that far away so he wants you to help his research. Use the Paralysis powder to collect the blood of Green Weldigo.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001582
text: Hand them over to Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001585

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001586
text: Search the lost research paper

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001587
text: While Sarma was away, Gatre asked you to look for the research papers of Boldas who has been unconscious. Before you do what Sarma asked you to do, look for the lost research papers. The monsters may have the research papers or they may be hidden somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001588

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001591
text: Since you've found the lost research papers, please collect the fruit juice crystals that are on the list of research materials by defeating the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001592
text: Collect the leaves of the plants that grew up strangely

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001593
text: According to the list of the research materials, the leaves of the plants that grew up strangely are needed. Collect the leaves of the plants that grew strangely by going to the seed collection place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001594
text: Hand over the materials to Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001595
text: You've collected all the materials that were listed on the list of the research materials. Hand over the collected materials to Sarma who is at the entrance of the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001596
text: Sabotage the research

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001597
text: Return to Gatre

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001598
text: Sarma told you that there are some materials which Sarma has left so he asked you to get them from Gatre. While moving out from the Sarma's sight, talk with Gatre after giving him the diary of the unconscious man.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001599
text: Check the lost research paper

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001600
text: Gatre asked you to check the lost research paper. Open the inventory and read all the lost research papers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001601
text: On the lost research paper, Sarma's experiment is written in details. Show the lost research paper to Gatre.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001602
text: Although, we haven't found evidence, it is certain that Sarma is doing something wrong when we think based on the research papers. Talk with Gatre what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001603
text: Look for the medicine that is similar to the ripen liquid from the research materials' storage

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001604
text: Gatre told you that since he ruined the research of Sarma, he should earn some time. Look for other medicine that looks similar to the ripen liquid of the fruit tree which is needed for the research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001605
text: Hand them over to Gatre

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001606
text: You've found the medicine that resembles the ripen liquid of the fruit tree. Go back to Gatre with the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001607
text: It seems that you won't be able to distinguish the ripen liquid of the fruit tree from the water of the red lake. Talk with Gatre what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001608
text: Hand over the ripen liquid of the fake fruit tree to Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001609
text: Gatre told you that he would look for the evidence while Sarma is focused on the experiment. Go back to Sarma with the water from the red lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001610
text: True Nature of Sarma's Research

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001611
text: Fortunately, it seems that Sarma didn't notice that the ingredients have changed. Listen to him what he is trying to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001612
text: Use the Transmutation Magic Circle to create ductile ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001613
text: Sarma told you that since he prepared everything, you should just have to activate the Transmutation Magic Circle. Put the ingredients of the mixed alchemy above and in front of the tombstone that locks the magical power, release the locked magical power to make the ingredients ductile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001614
text: Hand over the completed liquid to Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001615
text: You've completed the liquid which Sarma told you about by using the Transmutation Magic Circle. Although, you've mixed some fake ingredients, it looks normal from the appearances. Go back to Sarma and hand over the liquid to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001616
text: Ask Sarma what he is trying to experiment with the completed liquid.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001617
text: Sprinkle the liquid onto the pile of the grass

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001618
text: Sarma told you that he will give you some completed liquid and asked you to wait for the results after sprinkling it on the pile of the grass. Sprinkle the completed liquid onto the pile of the grass that is located in front.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001619
text: You've defeated all monsters that rushed in. Look for Gatre who followed Sarma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001620
text: Check the abandoned memo

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001621
text: Something is written on the abandoned memo. Check what's inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001622
text: Search the wooden boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001623
text: The story about the object which the resident who used to live here is written on the memo. Look for the box and check the object.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001624
text: Check the pot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001625
text: It seems that there is something in the pot. Check what is inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001626
text: Search the next pot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001627
text: The location of the object that was hidden by the villager is written on the memo inside the pot. Look for the next pot and go to the location where the object is located.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001628
text: The Alchemist of Nahash Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001629
text: Search the abandoned tent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001630
text: You've found the abandoned laboratory

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001631
text: Completed searching the abandoned tent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001632
text: Look for the owners of reagent bottles from Nahash Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001633
text: You've found the reagent bottles that seem lost by someone from the abandoned tent. Look for the owner of the reagent bottles from Nahash Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001634
text: Talk with Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001635
text: You've saved Lucienne Winterspoon who was being attacked by the monsters. Talk with Lucienne.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001636
text: It seems that Lucienne Winterspoon has a purpose. Continue talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001637
text: Support for the Greater Justice

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001638
text: Lucienne Winterspoon was conducting an experiment to prevent the plant explosion for the next Alchemist Master position. Continue to talk with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001639
text: Escort Lucienne Winterspoon to Pamesti Village

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001640
text: Lucienne Winterspoon asked for your escort since she wanted to change the location of the experiment. Please take Lucienne Winterspoon safely to Pamesti Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001641
text: You've arrived at Pamesti Village safely. Talk with Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001642
text: You've arrived at Pamesti Village safely. Talk with Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001643
text: Hand over the basic reagent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001644
text: Lucienne Winterspoon told you that she left the basic reagent which she created at the experiment tent as she had to run away quickly. Show her whether the reagent which you picked up belongs to Lucienne.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001645
text: Lucienne told you that the reagent belongs to her as she looked at the basic reagent. Hand over the basic reagent to Lucienne.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001646
text: Hand over %s to Lucienne

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001647
text: Lucienne Winterspoon is preparing for the experiment with the basic reagent. Ask her whether there is anything you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001648
text: Collect the leaves of Spion after defeating Blue Spions

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001649
text: Lucienne Winterspoon told you that the other materials can be obtained by herself, but she can't face Blue Spions alone. For her, collect the leaves of Spion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001650
text: Hand over the leaves of Spion to Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001651
text: You've collected enough leaves of Spion. Hand them over to Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001652
text: Collect %s from Blue Spions

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001653
text: After collecting the leaves of Spions, you've handed them over to Lucienne Winterspoon. Continue talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001654
text: Protect Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001655
text: Lucienne Winterspoon told you that he will start the reagent mix with the collected ingredients. The monsters may come after smelling it so she asked you to protect her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001656
text: You've defeated Spions that came after smelling the medicine. Talk with Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001657
text: Great Success or Great Failure

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001658
text: It seems that the reagent has been completed. Talk with Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001659
text: Test Lucienne's reagent on the tree vines that are in the tent of herb pickers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001660
text: Lucienne Winterspoon told you that the tree vines that are growing in the herb broker's tent are good to test for the reagent. For the test of Lucienne's reagent, please move to the tent of the herb collector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001661
text: As you used the reagent, the tree vines grew irregularly and soon they broke. Talk with Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001662
text: The tree vines grew at an enormously fast pace and then they broke. Lucienne Winterspoon is happy since she thinks that her experiment is successful. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001663
text: Receive advice from Vaidotas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001664
text: Lucienne Winterspoon seems she's mad after listening from Vaidotas to get advice.  She told you to go meet Vaidotas alone if she really wants to see him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001665
text: Go back to Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001666
text: Vaidotas told you that the reagent that was created by Lucienne Winterspoon is a dangerous reagent. She gave you the reagent and told you to go back to Lucienne quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001667
text: Look for Lucienne Winterspoon with the ownerless cultivated land

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001668
text: It seems that Lucienne Winterspoon went to the ownerless cultivated land to test the reagent. Before she uses the reagent, please go quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001669
text: You've defeated the Carnivore that went crazy. Talk to Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001670
text: It seems that Lucienne Winterspoon has some request to you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001671
text: Collect the teeth of the Spions

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001672
text: Lucienne Winterspoon asked you to bring the teeth of the Spions. Obtain the teeth from Blue Spions around.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001673
text: Hand over the teeth of the Spions to Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001674
text: You've collected all the teeth of Spions which Lucienne Winterspoon has requested to you. Hand them over to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001675
text: Collect %s from Blue Spions

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001676
text: It seems that Lucienne Winterspoon has som request to you. Talk with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001677
text: Plant the herb seeds for the experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001678
text: Lucienne Winterspoon asked you to plant the herb seeds for the experiemnt when you pass by the ownerless cultivated land.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001679
text: Talk with Villager Nella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001680
text: It seems that Nella who've come back to the village has some request to you. Talk with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001681
text: Defeat the monsters at Nahash Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001682
text: Villager Nella feels uneasy because she doesn't know when she will get attacked again. She asked you to defeat the monsters that are wandering around the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001683
text: You've defeated the monsters at Nahash Forest. Go back to Villager Nella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001684
text: Great Words

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001685
text: Talk with Priest Dominikas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001686
text: As you came into the Elgos Monastery, people are gathered around. Talk with Priest Dominikas among them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001687
text: Dominikas told you that the door of the Order of the Tree of Truth is open to anyone and waiting for someone who wants salvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001688
text: Listen to the sermon of Priest Dominikas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001689
text: Listen to the preach of Priest Dominikas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001690
text: Dominikas told you that he will preach about the doctrine of the Order of the Tree of Truth. Listen to the preach of Dominikas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001691
text: Wrong Faith

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001692
text: Dominikas told you that you better get used to the Order by helping the villagers. Talk with Nella first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001693
text: Fill the soul beads with the spirits of the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001694
text: Villager Nella told you that in order to prevent getting attacked by the demons, you should possess the soul marbles with the souls of the demons. When the HP of the demons is less than half, you will be able to absorb the souls of the demons when using marbles of the spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001695
text: You've filled the soul beads with the spirits of the demons. Return to Villager Nella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001696
text: Talk with Villager Duncan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001697
text: Dominikas told you that you should get used to the Order by helping the villagers. Talk with the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001698
text: Move to Veyrhas Hall with Villager Duncan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001699
text: Duncan told you that he collected all the books that he will burn at Veyrhas Hall. It seems dangerous, but anyways, move to Veyrhas Hall with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001700
text: You have successfully saved Villager Duncan from the demons. Talk to Villager Duncan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001701
text: Talk to Villager James

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001702
text: Collect Demon's Red Blood

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001703
text: Villager James says that, in order to purify the corrupted power of the goddess, the demon's red blood is needed. Defeat the nearby demons to collect their red blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001704
text: Deliver it to Villager James

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001705
text: Obtained demon's red blood requested by Villager James. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001706
text: Defeat nearby demons and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001707
text: Dirty Tricks

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001708
text: Inspect the Annex Laboratory beyond the Black Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001709
text: There is something hidden beyond the black wall. Pass through the black wall to inspect the Annex Laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001710
text: Dominikas is right behind you. You didn't see him coming, and you're not sure how long he's been there. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001711
text: On the way out from the Annex Laboratory, you came across Priest Dominikas. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001712
text: Move to the Principal Corridor

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001713
text: Priest Dominikas praises you, for those who can walk through the black wall are those whom the Divine Tree allowed. He says an important ritual is about to commence, and he wants you to meet him at the Principal Corridor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001714
text: Attend Dominikas' ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001715
text: Dominikas said an important ritual is to be held at the Principal Corridor. Attend the ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001716
text: Go to the Elgos Monastery Main Building

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001717
text: Dominikas' ritual was a ruse to accuse you of heresy. Escape to the Elgos Monastery Main Building.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001718
text: Remove the vines

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001719
text: Talk to Elgos Monk

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001720
text: The monk is in need of your help. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001721
text: Elgos Monk wants to get rid of all the vines Dominikas has grown. Talk to Lucienne Winterspoon to get the info you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001722
text: The Elgos Monk is looking for a way to remove all the vines grown by Dominikas. Talk to Lucienne Winterspoon to get the info you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001723
text: Remove the vines by using Lucienne's Special Reagent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001724
text: Lucienne Winterspoon has developed new reagent. She combined materials in accordance with the adivice from Vaidotas. The result was a safe reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001725
text: The vines wither away from a mere touch of Lucienne's special reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001726
text: The Elgos Monk is in need of your help. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001727
text: Retrieve the fake scripture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001728
text: The monk wants retrieve the fake scripture spread by Dominikas. Inspect the bookpiles in Veyrhas Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001729
text: You've found the fake scripture from the pile. Return it to the Elgos Monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001730
text: According to the order of the Order of the Tree of Truth, they trapped the monk in the principal building. Find the trapped monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001731
text: You've found the monk trapped in the Principal Laboratory. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001732
text: Hungry Faith

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001733
text: You have found the surviving monk in the Principal Laboratory. Talk to the Elgos Monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001734
text: Find edible food

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001735
text: The monk seems to be relieved to see that you are not a member of the Order of the Tree of Truth, the monk could not continue his words. He is quite starved. Bring him some edible food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001736
text: Give the food to the Elgos Monk

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001737
text: You've found some food in the Namhoss Parvis Intersection. Give it to the Elgos Monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001738
text: After gobbling down the food, the Elgos Monk seems to regained himself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001739
text: Move to the Elgos Abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001740
text: The Elgos Monk says that the abbot is in the same situation as he was, trapped in the Monastery Courtyard. Get the food to him as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001741
text: Demon's Fallen Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001742
text: Talk to the Elgos Abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001743
text: Found the abbot trapped in the Monastery Courtyard. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001744
text: Collect Demon Souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001745
text: The abbot claims that in order to destroy the black wall, the Sinister Idol must be destroyed as well. Fill the Soul Sphere with the demon souls, purify them to destroy the sinister idol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001746
text: You've filled the Soul Sphere with the demon souls. Return to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001747
text: Defeat the demons and absorb their souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001748
text: Collected enough demons' fallen souls. Talk to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001749
text: Purchase Holy Water from the Priest Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001750
text: The abbot needs more power to purify the demons' fallen souls. The Holy Water from a Priest Master would greatly help him with the process. Purchase 10 Holy Waters from the Priest Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001751
text: Give the Holy Water to the abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001752
text: You've purchased Holy Water from the Priest Master. Return to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001753
text: Purchase %s from the Priest Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001754
text: You've purchased Holy Water from the Priest Master. Talk to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001755
text: Destroy the Sinister Idol

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001756
text: The abbot purified the soul sphere. He says using the purified soul sphere will destroy the sinister idol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001757
text: By using the soul sphere, you've destroyed the sinister idol. Report back to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001758
text: For Total Freedom

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001759
text: You've destroyed the sinister idol by using the purified soul sphere. Talk to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001760
text: Move to the Pagarba Chapel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001761
text: The Elgos abbot says that Dominikas frequently visited the Pagarba Chapel. Hiding inside it, he will certainly show his face there. Move to the Pagarba Chapel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001762
text: The magic must have failed since no plant multiplied. Instead, gluttons appeared and you've barely managed to defeat it. Report this to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001763
text: Defeat the summoned %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001764
text: You've successfully driven out Dominikas and rescued the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001765
text: Resolve the misunderstanding of the townspeople with the Elgos Abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001766
text: The Elgos Abbot requested your help in resolving misunderstandings the townspeople have. Go along with the abbot to resolve the misunderstanding.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001767
text: The townspeople seemed to have realized the truth at the Annex Laboratory. Talk to the Elgos Abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001768
text: The Elgos Abbot seems to want to ask you a favor. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001769
text: Defeat the demons in the Elgos Monastery Main Building

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001770
text: The abbot managed to drive out Dominikas but the demons are still roaming the monastery. They need to be taken care of.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001771
text: The Elgos Abbot seems to want to ask you a favor. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001772
text: Defeat the demons and absorb their fallen souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001773
text: The abbot says that to prevent it from ever happening again, the abbot asks you to filled up the soul sphere with the demon souls once again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001774
text: You've successfully filled the soul sphere up. Return to the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001775
text: Absorb the demons' fallen souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001776
text: Talk to Mayor Frege

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001777
text: When arrived at Cranto Coast, you see the refugees who lost their wills to live. Ask Mayor Frege about the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001778
text: Mayor Frege wants ot talk about his problems to anyone. Listen to Mayor Frege.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001779
text: Talk to Merchant Simonas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001780
text: Merchant Simonas is having some troubles gathering corals. Talk to Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001781
text: Sweep the monsters of the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001782
text: Merchant Simonas explains that due to the influx of monsters, the townspeople are unable to gather corals. Defeat the monsters in the coral mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001783
text: Report to Merchant Simonas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001784
text: You've defeated all monster of the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef. Return to Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001785
text: Despite your initial success, the monsters are reappearing in the coral mine. Talk to Merchant Simonas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001786
text: Gather intel from the refugees

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001787
text: Merchant Simonas has some idea to put to test and asks you to ask the refugees about any suspicious things they might have witnessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001788
text: Gathered some various intel. Share them with Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001789
text: Merchant Simonas says there is something weird about testimonies from the refugees and the behavior of the Lord Lieutenant. Talk to Merchant Simonas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001790
text: Inspect the spot with a strange smell on Cranto Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001791
text: Merchant Simonas suspects there is a linkage between the upsurge of monsters and the strange scent. Inspect the smelly spot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001792
text: Deliver it to Merchant Simonas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001793
text: You've found a Suspicious Pouches on the spot of the smell. Deliver it to Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001794
text: Merchant Simonas seems to have found something inside the pouches. Talk to Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001795
text: Find the Suspicious Pouches from the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001796
text: Merchant Simonas believes that the reason behind the monster infestation is this foul-smelling pouches. Find all the suspicious Pouches from the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001797
text: It seems all the foul smelling pouches have been retrieved. Deliver them to Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001798
text: Merchant Simonas seems to have an idea. Continue talking with Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001799
text: Stake out in the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef until the perpetrator shows up

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001800
text: Merchant Simonas says that the perpetrator will come back to the crime scene to repeat the action. Hide in the Lhu'uvik Coral Reef until the perpetrator shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001801
text: The monster has been defeated but the Lord Lieutenant and his ilk have ran away. Talk to Merchant Simonas and find what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001802
text: Defeat %s driven by smell

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001803
text: Mayor Frege seems to have some more favors to ask of you. Talk to Mayor Frege.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001804
text: Remove the remaining pouches on the Cranto Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001805
text: Mayor Frege claims there are still many pouches remaining on the coast. Find all the remaining pouches.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001806
text: All the pouches are found. Report back to Mayor Frege that they have been taken care of.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001807
text: Mayor Frege is in need of your help. Talk to Mayor Frege.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001808
text: Lure the monsters to the suspicious pouch

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001809
text: Mayor Frege says that by using the suspicious pouch, you can lure monsters further away. Bury the suspicious pouch in the ground near the Atskiles Cay.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001810
text: You've defeated all the monsters lured in. Report to Mayor Frege.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001811
text: Defeat the lured monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001812
text: Ask Merchant Felicia about the corals

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001813
text: Acquired unique corals from monsters. Perhaps Merchant Felicia knows something about this?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001814
text: Inspect the habitat of Arnim Coral

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001815
text: Merchant Felicia says this unique coral is called Arnim Coral. It is extremely rare and it will help the townspeople greatly if you let her know where to find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001816
text: Talk to Merchant Felicia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001817
text: You've found the habitat of Arnim Coral. Tell Merchant Felicia the location.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001818
text: Talk to Refugee Elius

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001819
text: Refugee Elius seems to be in need of your help. Talk to Refugee Elius.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001820
text: Defeat the nearby monsters and obtain materials for making an ointment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001821
text: Refugee Elius is makig ointments to heal injured people. Gather the necessary materials from the nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001822
text: Deliver them to Refugee Elius

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001823
text: You've found all the ingredients you need. Deliver them to Refugee Elius.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001824
text: Merchant Felicia is looking for someone who can help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001825
text: Use the Magic Searching Stone to find a tool to open the box

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001826
text: Merchant Felicia is looking for a way to open the box. Use the Magic Searching Stone to find the right tool.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001827
text: Deliver it to Merchant Felicia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160310_001828
text: You've found a bag responding to the Magic Searching Stone's signal. Deliver it to Merchant Felicia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001829
text: I'm going to give you some aged fruit tree sap.{nl}Go to the research material warehouse and find a chemical that looks like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001830
text: It is said this steel-barred window was moved to Kalejimas a long time ago.{nl}Quite a dready object from the Kadumel Era.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001831
text: Vaidotas. Do you know him?{nl}The Alchemist Master, Vaidotas, is my cousin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001832
text: You are unable to move due to a strange magic circle!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001833
text: It looks like the circle was made for something evil.{nl}Let's see if there's other circles around.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001834
text: I found another magic circle.{nl}I wonder if it'll disappear if we destroy the magic core?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001835
text: I don't think regular stones will work.{nl}Maybe monster horns or something similar?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001836
text: I think I found out how to destroy the magic circles.{nl}Let's see if there's more of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001837
text: Are you hurt?{nl}I'm sorry. I didn't think someone would come to such unstable grounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001838
text: I'm Kabbalist Lutas.{nl}I'm redrawing the Vera Coast magic circles as requested by the Kabbalist Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001839
text: This area rose up from underwater during Medzio Diena, so the soil here is very weak. {nl}If it ends up being covered by the sea again, it will cause {nl}a massive earthquake affecting the whole continent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001840
