text: Because of that, the Kabbalist Master drew magic circles here to stabilize the soil.{nl}With the power of Zemyna, the goddess of the earth and Jurate, the goddess of the sea.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001841
text: But after sometime, I came back and the circles had faded a lot.{nl}So I told the Kabbalist Master and now I'm redrawing the magic circles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001842
text: By the way, you don't seem very affected by the Binding Magic Circle, you must be skilled. {nl}Sorry for asking, but I could use some help, actually... Would you perhaps...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001843
text: Oh no... How could this happen?{nl}The Earth Magic Circle is gone!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001844
text: Could it be... the earthquake...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001845
text: You destroyed the magic circle?{nl}Oh my...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001846
text: I know my magic circles gave you a hard time, but this one...{nl}This one is the magic circle supporting Vera Coast!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001847
text: We can't lose time. We need to draw the magic circle again!{nl}Quick, you need to gather some earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001848
text: I have an earth energy collector that I installed some time ago, just in case.{nl}The Tuolo Coral Reef. I'll give you this Earth Magic Stone, just go quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001849
text: We have no time to stall.{nl}If we don't complete the magic circle, we could cause an earthquake as strong as Medzio Diena!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001850
text: Aaargh... Another earthquake...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001851
text: You're fast.{nl}Give me the earth energy. I'll take it from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001852
text: Did you feel the ground shaking earlier? We need to hurry.{nl}After restoring the Earth Magic Circle, I'm going to take care of the the sea and balancing one.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001853
text: I'm giving you a Sea Magic Stone and a balancing one.{nl}Fill them up while I try to restore the Earth Magic Circle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001854
text: Unfortunately I have no collector for these.{nl}You'll have to put down the stones and hunt monsters nearby to have them absorb their energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001855
text: The ground was shaking again.{nl}I should hurry and complete the Sea Magic Circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001856
text: Did you fill up the stones with energy?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001857
text: I just finished the magic circle.{nl}Please wait a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001858
text: Finished! Now to repair the Sea Magic Circle.{nl}I'll go ahead first and start preparing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001859
text: The Sea Magic Circle is in Khanka Sentry.{nl}You know where it is, right? We'll meet there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001860
text: Thanks to you I was able to draw the circle in time.{nl}Now I just need to finish the Balancing Magic Circle and it should be fine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001861
text: I drew the Balancing Magic Circle in advance before coming back.{nl}All we need to do is add the balancing energy to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001862
text: The Balancing Magic Circle is at the Garama Sandbank, past the Bachl Vacant Lot.{nl}Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001863
text: Ugh... I can't walk anymore.{nl}I'm sorry, I'm a disgrace...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001864
text: But there's no time to waste.{nl}The Balancing Magic Circle needs to be completed as soon as possible...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001865
text: I think I'm going to have to give you the balancing stone.{nl}I'll be fine if I rest for a while, you go ahead and complete the magic circle. Please.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001866
text: We're wasting time. Go now. Go...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001867
text: You did great.{nl}You stopped an immense tragedy from happening.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001868
text: Vera Coast should be safe from being submerged now.{nl}I'm going to look into the conditions of the soil a little more and go back to the Kabbalist Master.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001869
text: Thank you!{nl}If you could keep the monsters away while I draw the circle again, I'll be much appreciated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001870
text: I was just about to go to the Earth Magic Circle. Come with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001871
text: The Sea Magic Circle only needs energy of the sea.{nl}On the Balancing Magic Circle you need to add both earth and sea energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001872
text: For the Sea Magic Stone, make sure you fill it only with sea energy.{nl}Be careful not to mix sea and earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001873
text: Ah... wait!{nl}I think there's a problem...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001874
text: Looking at the new magic circles, the Earth Magic Circle looks a little weaker than the others.{nl}I think there might have been a problem with the energy collector.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001875
text: I want to absorb some energy directly from monsters {nl}like what we did with the other magic circles.{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001876
text: Just be careful.{nl}Make sure the sea energy doesn't mix with the earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001877
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll repair the Earth Magic Circle now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001878
text: Hmm... I can't help but worry about all these monsters around.{nl}But magic circle protective magic doesn't work on monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001879
text: I should probably make more Binding Magic Circles around.{nl}I'm sorry, but just help me with this one last thing!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001880
text: When the new magic circles are completed, they disappear after a while.{nl}Don't worry about stepping on them, though, they only react to monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001881
text: The new Binding Magic Circles are ready? {nl}Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001882
text: What? Nothing happens when the monsters step on them?{nl}Ah... Maybe they need time to activate.{nl}Don't worry about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001883
text: Now that I think about it, the Binding Magic Circles I made before were too dangerous. {nl}Even you had a close call with them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001884
text: I think it's best to get rid of any danger.{nl}It's the last thing I'm asking you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001885
text: The Magic Searching Stone is too old so sometimes it doesn't detect magic circles that well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001886
text: Thanks for your help.{nl}It should be safe for anyone who comes here now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001887
text: I'm going to give you a Magic Searching Stone.{nl}Use it to find any hidden Binding Magic Circles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001888
text: The magic circles you found will fade away with time.{nl}Luring monsters into the circles isn't a bad option either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001889
text: The magic circles do disappear when you step on them, {nl}but there's no need to do anything dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001890
text: Oh, make sure you add only sea energy to the Sea Magic Circle.{nl}The balancing one needs both earth and sea energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001891
text: Make sure you don't get them mixed up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001892
text: Thanks to you Vera Coast is stable now.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001893
text: There are three small magic circles at the Bachl Vacant Lot.{nl}If something happens to the magic circles, those circles will also react.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001894
text: There doesn't seem to be a reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001895
text: Are you sure? Thank you!{nl}The method is the same as before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001896
text: I'm going to give you an Earth Magic Stone; just put it down and defeat monsters.{nl}Also, make sure to fill it only with earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001897
text: Oh, don't worry.{nl}I made it so that it only works with monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001898
text: This is a Binding Magic Circle scroll.{nl}Take it and create Binding Magic Circles around the new circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001899
text: Evil Magic Circles? (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001900
text: Evil Magic Circles? (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001901
text: Evil Magic Circles? (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001902
text: Evil Magic Circles? (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001903
text: Earth Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001904
text: Earth Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001905
text: Talking about what happened

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001906
text: I'll gather the energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001907
text: Balancing Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001908
text: I see no reason to help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001909
text: Sea Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001910
text: Sea Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001911
text: I'll go there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001912
text: That's going to be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001913
text: Balancing Magic Circle (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001914
text: Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001915
text: Balancing Magic Circle (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001916
text: I can't go alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001917
text: More Earth Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001918
text: Restrain to Protect (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001919
text: I'll help you, but what if other people get caught in it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001920
text: Restrain to Protect (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001921
text: Evil Magic Circles?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001922
text: Search Vera Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001923
text: You have arrived at Vera Coast. What kind of events could await you here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001924
text: A magic circle under your feet has suddenly activated and you're unable to move! First, defeat the monsters around you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001925
text: Someone seems to have created a magic circle with evil intents. Look for other magic circles around Vera Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001926
text: Search for other magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001927
text: Someone seems to have created a magic circle with evil intents. Look for other magic circles around Vera Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001928
text: Find a way to destroy the magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001929
text: You have found other magic circles. To destroy them, it seems you need to target their magic cores. Find a way to to that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001930
text: Find another way to destroy the magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001931
text: The stones don't seem to be very effective. Look for another solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001932
text: Find another way to destroy the magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001933
text: The stones don't seem to be very effective. Look for another solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001934
text: Throw a piece of Coral Horn

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001935
text: Normal stones don't seem to be very effective. Defeat nearby monsters to obtain a piece of a monsters horn and throw it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001936
text: You have destroyed the Blue and Red Magic Circles. Look for any other magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001937
text: Search for more magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001938
text: Talk to Kabbalist Lutas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001939
text: Kabbalist Lutas has disabled the Binding Magic Circle. Ask him if he knows anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001940
text: Kabbalist Lutas has disabled the Binding Magic Circle that was trapping you. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001941
text: Go to the Magic Circle with Kabbalist Lutas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001942
text: Kabbalist Lutas is redrawing the magic circles stabilizing Vera Coast. Go with him to the magic circle he is redrawing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001943
text: The magic circles thought to have been created with evil intentions were drawn by Lutas. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001944
text: It looks like you will have to help Lutas redraw the magic circles. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001945
text: Gather Earth Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001946
text: Kabbalist Lutas has asked you to fill the magic stone with earth energy. Go to the Tuolo Coral Reef and have the stone absorb earth energy. Lutas also warned you to be careful of any monsters after earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001947
text: Return to Kabbalist Lutas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001948
text: You have gather enough earth energy. Return to Kabbalist Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001949
text: Kabbalist Lutas says the Earth Magic Circle is not yet complete. Ask him if there is anything you can help with meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001950
text: Gather Balancing Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001951
text: Kabbalist Lutas now wants to collect energy to repair the water and Balancing Magic Circles. Put down the Balancing Magic Stone and defeat nearby monsters to collect sea and earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001952
text: Kabbalist Lutas now wants to collect energy to repair the water and Balancing Magic Circles. Put down the Balancing Magic Stone and defeat nearby monsters to collect sea and earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001953
text: Gather Sea Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001954
text: You have filled the Balancing Magic Stone with balancing energy. Now fill the Sea Magic Stone with sea energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001955
text: To fill up the Sea Magic Stone, put it down and defeat monsters with sea energy. Just be careful not to let it mix with earth energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001956
text: You have filled the Balancing and Sea Magic Stones with sufficient energy. Return to Kabbalist Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001957
text: Kabbalist Lutas is going to head to the spot where the Sea Magic Circle is. Go meet him there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001958
text: Protect Lutas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001959
text: Kabbalist Lutas wants to draw the next magic circle as soon as possible. While he does that, he has asked you to protect him from nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001960
text: Lutas has completed the Sea Magic Circle. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001961
text: Balancing Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001962
text: Lutas has restored the Sea Magic Circle. Talk to Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001963
text: Go to the Bachl Vacant Lot for the Last Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001964
text: Lutas says all that's left to do is repair the Balancing Magic Circle. Go with Lutas to the Bachl Vacant Lot, where the circle is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001965
text: Lutas seems to have been injured by the attacking Crabil. Talk to Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001966
text: The Crabil was defeated, but Lutas seems to be injured. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001967
text: Add balancing energy to the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001968
text: Lutas seems to be having trouble moving. You need to complete the Balancing Magic Circle for him. Defeat nearby monsters to keep them from disturbing you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001969
text: After adding the balancing energy to the magic circle, it is now completed. Return to Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001970
text: Kabbalist Lutas seems to have something to ask you. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001971
text: Gather Earth Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001972
text: Lutas thinks the earth energy gathered with the collector was too weak. Put down the Earth Magic Stone and defeat nearby monsters to fill it with earth energy. Like Lutas warned, make sure it doesn't mix with sea energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001973
text: You have gathered earth energy from monsters. Return to Kabbalist Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001974
text: Restrain to Protect

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001975
text: Kabbalist Lutas seems to have something to ask you. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001976
text: Create a Binding Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001977
text: Lutas wants to create Binding Magic Circles to protect the newly drawn ones. He believes the ones he created at first were too dangerous, as they worked on both monsters and humans, so he has given you a new magic circle scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001978
text: You have created new magic circles around the newly drawn ones. Return to Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001979
text: You have created new magic circles around the newly drawn ones. Talk to Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001980
text: Search for Dangerous Binding Magic Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001981
text: Kabbalist Lutas wants to find and destroy the Binding Magic Circles he has previously created. Use Lutas' Magic Searching Stone to find the circles. Revealed magic circles disappear after some time, or you can lure monsters into them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160323_001982
text: You took care of all the dangerous magic circles. Talk to Lutas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001983
text: There's still work to be done, it seems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001984
text: I see everything is settled.{nl}I can only thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001985
text: I've received the information and will proceed accordingly.{nl}Please rely that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001986
text: Thanks to you I can safely return to my hometown.{nl} Meeting you really was the greatest blessing of my life.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001987
text: The demon remnants are still everywhere.{nl}It's going to take a while for the soldiers to recover...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001988
text: Wizard Tulis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001989
text: Thank you for helping with my research.{nl}I can do it on my own from now on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001990
text: If we can use this, it could really help us find the goddess.{nl}Sorry for being so sensitive earlier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001991
text: Village Priest Chaleims

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001992
text: The goddess have not abandoned us!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001993
text: Just do as Argis says.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001994
text: Villager Deailan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001995
text: We need to get some herbs growing around here to cure our people...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001996
text: Villager Argis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001997
text: I waited for the day this curse would be gone...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001998
text: Villager Emils

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_001999
text: When will the suffering end...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002000
text: Please, destroy the statues in Kadumel Cliff and rid us of this suffering...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002001
text: Jamelhan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002002
text: We need medicine.{nl}Too many people are wounded and we don't have enough antiseptic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002003
text: I saw some wild ginger plants on the way here, maybe we can use that.{nl}It stings a little but... It's better than nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002004
text: They grow in Barga Base.{nl}There are many monsters there, so you'll need to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002005
text: That's the only place they grow like that.{nl}But, I mean, if they're good...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002006
text: You brought in the good ones.{nl}Good job.{nl}We all owe you one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002007
text: Soldier Guylens

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002008
text: S-s-stop!{nl}Are you travelling through here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002009
text: This area is too cold and dangerous to walk through without preparation.{nl}And... um... I'm sorry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002010
text: We're offering supplies to travelers who come through here.{nl}Go inside and look for the Assistant Commander.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002011
text: It's been long since we've seen a traveler.{nl}You must be tired, coming all the way here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002012
text: Talk to the Assistant Commander to receive some supplies.{nl}Don't refuse them and... Safe travels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002013
text: Ibre Plateau is a very cold, dangerous place.{nl}Without firewood to keep you warm and plenty of food, you'll have a hard time making it through your journey.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002014
text: Go see Supply Soldier Herntas by the bridge that goes to Uzsaldi Plateau.{nl}Tell him I sent you and he will give you some supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002015
text: Our troops have plenty to deal with, so don't worry.{nl}Now, if you'll excuse me... {nl}Have a nice trip.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002016
text: Don't feel too concerned for our troops.{nl}Just worry about your own safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002017
text: Did the Assistant Commander send you?{nl}I was just... organizing these traveler supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002018
text: The supplies are at Valaska...{nl}Wait, no.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002019
text: Here, take these supplies.{nl}They'll be of great use whilst you're travelling through the Plateau.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002020
text: Uh... Oh. I'm sorry, would you go back to the Assistant Commander?{nl}There's something missing. Talon will tell you about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002021
text: Herntas sent you?{nl}Ah... I see. Can't be helped, then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002022
text: The rest of the supplies aren't organized yet, you see.{nl}It really can't be helped.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002023
text: I guess it's best if you go get the rest of the supplies yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002024
text: We have a warehouse in Valaska Hillside.{nl}Tell Supply Soldier Delyn there that I sent you and get the supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002025
text: I'm sorry.{nl}We can't help it either.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002026
text: I'm sorry.{nl}I'm really sorry...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002027
text: I don't expect you to forgive me.{nl}I know the goddess won't easily take me to her side even when I die!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002028
text: But... Still, I hope you'll listen.{nl}We're going to die at the hands of the demons anyway... Just listen to me, then you can decide what to do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002029
text: After Medzio Diena, all contact from the kingdom suddenly stopped.{nl}Without news of operations or reports, the troops themselves were crushed...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002030
text: Then, Demon Centaurus appeared with his vassals.{nl}He said he would spare our lives if we agreed to his deal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002031
text: He told us to find and kill the one called the Revelator. {nl}In return, he would keep us alive and fed...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002032
text: We didn't even know what a Revelator was.{nl}Besides, who would come to a dangerous place like this?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002033
text: We decided to take the chance and keep living.{nl}The lives of our very troops were at stake so we had no choice.{nl}We just had to survive no matter how...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002034
text: Some did try to escape, of course.{nl}But each one of them... was made into a gruesome example of what could happen to us...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002035
text: Yes... We prayed every day that no one would come...{nl}But then you... I don't know what to tell you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002036
text: I've lost my honor as member of the Royal Army, and my own life now.{nl}If I keep you safe, will I be able to repent...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002037
text: Go.{nl}They'll come running as soon as they find out one of the vassals is dead.{nl}Go, now!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002038
text: Soldier Callans

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002039
text: You already prepared the trap?{nl}Wow...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002040
text: The bomb I have isn't powerful enough.{nl}If we're to set it up over there... Even without the proper calculations, I don't see it being enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002041
text: Oh, you will?{nl}Then please bring me some Black Stones from Uzsaldi Plateau.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002042
text: I'll be here preparing to enhance the bomb meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002043
text: This bomb wasn't made to kill, you see.{nl}If we don't work on it, this will be nothing but a joke to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002044
text: Oh, this is it.{nl}Just a wait a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002045
text: Finished.{nl}I had to rush it so it's not too stable, but it's definitely powerful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002046
text: Now, for the next step.{nl}We need to set up this bomb somewhere the demons will walk by.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002047
text: Will you?{nl}Let's go together, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002048
text: Be careful with it.{nl}I did manage to enhance the bomb, but since I had to rush it, it's not very stable.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002049
text: Thank you so much.{nl}Now... the operation begins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002050
text: What are you doing? Why don't you run?{nl}We disobeyed the demons, they'll be here any second!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002051
text: Do you really mean it?{nl}You want us to... defeat the demons together?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002052
text: We were going to hurt you!{nl}I thought you would at least resent us... instead you make humbled criminals of us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002053
text: Alright.{nl}If I'm going to die, I might as well repent to you while I can.{nl}The thing that worries me is that... everyone is terrified of Centaurus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002054
text: I realised what it is we were missing.{nl}You awoke that in us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002055
text: Yes... I remember now.{nl}We are the Royal Army!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002056
text: Never did we imagine an operation of this caliber.{nl}With someone as strong as you on our side, I'm not afraid to put my life at risk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002057
text: My plan is to attract as many demons as possible to the trap to reduce their numbers.{nl}But we can't let a monster get caught instead and ruin the plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002058
text: The operation is taking place at Uzsaldi Plateau.{nl}Will you take care of the monsters around the trap?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002059
text: This trap wasn't easy to set, it would be a shame to see it ruined by monsters.{nl}I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002060
text: Slowly we're getting ready to fight the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002061
text: First we need to lure the demons with wooden fences.{nl}The soldiers are busy with other tasks, so I want to ask you to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002062
text: My debt to you just keeps growing.{nl}You can get the fences from the supplies box in front of Herntas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002063
text: If only we can make this work...{nl}We could finally escape the clutches of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002064
text: Are the fences ready?{nl}Good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002065
text: Now we just need Soldier Callans to set up the trap to begin the operation...{nl}He's a little late.{nl}It'd be great if you could help him, just in case.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002066
text: Alright. We're ready.{nl}The soldiers sent to spread false information to the demons already reported back, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002067
text: They say Centaurus is coming this way.{nl}And apparently he's furious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002068
text: Everything's running smoothly.{nl}I just hope we succeed...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002069
text: Is it... over?{nl}I can finally return as soldier of the Kingdom... It's been so hard...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002070
text: I would have lived a miserable life if it weren't for you.{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002071
text: We might have escaped the demons, but this is far from over.{nl}They probably don't even know we're alive back in the Kingdom...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002072
text: We need a way to contact the Kingdom!{nl}Then we can think about going back to our families.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002073
text: But how do we tell them about this...{nl}It's not easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002074
text: Are you talking about Uska from Klaipeda?{nl}If so, then... please, do me the favor!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002075
text: Telling Uska about what happened to our troops should be enough.{nl}That and... we're ready to take responsibility for the things we did.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002076
text: You mean the troops were still alive?{nl}That's a relief to hear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002077
text: We ought to get them back to their hometowns but...{nl}Given the urgency of their situation, we will first make sure to send them supplies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002078
text: Thank you for reporting this information.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002079
text: Hopefully Uska will be able to help us...{nl}As for our punishment... I'm not sure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002080
text: You have no idea how we feel right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002081
text: Uska is sending us supplies?{nl}That's a relief. To think I can go back to my hometown too...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002082
text: And...{nl}No word about our punishment?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002083
text: You left that out on purpose?{nl}You really... I get why there's no match for the Revelators now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002084
text: I'm sorry... and thank you for speaking on behalf of our troops!{nl}Your favor will not be forgotten.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002085
text: Soldier Guylens

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002086
text: There's nowhere colder than this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002087
text: Thanks to you we defeated Centaurus...{nl}But his vassals are still around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002088
text: Our soldiers are too exhausted from the battle.{nl}But now that we have freedom... we need to protect it at all costs...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002089
text: Will you really?{nl}My debt to you just keeps growing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002090
text: Here we have to battle not just monsters but the freezing cold, so it's never easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002091
text: If only we can pull through this...{nl}There'll be nothing else holding us down!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002092
text: You brought us a lot of relief, but I'm still worried about the remaining vassals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002093
text: Who're you?{nl}The monsters are coming.{nl}Aren't you going to run away like those cowardly soldiers?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002094
text: Me?{nl}I'm going to try and pull through it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002095
text: Wow, you're pretty good.{nl}Defeating that huge monster all by yourself, now that's impressive!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002096
text: Oh, I just remembered.{nl}I was supposed to finish my damage report but the monsters got me distractred.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002097
text: I'm sorry, but would you take care of the wounded miners for me?{nl}You can use the herbs from before to make the antiseptic.{nl}Sorry for the trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002098
text: The miners are over to the left.{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002099
text: Soldier Andre

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002100
text: If we do nothing, all my fellow soldiers could die.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002101
text: We need to save them as soon as possible...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002102
text: Let's see... I don't think we have enough people for the Dimensional Stone.{nl}What do we do...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002103
text: There weren't enough of us to stop all the demons coming out of Kaleimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002104
text: We would have been exterminated if it weren't for Assistant Commander Vilas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002105
text: How's the healing process?{nl}Looks like you talked to the miners, too.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002106
text: As you know, we're too short on people.{nl}Especially since the soldiers, who we need the most, all ran away in fear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002107
text: If only we knew where the Dimensional Stone was, I think we can make do with the workers we have...{nl}The problem is the monsters.{nl}Nothing but an annoyance...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002108
text: If you help us out with this, we can do the rest.{nl}For now I marked some areas that look promising.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002109
text: Lezsa Hill has the highest probability.{nl}Go there and use this detector to find the Dimensional Stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002110
text: Make sure to mark the spot so we can find it later.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002111
text: If it weren't for the monsters it would be a lot easier.{nl}As for the demons... I don't even want to talk about those.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002112
text: You really saved us here.{nl}Your help has been precious to the Kedora Alliance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002113
text: Oh, and I'm very grateful for your help, {nl}but please don't tell anyone about the Dimensional Stone.{nl}Last time some baron opened this weird door and... let's just say it wasn't pretty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002114
text: I guess that's it...{nl}You're a Revelator, we're followers of the goddess; {nl}I'm sure we'll meet again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002115
text: Why did we come to this dangerous place, you wonder...{nl}First of all, I work for the Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002116
text: This is actually a secret, but anyways.{nl}If I tell you this then you'll have to help us out, though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002117
text: So, what do you say? It'd be great if you could help.{nl}It's all in the name of the goddess, no personal gains to be had from this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002118
text: If you're a Revelator I think it's fine to tell you anyways. {nl}It's all because of the Dimensional Stone, you see.{nl}With it, you can travel between dimensions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002119
text: I see you're not getting it.{nl}Neither do we, actually.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002120
text: We at the Kedora Alliance are just doing as the goddess told us.{nl}She said the world needed us, so we're just fulfilling that role as best as we can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002121
text: If the demons get ahold of it we know it's not gonna end well so we've been working in secret...{nl}But our workers and soldiers all ran away, in fear of the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002122
text: Even if we send out a letter for more personnel, it's gonna take a while.{nl}The only miner workers left are terrified as well... We're in big trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002123
text: Good.{nl}First, would you clear out some monsters around here?{nl}We can't have another one like before coming our way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002124
text: Thank you for helping the Kedora Alliance.{nl}I knew finding the Dimensional Stone was gonna be hard. {nl}I never thought I'd have to risk my life over it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002125
text: I think they've calmed down now.{nl}Now, shall we start...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002126
text: What is it?{nl}Is it because I look like I'm doing something different from everybody else?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002127
text: Well of course.{nl}As the competent wizard I am, I was specifically hired by the Alliance.{nl} So yes, my work here is different.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002128
text: Can't you tell?{nl}I'm researching ores, of course.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002129
text: If you have time to be asking, why don't you be useful and help me?{nl}Oh, right.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002130
text: I need something similar to glass.{nl}Blue Cronewt Needler Crystals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002131
text: I need to analyze the ore's components, but I can't do that without the crystals.{nl}Understood?{nl}Go on, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002132
text: I wouldn't be this mad if my bag hadn't been completely destroyed by monsters.{nl}What are you doing?{nl}Hurry and get me the crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002133
text: The Kedora Alliance was too slow and the monsters took over...{nl}Bad luck all over.{nl}Now, give that to me already.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002134
text: Let's see, hm...{nl}The Dimensional Stone is full of impurities...{nl}I wonder what they're made of...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002135
text: What?{nl}You want to know about the Dimensional Stone?{nl}Does that mean you were... eavesdropping earlier?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002136
text: Alright.{nl}I'll tell you, just tone down your voice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002137
text: Jamelhan says this plain-looking stone has the power to cross dimensions.{nl}Isn't it exciting?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002138
text: I think that if used correctly... {nl}The Dimensional Stone can take us to the place where the goddesses are.{nl}I have no idea how to use its power, though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002139
text: Since you helped me find out about the impurities in the Stone...{nl}I guess I can start to find out more about it now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002140
text: You aren't just gonna leave after I told you all of that, are you?{nl}Why don't you give me a hand here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002141
text: These impurities can interfere with the power of the Dimensional Stone,{nl} so they need to be removed.{nl}That'll be easier if I can find out what the impurities are made of.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002142
text: I'm going to extract some pure magic from Magic Stones and have it react with the impurities.{nl}I should be able to infer what they're made of depending on how they react.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002143
text: There are some Magic Stones south of the stairs in these hills. Would you get me some?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002144
text: Did you bring back some stones?{nl}Or didn't you leave yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002145
text: These should be enough.{nl}I'll use the stones you brought to find out just what these impurities are.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002146
text: I found out what the Dimensional Stone's impurities are made of.{nl}In order to extract them, hm... It's a little complicated, but I need some materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002147
text: Luckily all I need is from monsters, which definitely aren't lacking around here.{nl}I'll give you a scroll.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002148
text: Use this on monsters to temporarily alter their essence, and then...{nl}you need to defeat them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002149
text: Collect their essence and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002150
text: The effects of the scroll don't last too long.{nl}It was made in a rush, so please understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002151
text: You're back. Thank you.{nl}Now I just need... some samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002152
text: I need to know what the Dimensional Stone reacts to.{nl}So I want to test it on some samples.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002153
text: The samples aren't a problem... The problem is the reagent. I don't have enough.{nl}Would you go to Gado Way and collect some Tini Salivary Glands?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002154
text: Bring them to me as soon as you get them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002155
text: None of this would be a problem if I still had my bag.{nl}Where are those glands? Is it gonna take long?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002156
text: Here they are, Tini Salivary Glands.{nl}I'm still a little short on research supplies, but I'll get by on my own from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002157
text: This story has been told in our village since long ago.{nl}Our village was built by the workers from Kaleimas Prison, a prison nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002158
text: Their peace didn't last long... an epidemic started to spread one day.{nl}The skin would fall off the body, it was a gruesome disease...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002159
text: Thankfully Maven, who was passing by, cured the disease with a holy relic...{nl}And that relic has been passed on by the people of our village ever since...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002160
text: But now... Not long ago, Demon Centaurus appeared with his vassals.{nl}He raised statues around the village and cursed it with a disease...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002161
text: We created a Purification Sphere with Maven's holy relic and succeeded in destroying some of the statues.{nl}But of course, Centaurus did not like that...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002162
text: We thought they would end us, but all they did was destroy the Sphere.{nl}It's as if they're observing the disease.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002163
text: We suffer every day...{nl}Our lives cannot end under the demons' watch, but they can't go on under it, either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002164
text: Please, I beg you...{nl}Rid us of the cursed statues and the demons, and cure us of this disease.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002165
text: The person who defeated that group of demons... was you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002166
text: Oh... Arntas.{nl}I can't tell if ending the curse is possible now...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002167
text: Your plan is to destroy the village's surveillance spheres, right?{nl}I'm afraid we have no choice, considering our situation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002168
text: My body hasn't recovered yet... Please go to Dvejoti Cliff for me and collect black stones.{nl}There's a lot of monsters there so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002169
text: There was a demon attack and some soldiers still can't leave the base.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002170
text: They need to be rescued.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002171
text: We were all just waiting for the day we would return to the goddess...{nl}Can we really escape the curse this time?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002172
text: You're back.{nl}Can I have them?{nl}It's time to give them hell.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002173
text: There, it's finished.{nl}I had to rush it so it's a little rough; please be careful with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002174
text: Just set up the bomb by the surveillance sphere and run to a safe place.{nl}I used up all the black stones on it, so there's no way to control the power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002175
text: If it works, go see Priest Chaleims.{nl}We almost succeeded once, so he knows what to do next; he will let you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002176
text: I don't want to live like this anyore.{nl}If we fail again this time I'll...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002177
text: That was a nice explosion!{nl}Now to make the Purification Sphere before the demons get here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002178
text: You did it!{nl}Hurry and go to Priest Chaleims!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002179
text: This isn't the first time I'm making a Purification Sphere, it won't be difficult.{nl}I do require some materials, however... Would you bring me some White Spion essence?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002180
text: I'll stay here and prepare.{nl}If we fail this time... we'll never be able to escape this life.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002181
text: You did well.{nl}We have the materials now, all we need is divine energy to make the Purification Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002182
text: We need the divine energy from Maven's holy relic... to charge the sphere with it.{nl}Originally the sphere was in our village...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002183
text: But the demons took it to Sventimas Exile and Kadumel Cliff.{nl}That's how powerful Maven's divine energy was.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002184
text: A lot of time has passed now, the divine force in it will have weakened.{nl}It's buried under the snow, thankfully, so the demons can't see it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002185
text: Thank you.{nl}Artnas will give you the detection orb and absorption orb.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002186
text: This is the most important step of our plan...{nl}I pray for your success.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002187
text: To think that, once again, we're using the Maven relics...{nl}I wonder if Maven knew then?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002188
text: You collected the energy.{nl}That's splendid!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002189
text: And yet... No news of Artnas.{nl}I hope nothing serious has happened... Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002190
text: If you find Artnas, please come back to the village.{nl}We don't know what the demons will do if they find out we destroyed their surveillance sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002191
text: Thankfully Arntas was just a little startled and will recover with some rest.{nl}The demons seem to have caught on to us however, it would be best to move.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002192
text: We'll make the Purification Sphere at the altar in Besde Shores.{nl}I will see you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002193
text: You came.{nl}The monsters and the demons seem to have found out that we're up to something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002194
text: Please keep an eye out while I make the Purification Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002195
text: Finished!{nl}The Purification Sphere is complete!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002196
text: All that's left now is destroying the cursed statues.{nl}Take the Purification Sphere to the statues and the divine energy within it will destroy them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002197
text: The problem is the statues are being guarded by an army of demons.{nl}The only one able to get pass them... is you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002198
text: If there's any hope left for us, that's you.{nl}Please... free us from this unbearable misery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002199
text: You've done it!{nl}At last... we're free from our dreadful misery...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002200
text: But it's not over yet.{nl}There are three more cursed statues in Kadumel Cliff.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002201
text: All three must be destroyed in order to end the curse.{nl}And if the demons find out your identity, they'll only make things harder for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002202
text: So please!{nl}Please... destroy the remaining statues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002203
text: A bomb?{nl}With the right materials, sure, I can make a bomb.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002204
text: My skin is still burnt but...{nl}If this curse ever ends I'll help you with whatever you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002205
text: Really?{nl}My... The goddess did not abandon us...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002206
text: First we need to destroy the surveillance spheres in the village so we can move freely.{nl}They were set up by the demons to monitor us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002207
text: We've tried before, but were caught by the demons.{nl}But you... I know you can do it if you try.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002208
text: Go meet Argis at the village.{nl}He knows about bombs, he can help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002209
text: What are you doing in this cursed place?{nl}Everyone in this village is suffering from a horrendous disease.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002210
text: I wish I could at least relieve the pain...{nl}But I'm too ill to even go looking for herbs...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002211
text: Do you mean it?{nl}You don't know how thankful I am...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002212
text: Bring me some Sikljien herbs if you can.{nl}They grow on the edge of Kadumel Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002213
text: I'm in so much pain... it hurts to even move.{nl}The most I can do is cool my fever with the cold breeze.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002214
text: I'm sick of constantly talking about how much I'm suffering.{nl}But these herbs... I'm grateful for them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002215
text: We're already suffering from the curse, and now the monsters...{nl}Please.{nl}I just want my mind to be at ease...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002216
text: I can't even escape from this village.{nl}Because of the demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002217
text: Thank you!{nl}Now if only this curse were to disappear...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002218
text: Eugh... Run!{nl}The demons are coming!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002219
text: You saved my life.{nl}Seeing you defeat all those demons... There's no way you're just a normal person.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002220
text: We're being mercilessly attacked by demons from Kalejimas Prison.{nl}Our troops were retreating back towards Sventimas Exile.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002221
text: But then we were caught in an ambush and only three of us managed to escape this way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002222
text: I want to go and rescue the rest of our troops but...{nl}I'm tired from the battle and I'm wounded...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002223
text: You say you're going to save our troops?{nl}That's extremely brave of you but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002224
text: {nl}We're incredibly outnumbered!{nl}Do you still want to go...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002225
text: {nl}Alright.{nl}Our troops will be at the Smekla Base, unable to move.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002226
text: The way to the Base is occupied by demons, so be careful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002227
text: You're my only hope now.{nl}Please... save our troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002228
text: Assistant Commander Vilas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002229
text: A civilian?{nl}How does a civilian end up here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002230
text: Who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002231
text: I hope everyone's safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002232
text: I see. Andre...{nl}By the way, did you see anything that looks like a black wall on your way here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002233
text: You passed through the black wall?{nl}How on earth did you do that?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002234
text: We're can't move from here because we couldn't pass over that wall.{nl}We'll never get away from here unless we find a way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002235
text: We need to know what that wall is so we can either destroy it or break through it.{nl}So we sent Scout Boas to the Lamdyti Workshop.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002236
text: If you help Boas, we can find out a lot faster.{nl}Please do me that favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002237
text: Scout Boas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002238
text: Are you a demon?!{nl}Reveal yourself!!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002239
text: Oh, you were sent by Assistant Commander Vilas?{nl}But... how did you pass through the black wall...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002240
text: I mean, that's not important now.{nl}But that black wall... it's definitely strange.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002241
text: I saw some demons guarding an unknown magic device down the road south of the Lamdyti Workshop.{nl}I wonder if that has anything to do with it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002242
text: I did try to blow it up with a bomb, but it didn't even budge.{nl}I think we need something more powerful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002243
text: I'll go and get more bombs.{nl}Meanwhile, will you gather some black stones?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002244
text: The black stones around here are good for enhancing bombs.{nl}Please do me that favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002245
text: You got the stones.{nl}I'll get them ready in no time.{nl}Just wait a little while.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002246
text: I think they're powerful enough now.{nl}Now, to destroy the magic device.{nl}You go first, I'll catch up soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002247
text: I think this time we can destroy it.{nl}The thing is... what if the problem is not the magic device?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002248
text: I knew it!{nl}There's no way that would survive my bombs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002249
text: I wonder if the wall is gone now... We should go back to the troops!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002250
text: You're just who I wanted to see!{nl}The black wall disappeared and we're ready to retreat.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002251
text: Are we out now...?{nl}Thanks to you we all managed to retreat in safety.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002252
text: Losing to the demons in Steel Heights was a shame but...{nl}At least we get to live to see tomorrow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002253
text: By the way...{nl}Are you perhaps headed to Kalejimas Prison?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002254
text: Be careful if go that way.{nl}The demons who nearly finished us all came from there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002255
text: Anyways, I have to thank you.{nl}May the grace of the goddess be with you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002256
text: Every time the wind blows it feels like my flesh is being ripped apart.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002257
text: I'm suddenly reminded of my parents' potato dumplings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002258
text: Soldier Hyrance

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002259
text: How much longer will we have to stay here...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002260
text: Soldier Kuijlen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002261
text: This unbearable cold is a bigger enemy to us than the monsters themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002262
text: This place is unbearably cold and full of dangerous monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002263
text: Soldier Heulen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002264
text: How much longer do we have to stay...? I want to go home now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002265
text: The monsters, the cold... I'm so exhausted.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002266
text: I feel extremely thankful and sorry for the soldiers who have endured this far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002267
text: I'm so grateful to these soldiers who always follow my orders even in these harsh conditions.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002268
text: If we didn't do as the demons said we'd be dead by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002269
text: Being threatened by the demons was really hard on us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002270
text: We were determined to refuse when the demons offered to give us supplies in exchange for killing the Revelator, but when they threatened to kill us instead if we didn't do it, we had no choice but to obey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002271
text: We wanted to resist the demons, but we knew that we couldn't defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002272
text: We didn't want to kill anyone... {nl}But we also didn't want to die.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002273
text: Now we're as good as dead anyway.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002274
text: You should run while you still can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002275
text: I'm really sorry. We would be dead if we had refused to obey the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002276
text: If only we weren't short on supplies, this wouldn't have happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002277
text: After we accepted the demons' orders, we prayed that no one would come to Ibre Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002278
text: We're just as good as dead to the demons now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002279
text: When we stopped getting supplies, I wanted to run away. {nl}But I couldn't bear to leave my fellow soldiers behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002280
text: We'd be dead if we hadn't obeyed the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002281
text: I wonder why the Assistant Commander wants to see us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002282
text: What does the Assistant Commander want to say to us?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002283
text: The Assistant Commander must have something important to say to us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002284
text: It sounds like the Assistant Commander has made an important decision.{nl}We'll have to go and see him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002285
text: I think the Assistant Commander made a decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002286
text: I wonder why the Assistant Commander wants to see us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002287
text: We're the Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}We supplied materials to the Great Cathedral, the Mage Tower, the Great Goddess Statue in Fedimian, and many other historical construction projects.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002288
text: You could say we're the backbone of history itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002289
text: Everything we thrive for is the will of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002290
text: Mine Worker

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002291
text: I came all the way here on the promise of a high pay...{nl}I had no idea it would be this dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002292
text: I wouldn't have applied if I knew how dangerous this place was...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002293
text: They didn't even hire a soldier to protect us, how can they ask us to work here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002294
text: I managed to survive the monster attack, but some experimentation tools were destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002295
text: If it weren't for that attack I wouldn't be having such a hard time right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002296
text: We managed to ward off the demons earlier but if they attack again we'll be completely exterminated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002297
text: We don't have enough soldiers to survive another attack from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002298
text: The black wall disappeared. We're able to retreat now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002299
text: We should leave before the demons attack again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002300
text: Right, right. Are you by chance the Revelator?{nl}I heard that someone called the Revelator came to Fedimian and is helping other people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002301
text: As expected.{nl}I can see why you're so talented now.{nl}It seems the goddesses haven't abandoned us yet!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002302
text: The smell and the monsters...{nl}I think I'm on to something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002303
text: Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002304
text: You... I don't think we've met before.{nl}Sorry for being so direct, but can I ask you a favor?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002305
text: I was attacked by monsters on my way here.{nl}I should have chased them away but... I can't move now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002306
text: Oh! Thank you.{nl}You can bring me some herbs then. I now a type that's good for wounds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002307
text: Although I'm not too familiar with this area.{nl}But the owl sculptures in Zaliavin Valley should know where to find those herbs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002308
text: I hate that I can't move because of the monsters...{nl}And that I have to ask this favor to a stranger... I'm sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002309
text: The broken owl sculptures you see around here... They don't answer when you talk to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002310
text: You say the owl sculptures are broken and don't answer?{nl}What on earth happened there...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002311
text: I'm actually here by request of the Dievdirbys Master.{nl}I was tasked with checking the condition of the statues, so I come here about once a month.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002312
text: I don't think they would be attacked by monsters...{nl}Strange. I should go there myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002313
text: The owl sculptures aren't answering.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002314
text: If these statues aren't repaired soon, the number of lost spirits will only grow bigger.{nl}But I'm barely able to stand as it is... This is some problem we have here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002315
text: I'm so sorry.{nl}You're the only one I can depend on right now so I have to ask.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002316
text: Please do me this favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002317
text: This is terrible.{nl}I feel a strange energy, too...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002318
text: I'll have a look; please wait here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002319
text: Uh? Why are there cuts on the backs of the statues...?{nl}There's an evil energy coming from here. This is not the work of monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002320
text: I wonder if it's a curse...{nl}It looks like the evil energy is attracting monsters to this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002321
text: This won't be easy, it seems.{nl}It's hard enough to deal with evil energy, but the big problem is repairing the statues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002322
text: Not only do they have cuts, there's broken parts here and there that need to be fixed.{nl}Even with the right materials... the chances look slim.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002323
text: Thank you for your precious help.{nl}I'll ask you to gather some sticky liquid and broken bows from monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002324
text: I'm still very wounded, but I can deal with the repair job.{nl}What kind of Dievdirbys would I be if I couldn't?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002325
text: Oh, you got them.{nl}I'll just tend to the cuts and broken parts and we can move on to the purification.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002326
text: My body feels like it's about to return to the goddess...{nl}I just hope I have enough strength to repair the statues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002327
text: I've never seen anything like this.{nl}The evil energy isn't disappearing. This could be a curse more powerful than anything I know...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002328
text: I need to observe the other statues to look for clues, but it's impossible like this.{nl}May I ask you to gather some herbs for me that I can use as a painkiller?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002329
text: Thank you, I'll trust you to do it.{nl}You can bring me some Yellow Sapous, they're found on the north side of the valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002330
text: I'd get proper treatment if only the statues were okay...{nl}This was all very unexpected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002331
text: Thank you. For all your favors.{nl}I think, however... there's something strange here...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002332
text: I've seen many statues destroyed by demons or broken by monsters...{nl}But none had this awful curse that won't disappear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002333
text: I should check the other statues, anyways.{nl}I can move to some extent now, I just pray that the goddess will help me make it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002334
text: I'm going to rest for a while before I head to Miglos Hill, what about you?{nl}But you don't have to worry about me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002335
text: Will you?{nl}I'm grateful to have someone as talented as you accompany me, of course!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002336
text: If you can, go and clear out some monsters on the way to Miglos Hill.{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002337
text: I'll follow you once the painkiller takes effect.{nl}I'll meet you at Miglos Hill, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002338
text: Cuts. And that evil energy...{nl}This owl sculpture is in the same condition as the other.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002339
text: You would need serious skill to make these cuts.{nl}And to handle such powerful evil energy, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002340
text: Who could have done this?{nl}Could it be a demon... or someone with other intents?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002341
text: For now I'll try and purify it.{nl}Will you take care of the other owl sculptures?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002342
text: Thank you.{nl}You can go to the Raucous Owl Sculpture in Skardus Hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002343
text: We'll have a big problem at hands if that statue is affected by evil energy too...{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002344
text: Raucous Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002345
text: Did Asel sent you here?{nl}What a relief!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002346
text: I was worried since none of the other statues are responding; I think they're asleep.{nl}Oh, right... I just remembered something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002347
text: Not long ago my friends said they saw a strange little girl.{nl}She had an odd energy to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002348
text: I think that's when it happened.{nl}I wonder if the girl has anything to do with them being asleep.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002349
text: This is going to take a while...{nl}Please take care of the Raucous Owl Sculpture in Skardus Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002350
text: A girl, you say... I have no idea.{nl}I don't think she would be responsible for this, though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002351
text: Maybe the owl sculpture in the training camp knows something.{nl}Meet me at the Grynas Training Camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002352
text: Can my friends ever wake up again?{nl}I want to at least protect them from the monsters... Would you help me just a little bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002353
text: Thank you!{nl}I'll make some crystals that can protect my friends.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002354
text: A little over Skardus Hill you'll find Spirit Stones.{nl}They're red and sparkly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002355
text: Please collect some stones and also ritual pouches used by Stoulets.{nl}I need the powder inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002356
text: Asel can wake them up, right?{nl}I hope the others won't hurt anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002357
text: You got the materials!{nl}I'll use them to make the protective crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002358
text: Finished.{nl}Will you put them next to my friends?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002359
text: Please put three crystals around each statue.{nl}There's bound to be monsters around so you'll have to clear them out, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002360
text: Luckily I'm here isolated and nothing happened to me.{nl}Who could have done such a thing...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002361
text: Thank you.{nl}The crystals will protect my friends for a while so I can put my heart at ease.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002362
text: You did say that there was evil energy around the cuts on the statues, right?{nl}They must have been bitten by monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002363
text: Even with the crystals protecting them, wouldn't it be better to get rid of everything harmful?{nl}I'm just worried, you see...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002364
text: Really? Thank you!{nl}Please clear out some monsters around the statues, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002365
text: Luckily I was left unscathed but...{nl}My friends aren't that vulnerable, who could have done that to them?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002366
text: Thank you.{nl}I hope my friends wake up soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002367
text: You're here.{nl}This is the place where Dievdirbys have been training since the old days.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002368
text: Not long ago, however, it was attacked by Sequoia.{nl}The very Sequoia created by Tesla, the one that was taken by evil energies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002369
text: After they took everyone to a safe place and began to take care of the wounded, this area became empty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002370
text: I'll ask the other Dievdirbys about the owl sculptures...{nl}Meanwhile, please have a look at the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002371
text: If I remember correctly, it will be at the Bevertis Crossroads.{nl}I will see you later.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002372
text: Hasty Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002373
text: Help!{nl}I think all my friends are asleep, they're not responding...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002374
text: Asel is here too?{nl}He must know, then! About the girl, that is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002375
text: A girl was here not long ago... She had a really warm energy.{nl}But after meeting with her, all my friends suddenly fell asleep...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002376
text: You should go see the Lonely Owl Sculpture.{nl}She's on a high spot at the end of a broken path, she could have seen something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002377
text: We can only hope that the information we need is here.{nl}There are too many things that don't seem right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002378
text: Did you find something?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002379
text: All the owl sculptures that saw the girl are now asleep... Hm.{nl}I'm afraid the Dievdirbys here don't know much, either.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002380
text: I don't think the girl did anything wrong.{nl}Her energy... it was so warm, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002381
text: I'll ask the Dievdirbys if any of them saw the girl.{nl}Will you go see the Lonely Owl Sculpture at the broken path?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002382
text: Lonely Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002383
text: St-stay away!{nl}Or else I'll...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002384
text: What? Dievdirbys Asel sent you here?{nl}I was so scared...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002385
text: A girl... That's odd.{nl}I should investigate a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002386
text: Oh, that girl... I know about her.{nl}Not long ago I saw a girl being chased by someone around here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002387
text: It was a man I'd never seen before.{nl}He looked so evil and terrifying... I was really very scared...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002388
text: That's about the time my friends started to fall asleep.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002389
text: From up here I can't see that well because of the trees but...{nl}My friends down the road maybe know more than I do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002390
text: You can follow this path down to Grubus Highway.{nl}I don't know if that statue is asleep though... I'm a little worried.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002391
text: There was a man chasing the girl?{nl}Then one of them must have put the curse on the owl sculptures.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002392
text: Now that I think of it, that evil energy would have been difficult to endure for a human...{nl}But we should keep all possibilities open.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002393
text: The owl sculpture is covered in cuts and... also sleeping.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002394
text: My friends started to fall asleep not long after I saw that man...{nl}I was really scared then...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002395
text: The Grubus Highway owl sculpture is also asleep... Hm.{nl}This won't do. We need to do something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002396
text: Tesla told me about something called a purifying sculpture, but it's complicated...{nl}If I make the sculpture, will you find some materials for the purification?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002397
text: Fight some Black Old Kepas and get their stems.{nl}Then meet me in front of the Sleeping Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002398
text: You're back faster than I thought.{nl}Just wait a while. This may be complicated but it won't take long.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002399
text: The only thing is... I don't think I can do this alone in my current state.{nl}I can do the hard part, but you'll have to support me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002400
text: All you need to do is purify any evil energy with the sculpture.{nl}Meanwhile I'll block the places where the energy is coming from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002401
text: This is not the time to be talking!{nl}Please, the purification!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002402
text: I'm sorry. It looks like I failed...{nl}Just what are those cuts...? I need to find another way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002403
text: I should go see the last training camp owl sculpture.{nl}I'll go first; you follow me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002404
text: Fortunately... this statue is not asleep because of the curse.{nl}It must be worn out from using too much divine force.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002405
text: It should be fine if we replenish its power.{nl}I hope this time we can find out something about the cuts...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002406
text: I'm going to give you an orb and I want you to fill it with the life force of defeated monsters.{nl}With the help of the orb the statue should recover fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002407
text: There are no cuts or evil energy.{nl}But the statue seems fast asleep.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002408
text: It should be fine if we replenish its power.{nl}I hope this time we can find out something about the cuts...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002409
text: Good, thank you.{nl}We should be able to wake up the owl sculpture now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002410
text: Did... Did I fall asleep?{nl}The girl and the man? What happened to them?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002411
text: So, that day... Yes, that's right.{nl}It was a dark night.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002412
text: A man I'd never seen was chasing a girl.{nl}I'm sure he was a human, but his energy was like a demon's...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002413
text: It was really scary.{nl}The girl was right in front of me when the man almost caught her... then, something strange happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002414
text: The girl, she...{nl}She used the divine force in me to push the man far away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002415
text: That's when I lost all my strength and fell asleep...{nl}I don't know what happened next...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002416
text: It's still all very unclear.{nl}But I think we can assume it wasn't the girl who hurt the statues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002417
text: Still... something doesn't fit.{nl}All the statues said that the man was human...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002418
text: I doubt that a human could endure such powerful evil energy.{nl}They could be using some sort of unusual method to do it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002419
text: Our last hope is the owl sculpture on the Hills.{nl}Meet me there. This time we must get a definitive answer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002420
text: I was really scared.{nl}Such an evil energy... I never felt anything like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002421
text: I can't believe it was coming from a human...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002422
text: Trainee Leryd

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002423
text: We're not in our best condition right now.{nl}A lot of trainees got hurt during the Sequoia attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002424
text: Still, we can't stop our training, right?{nl}I'm sorry, but could I ask you a small favor?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002425
text: Thank you!{nl}I want to ask you to collect some items from monsters around this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002426
text: Everything you can collect will be very useful to us!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002427
text: I never thought I would one day see the Sequoia with my own two eyes.{nl}And we thought we could put our training to use and face it but.... It was horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002428
text: You're back already?{nl}Amazing. These will be very useful for our training!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002429
text: Dievdirbys Ruthalen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002430
text: I'm just really upset.{nl}First there was the Sequoia attack, now the Ridimeds are wreaking havoc.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002431
text: They're very cunning and always move in groups so it's hard to catch them.{nl}I'm sorry, but would you help?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002432
text: Thank you for helping.{nl}They actually don't show up that easily, so we might need some preparation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002433
text: I'm talking about a bait, specifically the fruits that Ridimeds like.{nl}I'll stay here and prepare; you can collect the fruits from piles of greenery. They'll have a peculiar scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002434
text: Crafting wood, materials...{nl}They'll bite anything they see, even people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002435
text: We'll show them right this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002436
text: This should do.{nl}Let's set up the bait for the Ridimeds now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002437
text: I'll start cooking the fruits over fire like I said.{nl}Please take care of any Ridimeds that show up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002438
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}I can feel safe for a while now knowing all the Ridimeds in the area are gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002439
text: Did you happen to see two old carving knives around here?{nl}They're very dear to me, you see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002440
text: Oh! That's the knife!{nl}But the other one...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002441
text: It was a gift from my parents, I really can't lose it...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002442
text: If you find that knife, please return it to me.{nl}My name will be carved on the handle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002443
text: Yes! That's my knife!{nl}Thank you for bringing my precious knife back to me. Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002444
text: Dievdirbys Aisol

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002445
text: Oh, Asel told me about you.{nl}He is really impressed with your talent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002446
text: Things are a bit rough here because of the Sequoia attack.{nl}If that's okay, I would like to ask for your help... What do you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002447
text: Wow, thank you.{nl}What happened here was... well, the Sequoia attacked our training camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002448
