text: Did you know?{nl}The Sequoia was created by Tesla, the Dievdirbys Master, to protect the owl sculptures.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002449
text: But it was corrupted by the evil energy at Karolis Springs.{nl}This all happened a long time ago...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002450
text: Now the Sequoia came with other monsters and started to wreak havoc here.{nl}And... that's about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002451
text: First I'll ask you to clear out some monsters around here.{nl}They came with the Sequoia and are very persistent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002452
text: We don't know why the Sequoia became like this...{nl}But its evil energy looks extremely powerful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002453
text: But that happened a long time ago; now the owl sculptures...{nl}I don't know. Their case looks similar, but why would this happen after such a long time?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002454
text: Wow... You did a great job!{nl}Now we only need to deal with the Sequoia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002455
text: The Sequoia is still lurking around here.{nl}But after the last attack, I don't think we can fight that soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002456
text: The truth is, we feel sorry for asking you this favor.{nl}The Sequoia is extremely dangerous. We understand if you want to refuse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002457
text: Will you... be okay?{nl}The last place we saw the Sequoia was near the broken path.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002458
text: Hm... Right. It's still wounded from the previous attack so...{nl}Someone like you can definitely take it down. I'll wish you good luck!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002459
text: If it gets close to you, run away.{nl}We tried ambushing it and even then it was extremely brutal and resilient.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002460
text: Just try and stay safe...{nl}Do you think you can do it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002461
text: You did it!{nl}You defeated the Sequoia... I am in awe, really.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002462
text: We can finally recover in peace now.{nl}Thank you so much for all your help!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002463
text: Now. We hould check to see if the owl sculptures are still asleep.{nl}Let's split so we can check faster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002464
text: I'll go see the owl sculpture in Siauras Valley.{nl}Please have a look at the Quiet Owl Sculpture at Susipyne Hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002465
text: Thank you.{nl}Meet me at Siauras Valley again when you're done checking.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002466
text: Quiet Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002467
text: You have divine energy in you.{nl}I heard a girl like you was here a few days ago...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002468
text: You want to know about the girl and a suspicious man?{nl}I don't know. I didn't see anything... I just heard about it from the other statues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002469
text: I was worried since they all seemed to have fallen asleep.{nl}Did they see something they shouldn't?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002470
text: If Asel is here, that must be why they woke up, right?{nl}Although I'm sorry I can't be of more use to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002471
text: Let's check the statues and meet at Siauras Valley again.{nl}Hopefully with good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002472
text: The sleeping owl sculptures should know?{nl}Hm... I'm sure it was that suspicious man.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002473
text: The way he moves is a lot like an assassin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002474
text: Fortunately the statue I saw wasn't as affected by the curse.{nl}So I was able to talk to it a little bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002475
text: It seems the girl was chased by the suspicious man all the way here...{nl}Then she tried to use the power of the owl sculptures to keep him away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002476
text: After that she headed to the Laukimo Vacant Lot.{nl}We should go there too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002477
text: It's tragic... The owl sculptures...{nl}Not even I can help them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002478
text: There's something here. Inside the lot, that is.{nl}But the evil energy is too strong... My body can't take it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002479
text: You don't seem to be affected, though.{nl}It could be the Purifying Sculpture protecting you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002480
text: I think you can go inside the vacant lot.{nl}Please... go and see where this evil energy is coming from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002481
text: Sorry.{nl}I wish I could follow you but I can't move any further...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002482
text: I can't take it much longer...{nl}Please hurry...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002483
text: What's this... a dagger and a broken amulet.{nl}I need to have a look at these.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002484
text: I'm not sure but I feel traces of a special protection spell on this amulet.{nl}The dagger just gives off a powerful evil energy...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002485
text: Right. With this amulet, you wouldn't have to be a demon to use the dagger.{nl}But for some reason the amulet broke... and they abandoned both objects here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002486
text: With an evil energy this strong, I don't think even the Purifying Sculpture can help.{nl}We may need to call Tesla.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002487
text: I feel so sorry for the owl sculptures inside...{nl}We can only try and stop such a thing from happening again...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002488
text: Hm... If even Asel can't handle this energy...{nl}There's not much the Purifying Sculpture can do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002489
text: I'll carve another sculpture just in case.{nl}Please wait.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002490
text: I don't how much longer I can take it, please hurry...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002491
text: If the evil energy is too powerful, the Purifying Sculpture alone won't be able to stop it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002492
text: Here. Take this.{nl}It will help the Purifying Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002493
text: Are you saying Tesla created a new sculpture?{nl}Hm... This method is... Clearly I still need to train more...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002494
text: Now. The dagger is one thing, but the vacant lot is full of evil energy too.{nl}Go there. Get rid of the evil energy all at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002495
text: I reckon this sculpture will do.{nl}I hope Asel won't be too hard on himself...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002496
text: Tesla's sculpture is impressive.{nl}I can already feel the evil energy disappear...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002497
text: Now. I'll prepare for the dagger purification.{nl}Will you collect the Yellow Griba Pollen?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002498
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll start the procedure as soon as you come back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002499
text: Using the Purifying and Suppressing Sculptures together will work for sure.{nl}This time we'll definitely get to the end of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002500
text: Thank you.{nl}This should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002501
text: Okay. I'll start the purification procedure now.{nl}The clash of divine and evil energies is going to attract monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002502
text: I'll leave the monsters up to you.{nl}Please take care of them while I finish the procedure.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002503
text: It's a success!{nl}I've erradicated the evil energy...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002504
text: Not everything is back to normal, though.{nl}The owl sculptures are still asleep.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002505
text: We also need to find out the one responsible for this...{nl}And the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002506
text: There is one owl sculpture left.{nl}Its name is Friendly Owl Sculpture... it lives on the Stabdymo Shore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002507
text: I wonder if it knows the whereabouts of the girl or the suspicious man.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002508
text: I'm... so sorry.{nl}I really need to rest. Using so much divine force has tired me...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002509
text: I trust you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002510
text: A girl and a suspicious man?{nl}No one's been here in a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002511
text: Hm... Come to think about it, I did see a pillar of light coming from the lot a few days ago.{nl}I'm not sure if that's related or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002512
text: The statues at the Laukimo Vacant Lot should know...{nl}Why don't you go there?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002513
text: Oh... That's why they weren't responding...{nl}Who could have done it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002514
text: We can't let this happen again.{nl}There is a way to look into their memories, at least part of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002515
text: Go and ask Asel to carve another owl sculpture.{nl}I'll impart some of my power onto it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002516
text: That should allow me to peek into the others' memories.{nl}And don't forget to purify any evil energy first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002517
text: Looking into the memories of the owl sculptures...{nl}I see. So there is a way!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002518
text: I can make a small owl sculpture, no problem.{nl}The purification is going to be a little harder, though...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002519
text: Here's the statue. Please take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002520
text: The problem is me.{nl}The divine power I used to purify the dagger hasn't recovered yet...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002521
text: There's no other way. I'll carve the statue.{nl}Meanwhile, I'm sorry but I'm going to ask you to fill this orb with life force again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002522
text: I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002523
text: If only I hadn't been attacked by monsters before I met you...{nl}I'm a digrace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002524
text: You're back already!{nl}Give me the statue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002525
text: I'll impart some of our power onto it.{nl}After you take it, you'll be able to see some of our memories.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002526
text: I guess... I'll never see my friends again.{nl}I hopes this at least helps those who survived.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002527
text: In all my life I had never seen something so mystical.{nl}I wonder what the mysterious power is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002528
text: In the end we still don't know who the two men are.{nl}But considering the power of their evil energy... Someone so strong is surely well-known.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002529
text: And thank you for everything.{nl}If it weren't for you, the owls here would be asleep forever without knowing what happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002530
text: I'm going to investigate this issue a bit further.{nl}May the grace of the goddess bless your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002531
text: The... the broken statues.{nl}They must have been bitten by monsters with evil energy, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002532
text: I heard the monsters were attacking owls in other forests...{nl}I'm scared that will happen here too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002533
text: Would you clear out some monsters around here?{nl}I know it's not a definitive solution, but it would make me feel safer...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002534
text: I used to feel safe with all the Dievdirbys around...{nl}Now I'm really worried for the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002535
text: Thank you!{nl}I sure hope you and the Dievdirbys find a solution soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002536
text: I have a favor to ask you.{nl}It seems like the spirits aren't following me anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002537
text: It's all because of the Sequoia.{nl}I think the spirits are too scared...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002538
text: I need to guide the spirits before the demons get them...{nl}Would you help me with that?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002539
text: First, collect some Green Sakmoli leaves.{nl}Their scent comforts the hearts of the spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002540
text: The Sequoia... Maybe the spirits were too afraid of it.{nl}But if they don't return to the goddess, even scarier things will happen...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002541
text: This should be enough.{nl}Let's try and guide the spirits now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002542
text: If you see a wandering spirit, burn the leaves.{nl}Their scent will attract the spirits to you, so you can guide them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002543
text: Please take good care of the spirits.{nl}Make sure they find their way to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002544
text: Someone once said birth and conclusion are the values remembered in life.{nl}That's why I want to send the spirits to the goddess in safety. Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002545
text: When will my friends wake up...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002546
text: A lot of people were wounded in the attack and a lot of our things were destroyed, too.{nl}It's a disgrace...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002547
text: Many souls were startled by the Sequoia and lost their way...{nl}But if they don't return to the goddess, scarier things are going happen...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002548
text: The sleeping Owl Sculptures should know something.{nl}Asel can wake them up, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002549
text: It's awfully quiet now that most of my friends are asleep...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002550
text: So. The statue is finished and the orb is ready.{nl}With the power from this orb, purification should be quick.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002551
text: Go and take some power from the Friendly Owl Sculpture.{nl}Let's carry on with the purification.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002552
text: I'm worried. What happened...?{nl}My friends suddenly fell asleep...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002553
text: It looks like someone is fighting.{nl}What's happening?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002554
text: Loremaster Daroul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002555
text: Thank you for helping me!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002556
text: Those monsters were more dangerous than I expected...{nl}Lucky you could defeat them so easily, traveler.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002557
text: Oh, I didn't introduce myself.{nl}My name is Daroul, I'm a loremaster serving Goddess Jurate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002558
text: Maybe... you don't know what we do exactly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002559
text: Feel free to ask me anything.{nl}There's probably a lot that you don't know.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002560
text: Did I satisfy your curiosity?{nl}Unfortunately Goddess Jurate seems to have been mostly forgotten... It's a shame.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002561
text: I just wish that Goddess Jurate would answer us for a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002562
text: We heard the sea had turned into land and came as fast as we could...{nl}We had to prepare everything by ourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002563
text: One of our members is looking for a place to build an altar...{nl}Me, I'm preparing an offering for the goddess, but we're very short-handed, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002564
text: So please.{nl}Think of this as your destiny chosen by the goddess and give us a hand?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002565
text: Thank you.{nl}First, you could go to the Lamdonas Coral Reef and find some blue corals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002566
text: Our other member came while you where collecting the corals.{nl}They found a spot with concentrated sea energy and are going to build the altar there, they said.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002567
text: I'm going to go help them; will you come along?{nl}If the ceremony is successful, we might just see Goddess Jurate again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002568
text: I feel reassured now.{nl}They said the energy is concentrated at the Dellam Sandbank; come see me there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002569
text: Loremaster Berta

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002570
text: Oh, hello!{nl}You're the one who helped brother Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002571
text: These are just what we need!{nl}They're in good condition, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002572
text: They'll make a wonderful offering for the goddess.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002573
text: We need the blue corals found at the Lamdonas Coral Reef.{nl}The area has a lot of monsters though, so be careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002574
text: It looks like a normal stone. Let me try the holy water.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002575
text: We need the altar back as soon as possible...{nl}But the sea energy seems to have made the Crabil even more powerful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002576
text: Thank you for helping with our ceremony for Goddess Jurate.{nl}Other loremasters should start gathering here soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002577
text: I believe that someday Goddess Jurate will once again hear our prayers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002578
text: Thanks to you we managed to speed things up.{nl}We should hurry and finish building the altar now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002579
text: Our offering ceremony to the goddess was possible all thanks to you.{nl}I don't know what we would do if it were just me and Berta...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002580
text: I pray that the goddess will once again look over us soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002581
text: The altar is damaged, and the offerings are completely ruined.{nl}We need to hurry and prepare everything again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002582
text: It's hard for me to move because of the wounds...{nl}But I need to have a look at the owl sculptures...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002583
text: I'll trust you with the coral.{nl}Joana will do a much better job at crafting it than me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002584
text: Sigh... Looks like the Ridimeds messed with the dry wood again.{nl}I even threw away all the wood I had stored because of the Sequoia; I don't know what to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002585
text: A lot of people were wounded in the attack and a lot of our things were destroyed, too.{nl}I need to look for my missing knife if things settle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002586
text: Thank you for defeating the Crabil.{nl}Thanks to you we can now carry on with the ceremony.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002587
text: Thank you for finding my knife.{nl}Now I can really focus on my work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002588
text: Did you get the handicraft from Joana?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002589
text: What a beautiful piece.{nl}Incredible handicraft work...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002590
text: Thank you.{nl}I think the goddess will be very pleased with this offering.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002591
text: A few days ago the Sequoia and the monsters decided to wreak havoc here.{nl}Most of our group fled to a safe place, the rest are here dealing with the damage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002592
text: Thanks to you we can focus on getting back on our feet.{nl}We need to get everything ready so the trainees can start practicing again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002593
text: Apart from the statue on the Broken Path, no one else is reponding...{nl}What could have happened to the others?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002594
text: What could have happened to the others...?{nl}And who is that evil man...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002595
text: Thank you for helping.{nl}As soon as things settle here we need to take care of those Ridimeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002596
text: Who was that man surrounded by evil energy?{nl}And what could have happened to the girl he was chasing?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002597
text: It's getting so quiet here.{nl}My friends all fell asleep, one by one...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002598
text: Exhausted Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002599
text: The girl came running to me and I felt an unexplicable warmth in her...{nl}Then the girl used my power to chase away the suspicious man...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002600
text: I might have let her borrow too much of my power... I fell asleep right away.{nl}What happened to her?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002601
text: The forest feels awfully quiet today, now that most of my friends are asleep...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002602
text: I sure hope nothing like this ever happens again.{nl}I don't want to lose my friends...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002603
text: Let's go back to Dievdirbys Asel first and talk about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002604
text: Let's look for the statue at the Grubus Highway like the Lonely Owl Sculpture said.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002605
text: Follow Dievdirbys Asel to the Grynas Hills!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002606
text: Follow Dievdirbys Asel inside the Laukimo Vacant Lot!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002607
text: Did you perhaps see any Dievdirbys trainees around here?{nl}I really don't know what...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002608
text: My friends all seem to have fallen asleep, no one is responding...{nl}It wasn't a monster attack, was it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002609
text: The Sequoia was terrifying that night.{nl}All of these unfortunate things keep happening...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002610
text: I'd never seen anything that frightening.{nl}It was like witnessing another Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002611
text: I'm afraid this whole ordeal was really upsetting for everyone.{nl}How can we live in this world anymore...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002612
text: I'm glad I at least got my carving knife back.{nl}Us Dievdirbys can do anything as long as we have our carving knives.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002613
text: They destroy all the tools and the wood, they even attack people.{nl}The Ridimeds, that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002614
text: Now we just need to get things sorted again...{nl}It's going to take a while even with the help of the goddess, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002615
text: The girl... is she alright?{nl}And that man...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002616
text: It looks like a regular stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002617
text: Welcomed One (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002618
text: I'll go see Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002619
text: Welcomed One (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002620
text: Can I take some food?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002621
text: You don't have to worry about that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002622
text: Received the food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002623
text: Welcomed One (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002624
text: Thank you, this is enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002625
text: Saying you'll get the supllies yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002626
text: Preparing for Battle (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002627
text: Let's fight the demons together.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002628
text: We should get out of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002629
text: Preparing for Battle (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002630
text: Tell your soldiers to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002631
text: Preparing for Battle (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002632
text: Ask another soldier to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002633
text: Preparing for Battle (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002634
text: I'll wait until the job is finished

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002635
text: Preparing for Battle (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002636
text: Let's set it up together

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002637
text: The soldiers sent to relay the fake report to the demons are back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002638
text: The Battle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002639
text: I'm ready to fight the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002640
text: I'm not ready yet

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002641
text: Contact

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002642
text: I'll relay the situation to Knight Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002643
text: I can't think of a way to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002644
text: Talking carefully about Talon's troops' situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002645
text: Remaining Demon Forces

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002646
text: I'll defeat the demon remnants

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002647
text: Trustworthy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002648
text: I don't know what you're talking about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002649
text: That's right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002650
text: Setbacks (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002651
text: I'll help you, you can talk to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002652
text: I don't see the need for that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002653
text: Setbacks (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002654
text: I'll sterilize the miners' wounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002655
text: Setbacks (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002656
text: Wizard Tulis' Ore Research (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002657
text: What are you doing?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002658
text: Wizard Tulis' Ore Research (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002659
text: Asking about the Dimensional Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002660
text: I'll help you out

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002661
text: Wizard Tulis' Ore Research (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002662
text: Is there a way?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002663
text: I'll be on my way now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002664
text: Purification Agent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002665
text: Strange Energy Emanating from the Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002666
text: Observing the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002667
text: Village Curse (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002668
text: I don't think that's something I can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002669
text: Village Curse (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002670
text: Please ask someone else.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002671
text: Village Curse (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002672
text: I'll go set up the bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002673
text: Village Curse (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002674
text: I'll go get the White Spion essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002675
text: Village Curse (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002676
text: I'll help you gather the divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002677
text: I'm still a little unprepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002678
text: Village Curse (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002679
text: I'll go find Arntas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002680
text: Let's wait a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002681
text: Village Curse (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002682
text: I'll protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002683
text: Village Curse (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002684
text: I need to prepare first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002685
text: Destroying the cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002686
text: You destroyed the cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002687
text: Medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002688
text: I can gather the herbs for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002689
text: I'm sorry to hear that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002690
text: Anxiety in the Village

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002691
text: I'll defeat the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002692
text: You should ask nearby troops to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002693
text: Cursed Statues (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002694
text: Using the Purification Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002695
text: The divine energy contained in the Purification Sphere{nl}is not enough to destroy the cursed statues.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002696
text: Destroy the cursed statues with the Purification Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002697
text: Cursed Statues (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002698
text: You destroyed the cursed statue!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002699
text: Cursed Statues (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002700
text: Nearby magic devices are keeping the statues from being destroyed.{nl}Disable all magic devices first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002701
text: Cursed Statues (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002702
text: You're being protected from the magic of demons and monsters.{nl}Defeat those nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002703
text: Cursed Statues (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002704
text: The Altars of Kadumel Cliff (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002705
text: Observing the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002706
text: The power of the altar is being weakened by nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002707
text: The altar's power has been restored.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002708
text: The Altars of Kadumel Cliff (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002709
text: A concentration of evil energy nearby{nl}is obstructing the power of the altar!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002710
text: Retreat (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002711
text: Retreat (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002712
text: I'll save your troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002713
text: You should ask another army for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002714
text: Retreat (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002715
text: I'll help you get rid of the black wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002716
text: We should think about this further.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002717
text: Retreat (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002718
text: I'll help you get ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002719
text: Retreat (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002720
text: Retreat (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002721
text: Let's hurry and leave this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002722
text: We should wait a little longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002723
text: Destroy the Demons' Device (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002724
text: An ear-piercing ringing is coming from the device.{nl}Look for a way to destroy it!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002725
text: Destroy the Demons' Device (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002726
text: It's hard to set up the bomb with so many demons around.{nl}Clear out some nearby demons first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002727
text: You have destroyed the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002728
text: Favor for an Old Dievdirbys

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002729
text: What Happened to the Owl Sculptures?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002730
text: Respect Your Elders

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002731
text: I'll escort you to where the owl sculpture is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002732
text: I'm sorry, I don't really have time for that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002733
text: Checking the Statues (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002734
text: Checking the Statues (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002735
text: I can gather the materials you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002736
text: We should think of another solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002737
text: Injured Back

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002738
text: I can get the herbs for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002739
text: You should go somewhere safe and rest instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002740
text: Need to Look in Other Places

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002741
text: You're not in good condition; I'll help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002742
text: I need to go, I have urgent matters to tend to.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002743
text: Who Did It?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002744
text: Explaining the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002745
text: Relaying the information obtained.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002746
text: Sweet Dreams (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002747
text: Sweet Dreams (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002748
text: I can do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002749
text: Fast Asleep

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002750
text: I can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002751
text: Training Camp Owl (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002752
text: Training Camp Owl (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002753
text: I don't think that will work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002754
text: Training Camp Owl (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002755
text: Once Again, Purification (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002756
text: That's going to be hard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002757
text: Once Again, Purification (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002758
text: Fainted or Asleep? (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002759
text: I'm going to rest for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002760
text: Fainted or Asleep? (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002761
text: Tell me about the girl and the man chasing her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002762
text: Let's give it some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002763
text: For the Monster Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002764
text: I'll listen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002765
text: Troublemaker Ridimeds (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002766
text: Troublemaker Ridimeds (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002767
text: Precious Carving Knife

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002768
text: I'll bring it to you if I find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002769
text: I'm sure you'll find it eventually.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002770
text: For Safety (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002771
text: For Safety (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002772
text: Observing the Owl (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002773
text: Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002774
text: Please wait a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002775
text: Full of Evil Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002776
text: Investigating the greenery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002777
text: Dangerous Dagger

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002778
text: I'll go and ask for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002779
text: Suppressing Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002780
text: Give me the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002781
text: Purification Ceremony (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002782
text: Purification Ceremony (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002783
text: Finding the Last Witness (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002784
text: I think we should rest for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002785
text: Finding the Last Witness (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002786
text: What do you have in mind?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002787
text: We should give up this investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002788
text: Finding the Last Witness (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002789
text: I think we should rest for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002790
text: It Only Gets Worse

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002791
text: Of course I'll help defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002792
text: Wandering Spirits (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002793
text: Wandering Spirits (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002794
text: Loremasters of the Goddess (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002795
text: I'm listening.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002796
text: Setbacks (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002797
text: Where can I find wild ginger plants?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002798
text: Welcomed One

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002799
text: Talk to Soldier Guylens

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002800
text: Soldier Guylens is guarding the bridge and seems to have something to tell you. Talk to Soldier Guylens.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002801
text: Talk to Soldier Guylens

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002802
text: Talk to Assistant Commander Talon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002803
text: Soldier Guylens says this area is too cold and dangerous, so they are providing travelers with supplies. Talk to Assistant Commander Talon to receive the supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002804
text: Go see Assistant Commander Talon and receive the supplies as instructed by Soldier Guylens.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002805
text: Talk to Supply Soldier Herntas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002806
text: Assistant Commander Talon wants you to go get the supplies from Supply Soldier Herntas. Talk to Supply Soldier Herntas to receive the supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002807
text: Something seems to be missing from the supply set. Talk to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002808
text: Talk to Supply Soldier Delyn

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002809
text: Assistant Commander Talon is very sorry and asks you to go to the warehouse in Valaska Hillside. Go to Valaska Hillside and talk to Supply Soldier Delyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002810
text: You were suddenly attacked by the soldiers but managed to escape. Ask Assistant Commander Talon about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002811
text: Defeat the incoming demons and monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002812
text: Preparing for Battle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002813
text: Assistant Commander Talon was being threatened by demons. Go and talk to Assistant Commander Talon again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002814
text: Talk to Assistant Commander Talon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002815
text: Talon seems to have realized something after you offered to fight the demons together. Talk to Talon again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002816
text: Talon has ordered the soldiers to oppose the demons. Talk to Talon again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002817
text: Assistant Commander Talon has released the battle plans. Ask Talon about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002818
text: Defeat the monsters in Uzsaldi Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002819
text: Assistant Commander Talon is worried that monsters might end up caught in the trap set for demons. Clear out the monsters around Uzsaldi Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002820
text: The area is clear enough. Go back to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002821
text: Clear out monsters around Uzsaldi Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002822
text: The troops are slowly getting ready for the battle with the demons. Ask Talon about the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002823
text: Set Up Wooden Fences on the Operation Grounds

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002824
text: Assistant Commander Talon wants to lure the demons to the trap with wooden fences. Get the fences from supplies boxes and set them up at the Uzsaldi Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002825
text: You have installed all the wooden fences. Report back to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002826
text: Talk to Soldier Callans

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002827
text: Soldier Callans, who is preparing the bomb, seems to be late for some reason. Go find Soldier Callans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002828
text: Collect Black Stones at the Uzsaldi Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002829
text: Soldier Callans wants to enhance the bomb with black stones. Collect some from the lower region of Uzsaldi Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002830
text: Deliver to Soldier Callans

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002831
text: You have collected enough black stones. Deliver them to Soldier Callans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002832
text: The bomb is ready. Talk to Soldier Callans again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002833
text: Setup the bombs at the Operation Site

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002834
text: Soldier Callans and you are going to set up the bomb. Set it up in the path of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002835
text: The bomb is now set up. Talk to Soldier Callans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002836
text: Everything is in place for the operation. Return to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002837
text: Defeat Centaurus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002838
text: A furious Centaurus is attacking with his demon vassals! Defeat Centaurus with the help of the troops!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002839
text: You have successfully defeated Centaurus! Talk to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002840
text: Talon still seems to be worried about something. Talk to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002841
text: Assistant Commander Talon wants to make known his troops' situation. Tell Knight Commander Uska about Talon, but don't mention him being threatened by the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002842
text: You told Knight Commander Uska about the troops at the Ibre Plateau. Return to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002843
text: Talon still seems to be worried about something. Talk to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002844
text: Defeat the demon remnants at Ibre Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002845
text: Talon is worried about Centaurus' remnants. Defeat the demon remnants at Ibre Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002846
text: You defeated the demon remnants. Report back to Assistant Commander Talon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002847
text: Defeat the demon remnants

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002848
text: Talk to Jamelhan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002849
text: Jamelhan seems anxious about something. Ask Jamelhan what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002850
text: Defeat the attacking Yeti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002851
text: As you were talking to Jamelhan, a Yeti suddenly attacked. Defeat the attacking Yeti.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002852
text: You defeated the Yeti and Jamelhan seems surprised. Talk to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002853
text: Setbacks

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002854
text: Jamelhan is impressed by your abilities. Talk to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002855
text: Defeat monsters near the camp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002856
text: You decided to help the alliance for which Jamelhan works. Start by clearing out some monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002857
text: You defeated the monsters nearby. Report back to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002858
text: Defeat Monsters Near the Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002859
text: You're helping the Kedora Merchant Alliance. Ask Jamelhan about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002860
text: Nurse the Wounded Miners

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002861
text: Jamelhan has urgent matters to tend do and has asked you to help nurse the wounded minders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002862
text: You have tended to all the wounded minders. Report back to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002863
text: Jamelhan has one last favor to ask you. Talk to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002864
text: Search for the Dimensional Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002865
text: Jamelhan can't focus on looking for the Dimensional Stone because of the monsters. Use the detector to find the region where the Stone is and mark it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002866
text: You found all the locations of the Dimensional Stone. Report back to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002867
text: Wizard Tulis' Ore Research

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002868
text: Talk to Wizard Tulis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002869
text: Wizard Tulis seems to be doing something interesting. Go and talk to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002870
text: Collect Blue Cronewt Needler Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002871
text: Wizard Tulis needs special tools to observe the ores. Her attitude may not be the best, but gather some Blue Cronewt Needler Crystals for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002872
text: Deliver to Wizard Tulis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002873
text: You have collected the magic crystals. Deliver them to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002874
text: Wizard Tulis seems surprised that you mentioned the Dimensional Stone. Talk to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002875
text: Investigate the stones south of Stairway Knoll and collect the Magic Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002876
text: Wizard Tulis needs Magic Stones to remove impurities from the Dimensional Stone. Investigate the stones nearby and collect some Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002877
text: You have found the Magic Stones. Deliver them to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002878
text: Wizard Tulis is still experimenting with the Dimensional Stone. Ask her if there is anything else you can help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002879
text: Collect Monster Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002880
text: Wizard Tulis needs a material to remove impurities from the Dimensional Stone. User her special scroll on Blue Hohen Ritters to alter them and collect their essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002881
text: Talk to Wizard Tulis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002882
text: You have collected the monster essence. Deliver it to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002883
text: Wizard Tulis looks almost finished with the experiment. Keep talking to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002884
text: Collect Tini Salivary Glands

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002885
text: Wizard Tulis wants to test the Dimensional Stone's reactions but is missing a reagent. Collect the Tini Salivary Glands she needs for research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002886
text: You have collected enough Tini Salivary Glands. Deliver them to Wizard Tulis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002887
text: Investigate the Cursed Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002888
text: The statue nearby gives a nauseating sensation to whoever approaches it. You should investigate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002889
text: A group of demons attacked as soon as you tried to investigate the statue. Defeat them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002890
text: Talk to Someone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002891
text: You defeated the attacking demons. Find some you can ask about what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002892
text: Village Curse

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002893
text: Talk to Village Priest Chaleims

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002894
text: Village Priest Chaleims seems to be waiting for something. Talk to Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002895
text: Talk to Villager Argis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002896
text: Village Priest Chaleims is asking you to save the village from the curse spread by the demons. First, go to Sticla Village and talk to Villager Argis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002897
text: Collect Black Stones in Dvejoti Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002898
text: Argis wants to start by enhancing a bomb to destroy the demons' surveillance spheres. Go to Dvejoti Cliff and look for the black stones that will help enhance the bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002899
text: Deliver to Villager Argis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002900
text: You have collected enough black stones. Deliver them to Villager Argis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002901
text: The bomb is completed. Talk to Villager Argis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002902
text: Use the Bomb to Destroy the Surveillance Sphere

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002903
text: It's time to destroy the Surveillance Sphere. Set up the bomb by the sphere and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002904
text: The Surveillance Sphere is destroyed! Report back to Village Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002905
text: The demons' Surveillance Sphere is destroyed! Ask Village Priest Chaleims about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002906
text: Collect White Spion Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002907
text: Priest Chaleims wants to create a Purification Sphere. Collect the White Spion essence needed to make it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002908
text: Deliver to Village Priest Chaleims

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002909
text: You have collected enough White Spion essence. Deliver it to Village Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002910
text: The preparations to make the Purification Sphere are almost complete. Ask Priest Chaleims about what materials are needed next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002911
text: Find Divine Energy with the Detection Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002912
text: Village Priest Chaleims needs divine energy to make the Purification Orb. Use the Detection Orb on Maven's holy relic and fill the Absorption Orb with divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002913
text: The Absorption Orb is now full of divine energy from Maven's relic. Deliver it to Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002914
text: Everything is in place to make the Purification Sphere now. Talk to Village Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002915
text: Search for Village Priest Arntas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002916
text: Village Priest Arntas isn't back yet. Go and look for Priest Arntas.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002917
text: Priest Arntas looks safe for now, but the demons already seem to be on to something. Return to Village Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002918
text: Priest Chaleims wants to make the Purification Sphere in Besde Shores, away from the eyes of the demons. Go find Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002919
text: Protect Village Priest Chaleims

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002920
text: Protect Priest Chaleims while the Purification Sphere is being created. Defeat any incoming monsters or demons that may interfere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002921
text: The Purification Sphere is now complete. Talk to Village Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002922
text: The Purification Sphere is complete and it's time to destroy the cursed statue. Talk to Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002923
text: Destroy the Cursed Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002924
text: Priest Chaleims wants you to destroy the cursed statue using the Purification Sphere. Return to the spot where you first sighted the cursed statue and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002925
text: You have destroyed the cursed statue! Return to Village Priest Chaleims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002926
text: Talk to Villager Deailan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002927
text: Villager Deailan looks upset about something. Ask him what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002928
text: Collect Sikljien Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002929
text: Villager Deailan is too ill to go gather herbs by himself. Go to the edge of Kadumel Cliff and collect some Sikljien herbs for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002930
text: Deliver to Villager Deailan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002931
text: You have collected enough Sikljien herbs. Deliver them to Villager Deailan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002932
text: Talk to Villager Emils

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002933
text: Villager Emils is not looking well. Go and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002934
text: Defeat Monsters Near the Village

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002935
text: Villager Emils is ill from the curse and worried about the monsters roaming around the village. Defeat some monsters nearby for Villager Emils.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002936
text: You have defeated the monsters. Report back to Villager Emils.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002937
text: Cursed Statues

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002938
text: Destroy the Cursed Statues with the Purification Sphere

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002939
text: Village Priest Chaleims says there are other cursed statues at the Kadumel Cliff. Use the Purification Sphere to destroy these statues.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002940
text: Charge the Purification Sphere with Divine Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002941
text: The Purification Sphere is low on divine energy. Find Maven's holy relic and collect its energy in the Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002942
text: The Purification Sphere has been recharged with divine energy. Destoy the next cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002943
text: The demons started to attack as soon as you tried to destroy the statue. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002944
text: You have defeated the demons. Now, use the Purification Sphere to destroy the cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002945
text: Disable the Magic Devices Around the Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002946
text: The magic devices around the statue make it impossible to be destroyed. You need to disable them first, but keep in mind that they will activate again if you try and temper with the statue before they're all disabled.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002947
text: All magic devices are now disabled. Use the Purification Sphere to destoy the cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002948
text: The barrier around the statue has disappeared. Use the Purification Sphere to destoy the cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002949
text: Defeat the Demons and Monsters in Zvaghas Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002950
text: The cursed statue is being protected by demons and monsters. Defeat the ones in Zvaghas Stone and to eliminate the protective barrier around the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002951
text: There's nothing else standing in your way now. Use the Purification Sphere to destoy the cursed statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002952
text: Defeat the Lavenzard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002953
text: There is a Lavenzard guarding the statue and keeping it from being destroyed. Defeat the Lavenzard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002954
text: You have defeated the Lavenzard guarding the cursed statue. Use the Purification Sphere to destroy the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002955
text: The Altars of Kadumel Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002956
text: Investigate the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002957
text: An altar on Kadumel Cliff is exhuding divine energy. Go and take a closer look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002958
text: Defeat Monsters Around the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002959
text: The evil energy of the monsters in interfering with the altar's divine power. Defeat nearby monsters and restore the altar's energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002960
text: You have defeated the monsters. Check whether the altar's power has been resotred.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002961
text: Clear Out the Concentrated Evil Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002962
text: The altar's power is being suppressed by evil energy. Use the sacred objects in Lempa Clearing to clear out the concentrations of evil energy around the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002963
text: You have removed all concentrations of evil energy. Check the altar again to confirm whether its energy has been restored.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002964
text: Retreat

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002965
text: Talk to Soldier Andre

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002966
text: A group of wounded soldiers seem to be hiding nearby. Talk to Soldier Andre.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002967
text: Suddenly a group of demons started attacking. Defeat the demons!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002968
text: You have defeated the demons. Talk to Soldier Andre.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002969
text: Defeat the Attacking Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002970
text: Soldier Andre is impressed with your abilities. Keep talking to Soldier Andre.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002971
text: Go to Smekla Base and Find Assistant Commander Vilas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002972
text: Soldier Andre's troops were ambushed by demons as they were retreating from an attack and some of them are still in danger. Go to Smekla Base and rescue Soldier Andre's troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002973
text: Defeat the Demons and Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002974
text: Talk to Assistant Commander Vilas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002975
text: Assistant Commander Vilas is surprised to see you. Talk to Assistant Commander Vilas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002976
text: Talk to Scout Boas at the Lamdyti Workshop

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002977
text: Vilas says the base is being surrounded by a black wall, isolating the troops. Find Scout Boas at the Lamdyti Workshop and find a way to get rid of the wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002978
text: Talk to Scout Boas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002979
text: Scout Boas is looking for a way to get rid of the black wall. Keep talking to Scout Boas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002980
text: Collect Black Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002981
text: Scout Boas suspects the black wall was made with an unknown magic device spotted near the workshop. To destroy the device, you need to enhance Boas' bomb. Gather the black stones needed to enhance the bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002982
text: You have collected enough stones. Give them to Scout Boas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002983
text: You are now ready to destoy the suspicious magic device. Ask Scout Boas what you can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002984
text: Destroy the Suspicious Magic Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002985
text: You're going to destroy the magic device suspected of having created the black wall. Set up the bomb on the device!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002986
text: The magic device is destroyed! Talk to Scout Boas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002987
text: Assistant Commander Vilas is glad to see you! Ask about what happened to the black wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002988
text: Defeat the Dullahan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002989
text: The demon army is after Assistant Commander Vilas' troops. Defeat the attacking Dullahan and protect Vilas' troops!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002990
text: Vilas' troops escaped to safety while you were defeating the Dullahan. Talk to Assistant Commander Vilas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002991
text: Destroy the Demons' Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002992
text: Investigate the Demons' Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002993
text: A strange noise is coming from a device that seems to belong to the demons. Have a closer look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002994
text: Search for Objects to Destroy the Device at Smekla Base

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002995
text: The demon device seems to be sending out an ominous signal. Look for any objects able to destroy the device around Smekla Base.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002996
text: Destroy the Demon Device with the Bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002997
text: You found a bomb! Use it to destroy the demon device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002998
text: You need to destroy the demons' device using the bomb. Clear out any nearby monsters and set up the bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_002999
text: Mesafasla, the Strategic Spot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003000
text: Merchant Simonas has some idea to put to test and asks you to ask the refugees about any suspicious things they might have witnessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003001
text: Merchant Simonas seems to have an idea. Continue talking with Merchant Simonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003002
text: Talk to Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003003
text: Dievdirbys Asel's condition looks serious. Try and talk to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003004
text: Find the Zaliavin Valley Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003005
text: Dievdirbys Asel was attacked by demons and wants to ask the Owl Sculpture in Zaliavin Valley for a herb that can help with the wounds. Find the Owl Sculpture in Zaliavin Valley and ask about the herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003006
text: What Happened to the Statues?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003007
text: Talk to the Sleeping Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003008
text: The Owl Sculpture in Zaliavin Valley seems to be asleep. Make sure to check on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003009
text: The Zaliavin Valley Owl Sculpture seems broken in several places. Let Dievdirbys Asel know about the state of the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003010
text: Dievdirbys Asel doesn't seem happy to hear about the condition of the Owl Sculpture. Keep talking to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003011
text: Protect Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003012
text: Dievdirbys Asel wants to see the Owl Sculpture himself, but is still wounded from the attack. Protect Asel on his way to meet the Sleeping Owl Sculpture in Zaliavin Valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003013
text: Dievdirbys Asel made it to the Sleeping Owl Sculpture in Zaliavin Valley in safety. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003014
text: Dievdirbys Asel seems to be sensing a strange energy coming from the Owl Sculpture. Ask Asel about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003015
text: Dievdirbys Asel has finished checking the statue and is looking alarmed. Ask him what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003016
text: Dievdirbys Asel has finished checking the statue and is looking alarmed. Talk to him and ask him what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003017
text: Collect Materials for Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003018
text: Before purifying the statue, Dievdirbys Asel wants to repair it. Collect the materials needed to repair the statue from nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003019
text: Deliver to Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003020
text: You have collected all the materials requested by Dievdirbys Asel. Deliver them to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003021
text: Dievdirbys Asel seems to have failed to purify the statue. Ask Dievdirbys Asel about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003022
text: Collect Yellow Sapous

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003023
text: After being unable to clear out the evil energy, Dievdirbys Asel wants to go and look for clues on another statue, but is unable to move from the pain. Look for some Yellow Sapous to be used as painkiller.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003024
text: You have collected enough Yellow Sapous. Deliver it to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003025
text: Dievdirbys Asel seems to have sensed something suspicious in the evil energy imbued into the owl sculpture. Talk to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003026
text: Clear Out Monsters on the Way to Miglos Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003027
text: Dievdirbys Asel is very glad to hear you'll accompany him. Clear out some monsters on the way to Miglos Hill so Asel can move more comfortably.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003028
text: Go to the Owl Sculpture in Miglos Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003029
text: You have defeated some monsters along the way. Wait for Dievdirbys Asel in front of the owl sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003030
text: Clear out Monsters in Miglos Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003031
text: Dievdirbys Asel found more cuts and evil energy in this sleeping owl. Ask Dievdirbys Asel about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003032
text: Talk to the Raucous Owl Sculpture in Skardus Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003033
text: Dievdirbys Asel wants you to check on the last owl sculpture. Go to Skardus Hill and visit the Raucous Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003034
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture claims to have seen a girl. Tell Dievdirbys Asel about what the Raucous Owl Sculpture told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003035
text: Talk to the Raucous Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003036
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture is looking for help. Talk to the Raucous Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003037
text: Collect Materials for the Protective Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003038
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture wants to protect its friends who are asleep. Collect some spirit stones and ritual pouches from nearby monsters to make protective crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003039
text: Deliver to the Raucous Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003040
text: You have collected all the materials for the crystals. Deliver them to the Raucous Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003041
text: Talk to the Raucous Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003042
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture made protective crystals for the sleeping owl sculptures. Talk to the Raucous Owl Sculpture again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003043
text: Place the Crystals by the Sleeping Statues

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003044
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture wants you to place the protective crystals near the sleeping owl sculptures. Go to Miglos Hill and Zaliavin Valley and place the crystals there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003045
text: The crystals are now in place, protecting the sleeping owl sculptures. Report this to the Raucous Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003046
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture still seems to be worried about something. Talk to the Raucous Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003047
text: Clear Out Monsters Around the Sleeping Owl Sculptures

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003048
text: The Raucous Owl Sculpture wants to get rid of all possible threats just to be safe. Clear out some monsters around the sleeping owl sculptures.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003049
text: You have cleared out the monsters around the sleeping owl sculptures. Return to the Raucous Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003050
text: Defeat Monsters Around the Sleeping Owl Sculptures

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003051
text: Dievdirbys Asel is waiting for you at the Grynas Training Camp. Go find Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003052
text: Talk to the Hasty Owl Sculpture at Bevertis Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003053
text: Dievdirbys Asel wants you to get information from other owl sculptures. Go and find the Hasty Owl Sculpture at Bevertis Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003054
text: The Hasty Owl Sculpture says its friends started to fall asleep ever since a girl was sighted. It believes the Lonely Owl Sculpture should know more about what happened. Relay this to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003055
text: Dievdirbys Asel says the other Dievdirbys in the area don't know much about the case. Ask Asel if there is anything else you can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003056
text: Talk to the Lonely Owl Sculpture on the Broken Path

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003057
text: As the Hasty Owl Sculpture suggested, go and find the Lonely Owl Sculpture. Visit the owl sculpture on the Broken Path and ask if it has seen something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003058
text: Talk to the Lonely Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003059
text: The Hasty Owl Sculpture says the Lonely Owl Sculpture on the Bkoen Path could have seen something. Ask the Lonely Owl Sculpture about the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003060
text: Find Owl Sculpture in Grubus Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003061
text: Lonely Owl Sculpture is hidden behind the tree. Go down to Grubus Highway and find the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003062
text: Unfortunately, Owl Sculpture in the Grubus Highway has gone into slumber a long time ago. First, go back to Dievdirbys Asel and report him all the things you found out so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003063
text: Dievdirbys Asel seems to be trying to do something. Continue to talk to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003064
text: Collect the Materials for Purification

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003065
text: Asel says that some purification ritual might be in order to awaken the Owl Sculpture. Gather Black Old Kepa vines to prepare the necessary materials to initiate the process.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003066
text: You've collected Black Old Kepa's vine enough. Deliever them to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003067
text: Collect Black Old Kepa's %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003068
text: Dievdirbys Asel says he is ready to purify Owl Sculpture. Ask Dievdirbys Asel what can you do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003069
text: Remove the Malicious Force Near Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003070
text: Dievdirbys Asel is asking for your help on purifying Owl Sculpture. Use the Purifying Sculpture to cast out the evil energy surrounding Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003071
text: The purification process is done. Ask Dievdirbys Asel, if it was successful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003072
text: Dievdirbys Asel has to hear the last bit of info from the remaining Owl Sculpture. Follow Asel to the Grubus Highway and find Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003073
text: Charge the Orb with the Life Force

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003074
text: Fortunately, Owl Sculpture is asleep not because of a curse but merely tired from using the holy power too much. In order wake it up, fill the orb with life force from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003075
text: The orb is filled with the energy. Give it to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003076
text: Lo! Owl Sculpture has been awakened! Ask it what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003077
text: It seems that the suspicious man who was chasing the girl is also responsible for hurting the Owl Sculptures. Talk with Dievdirbys Asel about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003078
text: Talk to Trainee Leryd

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003079
text: Trainee Leryd is looking for help. Ask Trainee Leryd what is troublesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003080
text: Collect the Part that Represts the Monster

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003081
text: Trainee Leryd says that the training must go on even if Sequoia attacks. Hunt the nearby monsters and bring back the parts that represent the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003082
text: Deliever to Trainee Leryd

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003083
text: That seems to be enough. Bring them to Trainee Leryd.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003084
text: Talk to Dievdirbys Ruthalen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003085
text: Dievdirbys Ruthalen is concerned with the monsters. Talk to Dievdirbys Ruthalen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003086
text: Gather Fruits with a Peculiar Scent from the Bush

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003087
text: Dievdirbys Ruthalen wants to rid of ever-invading Ridimeds. You might want to find the fruits that will lure Ridimeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003088
text: Deliever to Dievdirbys Ruthalen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003089
text: That's enough fruits for now. Give them to Dievdirbys Ruthalen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003090
text: You are ready to lure Ridimeds. Talk to Dievdirbys Ruthalen before initiating the plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003091
text: Exterminate Ridimeds that Ruthalen lured

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003092
text: It is time to exterminate Ridimeds with the scent of the fruit. Crush every single last one of incoming Ridimeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003093
text: Ridimeds have been all wiped out. Talkt to Dievdirbys Ruthalen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003094
text: Fend Off Oncoming %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003095
text: Trainee Leryd is nervous. Ask Trainee Leryd what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003096
text: Find the Crafting Knife

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003097
text: Trainee Leryd is searching for the crafting knife that his parents gave. It is likely that nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003098
text: You've found Trainee Leryd's crafting knife. Give it back to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003099
text: Talk to Dievdirbys Aisol

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003100
text: Dievdirbys Aisol's training camp has been ran amok by the monsters.Talk to Dievdirbys Aisol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003101
text: Dievdirbys Aisol needs your help in defeating Sequoia. Firstly, defeat the monsters multiplied by Sequoia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003102
text: The situation seems to be under control. Go back to Dievdirbys Aisol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003103
text: Defeat the Monsters Near the training camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003104
text: Dievdirbys Aisol says that the only thing left is to eliminate Sequoia. Talk to Dievdirbys Aisol again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003105
text: Defeat Sequoia near the Broken Path

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003106
text: Dievdirbys Aisol asked you to defeat Sequoia. Defeat Sequoia on the Broken Path.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003107
text: Sequoia has been vanquished. Report back to Dievdirbys Aisol.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003108
text: Dievdirbys Asel seems to have heard the vital information from the exhausted Owl Sculpture. Talk to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003109
text: Head down to Laukimo Vacant Lot with Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003110
text: The girl and the suspicious man whom Owl Sculptures have talked about headed down to Laukimo Vacant Lot. Go to Laukimo Vacant Lot while safely escorting Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003111
text: As you reach Laukimo Vacant Lot, Dievdirbys Asel is immediately in great pain because of the malicious force. It's for the best to check Asel's state.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003112
text: Investigate Laukimo Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003113
text: Dievdirbys Asel says that the Purification Sculpture is protecting you. Investigate where in Laukimo Vacant Lot such malicious force is coming from.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003114
text: Investigate the Suspicious Greenery for the Source of the Malicious Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003115
text: On the spot where Iltiswort has fallen, there is greenery that is reeking with the malicious energy. Investigate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003116
text: Found a broken amulet and a dagger from the greenery. Take them to Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003117
text: Talk to Sculptor Tesla in the Siauliai West Woods

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003118
text: Dievdirbys Asel says that he can do nothing about the malicious energy from the dagger. Ask Sculptor Tesla in the Siauliai West Woods for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003119
text: Sculptor Tesla will carve you a new sculpture. Obtain Purification Sculpture from Sculptor Tesla.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003120
text: Sculptor Tesla has carved you a new purifcation sculpture. Hand it over to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003121
text: Dievdirbys Asel is trying to purify by using two sculptures. Talk to Asel about what you could do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003122
text: Collect the Materials for Purification Ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003123
text: Dievdirbys Asel asks you to gather up materials for the purification ritual to rid of the malicious force. Fill up a bag with spores from nearby Yellow Gribas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003124
text: You have filled up the bag with spores from yellow gribas. Deliever it to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003125
text: Dievdirbys Asel finished the preparation for the ritual. Talk to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003126
text: Protect Asel Who From the Monsters While Performing the Ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003127
text: Dievdirbys Asel's purification ritual is complete. Protect Asel from the oncoming horde of monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003128
text: Dievdirbys Asel's ritual seems to be finished. Ask Asel how did it go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003129
text: Dievdirbys Asel is exhausted from the ritual. Ask Dievdirbys Asel what can you do for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003130
text: Talk to the Friendly Owl Sculpture on the upper side of Stabdymo Shore

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003131
text: Dievdirbys Asel says that there is one remaining Owl Sculpture and askes you to inquire it about the suspicious man and the girl. Talk to the Friendy Owl Sculpture in the upper side of Stabdymo Shore.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003132
text: Friendly Owl Sculpture says it saw a strange beam of light. Inquire further.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003133
text: The Friendly Owl Sculpture says it will help you read the memories of the broken Owl Sculptures at Laukimo Vacant Lot. Report back to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003134
text: Dievdirbys Asel will do the thing the Friendly Owl Sculpture requested. Ask Dievdirbys Asel what you can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003135
text: Recharge the Faintly Glowing Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003136
text: Dievdirbys Asel has used up all of his divine power in the ritual, it might take some time to finish the provess alone. While Asel is carving the Owl Sculpture, fill the orb with life force from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003137
text: The orb is filled with the life force, hand it over to Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003138
text: Owl Sculpture in the high place is looking for someone help it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003139
text: Wipe Out the Monsters Around the Friendly Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003140
text: The Friendly Owl Sculpture is worried about its safety. Stay beside the Friendly Owl Sculpture and protect it from the nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003141
text: You've wiped out all the nearby monsters. Report back to the Friendly Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003142
text: Talk to Quiet Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003143
text: The Quiet Owl Sculpture seems to be looking for someone to help it. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003144
text: Collect Blue Sakmoli Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003145
text: The Quiet Owl Sculpture informs you that the souls are frightened and went astray. You need Blue Sakmoli Leaves to calm them down.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003146
text: Deliever to the Quiet Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003147
text: You've gathered enough Blue Sakmoli Leaves. Deliever them to the Quiet Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003148
text: Now, it is time to guide the lost soulds. Talk to the Quiet Owl Sculpture again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003149
text: Guide the Lost Souls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003150
text: The Quiet Owl Sculpture asked you to guide the lost souls. Lead them by using Blue Sakmoli Leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003151
text: You have guided all the lost souls. Go back to the Quiet Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003152
text: You helped Loremaster Daroul who was fighting the monster all alone. Ask Loremaster Daroul what is going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003153
text: Listen to the tale of Loremasters from Loremaster Daroul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003154
text: Listen to the story about Goddess Jurate from Loremaster Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003155
text: You have listened to everything you have to hear from Loremaster Daroul. Talk to Daroul again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003156
text: You gotta help Kedora Merchant Alliance. Ask Jamelhan whar you could do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003157
