text: Collect Wild Ginger Plants in Barga Base.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003158
text: Workers in Jamelhan have been injured and you are tasked with finding some medical herb. Go down to the upperside of Barga Base and gather Wild Ginger Plants.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003159
text: Deliever to Jamelhan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160718_003160
text: You have obtained sufficient amount of Wild Ginger Plants. Hand them over to Jamelhan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003161
text: I have to go after Sarma who has run towards the Barha Forest.{nl}Even if it's a failed potion, it is still dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003162
text: Savior, if you can hear my voice, please, find me..{nl}Nebulas... the revelation... before it is too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003163
text: Someone, here?{nl}You have heard my voice, haven't you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003164
text: Then, you truly are a savior.{nl}I have been waiting for you for a long time..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003165
text: My name is Zanas.{nl}As you can see, I am a lost soul..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003166
text: I have been protecting the revelation of Laima.{nl}In this Kalejimas Prison.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003167
text: I don't know how the demons got the info but they invaded.{nl}I will explain in detail.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003168
text: But first, we should avoid getting detected by demons. Please, receive protective magic.{nl}Each floor has demon barrier protecting and detecting intruders. Without protective magic, they would know your location.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003169
text: There is a magic circle that I have activated while running away from the demons.{nl}Use it to protect yourself from the demon barriers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003170
text: Great. There would be one at the interrogation room.{nl}When you get on the magic circle, you will be protected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003171
text: But just one magic circle is not going to last long..{nl}You have to hop to the next one as fast as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003172
text: After getting the protective magic, come talk to me again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003173
text: The magic circle is designed for living people. A soul like me cannot get the protective magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003174
text: The protective magic seems to be all working properly.{nl}Now, shall we continue?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003175
text: This prison was built by King Kadumel hundreds of years ago.{nl}King Kadumel, always being suspiciouos about other people lived in fear that one day he himself might end up in this place, if insurgency ever succeeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003176
text: So, he has made many secret devices inside this place, in case that ever became reality.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003177
text: It can hide something or someone..{nl}Case in point, the devices that have either protective or offensive magic you have just seen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003178
text: It is the secret kept by King Kadumel.{nl}However, my grandfather who worked on the prison maintenance project found them accidentally.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003179
text: That is the story I have been raised on... that is why I chose this place.{nl}After becoming the protector of Goddess Laima's revelation, I thought this was a good place to hide it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003180
text: The first step was not a bad one. Getting myself into the prison with a false charge..{nl}And it might have been 4 years ago... I don't know how but Nebulars found this place and rode in with the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003181
text: I could not bear to lose the revelation.{nl}If I get captured, I do not know what would happen... that is why I decided to take my own life.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003182
text: After my willful demise, I have split my own soul into many parts by using the secret device.{nl}That is the secret behind my survival thus far.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003183
text: One small side effect of splitting your own soul into many parts is that your memory gets split as well. So, I cannot find the revelation.{nl}What we can do is to find all of my souls and memories with them and locate the revelation before Nebulars does.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003184
text: That is all I can tell for now.{nl}I will do anything to help you find the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003185
text: Well, that was a rather long-winded speech.{nl}I am unable to go anywhere because of the demon barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003186
text: Especially, I cannot go near the barrier at all.{nl}So, it would be wise for you to get to safety and give me a signal, I will be there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003187
text: As a signalling device, I think Teal Magic Stone would do just perfectly.{nl}It emits a special signal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003188
text: Teal Magic Stone can be found on the back of the tombstone in the confessional.{nl}I am not which one it was though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003189
text: Whatever the case, I'm sure it's on the back of the Tombstone so check carefully.{nl}Don't get it confused. It's on the back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003190
text: Let's find all the other souls.{nl}At this point, it is virtually impossible for me to help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003191
text: Have you found it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003192
text: It is the right one..{nl}But there is a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003193
text: The power from Teal Magic Stone is stronger that expected.{nl}It might alert the demons considering its strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003194
text: We must do something before they are alerted.{nl}I know what we should do! We should cover the stone with demon blood to send a mixed signal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003195
text: If the signal is mixed with that of the demons..{nl}Those who are not familar with Teal Magic Stone like I am will not detect anything suspicious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003196
text: Defeat the demons and acquire their blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003197
text: It doesn't matter which demon as long as it from around here.{nl}You wouldn't have a difficult time locating one, the place is crawling with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003198
text: I am an ordinary man to begin with..{nl}And me being dead, well, is not helping at all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003199
text: It's all my fault, I should have kept it more safely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003200
text: Let's see.{nl}I think it's enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003201
text: Now, if you need me, use Teal Magic Stone at a safe place.{nl}I cannot get inside dangerous places like barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003202
text: To dispell a demon barrier, you must destroy Mandara.{nl}It is a powerful demon protecting Kalejimas Visiting Room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003203
text: On top of that, a demon barrier strengthens Mandara.{nl}However, there is a way to deactivate a barrier albeit temporarily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003204
text: Secret device in the isolated area has a Magic Control Scroll hidden inside.{nl}With that, King Kadumel can be defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003205
text: In order to unlock secret device in the isolated area, you must match the brightness of the lights on both sides..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003206
text: The escape plan can only be used by him, no one else. {nl}Now, that is a mark of a true tyrant, always thinking of escape strategies. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003207
text: As you can tell by secret devices, what kind of a person King Kadumel was like.{nl}Nota trusting one, I can tell you that much.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003208
text: Do you have it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003209
text: You are the Revelator selected by the goddess.{nl}You will get the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003210
text: The spell that you want to suppress must be inscribed in Magic Control Scroll first.{nl}No ordinary method can do the job..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003211
text: The demons have very similar spells among themselves.{nl}So, it doesn't have to be from King Kadumel.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003212
text: Defeat the demons and inscribe its spell on the scroll. {nl}It's much safer and wiser than charging straight to King Kadumel.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003213
text: Your safety comes first.{nl}For safely delivering the revelation to you is the sole reason why I am staying here instead of the bossoms of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003214
text: The Magic Control Scroll will not completely subdue King Kadumel.{nl}In Kalejimas Prison, there are five demon barriers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003215
text: The Magic Control Scroll seems to be ready to go.{nl} All that is left is the downfall of King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003216
text: Demon barriers are protecting King Kadumel from any harm.{nl}That is why we made the Magic Control Scroll.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003217
text: That will suppress the barriers and then you must strike King Kadumel.{nl}However, the Magic Control Scroll will not keep the barriers down completely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003218
text: It will regenerate again and again.{nl}So, you have to use Magic Control Scroll every time it rises up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003219
text: Got it?{nl}Now, let's go and defeat King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003220
text: King Kadumel is in Offender Institution.{nl}Be careful and keep what I have told you in mind at all time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003221
text: King Kadumel was one of Nebulas??minions.{nl}Demon Lord Nebulas is far stronger than King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003222
text: Are you hurt?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003223
text: That's a relief.{nl}Now disabling demon barriers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003224
text: To disable demon barrier, you must go down to Supply Room.{nl}The barrier is quite strong and requires something in return. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003225
text: The secret device in the supply room has Orb of Dominance Magic.{nl}I believe it is the last card up King Kadumel's sleeve.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003226
text: Dominance Magic is a powerful magic, it is enough to dispel demon barrier.{nl}You might face a slight problem but first, let's find the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003227
text: The secret device in the supply room can only be opened by entering a password.{nl}The problem is the memory about the password, I don't have. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003228
text: Perhaps, there might be a part of my soul that remembers the password... {nl}But at the moment, we have no time, we have to solve it ourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003229
text: The password is comprised of numbers. {nl}There might be some clues around the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003230
text: I should think about how to use the Orb of Dominance Magic when we acquire it.{nl}It is very powerful. A powerful magic requires something of equal worth in return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003231
text: You got the Orb of Dominance Magic.{nl}Nice job. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003232
text: Also, I figured out a way to use Orb of Dominance Magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003233
text: I did say something about giving something in return, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003234
text: Dominance Magic usually needs the user's life force to activate itself. {nl}Quite fitting for the last card in King Kadumel's sleeve.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003235
text: But offering the life of Revelator is not an option.{nl}Last of all, all of this is mine own fault. I should have protected the revelation..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003236
text: Dominance Magic requires lifeforce or something equivalent or higher. {nl}That is why... I have decided to use my own soul... I will feed Dominance Magic my soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003237
text: If it takes my entire soul, my very existence will cease to be.{nl}However, the soul is something much valuable than the lifeforce, so it will only drain a portion of my soul.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003238
text: But, repeat doing that, it will drain my existence completely..{nl}If giving up my existence means saving you, Revelator, I have no regret. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003239
text: Don't worry about me, let's just disable that demon barrier.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003240
text: Getting the revelation of Goddess Laima to you, Revelator, is my duty, even after death.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003241
text: I have died for the revelation once..{nl}I would do whatever it takes to deliver the revelation to you...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003242
text: Like I have said before... {nl}When my soul split, so did my memories. At my current state, helping you is a bit difficult. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003243
text: We need a part of my soul in Storage facility in Warehouse No. 3.{nl}To find the secret device where my soul resides in, you need two types of spell. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003244
text: When King Kadumel was making it, there were two types of magic stones...{nl}Unfortunately, we do not have them at the moment. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003245
text: One of them can be solved by your power alone, Revelator..{nl}As for the other one, we should use the power from the monsters. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003246
text: They are two completely different powers, it might just solve the secret device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003247
text: There is a evil energy core you can get from defeating nearby monsters.{nl}It emits the power exact opposite of your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003248
text: I think the demons have not noticed our movement.{nl}This is our chance!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003249
text: Hmm, seems sufficient.{nl}I hope, it will work out as planned...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003250
text: My other soul is hiding in the secret device in Warehouse No. 3.{nl}It cannot get out of it on its own, please turn it off and let it out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003251
text: To turn the secret device off, you have to give two different powers into the machine on each side.{nl}One from your own. The other from the core of the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003252
text: It bears repeating... {nl}Put the power of your own and the power from the monster into each side of the secret device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003253
text: I hope my other soul piece has the memory regarding the revelation...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003254
text: Is it you who got me out? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003255
text: Finally, Revelator came.{nl}That means my other soul piece in the visiting room succeeded.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003256
text: Some of my soul pieces are captured but it's a relief that one of them at least succeeded.{nl}Revelator is here! Now, the next step can be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003257
text: You need four gems to open the secret device that contains the revelation. {nl}One of the gems is stored in this storage. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003258
text: I have no memory of where all the gems are nor the location of the revelation..{nl}Perhaps, my other soul piece would have that information.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003259
text: But fortunately, there is an instruction manual for the secret device.{nl}If you find it, we don't have to find the memory to activate the secret device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003260
text: The problem is special spell is needed to read the manual.{nl}For that, we need Teal Magic Stone...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003261
text: Say what? That's the Teal Magic Stone, right there. {nl}You came prepared, didn't you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003262
text: That makes the whole thing, easy-peasy.{nl}The manual is hidden inside a pile of junk in Warehouse No. 2.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003263
text: Use the Teal Magic Stone on the pile of junk, there will be a piece of paper levitating.{nl} That's the manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003264
text: If you find the manual, please come straight to the Waiting Room.{nl}I will find my other soul pieces and regain more memories.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003265
text: Found the manual and some memories have been regained. Now things will get a bit easier. {nl}Now, let's get those jewels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003266
text: The King has four jewels.{nl}The red one is inside the secret device in Warehouse No. 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003267
text: In order to open it, you must light three lamps.{nl}Follow the instructions on the manual to light the lamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003268
text: Two of the lamps require specific oil for each lamp...{nl}The rest can be lit with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003269
text: It ain't exactly Homunculus summoning, just avoid getting devoured by demons and you are good to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003270
text: You lit two of them already? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003271
text: You truly are the revelator picked by Goddess Laima.{nl}Now, the last lamp is the trickiest lamp of them all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003272
text: But for you, it won't be that hard.{nl}The last lamp is located at the Kalejimas Visiting Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003273
text: The last lamp will be lit if you activate all the five magic circles surrounding it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003274
text: One activated magic circle will affect the others..{nl}So, you have to think ahead on which one you should activate first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003275
text: All these complex machineries... {nl}You cannot deny that King Kadumel was great in that respect. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003276
text: Then again, Nebulas has yet to find the revelation thanks to him...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003277
text: The lamps are all lit. All that is left is King's Red Jewel.{nl}The secret device in Warehouse No. 1 has the King's Red Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003278
text: Be safe. {nl}This place is swarming with those demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003279
text: I feel guilty not doing anything while you are doing all the hard work.{nl}I mean, I feel useless because of all those demon barriers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003280
text: Now, we are one step closer. {nl}3 more King's gems to go.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003281
text: Now, let's disable the demon barrier in the storage.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003282
text: I would have to pay a part of my soul as a price but... {nl}I had one piece just now so, I can endure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003283
text: Please, destroy the monsters on your way to the demon barrier. {nl}All our struggles would be in vain if we get captured by the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003284
text: Get to the barrier and use Teal Magic Stone to call me and I will disable the demon barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003285
text: Failing my duty is the only thing I truly fear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003286
text: We have disable two barriers now.{nl}I bet the demons have noticed something by now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003287
text: We need to interrogate the demons.{nl}It is quite crucial to know how much they know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003288
text: In the hanging room, there is a secret device that seems useful.{nl}There is a magic device that gives out hallucination. Disguise yourself as a monster and let's get the info from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003289
text: The hallucination device in the hanging room uses spell or souls to create its shape.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003290
text: So that means to create a hallucination of a demon, {nl}You have to defeat a demon that you want to make a hallucination out of near the hallucination device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003291
text: I think the reason why King Kadumel made such device, {nl}is to perhaps fool the enemies and escape himself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003292
text: However, I still do have some questions about how to use the device.{nl}I feel like I am missing something here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003293
text: Have you found out something?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003294
text: They don't suspect that the revelator is here. {nl}If anything, they think I am the intruder. Well, no one is stupid or brave enough to sneak in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003295
text: But Grinender is here... now that is no good news.{nl}We ought to find Grinender's Seal that the demons are talking about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003296
text: It seems that that is what can disable the magic circle created by Grinender.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003297
text: While you get Grinender's Seal, I will be planning on how to hit Grinender where it hurts.{nl}There must be something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003298
text: Some planning is needed for secret devices in the solitary confinement section.{nl}If I am remembering correctly, there were things like teleport scrolls or a magic device...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003299
text: Did you get Grinender's Seal?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003300
text: Good. I also had figured out a plan to get back at those demons.{nl}If it works, we might just easily get through the solitary confinement section.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003301
text: Here's the plan, get the teleport scroll and get straight to theLong Sentence Prison Cells.{nl}And activate the defense device and exterminate them all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003302
text: The demons in the mid hallway would not know what hit them.{nl}And we walk away like cool guys do. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003303
text: The first thing we should do is to get ahold of that scroll.{nl}The Teleport Magic Scroll is inside the secret device located in the Prisoner Waiting Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003304
text: You and I make a great team.{nl}You need a password to open the secret device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003305
text: I believe it was a name of a goddess. {nl}Gabija, Ausrine, Vakarine, Zemyna, Vaivora, Jurate... And you know a lot more, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003306
text: Vaivora, Vakarine, Ausrine, Gabija, Jurate, Zemyna... {nl}It might be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003307
text: Now that we got the Teleport Magic Scroll and jump ahead to the Long Sentence Prison Cell.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003308
text: I will hold onto one of these Teleport Magic Scrolls, just in case.{nl}The other one you should use it to get to the Long Sentence Prison Cells.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003309
text: When you get to the Long Sentence Prison Cells, turn on the defense device right away.{nl}The instruction is on the manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003310
text: I cannot go because of that Grinender. Once it falls, I will join you as soon as possible.{nl}Godspeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003311
text: The defense device in the long sentence prison cells is intricate with some powerful magic.{nl}I had some explaining to do to the wardens the first time I activate the machine and caused a havoc.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003312
text: I came here as fast as I could after seeing you defeating Grinender.{nl}It was no easy task, I imagine but well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003313
text: With Grinender no more, the remnants don't stand a chance.{nl}Let's wipe them off so that they won't hinder our quest to find the King's gem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003314
text: Don't let your guard down though. {nl}The demons can charge in at any time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003315
text: I hope Nebulas also would go down this easily.{nl}But I do have a bad feeling about this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003316
text: I hope this is just a feeling. Nothing more than that...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003317
text: Remarkable.{nl}Id I had your strength and skills, I would not have taken such a drastic choice..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003318
text: There is no point crying over spilt milk... {nl}The present is all that matters, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003319
text: Now let's disable the demon barrier in the Regular Prison Cell.{nl}The King's Green Jewel is inside the the secret device inside the Regular Prison Cells.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003320
text: Find it that and disable the demon barrier in the Reintegration Workshop.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003321
text: There are six crystals surrounding the secret device.{nl}Breathe spell into them and the device will unlock itself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003322
text: However, the crystals lose their potency after a while.{nl}So, please be hasty.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003323
text: King Kadumel was never known to show any special talents in using magic. {nl}Probably, he had his mages activate such devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003324
text: The demons surely are showing suspicious signs.{nl}I don't have a good feeling about that...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003325
text: Darn, a dead end.{nl}They must have noticed us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003326
text: But then again, it is pretty hard to miss the work of art we've left in the solitary confinement area.{nl}Looking at how things are at the moment, we should obtain a different soul piece.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003327
text: I cannot move further due to demon magic. You are on your own for now.{nl}But fortunately, I can tell you the way to get to the other side.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003328
text: A cell in Individual Workshop has teleportation magic. {nl}It is something made by King Kadumel as a contingency plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003329
text: The magic is activated upon uttering a special sentence.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003330
text: I only remember one pass-sentence... {nl}So, you would have to find the cell with the right code.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003331
text: The magic sentence is

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003332
text: It's not that surprising that it is King Kadumel made the phrase.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003333
text: Get to the other side and find Soul Stone of Restrainment from the monsters.{nl}Find the Spirit Stones and free my other spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003334
text: When you say the correct phrase in the right cell, you will be able to get to the other side.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003335
text: You have saved me.{nl}Are you perhaps the Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003336
text: Just as I have expected.{nl}It is indeed marvelous to see that my other spirits have not failed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003337
text: You have come this far, so perhaps, it is quite safe to assume that you are in fact seeking the King's Jewels. Am I correct in assuming so?{nl}If my memory serves me rightfully, there are two King's Jewels and one of them is hidden inside the Storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003338
text: Alas, the other one has fallen into the hands of Nebulas...{nl}No all is lost, let us take comfort in that and find the yellow one first in the Workshop. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003339
text: The King's Yellow Jewel is stored in the secret device located in the Supply Room.{nl}There are four fragments each with unique properties such as Fire, Ice, Electricity and Poison needed to open the secret device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003340
text: It originally belonged to me but, I am terribly ashamed to say this, got taken away by the monsters.{nl}It should be around here. We must retrieve it from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003341
text: Curse me for a novie...{nl}I should not have never let Nebulas lay his hand on the King's Blue Jewel...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003342
text: All the pieces have been brought together. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003343
text: Blimey, there is a slight problem.{nl}The pieces have been contaminated by the evil energy from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003344
text: We ought to purify them.{nl}Providentially, there is a way to perform such task.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003345
text: The top of the Supply Room, the part where lights are in, there will be Light Crystals.{nl}Shine the pieces with its light. That would purify them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003346
text: Doing it once or twice will not be sufficient enough.{nl}You must keep shining the light at them until all the evil energy is casted out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003347
text: After the purification process is complete, head down to Supply Room.{nl}Open the secret device there and obtain the yellow gem.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003348
text: Place the pieces into the spots around the secret device to open it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003349
text: I am still under Dominance Magic and it's hindering my movement...{nl}As soon as such limitation is removed, I will quickly join you in the Supply Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003350
text: I do not profess to know how Light Crystal is formed.{nl}One could only conjecture that it is a result of collected good aspects of souls fell in this prison...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003351
text: You've acquired the Yellow Jewel?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003352
text: What good news.{nl}I am now able to move again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003353
text: There is a secret device in the Punishment Room.{nl}It can be activated by a very strong magic attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003354
text: Once it is activated, we can jolly well blast through the demons and their putrid magic that's standing in our way...{nl}All good things are not that easy to earn as we know by now. I do not have the necessary memory in regards to how to operate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003355
text: My word, you have the manual! {nl}Goddesses be praised! It makes the entire thing much easier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003356
text: Activating the secret device in the Punishment Room will surely deal an overwhelming blow to the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003357
text: This strike would definitely leave a mark on their side.{nl}And the magic blocking the way is now go as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003358
text: Righty-O!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003359
text: There might be some monsters left in Segregated Ward.{nl}The radius of the blast was not that wide.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003360
text: We are in this to disable demon barriers... {nl}So, eliminating the remaining monsters is in the job description.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003361
text: I will reunite with my other spirit.{nl}I will join you right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003362
text: If I can recollect all my separated spirits, I might be able to find a way to...{nl}Defeat Nebulas once and for all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003363
text: I can sense something strange.{nl}It is not a pleasant one, I can surely tell you that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003364
text: So bizarre... There is a very powerful energy from that direction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003365
text: I believe it is from Nebulas...{nl}Even so, it is far too strong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003366
text: This is wrong. Nebulas power should not be that high...{nl}We must find out what happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003367
text: There is an observational detector nearby.{nl}But... when the demons invaded, the monsters broke it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003368
text: If we could retrieve some parts, we might be able to figure something out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003369
text: The detector is located up on the next floor.{nl}The nearby monsters might have the parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003370
text: What on earth has happened to Nebulas?{nl}He was a strong demon to begin with but this is ludicrous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003371
text: Wait, the demon barrier is that strong? {nl}Inconceivable...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003372
text: The power emitting from that one is stronger than all the previous four barriers put together.{nl}Perhaps, this is doing of a demon higher than Nebulas...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003373
text: Before we disable the barrier, we have no chance against Nebulas.{nl}Now the Dominance Magic will not hold.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003374
text: Desperate times call for desperate measures.{nl}I will enhance the Dominance Magic until it's strong enough to disable that barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003375
text: It means, I would have to pay my whole soul for it.{nl}For a Stronger Dominance Magic the price paid gets increased aswell.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003376
text: It must be done...{nl}If not, Nebulas can never be defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003377
text: After all, this was caused by my own failure to protect the revelation.{nl}It is my responsibility.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003378
text: The cessation of my existence is a small price to pay for delivering the revelation to you, the revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003379
text: Defeating Nebulas and getting the revelation...{nl}Saving the world is the task, only you could do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003380
text: Leave the demon barrier up to me.{nl}All you need to focus on is defeating Nebulas and obtaining the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003381
text: There is no time to lose. Don't waste your precious seconds worrying about me.{nl}We are racing against the clock.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003382
text: Use the secret device near the incinerator to enhance the Dominance Magic.{nl}But it requires Energy Crystals first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003383
text: Find Energy Crystals placed on the floor above the Incinerator.{nl}Once enough crystals have been collected, you can activate the secret device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003384
text: We must hurry before Nebulas finds us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003385
text: I cannot even fathom what functions were intended for the secret device near the incinerator.{nl}I have never heard that King Kadumel was so knowledgeable in magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003386
text: What good could come out of enhancing such minute spell?{nl}I am not complaining, it did give us the ample opportunity to combat Nebulas thanks to that secret device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003387
text: The secret device is operating perfectly.{nl}I will be here enhancing the Dominance Magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003388
text: As for you, activate all the secret devices in the Interrogation Room.{nl}That would buy us some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003389
text: I have faith in you.{nl}You would not have much difficulty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003390
text: Either activating secret devices to attack demons... {nl}Or destroy demon devices or magic circles. Do whatever you seem fit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003391
text: By the way,{nl}I'd appreciate it if you could deal with some of the monsters on the way so they won't be able to get here.{nl}Give me the signal with the Teal Magic Stone as soon as you get to the Barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003392
text: It better not be too late.{nl}I really don't wanna fail twice.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003393
text: Revelation of Kalejimas Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003394
text: I knew well what destiny awaited Zanas...{nl}And I knew he himself was ready to accept it, yet I had no choice but to trust him with the Revelation.{nl}The power that led Zanas, a mere boy, unto the Revelation...{nl}His last breath, his last prayer... were but for your own and our world's salvation.{nl}He shall be remembered for as long as I live.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003395
text: I understand this is a sin that cannot be forgiven.{nl}But the lives being lost in our world every day are far too many.{nl}A grave disaster is upon us...{nl}The same disaster that forced us to give up on the petrification curse,{nl}that nearly reduced the kingdom to ruins.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003396
text: The goddess that could not be saved will soon be free of her chains.{nl}Past chains of a relinquished salvation crushing Her...{nl}The one taken by the curse of the demon queen shall descend once more as the Goddess of Destruction.{nl}Savior. You must go to the caves holding the hidden goddess captive.{nl}Please... protect her from the demon queen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003397
text: Writings on the Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003398
text: the gards must be reely stoopid.{nl}or maybe im just reely smart?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003399
text: their trying to find a haystak in a needel haha.{nl}they hid some stuf in a pile of more stuf, nao its been half a year and they stil cant find it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003400
text: im also trying to find my hiden stuf.{nl}i hid dem reely well. i must be a geenias...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003401
text: I'm so mad.{nl}So what, I stole some bread. Why put me in this place and make me miserable...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003402
text: Even the care package my brother sent me was "confiscated".{nl}Right. I know you no-life guards took it all for yourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003403
text: I'm just saying, the real thief here isn't me.{nl}Wish the guards would just burn this prison cell already.{nl}Please! Oh, Goddess Gabija!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003404
text: I'm sure they will love to have this letter from their son.{nl}They're his parents, after all...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003405
text: Researcher Adas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003406
text: Ugh... The poison is spreading too much...{nl}Who're you? Are you with Sarma?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003407
text: Is it...? That means Gatre was right.{nl}Sarma released the poison on us and left.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003408
text: The poison is still spreading... I don't know if we can take it much longer.{nl}We would need the Barha antidote to neutralize it all... please help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003409
text: To make the antidote we need ingredients.{nl}Get me some Barha Herbs first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003410
text: Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003411
text: Gatre did say Sarma looked suspicious...{nl}But who knew this would happen...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003412
text: You got the Barha herbs.{nl}Looks like we'll be okay with you around.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003413
text: We also need some Griba juice to make the antidote.{nl}You can get it from Red Big Gribas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003414
text: There's plenty of Big Red Gribas around here, shouldn't be hard to find some.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003415
text: The Griba juice is the last ingredient we need for the antidote.{nl}We can use the reagent maker to finish the antidote after that, so hurry up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003416
text: Sorry to ask this, especially since you're so helpful, but please hurry.{nl}I'm starting to lose my senses...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003417
text: Oh.{nl}You got the Griba juice too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003418
text: We should be able to make the antidote in the reagent maker now.{nl}You need to follow the recipe very carefully.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003419
text: You'll see two reagent makers next to the alchemy table.{nl}Process the herbs on the left-side reagent maker, the one with smoke coming out of it, and the Griba juice on the right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003420
text: Once you have the ingredients processed, put them in the antidote flask on the alchemy table.{nl}And please hurry... I'm losing my sight now...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003421
text: The poison is still spreading...{nl}I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003422
text: Oh... Thank you.{nl}I'm still a little sore, but the effects of the poison are gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003423
text: Sarma came running and laughing like a crazy person when he released the poison on the researchers.{nl}We couldn't escape and ended up like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003424
text: Sarma made that poison by accident after failing time after time...{nl}This could have been his plan, for all we know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003425
text: What worries me is that he was headed to where the villagers are.{nl}They all helped in Sarma's research and now they could be in danger. Take the antidote, just in case.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003426
text: I'm glad to be alive, but my body still isn't moving right.{nl}If Gatre sent you, you're the only one I can trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003427
text: Researcher Veed

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003428
text: Ugh, who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003429
text: I hope they're all safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003430
text: Is Gatre...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003431
text: Sarma would have wiped us all if it weren't for Gatre.{nl}Of course, we owe you a lot as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003432
text: Sarma went south, but he must have sprayed the overgrowth solution all around and now the path is blocked by vines.{nl}We can't get past.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003433
text: We can make a neutralizer to reduce these vines, though.{nl}I would do it myself, but it seems my body has its own will at this moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003434
text: If you go to our research room, there's a paper there with the recipes for the neutralizer and other solutions.{nl}Just find that piece of paper.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003435
text: Once you find the paper, just follow the instructions to make the neutralizer.{nl}The ingredients will also be written on that paper.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003436
text: Oh, I still can believe Sarma betrayed us, I'm furious right now.{nl}I would so show him if my body wasn't still in this state.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003437
text: You managed to make the neutralizer, it seems.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003438
text: You can just spray the neutralizer all over the giant vines.{nl} But there's something I want you to do on the way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003439
text: The antidote you have with you is not enough to cure Sarma's poison.{nl}The paper at the research room also has a recipe for an antidote enhancer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003440
text: But Sarma didn't tell us which ingredients he used to make it.{nl}You'll have to look for Sarma's research documents to find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003441
text: Talk to Sireah after you find the materials for the enhancer.{nl}She's the one in charge of making the solutions, she'll know what to do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003442
text: Let's just hope Sarma didn't get to her too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003443
text: Sarma... And here I thought he was helping us the whole time...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003444
text: Researcher Sireah

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003445
text: W-who are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003446
text: Veed told you to come see me?{nl}I came here to avoid getting contaminated with Sarma's poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003447
text: Veed wants me to enhance the antidote?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003448
text: {nl}Okay.{nl}Give me the antidote and the ingredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003449
text: Done.{nl}This antidote should be enough to counteract Sarma's poison.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003450
text: Will you clear out the poison from the area that got contaminated?{nl}It's too dangerous right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003451
text: You can use the enhanced antidote to detoxify the area.{nl}Hurry, before the poison spreads any further.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003452
text: Is the area clean now?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003453
text: I'm glad to hear it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003454
text: Sarma contaminated the area so we couldn't go after him, then he went north.{nl}He used all of the poison and blocked the way behind him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003455
text: But I think you can get through it with this antidote.{nl}Be careful, though, you never know what he might do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003456
text: I still don't understand what it is that Sarma wants...{nl}Why did he made a fool of all of us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003457
text: All I know is that he's dangerous now.{nl}Please, you have to stop Sarma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003458
text: I just hope all the others are safe...{nl}I'm so worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003459
text: You're back.{nl}What happened to Sarma?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003460
text: Wow... At least he got what he deserved.{nl}It was the goddesses who punished him, I'm telling you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003461
text: Who knows, maybe it was the goddesses who brought you to us too.{nl}Thank you so much for saving us and the villagers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003462
text: If it weren't for you, we...{nl}I don't even want to think about it...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003463
text: Oh! By the way, Gatre was looking for you just now.{nl}They were worried when they heard you were going after Sarma. Go and see them if you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003464
text: My goodness...{nl}Are you alright?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003465
text: Aidas and Veed told me what happened on the way here.{nl}I'm so sorry I got you caught up in a dangerous situation like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003466
text: But I want to say thank you.{nl}If it weren't for you, we would never be able to save everyone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003467
text: Now we know not to trust people like Sarma and we're going to take care of the village ourselves.{nl}We'll be careful not to let something like this happen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003468
text: Something's happened after Sarma spread the poison around here.{nl}The monsters have changed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003469
text: They're going around spraying the poison everywhere.{nl}At this rate, it won't be long before the villagers are affected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003470
text: We need to stop these monsters before it's too late.{nl}You seem capable enough, won't you help us out?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003471
text: I knew we could count on you.{nl}You should be able to tell which monsters were affected by the poison, they have a green glow to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003472
text: Sarma really worked some havoc here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003473
text: The research Sarma was doing was too dangerous, we can't just leave it be.{nl}I think it would be best to get rid of the equipment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003474
text: Sarma had a main research room where he made the poison.{nl}We'll take care of the other research rooms, meanwhile you can go and destroy the equipment in the main room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003475
text: Sarma had a main research room where he made the poison.{nl}We'll take care of the other research rooms, meanwhile you can go and destroy the equipment in the main room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003476
text: Good.{nl}Everything Sarma was working on must be destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003477
text: The research equipment is spread out here and there so it won't be easy getting rid of it all.{nl}And we need to have some antidote saved.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003478
text: That should do it.{nl}We'll take care of the rest ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003479
text: What could possibly have led Sarma to do this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003480
text: I can't move my body...{nl}The poison is spreading.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003481
text: Because of Sarma everything has turned into chaos.{nl}I can't believe this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003482
text: We can make it work if we join efforts with the villagers.{nl}We sure learned a lot from this whole ordeal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003483
text: I'm still sore but I feel fine.{nl}I'm just glad nothing worse happened to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003484
text: What do we do now?{nl}We really need to think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003485
text: Thanks to you we managed to avoid the worst.{nl}It's up to us now to solve the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003486
text: Outsider Mark

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003487
text: I thought I'd be able to fight anything to make my father better...{nl}But now that I'm face-to-face with the monsters, I can't help but be scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003488
text: That elder's prescription is our only hope.{nl}We need those Tini horns to work...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003489
text: Would... you perhaps be able to help me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003490
text: I came all the way here to get Tini horns.{nl}My father is ill and the shiny Tini horns are supposed to make him better.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003491
text: I didn't realise how frightening it was being here... I don't think I can do it on my own.{nl}Would you be so kind to help my father?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003492
text: Apparently their horns only shine after being pulled out.{nl}Curious, isn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003493
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I will never forget this favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003494
text: Pilgrim Phylia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003495
text: I know nowhere is safe anymore after Medzio Diena, but this place seems even worse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003496
text: I should be able to get some treatment at the monastery, but I'm worried the wound will become infected before I arrive there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003497
text: Help me!{nl}I was attacked by monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003498
text: I can't move with these wounds.{nl}Please, traveler, will you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003499
text: I think I can make it to Maven Abbey with some medicinal herbs.{nl}They're called Taumas herbs... they look a little different from the grass around it. Please bring me some.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003500
text: The Taumas herbs release a scent when you pick them.{nl}This scent can attract monsters, so please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003501
text: Thank you.{nl}Are you also going to Maven Abbey?{nl}May the goddesses hear your prayers then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003502
text: I've walked this path so many times, but this time has been by far the roughest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003503
text: I hope my buddies at the monastery are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003504
text: You there.{nl}Can I talk to you for a second?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003505
text: You don't seem like a common fellow...{nl}Will you help an old man in trouble?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003506
text: I'm also on my way to Maven Abbey like the other pilgrims.{nl}But something's different about this path. Because of Medzio Diena, I s'pose...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003507
text: I hurt my leg earlier when some monsters attacked me, I even lost my bags.{nl}I had some important things I want to give to my buddies in there...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003508
text: So I'm asking you.{nl}If the Tinis don't scare you, please bring me back my bags.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003509
text: No idea why the Tinis were so interested in my things.{nl}Don't know which one took them either... Some luck, huh.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003510
text: My bags, you found them!{nl}I can go on with my journey now. Not sure if I can keep walking but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003511
text: If you don't mind, I have one more favor to ask.{nl}Can you get me a stick that I can use as a cane?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003512
text: I'm very sorry, child.{nl}May the grace of the goddesses be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003513
text: I just need something sturdy enough to take all the way to the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003514
text: Now that's sturdy!{nl}Should have no problems getting to the monastery now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003515
text: Ah, but what to do about these monsters...{nl}They're a pain in the neck, I'm telling you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003516
text: Are you going to Maven Abbey too?{nl}If you don't mind, would you come with me just half the way?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003517
text: {nl}No need to go to far, just until the road to Salvia Forest up there.{nl}You know the old building there? That's where I want you to take me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003518
text: Do you know this monk?{nl}If something went wrong, they could have escaped. The goddesses' grace must have been with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003519
text: Pilgrim Angela

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003520
text: At last we found someone!{nl}Please, we're trying to help this monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003521
text: What's this?{nl}Why are they lying here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003522
text: What could've happened at the monastery?{nl}Fortunately they're still breathing...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003523
text: The goddesses are truly looking over us{nl}Certainly finding this monk here was not a coincidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003524
text: We must never lose hope.{nl}And we must never forsake our prayers to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003525
text: Oh no...{nl}That monk... They look like they've starved for days.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003526
text: I will cook them a stew.{nl}Traveler, would you bring me some meat?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003527
text: The only meat worth eating in this area should be Tini meat.{nl}Please go and gather some.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003528
text: We should hurry.{nl}They look extremely weak already.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003529
text: Come back after you've helped my husband.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003530
text: Thank you.{nl}I will cook this for the monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003531
text: I hope the monk can get their senses back soon, they need to recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003532
text: This is the first time my husband and I do a pilgrimage to Maven Abbey.{nl}If the rumors are true, praying to the goddesses there will make everything better.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003533
text: Oh my, what was I thinking?{nl}We don't have enough water.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003534
text: I saw an old well up north on our way here.{nl}Would you go there with my husband and bring me some water?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003535
text: My husband will draw the water.{nl}Please look after him and don't let the monsters go near.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003536
text: Are you ready?{nl}Let's go, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003537
text: The well is up there.{nl}We should hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003538
text: Thank you.{nl}This will help my wife look after the monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003539
text: Thank you.{nl}Finding you was truly a fortunate thing to happen to this poor monk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003540
text: Could this be anything but the will of the goddess?{nl}We'll have them drink some water first, then the stew.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003541
text: If this poor fellow if lying here...{nl}Something isn't right at the monastery, don't you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003542
text: Imagine the things they must have gone through, a healthy person like that in this state...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003543
text: What could've made them be outside of the monastery like this...{nl}In any case, we should take care of them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003544
text: {nl}First things first, fire.{nl}We'll need some if we're going to make some stew or keep warm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003545
text: Traveller. I'm so sorry but...{nl}Can I ask you for some wood for the fire?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003546
text: Go to the Vabalas Vacant Lot.{nl}You should find some firewood we can use there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003547
text: Really wonder what happened to my buddy here...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003548
text: This should do it.{nl}Let's get started with the fire then. Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003549
text: Monk Ethan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003550
text: Thank you for saving my life.{nl}I'm worried for the monastery, however. I wonder if my brothers are safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003551
text: I was fortunate to find my friend here.{nl}I can't imagine what would have happened should he have gone to the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003552
text: Thanks to you and the pilgrims, my friend seems to be better now.{nl}My friend will thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003553
text: Thank you...{nl}You're the kind people who saved me, is that right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003554
text: I'm Monk Ethan, from Maven Abbey.{nl}Please... You mustn't go to the monastery!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003555
text: The abbey was taken by an organization called the Tree of Truth.{nl}They accused me of conspiring with the demons and expelled me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003556
text: As if that weren't enough, they sent one of them to chase after me.{nl}It was a miracle of the goddesses having made it this far...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003557
text: Trust my words. You must not go to the monastery.{nl}The Tree of Truth do not worship the goddesses as we do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003558
text: My goodness... Do you mean the monastery was forcefully taken?{nl}The historic Maven Abbey?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003559
text: {nl}And by that unlawful order calling themselves the Tree of Truth...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003560
text: You should speak with my friend now.{nl}Let's see what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003561
text: It's a shame they chose not to listen to my words.{nl}The very same people who saved my life...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003562
text: Hm... I hope those pilgrims stay safe.{nl}I'm going to stay here with my friend.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003563
text: Ethan says they're recruiting people to fight the Order.{nl}I'm heading to Klaipeda as soon as I get better.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003564
text: The problem is all these monsters blocking the way.{nl}As a last favor, would you clear out some monsters around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003565
text: I'm really sorry for making you work so much.{nl}Just do this one last thing for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003566
text: No, no. It's still too dangerous.{nl}Get some more of those monsters if you can.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003567
text: There's too many monsters on the way to Klaipeda, you see.{nl}I'm asking you. I've no one else I can trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003568
text: You're too kind, I can't thank you enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003569
text: Not many good people like you left these days.{nl}May the grace of the goddesses be with you always.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003570
text: Things seemed normal all the way to Taumas Forest, but here it's extremely cold.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003571
text: I can't see my own breath, but I'm freezing.{nl}This doesn't make any sense. Brrrr...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003572
text: I was still cold even with all the leather...{nl}But I feel more relaxed now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003573
text: Traveller... please help me.{nl}I was on a pilgrimage to Maven Abbey but I can't walk anymore...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003574
text: I must be sick... I can't stand the cold...{nl}Would bring me some leather, something to cover myself with...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003575
text: You should be able to gather some leather from the Red Spions around here...{nl}Please, you need to help me...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003576
text: I can't stop shivering ever since I arrived in Salvia Forest...{nl}I'm starting to think I might really die here...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003577
text: Thank you, really.{nl}This leather should keep me from freezing to death...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003578
text: I'm so cold and hungry...{nl}Not even Medzio Diena was this brutal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003579
text: Would you perhaps have something to eat? I'm starving.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003580
text: I feel full even though I didn't eat.{nl}I only have Clark to thank.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003581
text: It's funny... I feel so hungry ever since I got here...{nl}I already ate everything I had...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003582
text: I'll take anything.{nl}Don't you have anything I could eat?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003583
text: Can you pick me some berries from Salvia Brambles?{nl}I would be very thankful...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003584
text: How long is it going to take?{nl}I feel like going to the goddess if I stay like this any longer...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003585
text: Thank you.{nl}I never felt as cold or hungry as I do now...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003586
text: I barely made it out of Taumas, but no luck. This place is just as full of monsters{nl}Now I'm not only cold and hungry, I'm too scared too even move.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003587
text: Killing them is no use, there's always more and more.{nl}Just where are these monsters coming from?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003588
text: I think I can take on the monsters now that I'm no longer cold or hungry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003589
text: I'm so cold and so hungry...{nl}But most of all I'm scared of all the monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003590
text: Please.{nl}Could you take care of any monsters around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003591
text: No, there's still too many.{nl}Please, just a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003592
text: Thank you.{nl}I need to find a way to deal with the hunger and the cold now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003593
text: Do not waver before false beliefs.{nl}In this confounding world of ours, we must follow the will of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003594
text: The world knows not how to worship the divine goddesses.{nl}The Tree of Truth can show you the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003595
text: Greetings.{nl}We are the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003596
text: We are expelling the false believers...{nl}... and propagating true faith in this monastery.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003597
text: We came to protect incoming pilgrims from the monsters.{nl}But it seems a contagious disease has affected the surrounding areas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003598
text: Should you too be interested in true faith...{nl}Won't you help us care for the pilgrims suffering from this disease?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003599
text: Oh, is that so?{nl}I'll prepare some medicine in that case. You may go with Follower Clark and help the pilgrims in need.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003600
text: I'll ask you to watch over Follower Clark while he tends to the pilgrims.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003601
text: Many pilgrims are still suffering from this terrible disease.{nl}We ought to hurry and help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003602
text: Please help Follower Clark heal the ailing pilgrims.{nl}Time is running short.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003603
text: Pilgrim in Treatment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003604
text: I would be in deep water if it weren't for the followers of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003605
text: I only need to rest a little longer before I finally head to the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003606
text: I don't see Follower Brutus.{nl}He said he would go prepare the medicine, but where is he?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003607
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth exists to serve humanity by the will of the Divine Tree.{nl}Help those in need and be blessed by the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003608
text: Those of us already under the grace of the Tree are safe, but I worry for the pilgrims that have yet to convert.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003609
text: You might have heard the negative rumors about our Order.{nl}Pure fabrications with no ground on truth. We are merely offering help to those who need it the most.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003610
text: I can't tell what Follower Brutus is thinking.{nl}I think it would be best to follow him/

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003611
text: But traveler.{nl}Do you not see what's strange?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003612
text: The ailing pilgrims look very similar to the monsters that inhabit these lands.{nl}I'm talking about... the black energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003613
text: There's something... strange about it.{nl}There is something I would like to test; would you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003614
text: Thank you.{nl}This medicine is the same one I gave to the pilgrims...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003615
text: Several Red Spions around the area are cursed, surrounded by black energy.{nl}I would like you to apply the medicine on them and see how they react.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003616
text: It's very strange.{nl}Please, give the medicine to the Red Spions surrounded by dark energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003617
text: The black energy disappears?{nl}Could this mean the medicine is not curing a disease but a curse?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003618
text: That's... very strange indeed.{nl}It seems Follower Brutus has returned; do speak to him about the reaction of the monsters to the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003619
text: A curse, you say?{nl}That's utter nonsense! The condition we're curing is indubitably a disease!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003620
text: Furthermore. The medicine we use is made from very precious ingredients.{nl}One does not use such a medicine on monsters like you did!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003621
text: Both you and Follower Clark ought to be ashamed!{nl}Thanks to you large amounts of the medicine were wasted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003622
text: Now, I need to make more medicine.{nl}I appreciate your help, but if you have no other business to attend to here, I suggest you leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003623
text: What happened with Follower Brutus?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003624
text: He sounds furious...{nl}But it's strange. Disease or curse, isn't it worth curing either way?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003625
text: This is all very suspicious.{nl}He's never told us what is in the medicine or how it is made, either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003626
text: I ought to find out more about this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003627
text: This altar is filled with what are clearly evil demon objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003628
text: Who could have guessed Brutus was a demon...?{nl}We must tell Deimantas about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003629
text: Follower Brutus always makes his medicine alone.{nl}We should follow him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003630
text: Will you come with me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003631
text: I can't believe Brutus was a real demon!{nl}You don't seem like the common folk either, from the way you defeated him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003632
text: This is grave, we have demons hiding among our Order.{nl}You don't suppose our chiefs will know about this...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003633
text: I would like to inspect the altar where he performed his ceremonies.{nl}But as you can see, this place is rather dark. I can't see very well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003634
text: I would like to ask.{nl}Would you gather some tree leaves we can use to make a fire?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003635
text: I'm in shock... wait, I need to think.{nl}I can't believe it... a demon...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003636
text: You brought the leaves. Thank you.{nl}Light them up so we can see better.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003637
text: I should be able to have a look now.{nl}Let's see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003638
text: I remember seeing these patterns before.{nl}I believe they were used for placing curses...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003639
text: Does this mean the disease was really a curse placed by Brutus?{nl}It would make sense.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003640
text: There's no doubt the demons are attempting to slander the order.{nl}They must be the reason behind the rumors.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003641
text: This is urgent, I need to return to the monastery immediately and alert the High Officers.{nl}Please tend to the other pilgrims meanwhile.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003642
text: Traveller. Did Follower Clark really leave?{nl}Myself and the other pilgrims haven't recovered, I don't think we can continue our journey just yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003643
text: {nl}We're worried about the monsters in this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003644
text: There's too monsters around for us to be safe.{nl}Did Follower Clark return yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003645
text: Follower Clark is late. What could have happened to him?{nl}Traveller. I'll ask you for one more favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003646
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll do my best to recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003647
text: Thank you.{nl}There still seems to be quite a lot of them around... but it's a little better than before.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003648
text: It feels a lot safer than before.{nl}We'll try to recover now, so we can carry on with our pilgrimage. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003649
text: Pilgrim Vados

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003650
text: We too are servants of the goddesses.{nl}We cannot ignore the murder of our clerics.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003651
text: Surely wise monks of Maven Abbey will give this soul a rightful judgment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003652
text: I have no reasons to doubt the monk.{nl}It's the demons who ought to be punished.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003653
text: The Tree of Truth you describe sounds very different from what I heard.{nl}They could very well be conspiring with the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003654
text: You ask why this monk is tied?{nl}We don't know if this person really is a monk, but in any case that does not concern you, does it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003655
text: Are you really that curious?{nl}Alright... Since you aksed, then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003656
text: We're pilgrims coming from Grynas Trails.{nl}We arrived here and, what do you know, we start to hear someone screaming!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003657
text: This is who we found when we followed the sound.{nl}The one dressed in monk garments was passed out on the ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003658
text: Isn't it obvious? This person murdered a monk.{nl}Would you not tie up a person suspected of murdering a cleric?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003659
text: We want to bring this person to the monastery and let them be judged there.{nl}The folk at the abbey will know what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003660
text: These people are misunderstanding me.{nl}I have no reasons to hurt one of the brothers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003661
text: I was the one who screamed!{nl}I'm a monk at Maven Abbey...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003662
text: The monastery is in chaos because of the Tree of Truth.{nl}So I escaped with my brother and we ended up in this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003663
text: And yet... My mistake was leaving my tired brother behind for a moment...{nl}I screamed when I returned to find them dead already...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003664
text: That's when these people arrived and took me for the criminal.{nl}Please, help me. I'm innocent, I swear!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003665
text: Well, you can listen to what this shameless criminal has to say if you want.{nl}But it will all be lies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003666
text: Please believe me!{nl}I did not hurt one of my brothers!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003667
text: These people are seriously misunderstanding the situation.{nl}Please help me clear things out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003668
text: I'm glad we clarified the situation.{nl}But the fact remains that something horrible happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003669
text: I'm worried for the safety of the other monks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003670
text: We have reasons to believe this person is the culprit.{nl}Try and convince the other pilgrims if you believe otherwise.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003671
text: If you can't prove that this person is innocent...{nl}We have no choice but to leave their faith up to the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003672
text: Do as you wish.{nl}The pilgrims over there know what they saw.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003673
text: I and the others all believe that person is a criminal.{nl}They claim to be innocent... but what would you expect a criminal to say?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003674
text: Revelator, please.{nl}Help me prove my innocence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003675
text: W-what? Now that's...{nl}Hm, I stil don't think...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003676
text: Alright, alright. I guess I was wrong.{nl}I apologize for being suspicious...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003677
text: I'm really sorry.{nl}It's the demons and the Tree of Truth who are wrong. We almost punished the wrong person.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003678
text: Pilgrim David

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003679
text: We had no choice but to assume he was the culprit.{nl}I believe Vados made the right decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003680
text: All circumstances point to him being the criminal, it's all very clear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003681
text: I feel extremely sorry for the monk.{nl}If only we had believe them this whole ordeal would never have been.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003682
text: It isn't right to suspect people at will, I understand that now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003683
text: I don't think that person is a real monk.{nl}He could just be pretending, couldn't he?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003684
text: {nl}If he was really a monk, would he have a way to prove it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003685
text: Then show us proof that this person is really a monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003686
text: They want proof... I suppose reciting the scriptures won't be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003687
text: {nl}I do have a rosary made at our monastery, however.{nl}It has my name engraved on it too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003688
text: {nl}I dropped the rosary when I was caught by the pilgrims.{nl}It should be near my luggage, at the Deveera Forest Road. Please find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003689
text: {nl}If I show them the rosary, it will prove to them that I am a monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003690
text: As expected, no proof that this person is a monk so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003691
text: You say this is his rosary?{nl}It's true, it has the name Dorma engraved in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003692
text: {nl}It really looks like he's a monk.{nl}But why would he harm another monk?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003693
text: Pilgrim Eli

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003694
text: Dares to impersonate a monk on top of that harming a monk? {nl}There is no need to go to the abbey. Let's go get him straight to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003695
text: All circumstances point to being guilty but still maintaining innocence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003696
text: A man can err. {nl}I am just glad all misunderstanding have been solved.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003697
text: I have been told that the Order of the Tree of Truth was a trusty organization showing the people a new way. {nl}But they were working with the demons all along. That is why you cannot trust heresays.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003698
text: I was the first founder of that person and the body together.{nl}I still believe that person is the perpetrator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003699
text: I even saw a bloody knife on his hand.{nl}A body and a man with a knife, what more solid evidence could you possibly want?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003700
text: Let's what kind ingenious excuses he is going to spout.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003701
text: I am innocent!{nl}I was merely examining the knife stuck inside my colleague.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003702
text: {nl}The demons that were following had a similar weapon...{nl}My colleague was struck by demons!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003703
text: There is one way to prove my innocence.{nl}Proving that the knife is indeed from demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003704
text: Please, find my luggage at Deveera Forest Road. In it, you will get Holy Water.{nl}Get that Holy Water to Vados and ask him to pour it on the knife.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003705
text: My luggage is located at the upper side of Deveera Forest Road. Please, find the Holy Water inside my luggage

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003706
text: This is the Holy Water that was in his luggage? {nl}Then, can we test if this is indeed a genuine article.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003707
text: Yes, that is a real one.{nl}Please, hand it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003708
text: Let us test the authenticity of the Holy Water.{nl}Please, sprinkle it on nearby Yellow Dumaros and observe their reactions.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003709
text: Sprinkle the Holy Water on Yellow Dumaros and see the results.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003710
text: As you wish, Vados.{nl}Those demons will surely show the effect.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003711
text: I am yet to be convinced whether this is real Holy Water or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003712
text: Hmm... the demons did react in an expected manner, right?{nl}Then now let us test his claim.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003713
text: Now, we will pour Holy Water unto the weapon this man was holding to see if this is a demonic weapon or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003714
text: {nl}But be warned, even if the weapon reacts, that would not be the end of it.{nl}He might be a demon himself and his current appearance might be just a disguise.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003715
text: {nl}We would have to make him drink it as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003716
