text: Uh, at least you are a monk.{nl}Please, pardon my previous insolence. That means this is a demon's doing after all?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003717
text: Now, all the suspicions Eli had have been resolved.{nl}But not all suspicions on him have been resolved yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003718
text: Pilgrim George

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003719
text: Monks usually do not venture outside the abbey.{nl}My suspicion is that why would you come to this place that is far away from the abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003720
text: Mere coincidences are not enough to explain the circumstances. Especially when the suspicion fits the circumstance so perfectly. {nl}I am still yet to be convinced of his innocence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003721
text: I was terribly mistaken.{nl}I should properly apologize to the monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003722
text: The circumstances be. It is for the best to figure out a way to get safely back with the monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003723
text: If I may speak of my suspicion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003724
text: {nl}Why would two monks travel to such a remote place.{nl}And at the time of the actual murder, why was he absent?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003725
text: {nl}I cannot help but to doubt his innocence.{nl}Why were they here and where was he at the time of the murder.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003726
text: Our abbey is in great peril.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003727
text: {nl}The Order of the Tree of Truth has came and is currently occupying the abbey.{nl}Furthermore, they forced us to be converted.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003728
text: {nl}Of course, we escaped to get help from outside.{nl}But then, the demons started to chase after us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003729
text: {nl}We barely escaped to this Sekta Forest. The escape was so sudden and harsh one and it took its toll on my brethren. He collapsed from hunger and thirst.{nl}That is why I was away; looking for something to eat and drink.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003730
text: {nl}I hope this sufficiently my story.{nl}Please, pass it on to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003731
text: To prove a monk's innocence, I request answers to my questions...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003732
text: I see. {nl}But words are not enough.{nl}I want to see something solid.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003733
text: That's all I can say.{nl}I am not sure whether he would believe it or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003734
text: Solid evidence? {nl}I don't know what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003735
text: {nl}Well, I did gather some plant roots as something to eat. {nl}While gathering, I did throw out the bad ones...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003736
text: {nl}Would that be enough?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003737
text: I am grateful for doing this for me.{nl}The location where I threw them away was Gingkaras Reed Field. Please search them in that vicinity.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003738
text: On Gingkaras Reed Field, there would be plant roots that it seemed unfit to eat.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003739
text: Were there any evidences to prove his alibi?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003740
text: Quite partially rotten. Very unfit to eat, indeed. But they do seem freshly dugged out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003741
text: {nl}I am convinced. I now believe what the monk had claimed.{nl}I should apologize to him properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003742
text: Yes, those are the rotten plant roots that I threw out.{nl}Please, prove my innocence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003743
text: We have been chased by the demons. {nl}But a strange thing was that they seemed to be intending to capture us rather than kill us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003744
text: They must have changed their attitude.{nl}Does this mean, they no longer see the need to convert us? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003745
text: I am only alive because I was away at the time. {nl}If I was with him, the same fate would have hit me as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003746
text: If what the monk has been telling is true. All the other monks are... {nl}We should eliminate the demons that are targeting the monks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003747
text: I have already forgotten and forgiven what happened.{nl}Forgiveness is the main virtue of a clergyman, after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003748
text: Anwyay, Vados seems to have something to speak to you about.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003749
text: I have a cunning plan.{nl}If the demons are still looking for the Monk, we could trap them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003750
text: Please, take the monk to Mova Wilderness.{nl}The demons, unaware of your true feats, will decide to attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003751
text: Your power would be more than enough to teach them who is the boss. {nl}We are counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003752
text: Vados seems to be thinking about something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003753
text: I knew you would help.{nl}As soon as you are ready, get going with the monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003754
text: I have heard from Vados about the plan.{nl}When you are ready, shall we?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003755
text: As soon as they show their ugly heads in Mova Wilderness, strike them down at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003756
text: Good work.{nl}We have been thinking. We will follow the monk's advice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003757
text: The pilgrimage ends here and we will get back to Klaipeda.{nl}You should get to safety as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003758
text: Thanks to you, Revelator, all the troubles and toils I was in have been resolved.{nl}I cannot thank you enough for this. The goddess shall present you with the appropriate grace to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003759
text: You've eliminated all the demons that were after the monk? Impressive to say the least.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003760
text: The name 'Revelator' is not in vain, I suppose.{nl}Getting rid of the demons assassins just like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003761
text: I have heard that you have defeated the demons that were after the monk.{nl}It must have been hard work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003762
text: I came to realize that you are a great person. Seeing how much you have done to prove the monk's innocence {nl}Well, if it is not too much to ask, I have a favor to ask of you, would that be alright with you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003763
text: Well, our way back is filled with monsters now. {nl}Vados says we can avoid them but I am worried.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003764
text: Could you defeat nearby monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003765
text: I cannot deny that it is quite disappointing. We have come this far. {nl}However, nothing is more valuable to life, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003766
text: Thank you so much.{nl}Goddess is looking after you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003767
text: That's not good.{nl}Looking at our stock, our food supply is sure to run out on the way back.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003768
text: I am so ashamed to ask you this but... there is no other way.{nl}Could you get us some Lepusbunny Meat to replenish our food supply?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003769
text: I really appreciate your help.{nl}We only planned and stocked for the trip to the abbey...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003770
text: Demon Meat is unsuitable for consumption.{nl}The only option is meat from nearby Lepusbunny.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003771
text: I think we have enough for all of us. {nl}My heart is filled with gratitude.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003772
text: The teachings of the goddesses is based on mercy. {nl}If there is an exception, that would apply to the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003773
text: Not only took my brethren's life but tried to harm me as well.{nl}This wrath I feel... I think even the goddesses would forgive me on this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003774
text: I beseech you.{nl}Please, show those demons the retribution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003775
text: Thank you. {nl}The nearby demons are Yellow Dumaros.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003776
text: They seem like mere beasts but they are demons after all. So, please be vigilant. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003777
text: Thank you. {nl}I am eternally in your debt.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003778
text: Thank you.{nl}I thought I was going to get captured.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003779
text: I am a librarian from Maven the Great Abbey.{nl}But now the Great Abbey is occupied by the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003780
text: We had to ask the help from Klaipeda in order to save the abbey.{nl}If the Revelators were there, things would have been different.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003781
text: Please.{nl}Escort me to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003782
text: My words... you are the Revelator? {nl}O, the goddesses have not forsaken me! {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003783
text: I beseech thee.{nl}Save our abbey...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003784
text: Please, Revelator.{nl}Even as we speak our brethrens and sistrens are suffering. Help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003785
text: Why would they want to occupy the abbey even going as far as framing us. I cannot even begin to fathom their reason{nl}They do worship the goddesses just like us. Why so hostile?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003786
text: Well, I believe it was a week ago.{nl}The Order of the Tree of Truth started to gather in front the abbey.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003787
text: They claimed we have been working alongside the demons. Such false accusation! {nl}Of course, we denied such ridiculous claim but they didn't listen...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003788
text: A female believer from the Order claimed that she can prove our allegiance with the demons.{nl}From the looks of her, she must hold an important position in the Order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003789
text: She casted an incantation...{nl}And one of our brethrens turned into a demons. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003790
text: That must have be a visual trickery. {nl}The brethren was born in the abbey and have been raised there his entire life.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003791
text: The reaction from the Order Believers when they saw it was explosive.{nl}Within just few minutes, they began to drive us out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003792
text: Many of my monk brothers and sisters have ran away or have been captured.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003793
text: Only a handful of brethrens including me managed to escape... {nl}I am deathly worried about all of them. I have no way knowing what happened to the others.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003794
text: I know it is a vain struggle but... {nl}I did attempt to rescue the captured brethrens.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003795
text: The gate of the Abbey was shut tight. There was no way in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003796
text: All I have left to trust is you Revelator.{nl}Please, save our brethrens and... the abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003797
text: By the looks of it, mosts ofthe Believers are being duped by the higher ups...{nl}I believe they are innocent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003798
text: There are 3 high-ranked officers in that Order.{nl}If we can expose their true motives, the Believers will see the truth about us as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003799
text: I believe they are in the abbey...{nl}A man called Domantas lead the Believers to this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003800
text: They seemed to be looking for a way to lure pilgrims to the abbey in...{nl}First, we capture Domantas and figure out our way in the Abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003801
text: They accused us of being demons... {nl}But I sensed the demon in them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003802
text: There must be demons among them. {nl}The officers and executives, most likely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003803
text: If we can expose the true identity of Domantas, people will listen.{nl}I have something to test out. Could you help me on that?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003804
text: A long time ago, there was a holy monk famous for defeating demons.{nl}He died a martyr fighting demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003805
text: We never recovered the body but we placed the keepsake and made a grave.{nl}Among them, there are two devices that can determine a demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003806
text: One of them is an orb that only attacks demons...{nl}The other is a mirror that shows the true self.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003807
text: Having at least one of them can show their true faces.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003808
text: It is very blasphemous but... {nl}At this time, there is no other way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003809
text: The monk's grave is one of the four grave in Ketra Cemetry.{nl}Please, retrieve the keepsake that I have told you about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003810
text: The orb is broken... {nl}But fortunately, the mirror seems fully intact.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003811
text: According to the records, the mirror exposes the target's true identity.{nl}But it has been underground for so long, there is little juice left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003812
text: Could you help me recharge the mirror?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003813
text: Let's try the lifeforce from nearby monsters.{nl}The mirror will automatically absorb the monster's lifeforce, when it falls.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003814
text: This is our only opportunity, please, fill it up with power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003815
text: Thank heavens! The mirror is full of juice now.{nl}The only thing left to do is to lure Domantas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003816
text: Tired Pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003817
text: The people from the Order what they say is enticing but...{nl}Why can't we enter the abbey...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003818
text: The Order is right! Always! {nl}If it weren't for them, we would have been supper for monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003819
text: Leaving the holy object like that is wrong for the Order...{nl}The least we could do is to build a shrine and pray to it...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003820
text: Is there any meaning to Maven Abbey?{nl}This place is a true holy place for goddeses who visit us every night...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003821
text: High Officer Domantas or one of the subordinates must be a demon in disguise.{nl}The problem is they don't stay in one place for long..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003822
text: We need to lure Domantas in.{nl}Perhaps, the Pilgrim Camp down there...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003823
text: I have seen Domantas and the believers of the Order preaching to the pilgrims.{nl}Let's go to the camp and figure out the way to lure Domantas in.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003824
text: Thank you. {nl}The nearby monsters are quite hostile so we'd better be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003825
text: Urgh, strangely, I feel very tired and worn out.{nl}Could this be the doings of the Order?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003826
text: That's bizarre... {nl}The moment we got here, I feel light-headed and cannot think straight...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003827
text: I am weakened now... but I must protect the abbey...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003828
text: Could you look into this phenomenon? My body is not ready nor responding well {nl}How about you, Revelator? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003829
text: Perhaps, could you ask pilgrims around to see what is going on?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003830
text: Thank you...{nl}Please, listen to the people here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003831
text: My body is getting heavier by the minute.{nl}What is going on...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003832
text: It's becoming more difficult to think... I can feel it...{nl}Alright, let's summarize...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003833
text: The black crystal in the shrine erected in Shinikti Vacant Lot is said to be casting out monsters.{nl}The Order of the Tree of Truth claimed that this is a holy object and the drowsiness one feels is the blessings from the Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003834
text: And by every night, it turns to the goddess?{nl}I'm getting curious.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003835
text: The black crystal is very valuable to the Order. {nl}If we break it, Domantas is sure to come.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003836
text: Please.{nl}Destroy the black crystal...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003837
text: If you think about it, leaving such an important artifact undefended must mean, it is hard to destroy.{nl}If it is demon-made, surely the divine power can break it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003838
text: Please, take my rosary.{nl}Its divine power will weaken the crystal. If so, it will become breakable.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003839
text: Please, place my rosary in front of the black crystal and destroy the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003840
text: Thank you, I feel much better.{nl}Just as I expected, the believers of the Order will come out to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003841
text: The true face of the Order is slowly getting revealed.{nl}The truth shall soon be known.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003842
text: What was that black crystal?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003843
text: The campside is quite noisy.{nl}They must be coming.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003844
text: {nl}I will expose the demon with the mirror. I leave the rest up to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003845
text: Revelator, you are amazing!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003846
text: Since Domantas is a demon, it is most likely that the other officers are demons too.{nl}Especially, Deimantas the one who leads.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003847
text: Now, we'd better prepare to get inside the abbey...{nl}I don't have the key. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003848
text: We must find the one who handles the keys of the abbey.{nl}He ran in direction of Oasseu Memorial. Better find him there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003849
text: I'll meet you there.{nl}Please come to the Oasseu Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003850
text: Even this place was taken by the Order and Demons.{nl}What do you think they were trying to do here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003851
text: There is a legend stating that the Oasseu Tree had been planted by Maven.{nl}Maybe that's why the Oasseu Tree didn't harm people even on Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003852
text: You're here.{nl}I couldn't find the Brother... who managed the keys.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003853
text: I'm worried that he's been taken by the demons.{nl}There... there is also a strange feeling about this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003854
text: This is a place where the holiest have been buried.{nl}That's why it was always filled with divine power... But I can't feel any of it now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003855
text: I think that we'll need to find out what happened.{nl}Then we can go look for the Brother.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003856
text: Thank you.{nl}Please check to see if there is anything amiss at the Hermit's Tomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003857
text: What happened...{nl}I can't even imagine what they were after.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003858
text: A strange device is emitting a dark energy?{nl}I see... The Order must be suppressing the divine power with that device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003859
text: I don't know what the Order of the Tree of Truth is after...{nl}But I suspect that this place has also been taken over by the Order,{nl} and the Brother must have been taken by them as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003860
text: Let's lure them out as we did before.{nl}I'm sure the Order will appear if we destroy their devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003861
text: If we think about the Black Crystal at Rasvoy Lake...{nl}I think the divine power will be enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003862
text: Take this bottle and go to the Oasseu Tree.{nl}It grew under the influence of the divine power for a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003863
text: Spray the Order's Device with the Tree's Sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003864
text: Please get some of the Oasseu Tree's Sap and spray it on the Divine Power Suppression Devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003865
text: Have you destroyed the Device?{nl}I can feel the divine power returning to this region...{nl} I don't think the Order has noticed yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003866
text: Let's keep trying.{nl}There must be another device since the divine power hasn't fully returned.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003867
text: This is the abbey's land and in turn the Order's land as the abbey is now under our influence.{nl}Please do not disturb us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003868
text: People cannot endure times like these with contemporary beliefs.{nl}Yes... Maybe the goddesses wanted you to follow the Order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003869
text: The next place where a device might be...{nl}It will probably be near the tomb at Rijekavi Fields.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003870
text: I hope I am right...{nl}Could you please destroy another Device to try and lure the people from the Order?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003871
text: The plan is the same as before.{nl}Gather Sap from the Oasseu Tree and spray it on the Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003872
text: I hope we will be able to find the Brother this time...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003873
text: Halt! Was it you?{nl}Are you the one that has been destroying the Order's Holy Devices?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003874
text: I don't know what you are up to, but you had better stop.{nl}This is the holy ground of Maven Abbey!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003875
text: Please do not handle the devices if you are not from the abbey or the Order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003876
text: Wait... Did you just say Stella?{nl}I don't know where you heard that name, but she can't be alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003877
text: I saw her being chased by Demons with my own two eyes!{nl}Do not dare to defile the name of the deceased.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003878
text: I don't know who the imposter is, but she cannot be alive.{nl}I wish to see for myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003879
text: Take me to this person who you call Stella.{nl}You cannot touch the device before that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003880
text: I am sad to hear that we have lost the Brother...{nl} But we have someone within the Order that can help us.{nl}We have to hurry if it is only for the Brother who is now back with the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003881
text: Thank you.{nl}I will pray that you will be well rewarded for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003882
text: Don't you think that you should learn more about the Order instead of simply being hostile towards it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003883
text: Those Devices must all be destroyed.{nl}If only for the Brother who is no longer with us...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003884
text: I cannot forgive the Order.{nl}Please return to Rijekavi Fields once more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003885
text: You already know the location, correct?{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003886
text: How could they do this?{nl}The Order... How...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003887
text: Good job.{nl}Things seem to be going extremely well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003888
text: Come to think of it...{nl}I think it would be better if we do not destroy any more of the devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003889
text: That's strange...{nl}I can't seem to find High Officer Medea anywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003890
text: Are you sure you will be okay on your own?{nl}Don't you think we'll need more help to retake the abbey?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003891
text: I will watch Medea so that she can't go anywhere.{nl}She won't be able to escape the magic circle as long as she's human.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003892
text: Revelator, I leave the fate of the abbey in your hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003893
text: Re... Revelator...{nl}She... has escaped... Ugh...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003894
text: Ah... That is correct. {nl}Of course you could also stop their plans by destroying the device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003895
text: But don't you think that it is a bit wasteful to do so?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003896
text: At times like these... It is sometimes better to use their powers against them.{nl}With these magic scrolls.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003897
text: This Scroll allows you to transfrom all energies into divine power.{nl}You will be able to use this scroll to make the Divine Power Suppression Device release large amount of divine power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003898
text: You will help me of course... won't you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003899
text: I was certain that you would help me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003900
text: What are you doing?{nl}Hurry to Krasjia Hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003901
text: Ah, Revelator.{nl}I can't seem to find Medea anywhere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003902
text: By the way, how many devices have you destroyed?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003903
text: What? {nl}Stella gave you those Scrolls to use on the device?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003904
text: That's odd.{nl}Of course Stella is the abbey's librarian so she would know Scrolls that I don't know about but..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003905
text: I haven't heard anything about such Scrolls.{nl}I'm suspicious but... She should know better...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003906
text: However, I think you should take some Oasseu Tree Sap just in case.{nl}Just in case.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003907
text: Have you still not started on your journey?{nl}You have to hurry to stop the Order's scheme.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003908
text: I hope I'm worrying about nothing but..{nl}Remember to take the Oasseu Tree Sap just in case.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003909
text: I don't have anything else.{nl}I surrender.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003910
text: {nl}The only ability I have is to show illusions you know.{nl}I'll tell you anything you want so please go easy on me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003911
text: Impressive. Now what are you going to do to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003912
text: What do you think I'll be able to do in this situation?{nl}Relax.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003913
text: Is this how you learned to treat the defenseless? How rude.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003914
text: Restraints, a Magic Circle and a guard..?{nl}You don't have to fear me so much you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003915
text: Wait a second. {nl}Please don't think I'm on the same level as Deimantas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003916
text: I am a human. {nl}You won't hurt another human would you now?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003917
text: I'll tell you where Stella is as well as hand over the Abbey key if you let me go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003918
text: Is there someone else that will guard me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003919
text: Fine, whatever.{nl}Then let's go meet him then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003920
text: I never imagined that you'd capture Medea. {nl}You are more capable than I had thought.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003921
text: I'll restrain her so she won't be able to run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003922
text: Medea! What did you do to Stella?{nl}If anything has happened to her, I don't know what I'll do!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003923
text: Let's see...{nl}All I did was to have her captured and taken to the vacent lot left of Stjeva Intersection.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003924
text: How would I know if something has happened to her since then?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003925
text: Are you sure you can trust this guard?{nl}I don't know. I don't trust him too much but... Fine, have it your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003926
text: Revelator! {nl} Stella seems to be held near Stjeva Intersection.{nl}Please save her! I'll stand guard here to make sure that nothing happens!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003927
text: Please!{nl}I'll be watching Medea.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003928
text: Stella might be suffering a great deal even at this moment!{nl}Please hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003929
text: I don't know what the demon might be doing to her.{nl}You might want to hurry you know?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003930
text: Thank you, Revelator...{nl}I don't know how many times you've saved my life...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003931
text: After you went to Rijekavi Fields, I suddenly couldn't see anything...{nl}When I woke up, I had already been captured...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003932
text: We don't have time for this. We have to go and retake the abbey!{nl}I'll see you at the base of the Oasseu Tree!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003933
text: Now that you have the key, all that is left is to take care of Medea before going to the abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003934
text: I thought all of the Order's high officers were demons after seeing Domantas...{nl}I never thought that there would be people that had volunteered to help the demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003935
text: Now we have to retake the abbey.{nl}Medea will manage to escape if we just leave her like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003936
text: I just thought of a good idea.{nl}I'm thinking of creating a Restrainment Magic Circle with the remaining power of the Divine Power Suppression Device Fragments.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003937
text: If I use the power remaining in the fragments... {nl}I'm sure we'll be able to hold Medea until we retake the abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003938
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I don't know what would have happened if I had not met you...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003939
text: The Divine Power Suppression Device was at the Hermit's Tomb, Rijekavi Fields and Krasjia Hill.{nl}Please get two fragments from each place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003940
text: Please help me prepare to activate the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003941
text: She first asks you to destroy them and now she wants you to gather their Fragments.{nl}Isn't she being to demanding just because you're a Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003942
text: {nl}You won't have to do anything of the sort if you help me out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003943
text: The preparations are complete. Go and tell Sister Stella that the magic circle is ready to be activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003944
text: Remote Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003945
text: Maven prophesized that this road will always be threatened by the demons.{nl}I now go to rest after completing my mission but am worried about who will now stop the Demon threat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003946
text: If someone honorable happens to pass and defeat the demons{nl}they will have my enternal thanks even if I had returned to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003947
text: A warm light emits from the tomb as if to give a blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003948
text: After talking to Brother Mattas, it seems as if the abbey is in more trouble than I had thought.{nl}There are even demons and monsters roaming around inside.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003949
text: Please deal with the monsters in front of the abbey.{nl}I'll wait for the chance to open the doors.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003950
text: I won't be able to open the doors until there are less monsters.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003951
text: I was able to hear some information from Medea.{nl}It seems as if High Officer Deimantas is at the Hall of Honor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003952
text: It seems like they have raised a Barrier and are defiling the Divine Power of the abbey to use as their own.{nl}Of course, we can't believe Medea's word at face value, so we'll have to check for ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003953
text: We won't be able to stop High Officer Deimantas if we don't break this barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003954
text: We also have to save the others that have been captured... I keep getting nervous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003955
text: We'll have to see what type of barrier it is first.{nl}Could you please get me to the Barrier?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003956
text: Shall we?{nl}Please be careful of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003957
text: Ah... It seems like Medea was telling the truth afterall.{nl}We'll have to find a way to get through here in order to stop Deimantas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003958
text: I remember seeing a Ancient Book about Demon Barriers.{nl}Could you please protect me while a look for it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003959
text: I found it!{nl}But... I'll need some time while I look for where the information about this particular barrier is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003960
text: I'll try to find it as fast as I can, but please keep the Demons off of me one more time.{nl}I'm counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003961
text: It took longer than I thought because the information was in the latter half of the book.{nl}All we have left is to get rid of this barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003962
text: First, we need something to hold the divine power.{nl}Could you get an Orb from beneath the Stoup while I finish the spell?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003963
text: I'll be completing the spell here as is mentioned in the book.{nl}May the goddesses bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003964
text: Just a second... This is an extremely complicated spell...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003965
text: Yes. This orb should do nicely.{nl}The spell is just about ready as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003966
text: Now we have to gather the divine power in this orb.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003967
text: Maybe the Central Fountain... {nl}There may be some divine power there even if Deimantas is trying to use all of the divine power in the abbey.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003968
text: Of course I'll do the gathering.{nl}Just take me to the Central Fountain in once piece.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003969
text: They have become too weak to even wimper.{nl}We need to help them recover their strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003970
text: The only reason I was able to save them is thanks to you Revelator.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003971
text: It's finished!{nl}Now let's go and find Deimantas!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003972
text: Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003973
text: Finally... The abbey has been retaken from the grasp of the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}This was all possible thanks to you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003974
text: I saw the barrier on the upper rooms disappear as soon as Deimantas was defeated.{nl}I went there because I suspected that there may be some of my captured colleagues and there they were..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003975
text: I'm worried because their condition is far weaker than I thought.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003976
text: My goodness... I shudder to think what they must have gone through.{nl}We have to get something for them to eat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003977
text: I think Stew would be best since they haven't had anything for a while.{nl}Please look for anything edible left in the pantry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003978
text: Please hurry back.{nl}I'll be getting the water ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003979
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth wouldn't have use or tossed all of the food in the abbey.{nl}Especially not if they were thinking of using this place as their headquarters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003980
text: Thank you!{nl}I'll get the Stew ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003981
text: Could you please get some medicine while I get the Stew ready?{nl}There should still be some herbs in the corner of the Lower Prayer Room stashed away for emergencies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003982
text: All three of the lower rooms were used as Prayer Rooms.{nl}At least they used to...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003983
text: Thank you.{nl}I see there were still some usable herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003984
text: We wouldn't have been able to drive off the Order of the Tree of Truth without you.{nl}Even if Klaipeda had managed to send some soldiers to help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003985
text: There are still too many Demons left in the Abbey.{nl}My colleagues... I know I have been asking for a lot of help, but could you please deal with the Demon stragglers?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003986
text: Thank you.{nl}Please get rid of as many Demons as you can in the Abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003987
text: They are all too weak.{nl}It will be a massacre if the Demons decide to attack at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003988
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I'll be praying that the Demons don't decide to attack at once until my colleagues have recovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003989
text: Revelation Guardian Zanas(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003990
text: Revelation Guardian Zanas(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003991
text: Say that you will go and receive the Protection Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003992
text: Say that you do not believe him

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003993
text: Revelation Guardian Zanas(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003994
text: Say that you will get the Teal Magic Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003995
text: Say that you do not need such things

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003996
text: Bloody Magic Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003997
text: Say that you will gather Demon Blood

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003998
text: Say that you cannot do such things

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_003999
text: How to beat stronger foes(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004000
text: Say that you will retrieve the Magic Control Scrolls

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004001
text: Say that you do not need such things

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004002
text: How to beat stronger foes(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004003
text: Say that you will inscribe their magi

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004004
text: Argue that you can go to Mandara now

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004005
text: How to beat stronger foes(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004006
text: Say that you will defeat Mandara

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004007
text: Say that you need some more time

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004008
text: Dominance Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004009
text: Go to the Subsidiary Material Storage Room's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004010
text: Say that you do not need such things

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004011
text: Visiting Room Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004012
text: Ask if it isn't dangerous

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004013
text: Say that you don't know what he's talking about

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004014
text: Another Soul of Zanas(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004015
text: Say that you think it's a good idea

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004016
text: Another Soul of Zanas(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004017
text: Say that it is nonsense

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004018
text: Preparing for the worst

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004019
text: Show the Teal Magic Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004020
text: Argue that this is merely complicating things

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004021
text: Storage Lamp(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004022
text: Say that you will light the Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004023
text: Say that you have no idea what the instructions mean

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004024
text: Storage Lamp(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004025
text: Examining Blue Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004026
text: The Blue Lamp doesn't have any Oil{nl}Gather Oil for it from the nearby Oil Pouches

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004027
text: Lighting Blue Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004028
text: You have lit the Blue Lamp{nl}Look for the Red Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004029
text: Storage Lamp(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004030

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004303
text: Say that you cannot beleive what they are saying

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004304
text: Rescuing The Captured Stella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004305
text: Say that it won't be a problem because she's a hostage

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004306
text: Restraining the Criminal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004307
text: Say that you will retrieve the Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004308
text: Say that you do not think the Fragments will be in usable shape

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004309
text: The Wishes of the Deceased

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004310
text: Swear that you will deal with the Demons in the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004311
text: Keep on going

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004312
text: Clearing up

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004313
text: Ask them to follow you as soon as possible

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004314
text: Argue that you should move together and don't move

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004315
text: The enemy is also preparing

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004316
text: See for yourself

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004317
text: Say that you will do that

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004318
text: Say that you do not wish to go any further

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004319
text: Treasure Trove of Knowledge

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004320
text: Say that you will hurry to the library

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004321
text: Ask if she can't look for the book on her own

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004322
text: Reading Time

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004323
text: Ask that she hurry

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004324
text: Ask if she can't hide somewhere while she reads

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004325
text: To each his own

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004326
text: Say that it isn't too difficult

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004327
text: Say that going together really seems like the better idea

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004328
text: Gathering Divine Power

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004329
text: Say that you'll handle the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004330
text: Ask if the Divine Power won't defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004331
text: Taking Down The Last Executive

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004332
text: Say that you it's time to finish this

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004333
text: Slow Recovery

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004334
text: Say that you'll try to find things that aren't spoiled

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004335
text: Say that you are doubtful if there will be anything worthy of consumption

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004336
text: For Times Like These

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004337
text: Say that you will hurry and bring the needed goods

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004338
text: Say that you think you should monitor the situation a while

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004339
text: The Enemies That Remain

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004340
text: Say that you'll finish the job

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004341
text: Revelation Guardian Zanas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004342
text: Listen to the Soul's voice

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004343
text: There is a mysterious light in the air. Go closer to check what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004344
text: Search for the source of the voice

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004345
text: You hear the voice of someone looking for you from the mysterious light. Look for where it is coming from.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004346
text: Talk to Zanas' Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004347
text: The source of the voice was Zanas' Soul. Listen to what Zanas' Soul has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004348
text: Complete the Protection Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004349
text: Zanas' Soul says that you require Protection Magic that will protect you from the Demon Barrier. Go to the Protection Magic Circle in the Interrogation Room and complete the Protection Magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004350
text: Report back to Zanas' Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004351
text: The Protection Magic has been completed. Return to Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004352
text: You have successfully completed the Protection Magic. Talk to Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004353
text: Search for the Teal Magic Stone on the back of the Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004354
text: Zanas' Soul says that you should obtain the Teal Magic Stone which will allow you to contact him without alerting the Demons. Look for the Teal Magic Stone on the back of the Visiting Room Tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004355
text: Report back to Zanas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004356
text: You have found the Teal Magic Stone. Listent to Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004357
text: Search for %s on the back of the Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004358
text: Talk to Zanas' Soul about what to do next now that you have the Teal Magic Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004359
text: Obtain Kalejimas Demon Blood by defeating Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004360
text: Zanas' Soul wishes to mix Demon energy into the Teal Magic Stone to avoid suspicion. Defeat Demons to obtain Kalejimas Demon Blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004361
text: Give it to Zanas' Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004362
text: You have collected enough Kalejimas Demon Blood. Take it to Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004363
text: Obtain %s by defeating Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004364
text: How to beat stronger foes

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004365
text: You have mixed Demon energy into the Teal Magic Stone to avoid suspicion. Listen to what Zanas has to say about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004366
text: Disarm the Isolated Area's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004367
text: Zanas' Soul says that you require Kalejimas Magic Control Scrolls to defeat the Demon Mandara guarding the Visiting Room. Match the lights to the same color when they appear after you activate the Isolated Area's Secret Device. You will be able to obtain the Magic Control Scroll once the Secret Device is disarmed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004368
text: You have found the Magic Control Scroll. Talk to Zanas' Soul with the Teal Magic Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004369
text: Obtain %s by disarming the Isolated Area's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004370
text: Use the Teal Magic Stone to call Zanas' Soul and listen about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004371
text: Regsiter Demon Magic on the Magic Control Scroll

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004372
text: Zanas' Soul says that you need to inscribe the magic you wish to control on the Magic Control Scroll. Defeat Demons to inscribe their magic onto the Magic Control Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004373
text: You have successfully inscribed Demon Magic on the Magic Control Scroll. Use the Teal Magic Stone to call Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004374
text: You have successfully inscribed Demon Magic on the Magic Control Scroll. Use the Teal Magic Stone to call Zanas' Soul and ask if you can now defeat Mandara.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004375
text: Zanas' Soul says that you should now defeat Mandara who is guarding the Kalejimas Visiting Room. Find Mandara in the Offender Institution and use the Magic Control Scroll to reduce the power of the Barrier and defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004376
text: You have defeated Mandara. Tell Zanas' Soul by using the Teal Magic Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004377
text: Us the Teal Magic Stone to call Zanas' Soul and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004378
text: Disarm the Secret Device to obtain the Dominance Magic Orb in the Subsidiary Material Storage Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004379
text: Zanas' Soul says that you have to use Dominance Magic to disarm the Demon Barrier. Disarm the Subsidiary Material Storage Room's Secret Device to find the Dominance Magic Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004380
text: You have obtained the Dominance Magic Orb. Tell this fact to Zanas' Soul by using the Teal Magic Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004381
text: Obtain %s by disarming the Subsidiary Material Storage Room's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004382
text: Move to the Demon Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004383
text: Zanas' Soul says that it will disarm the Demon Barrier with Dominance Magic. Go to the Demon Barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004384
text: Another Soul of Zanas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004385
text: Talk to the Zanas' Soul in Storage

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004386
text: You have disarmed the Demon Barrier in the Kalejimas Visiting Room. Talk to Zanas' Soul in Storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004387
text: Collect Evil Energy Cores by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004388
text: Zanas' Soul says that you require two different types of power. Collect Evil Energy Cores by defeating monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004389
text: You have gathered all of the Evil Energy Cores. Return to Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004390
text: Ask Zanas' Soul where you should go with the Evil Energy Cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004391
text: Free the hiding Soul of Zanas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004392
text: You must input different energies into each side of the Secret Device in Warehouse No. 3. Place your energy and the eveil energy on either side of the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004393
text: Talk to Zanas' Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004394
text: You have taken out Zanas' Soul that had been hiding in the Secret Device. Talk to Zanas' Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004395
text: Ask what Zanas' Soul can remember.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004396
text: Search for Kalejimas Secret Device Instructions

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004397
text: Zanas' Soul remembers where the instructions for the Secret Devices are hidden. Find the Kalejimas Secret Device Instructions by shining the Teal Magic Stone on the boxes in Warehouse No. 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004398
text: You have found the Kalejimas Secret Device Instructions. Talk to Zanas' Soul at Central Assembly Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004399
text: Search for %s in the box at Warehouse No. 2

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004400
text: Storage Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004401
text: You have obtained the instructions for the Kalejimas Secret Device. Ask Zanas' Spirit which Device needs to be activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004402
text: Look for the Blue Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004403
text: Zanas' Spirit says that you must recover four King's Jewels. Look for the first Blue Lamp in order to disarm the Device in which the King's Jewel is hidden.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004404
text: Check the Blue Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004405
text: You have found the Blue Lamp. See if you can light it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004406
text: Retrieve Oil from the nearby Oil Pouch for the Blue Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004407
text: How to activate the Blue Lamp : You need special Oil to light the Blue Lamp. Oil needed to light the Blue Lamp is always nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004408
text: Give the Blue Lamp Oil

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004409
text: You have enough Oil for the Blue Lamp. Light the Blue Lamp after Oiling it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004410
text: Obtain %s from the nearby Oil Pouch

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004411
text: Check the Red Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004412
text: You have found the Red Lamp. See if you can light it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004413
text: Retrieve Oil for the Red Lamp by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004414
text: How to activate the Red Lamp : You need special Oil to light the Red Lamp. Monsters like the smell of the Red Lamp's Oil.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004415
text: Give the Red Lamp Oil

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004416
text: You have gathered enough Oil for the Red Lamp. Light it after giving it enough Oil.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004417
text: Defeat nearby monsters to retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004418
text: You have lit both Lamps. Return to Zanas' Spirit and ask about the location of the last Lamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004419
text: Activate all of the Yellow Lamp's Magic Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004420
text: How to activate the Yellow Lamp : You must activate all of the Magic Circle to light the Yellow Lamp. First activate the Yellow Lamp to send magic to the Magic Circles and control them to activate it. Activating a Magic Circle will affect the nearby Circles and cause them to either be turned on or off.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004421
text: Light the Yellow Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004422
text: All Magic Circles have been activated. Light the Yellow Lamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004423
text: All Lamps have been lit. Return to Zanas' Spirit and ask about the location of the King's Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004424
text: Move to the Secret Device of Warehouse No. 1

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004425
text: King's Red Jewel is hidden within the Secret Device at Warehouse No. 1. Go to Warehouse No. 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004426
text: Obtain the King's Red Jewel from the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004427
text: Defeat the monsters near the Secret Device. Obtain the King's Red Jewel from the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004428
text: Storage Room Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004429
text: You have obtained the King's Red Jewel. Return to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004430
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to Warehouse No. 4

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004431
text: Zanas' Spirit says that you must disarm the Demon Barrier at the Storage Room. Defeat the monsters on the way there to allow Zanas' Spirit safe passage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004432
text: You have defeated enough monsters on the way. Now go to the the Demon Barrier at Warehouse No. 4.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004433
text: Who am I

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004434
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit at the Solitary Cells

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004435
text: Zanas' Spirit wishes to go to the Solitary Cells. Go and talk to him there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004436
text: Defeat the Demons near the Hanging Room's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004437
text: In order to use the Illusion Magic with the Hanging Room's Secret Device, you must register the magic of the Demon to be used in the illusion. Defeat Red Socket Mages near the Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004438
text: Activate the Secret Device in the Hanging Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004439
text: The Hanging Room's Secret Device has registered the Red Socket Mage's magic. Activate the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004440
text: Defeat %s near the Hanging Room's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004441
text: Listen to information from the Red Socket Mage in the Solitary Cell

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004442
text: You will appear as a colleague to the other Demons thanks to the help of illusion magic. Listen to the Red Socket Mage for information in the Solitary Cell.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004443
text: You have gained much information from the Demons. Return to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004444
text: Tell Zanas' Spirit about the information you have gained from the Demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004445
text: Obtain Grinende Seal's by defeating the Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004446
text: It seems as if you require Grinende Seal's to disarm the Demon Magic Circles. Defeat the Demons to obtain Grinende Seals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004447
text: You have obtained Grinende Seals. Return to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004448
text: Obtain %s by defeating Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004449
text: Prison Movement

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004450
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit about what to do next now that you have obtained the Grinende Seals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004451
text: Obtain Kalejimas Teleportation Scrolls from the Prisoner Waiting Room's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004452
text: It is said the scrolls that allow you to teleport within the Kalejimas Prison are in the Prisoner Waiting Room's Secret Device. Disarm the Secret Device to obtain the Kalejimas Teleportation Scrolls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004453
text: You have disarmed the Secret Device and gained the Kalejimas Teleportation Scrolls. Return to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004454
text: Obtain %s from the Secret Device in the Prisoner Waiting Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004455
text: Things seem to be going well. Talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004456
text: Use the Kalejimas Teleportation Scroll

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004457
text: Move to the Long Sentence Prison Cell by using the Kalejimas Teleportation Scrolls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004458
text: Activate the Secret Device in the Long Sentence Prison Cell

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004459
text: You have safely arrived at the Long Sentence Prison Cell by using Kalejimas Teleportation Scrolls. Activate the Long Sentence Prison Cell's Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004460
text: Lure the monsters near the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004461
text: Long Sentence Prison Cell Defensive Device : It attacks approaching enemies with a strong magical attack once activated. It will stop after a time but it can be reused without any special conditions.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004462
text: Disarm Grinende's Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004463
text: Disarm Grinende's Magic Circle in the Common Room by using Grinende Seals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004464
text: Grinende appears as soon as you disarm his Magic Circle. Defeat Grinende.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004465
text: Go talk to Zanas' Spirit since you have defeated Grinende.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004466
text: Zanas' Spirit seems to be able to move more easily now that Grinende has been defeated. Talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004467
text: Defeat the Demon stragglers in the Solitary Cells

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004468
text: All that is left now are stragglers since you've defeated Grinende. Defeat the Demons in the Solitary Cells so they won't interrupt you while trying to obtain the King's Jewels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004469
text: Now there aren't too many stragglers. Return to Zanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004470
text: It is now time to obtain the second King's Jewel. Go and ask Zanas about the King's Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004471
text: Disarm the Regular Prison Cell's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004472
text: Regular Prison Cell's Secret Device : Enfuse magic into all six Crystals. You must enfuse magic into all of the Crystals while they are still shining. This will disarm the Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004473
text: Obtain the King's Green Jewel from the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004474
text: You have disarmed the Regular Prison Cell's Secret Device. Take the King's Green Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004475
text: You have obtained the King's Green Jewel. Now go to the Demon Barrier at the Reintegration Workshop.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004476
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit at the Reintegration Workshop

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004477
text: You have disarmed the Demon Barrier at the Solitary Cells. Go and talk to Zanas' Spirit at the Workshop.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004478
text: You cannot proceed because of Demon Magic. Talk to Zanas' Spirit about what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004479
text: You can go no further because of Demon Magic. Ask Zanas' Spirit if there is a solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004480
text: Search for Teleporation Magic in the Individual Workshop

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004481
text: It is said that King Kadumel installed Teleporation Magic in each cell in case he was imprisoned. Look for that magic that is activated by a special crest that Zanas told you about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004482
text: The Restrained Spirit of Zanas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004483
text: Obtain the Spirit Stone of Restrainment by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004484
text: You require the Spirit Stone of Restrainment in order to free Zanas' Spirit that is captured by the Demons. Defeat the Monsters to obtain them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004485
text: Obtain %s by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004486
text: Rescue Zanas' Spirit by disarming the Magic Circle of Restrainment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004487
text: You have obtained enough Spirit Stones. Find and disarm the Magic Circle of Retainment to free Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004488
text: Talk to the now free Zanas' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004489
text: Zanas' Spirit is now free as the magic has been disarmed. Talk to the now free Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004490
text: Shard Collection

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004491
text: You require information from Zanas' Spirit about when he was captured by the Demons. Listen to the new information Zanas' Spirit has to offer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004492
text: Defeat the monsters and obatin four types of Shards

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004493
text: Zanas' Spirit says that he has lost the four Shards of Fire, Ice, Lightning and Poison because they were taken by the Demons. All four are required to disarm the Secret Device in which the King's Yellow Jewel is hidden, so you must recover all of them to obtain the Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004494
text: You have recovered all four of the Jewels. Return to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004495
text: You have retrieved all four types of Shard but you feel an evil aura from them. Talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004496
text: Purify the Shards by using Light Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004497
text: You must purify the Shards as they have been defiled by the Demons. Use the shining Light Crystal that are in a sunny spot of the Supply room to purify them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004498
text: Check the Secret Device in the Supply Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004499
text: All the Shards have been purified. Go to the Supply Room's Secret Device and take the King's Yellow Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004500
text: Use the Shards on all four directions of the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004501
text: Supply Room's Secret Device : The Device will be disarmed if you use the shards on all four directions. The type of Shard doesn't matter but you may not use the same one more than once.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004502
text: Obtain the King's Yellow Jewel from the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004503
text: The Secret Device has been disarmed. Take the King's Yellow Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004504
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit in the Supply Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004505
text: You have obtained the King's Yellow Jewel. Talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004506
text: Activate the Secret Device in the Punishment Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004507
text: Punishment Room's Secret Device : Four Magic Crystal will be created when you activate it. Magic Crystals will provide magic to the Device if you turn them so the Crests are facing the Device. When all the Crystals are providing magic to the Device and this will in turn activate a strong offensive skill across all of the Workshop area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004508
text: Activate the Secret Device in the Punishment Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004509
text: All Magic Crystals are providing magic to the Secret Device. Activate the magic by using the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004510
text: Workshop Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004511
text: You have dealt massive damage to the Demons by activating the Secret Device. Return to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004512
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to the Demon Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004513
text: Zanas' Spirit says that he will go to the Demon Barrier by meeting with the Zanas' Spirit that had been blocked by Demon Magic. Defeat the monsters on the way to the Demon Barrier to help the two Zanas' Spirits meet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004514
text: Zanas' Spirit should be able to follow you without issue since you have defeated many monsters. Go to the Demon Barrier on the way to the Interrogation Room Entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004515
text: Unexpected Situation

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004516
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit in the Interrogation Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004517
text: You must go to the Interrogation Room in order to gain the last King's Jewel. Go to the Interrogation Room and talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004518
text: You feel great power from Nebulas. Ask Zanas' Spirit what has happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004519
text: Defeat nearby monsters to retrieve the Observational Detector parts

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004520
text: Zanas' Spirit wishes to see what is going on. Defeat nearby monsters and retrieve Observational Detector parts in order to repair and use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004521
text: Repair the Observational Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004522
text: You have gathered all of the parts required. Repair the Observational Detector and examine the Demon Barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004523
text: Zanas' Resolve

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004524
text: This is a much stronger Demon Barrier than the one you had disarmed. Tell this to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004525
text: Zanas' Spirit is thinking of sacrificing itself to disarm the Barrier. Talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004526
text: Zanas' Spirit seems to have strengthened it's resolve. Talk about what needs to be done in order for his resolve to not be in vain.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004527
text: Charge Energy Crystals around the Incinerator

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004528
text: It is said that the Incinerator's Secret Device must be used to enhance the Dominance Magic. Collect Energy Crystals from around the Incinerator in order to activate the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004529
text: Activate the Incinerator's Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004530
text: You have collected enough Energy Crystals. Activate the Incinerator's Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004531
text: What needs to be done

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004532
text: The Incinerator's Secret Device has been activated. Talk to Zanas's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004533
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to the Incinerator

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004534
text: Zanas' Spirit says that it will utilize itself and the Incinerator in order to enhance the Dominance Magic. You must activate the Secret Devices and attack the Demons to draw their attention in order to protect Zanas and weaken the Demons. Defeat the monsters on the way to the Incinerator in order to protect Zanas' Spirit at the Incinerator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004535
text: Activate the Magical Device at the Tower of Discipline

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004536
text: You must distract the Demons in order to make it harder for them to find Zanas. Activate the Magical Device on the Tower of Discipline.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004537
text: Activate all of Kadumel's Magic Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004538
text: Tower of Discipline Magical Device : You must find and activate only Kadumel's Magic Circles after activating the Device. You must start over if you activate other Magic Circle as Kadumel's Magic Circles will lose their strength. If you activate the Device after activating all of Kadumel's Magic Circles, illusions will appear in the Interrogation Room and confuse enemies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004539
text: All of Kadumel's Magic Circles have been activated. Move to the Execution Grounds to activate the next Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004540
text: Disarm the Secret Device at the Execution Grounds

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004541
text: You must distract the Demons to make it harder for them to find Zanas. Activate the Secret Device at the Execution Grounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004542
text: Execution Grounds Secret Device : You must match the lights to the same color to disarm the Device. The lights will change color at certain intervals or by reacting to Magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004543
text: Obtained a Worn Gravity Stone from the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004544
text: The Secret Device has been disarmed. Take the Worn Gravity Stone from the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004545
text: Defeat the Demons by using the Worn Gravity Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004546
text: You should check to see if the Gravity Stone is still in working condition. Use the Worn Gravity Stone on Demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004547
text: Remove the Demon Summoning Crystal by using the Worn Gravity Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004548
text: The Worn Gravity Stone still seems to be in working condition after testing it on monsters. Use the Worn Gravity Stone to remove the Demon Summoning Crystal on the way to the Public Punishment Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004549
text: Call Zanas' Spirit from the Demon's Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004550
text: You have done all that you can. Go to the Demon's Barrier and use the Teal Magic Stone to call Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004551
text: Obtain the King's Blue Jewel after defeating Nebulas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004552
text: Zanas' Spirit sacrificed itself to destroy the Demon's Barrier. Obtain the King's Jewel after defeating Nebulas in order for the sacrifice to not be in vain.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004553
text: Obtain the Revelation from the Confessional Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004554
text: You have defeated Nebulas and obtained the King's Blue Jewel. Obtain the Revelation from the Confessional Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004555
text: Obtain %s by defeating Nebulas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004556
text: Check the Writings on the Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004557
text: There is something written on a cell near the Waiting Room. Read it and see what it has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004558
text: Check the location indicated by the writings on the wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004559
text: According to the contents, it seems as if it was written by a prisoner from Kalejimas Prison. Try to find the place where the prisoner hid the contraband.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004560
text: Check the Secret Device at Jibuza Square

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004561
text: There is a Secret Device at Jibuza Square. Carefully check what it's functions are.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004562
text: Check the Supply Chest that is hidden somewhere in the Waiting Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004563
text: You heard something being activated as soon as you activated the Device but nothing seems to have changed. Try checking the Waiting Room from top to bottom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004564
text: Check the Secret Device at the Central Assembly Area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004565
text: Something might be inside the Central Assembly Area's Secret Device. Take a close look.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004566
text: Obtain the object from inside the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004567
text: You have succeeded in opening the Secret Device. Take the what is inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004568
text: Check the walls of the Long Sentence Prison Cell

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004569
text: There is something written on the walls of the Long Sentence Prison Cell. Read it to see what it has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004570
text: Search Confiscated Goods

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004571
text: The wall is filled with the angry words of a prisoner who had his belongings taken by a guard. Look for the Confiscated Goods by reading what the prisoner has written.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004572
text: Check the letter on the ground at the Inmate's Lounge

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004573
text: There is a letter on the ground of the Inmate's Lounge. Pick it up and read it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004574
text: Search for a person that knows the letter's owner

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004575
text: The letter is from a prisoner to his parents. Try to find someone at Fedimian to find that might know the letter's owner.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004576
text: Talk to the old man at Fedimian

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004577
text: You have found a person that knows the letter's owner. Try talking to the old man in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004578
text: Activate the Secret Device in the Interrogation Room Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004579
text: There is a mysterious Secret Device in the Interrogation Room Entrance. Check it to see what it's function is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004580
text: Defeat as many monsters as the Secret Device is indicating

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004581
text: A number appears as soon as you activate the Secret Device. Think about what the number might mean before acting. You may re-activate the Device to change the number.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004582
text: Disarm the Secret Device in the Room of Abyss

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004583
text: Disarm the Secret Device in the Room of Abyss. You must choose the proper password by reading the hints from the Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004584
text: Obtain the Reward from the Secret Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004585
text: The Secret Device has been disarmed. Take the object from the Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004586
text: Check Zanas' Echo

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004587
text: There is something shining in the Incinerator where Zanas' Spirit was. Check it to see what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004588
text: Gather Energy Crystals from near the Incinerator

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004589
text: You think you hear something from the Echo but can't quite make out what it is saying. Collect Energy Crystals from near the Incinerator and give the Echo more energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004590
text: Passing energy to Zanas' Echo

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004591
text: You have gathered enough energy. Pass the energy to Zanas' Echo.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004592
text: Barha Forest Antidote

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004593
text: Talk to Researcher Adas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004594
text: Researcher Adas seems to be in pain. Check to see what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004595
text: Collect some Herbs of Barha

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004596
text: Adas says that she has been Poisoned by the Poison sprayed by Sarma. Collect Herbs of Barha to craft an Antidote before the Poison spreads too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004597
text: You have gathered enough Herbs of Barha. Hurry and ask Adas what other ingredients are required.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004598
text: Defeat Big Red Gribas to obtain Griba Juice

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004599
text: You require Griba Juice to craft the Antidote as well. Defeat Big Red Gribas to collect Griba Juice.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004600
text: You have gathered all of the required Griba Juice. Return to Adas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004601
text: Defeat the Big Red Griba and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004602
text: You have gathered all of the Antidote ingredients. Ask Adas how to craft the Antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004603
text: Mix the Antidote Ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004604
text: You can create an Antidote using the research equipment below. Use the smoking equipment on the left to process the Herbs of Barha and use the equipment on the right to process Griba Juice before crafting the Antidote on the Alchemy Table in the middle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004605
text: Craft the Antidote at the Alchemy Table

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004606
text: You have properly processed all of the ingredients. Craft the Antidote at the Alchemy Table in the middle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004607
text: Cure Researcher Adas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004608
text: You have crafted the Antidote. Use it to cure Researcher Adas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004609
text: Cure Researcher Veed

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004610
text: Adas says that there are other Researchers in the direction where Sarma went. Find and cure Researcher Veed who is the closest if he is poisoned.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004611
text: Pass the Tree Vines

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004612
text: Talk to Researcher Veed

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004613
text: It seems as if the Antidote is working well on Researcher Veed as well. Ask Veed about the whereabouts of Sarma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004614
text: Search for the paper with the combination

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004615
text: You must deal with the Tree Vines that are covering the road due to Sarma's potion. Go to the right and try to find the paper with the combination written on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004616
text: Search the Chest of Materials for Neutralizer reagent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004617
text: The combination states that you require a reagent for the Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer. Look through the Chest of Materials to find a Neutralizer reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004618
text: Activate the lights surrounding the Potion Mixing Magic Circle in the correct order

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004619
