text: Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer Combination : You can craft it by processing it at the Potion Mixing Magic Circle by using the Neutralizer reagent stored in the Chest of Materials. In order to use the Potion Mixing Magic Circle, input magic in the Magic Circle. You will be able to utilize it by activating the blinking lights in the correct order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004620
text: Craft a Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer with the Potion Mixing Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004621
text: You can now use the Potion Mixing Magic Circle. Craft an Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004622
text: You have crafted a Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer. Return to Researcher Veed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004623
text: Remove the Tree Vines blocking the road

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004624
text: Remove the Tree Vines blocking the road with Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004625
text: Enhanced Antidote

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004626
text: Examine Sarma's Research Materials

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004627
text: It is written on the combination that you can combine certain ingredients to the Antidote to enhance it's effects. Examine Sarma's Research Materials to find the specific ingredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004628
text: Defeat the Green Rafflesia to obtain Sticky Sap Rafflesia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004629
text: According to the combination and Sarma's Research Materials, you require Sticky Rafflesia Sap to enhance the Antidote. Defeat the Green Rafflesia and obtain Sticky Rafflesia Sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004630
text: Talk to Researcher Sireah

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004631
text: You can now enhance the Antidote with Sticky Rafflesia Sap. Go and look for Researcher Sireah.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004632
text: Obtain %s by defeating Green Rafflesias

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004633
text: Craft an Enhanced Antidote with Researcher Sireah

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004634
text: Ask Researcher Sireah to enhance the Antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004635
text: Purify the Poisoned Ground with the Enhanced Antidote

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004636
text: You must purfiy the ground Sarma poisoned. Use the Enhanced Antidote to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004637
text: You have purified the Poisoned Ground. Talk to Researcher Sireah.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004638
text: The Enhanced Antidote seems to be very effective. Now ask Researcher Sireah about the whereabouts of Sarma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004639
text: Tracking Sarma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004640
text: Track Sarma who has run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004641
text: Report back to Researcher Sireah

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004642
text: Sarma has met a horrid end. Return to Sireah and tell her what you have found.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004643
text: Sireah seems to be relieved to hear about Sarma's demise. Ask Sireah if she has anything else she wishes to talk about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004644
text: Sireah says that Gatre came from Alemeth Forest. Tell Gatre about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004645
text: Researcher Veed seems to be in trouble. Ask if there is something you can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004646
text: Defeat monsters that have been poisoned by Sarma's Poison

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004647
text: He says that monsters that have been poisoned by Sarma are going around and spreading the Poison. Defeat the monsters so that Sarma's Poison doesn't spread any further.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004648
text: Defeat the poisoned monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004649
text: Defeat the %s poisoned by Sarma's Poison

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004650
text: Researcher Sireah seems to be in trouble. Ask if there is anything you can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004651
text: Destroy research equipment at Sarma's main laboratory

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004652
text: According to Sireah, Sarma had a main laboratory where he created the dangerous poisons. Destroy the research equipment there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004653
text: You have destroyed Sarma's Research Facilities. Return to Sireah.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004654
text: Talk to Outsider Mark

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004655
text: Outsider Mark seems to be looking for someone to help him. Ask him how you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004656
text: Collect Shiny Tini Horns from the Tinis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004657
text: Outsider Mark believes that the Shiny Tini Horns will make his father recover. Obtain Shiny Tini Horns from Brown Tinis or Green Tini Archers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004658
text: You have collected enough Shiny Horns from the Tinis. Give them to Outsider Mark.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004659
text: Talk to Pilgrim Phylia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004660
text: Pilgrim Phylia seems to be unable to move. Ask her if there is something wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004661
text: Gather Taumas Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004662
text: Wounded Pilgrim Phylia has asked you to gather nearby Taumas Herbs to use as antiseptic for her wounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004663
text: You have gathered enough Taumas Herbs to care for Pilgrim Phylia. Give them to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004664
text: Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004665
text: Being Considerate to Elders

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004666
text: Talk to Pilgrim Jacob

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004667
text: Elderly Pilgrim Jacob is sitting on a corner in order to avoid the monsters. Ask if there is anything you can do for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004668
text: Find Jacob's lost baggage from the Tinis at Rjudin Wilderness

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004669
text: Jacob says that he has lost his baggage when he was attacked by the Tinis. Defeat the Tinis at Rjudin Wilderness and look for the Tini that took his baggage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004670
text: You have reclaimed Jacob's baggage. Return it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004671
text: Search the Tini for %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004672
text: Pilgrim Jacob still seems to be unable to leave despite recovering his baggage. Ask him if you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004673
text: Find a Sturdy Branch

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004674
text: Jacob says that he requires a Cane in order to leave because of his wounds. See if there is a Branch that could be used as a Cane nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004675
text: You have found a suitable Branch. Give it to Jacob.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004676
text: Find a %s that can be used as a Cane

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004677
text: Pilgrim Jacob has finally gotten back on his feet but still seems to be afraid of monsters. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004678
text: Go with Pilgrim Jacob towards Salvia Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004679
text: Jacob has asked the Revelator to accompany him to a building near Salvia Forest. Guard him to that building.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004680
text: The Monk lying on the ground in front of the building is Jacob's friend. Talk to Jacob.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004681
text: Talk to Pilgrim Brad

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004682
text: Pilgrim Brad is trying to think of a way to help the fallen Monk recover. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004683
text: Collect Tini meat

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004684
text: Brad says that he needs meat to feed the Monk. Defeat the Tini from the surrounding area and bring him their meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004685
text: There is enough meat for a Stew. Bring the meat to Brad.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004686
text: Talk to Pilgrim Angela

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004687
text: Pilgrim Angela seems to have something to do in a hurry. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004688
text: Get water from the well with Pilgrim Brad

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004689
text: Angela asked you to get water from the well with Pilgrim Brad. Protect Brad while he gets the water. Make sure to stay near Brad.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004690
text: Brad has successfully brought back water. Talk to Angela.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004691
text: Pilgrim Jacob wishes to make sure that his friend is warm. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004692
text: Collect Firewood from Vabalas Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004693
text: Pilgrim Jacob is trying to light a fire to warm the Monk. Collect Firewood from Vabalas Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004694
text: You have enough Firewood to light a fire. Return to Jacob.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004695
text: Collect %s from Vabalas Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004696
text: Ask Pilgrim Jacob about the condition of his friend Monk Ethan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004697
text: Talk to Monk Ethan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004698
text: Monk Ethan seems to have regained consiousness. Talk to him to hear about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004699
text: The Pilgrim Couple has left. Talk to Jacob.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004700
text: Pilgrim Jacob seems to have a last request. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004701
text: Defeat monsters on the road to Salvia Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004702
text: Jacob has asked you to defeat the monsters in the surrounding area so he can return to Klaipeda. Reduce the number of monsters in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004703
text: You have dealed with enough monsters. Return to Jacob.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004704
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to Salvia Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004705
text: Talk to Pilgrim Jhodan

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004706
text: Pilgrim Jhodan is lying on the road asking for help. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004707
text: Defeat the Red Spion and gather their hides

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004708
text: Jhodan has asked you to get him some hides so he can stay warm. Defeat the Red Spion and collect their hides.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004709
text: This should be enough to satisfy Jhodan. Give him the hides.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004710
text: Talk to Pilgrim Diane

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004711
text: Pilgrim Diane is lying on the ground asking for help. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004712
text: Collect berries from Salvia Brambles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004713
text: Diane seems to be famished. Collect berries from the nearby Salvia Brambles.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004714
text: You have collected more than enough berries for one person. Take them to Diane.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004715
text: Collect %s from the Salvia Brambles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004716
text: Talk to Pilgrim Barry

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004717
text: Pilgrim Barry seems to be terrified. Talk to him to try and calm him down.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004718
text: Defeat monsters near Pilgrim Barry

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004719
text: Barry is not only very ill but also extremely afraid of the monster. Defeat the nearby monsters to calm him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004720
text: The monsters in the surrounding area have been reduced. Return to Barry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004721
text: Talk to Believer Brutus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004722
text: There are two Monks in fron of the closed Inn. Go and talk to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004723
text: Lead Believer Clark to the fallen Pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004724
text: The two men who are from the Order of the Tree of Truth are trying to help the Pilgrims struggling from the Plague. Lead Believer Clark to the fallen Pilgrims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004725
text: Talk to Believer Clark

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004726
text: You can't seem to find Believer Brutus once you return. Try talking to Believer Clark first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004727
text: It seems as if Believer Clark felt something was wrong while he treated the pilgrims. Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004728
text: Test the medicine on the Red Spion emitting a black aura

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004729
text: Clark is suspicious about the medicine's effects. Spray it on the monsters emitting black auras and observe it's effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004730
text: You were able to see what effects the medicine had on the monsters emitting black auras. Return to Clark and tell him what had happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004731
text: Believer Clark's suspicion of the medicine has only grown. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004732
text: Clark asked you to tell Brutus about the strange effects of the medicine. Talk to Believer Brutus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004733
text: Clark seems to be alarmed by Brutus's strange reaction. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004734
text: Showing True Colors

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004735
text: Believer Clark has become suspicious after seeing Brutus's strange reaction. Talk to him and ask what he is thinking.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004736
text: Follow Brutus with Believer Clark

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004737
text: Clark has decided to follow Brutus. Go with him and follow Brutus to Diga Fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004738
text: Defeat Brutus who has become a Demon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004739
text: Defeat the summoned Demon

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004740
text: Retrace Brutus's path

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004741
text: Go towards Diga Fields where you fought with Brutus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004742
text: You have defeated Believer Brutus who showed his true identity. Talk to Believer Clark.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004743
text: Believer Clark wishes to examine the Altar that Brutus was using but it seems to be too dark. Talk to Clark.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004744
text: Collect flamable leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004745
text: Clark has asked you to collect flamable leaves so that he can examine the altar. Collect them from near the trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004746
text: This seems to be enought to start a fire. Take them to Clark.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004747
text: Gather %s from beneath the trees

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004748
text: Pilgrim Barry, who is in recovery, seems to have a request. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004749
text: Defeat the monsters in Salvia Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004750
text: Barry has asked you if you could reduce the number of monsters so that the pilgrims will be safer while they recover. Defeat the monsters in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004751
text: You have defeated the requested monsters. Go back to Barry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004752
text: Talk to Pilgrim Vados

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004753
text: Pilgrim Vados has restrained a monk. Ask him about what is going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004754
text: Talk to Monk Dorma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004755
text: Pilgrim Vados says that Monk Dorma has murdered another monk. Listen to what Dorma has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004756
text: Pilgrim Vados seems to be absolute on his belief that Dorma is the culprit. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004757
text: Lift the suspicions from the other pilgrims

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004758
text: Vados says that Dorma will be proven innocent if all the other pilgrims lift their suspicions. Lift the suspicions of Pilgrim David, Eli and George.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004759
text: The other pilgrims seem to have lifted their suspicions against Dorma. Try talking to Vados once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004760
text: Talk to Pilgrim David

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004761
text: David seems to be suspicious of whether Dorma is actually a monk. Try talking to him first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004762
text: Find a way for Dorma to prove that she is a monk

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004763
text: Monk Dorma says that she will be able to prove that she is a monk if you can find her rosary. Look for her rosary which should be somewhere on Deveera Forest Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004764
text: You have found Dorma's rosary. Show it to Pilgrim David.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004765
text: Search for %s at Deveera Forest Road

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004766
text: Talk to Pilgrim Eli

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004767
text: Pilgrim Eli seems to be the first person to have witnessed the scene. Ask what he is suspicious about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004768
text: Pilgrim Eli seems to be suspicious about the fact that Monk Dorma was holding a bloody weapon. Ask Monk Dorma about what had happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004769
text: Monk Dorma says that she was simply checking it because it was similar to the demonnic weapon which they were looking for. Ask if there is a way to prove her claim.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004770
text: Find Monk Dorma's Holy Water

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004771
text: Monk Dorma says that she can prove that it's a demonic weapon by pouring holy water from her luggage on it. Look for Dorma's Holy Water.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004772
text: You have found Monk Dorma's Holy Water. Give Monk Dorma's Holy Water to Pilgrim Vados and tell him what you have heard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004773
text: Pilgrim Vados is doubtful if the holy water is legitimate. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004774
text: Check Monk Dorma's Holy Water

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004775
text: Prove whether Monk Dorma's Holy Water is actually legitimate. A Yellow Dumaro will react to the holy water since it is a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004776
text: Monk Dorma's Holy Water seems to be legimitate. Go back to Pilgrim Vados.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004777
text: Monk Dorma's Holy Water is legimitate. Now watch Pilgrim Vados pour the holy water on the murder weapon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004778
text: The murder weapon was from a demon and it seems as if Monk Dorma is innocent. Tell this fact to Pilgrim Eli.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004779
text: Talk to Pilgrim George

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004780
text: Pilgrim George seems to be suspicious about the fact that there would be a monk in such a remote place at all. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004781
text: Pilgrim George seems to be suspicious about the fact that a Monk is at this remote location and was conveniently absent when his colleague was murdered. Ask Monk Dorma for an explanation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004782
text: Monk Dorma has given a reasonable explanation. Tell George what you've heard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004783
text: Monk Dorma has given an explanation for why he was not near his colleague. Ask if there is any evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004784
text: Collect discarded Plant Roots from Gingkaras Reed Field

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004785
text: Monk Dorma says that there are Plant Roots that she had discarded at Gingkaras Reed Field while she was scavenging for food. Collect those as evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004786
text: This should be enough to use as evidence. Show the Plant Roots to Pilgrim George.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004787
text: The suspicions of the pilgrims have been lifted as well as Monk Dorma's restraints. Talk to the freed Dorma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004788
text: Pilgrim Vados seems to be thinking something after listening to Monk Dorma's story. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004789
text: Pilgrim Vados seems to be thinking of a way to lure out the Demon Assassin who will still be after Monk Dorma. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004790
text: Pilgrim Vados suspects that the Demon Assassin will appear to defeat Monk Dorma if you go to Mova Wilderness with him. Talk to Monk Dorma and follow her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004791
text: Moving to Mova Wilderness with Monk Dorma

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004792
text: Lure the Demon Assassin out at Mova Wilderness with Monk Dorma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004793
text: Defeat the Demon Assassin

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004794
text: The Demon Assassins have appeared to defeat the two of you. Defeat them while protecting Monk Dorma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004795
text: Meet Pilgrim Vados at Mova Wilderness

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004796
text: You have defeated the Demon Assassins. Meet with Jack at Mova Wilderness.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004797
text: You have defeated the Demon Assassins. Talk to Pilgrim Vados at Orde Forkroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004798
text: Pilgrim David seems to be worried about the way back. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004799
text: David want you to reduce the number of monsters on the road back to Grynas Trails. Defeat the monsters at the designated location.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004800
text: It seems as if the road to Grynas Trails is a bit safer. Return to David.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004801
text: Defeat the monsters on the road to Grynas Trails

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004802
text: Pilgrim George seems to have new concerns due to the destination change. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004803
text: Collect Lepusbunny Meat

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004804
text: George is worried that they will not have enough food for the return trip. Defeat Lepusbunnies and gather their meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004805
text: This should be enough meat. Give the meat to George.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004806
text: Monk Dorma cannot forgive the Demons for harming his colleague. Ask him what he wants to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004807
text: Defeat Yellow Dumaro

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004808
text: Monk Dorma has asked you to defeat the Demons in the nearby area. Defeat the Yellow Dumaros.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004809
text: Monk Dorma should be satisfied by the number of defeated Demons. Report back to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004810
text: Rescue the Monk being chased by Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004811
text: A Monk is being chased by Demons. Try to save her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004812
text: Talk to Monk Stella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004813
text: You have saved the Monk being chased by Demons. Ask her what had happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004814
text: Defeat the Demon attacking the Monk

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004815
text: Monk Stella seems to be trying to explain what is going on at Maven Abbey. Listen to her explanation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004816
text: Monk Stella wishes to save Maven Abbey from the grasp of the Order of the Tree of Truth. Talk to Stella once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004817
text: Monk Stella seems to be planning on exposing the Demon's identity hidden within the Order of the Tree of Truth. Ask her if she has any plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004818
text: Find Magical Equipment from the Monk's grave

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004819
text: Stella says that you should look for Orb or Mirrors among the keepsakes from the graves of Monk's that had previously fought Demons. Find the which grave is the Monk's among Ketra Cemetery's four graves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004820
text: The Orb seems to be broken, but you've found a Mirror that is intact. Take the Mirror to Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004821
text: Find the Monk's Keepsake at Ketra Cemetery

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004822
text: It doesn't seem as if you can use the Mirror in it's current state. Ask Monk Stella about how you should use the Mirror.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004823
text: Fill the Mirror with the life energy or monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004824
text: Stella says that the Mirror should absorb the magic from monster if you defeat them. Defeat the monsters in the surrounding area and fill the Mirror of Truth with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004825
text: The Mirror of Truth is shining brightly. Return the Mirror to Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004826
text: Monk Stella is pondering on how to lure Domantas of the Order of the Tree of Truth out. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004827
text: Go with Monk Stella to the Pilgrim Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004828
text: Stella says that there should be a way at the Pilgrim Camp where the Order sometimes comes to recruit Believers. Go with her to the Pilgrim Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004829
text: You have safely arrived at the Pilgrim Camp, but Stella's condition seems to be unstable. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004830
text: Monk Stella says that she seems to be gradually losing strength. Ask if there is something you can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004831
text: Collect information from the drained pilgrims

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004832
text: Stella has asked you to collect information from the pilgrims in the camp. Talk to four drained pilgrims.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004833
text: You have heard different information from all four of the pilgrims. Tell Stella about what you have heard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004834
text: It seems as if she has found a way to lure the Order's believers based on the information you have given her. Ask her what she is planning.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004835
text: Destroy the Black Crystal at Shinikti Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004836
text: Stella is sure that the Black Crystal is a very important object to the Order of the Tree of Truth. Place her rosary in front of the crystal to weaken it and destroy the Black Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004837
text: You have successfully destroyed the Black Crystal. Wait for with Stella for a Believer of the Order to appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004838
text: It looks like Believers from the Order of the Tree of Truth are coming. Talk to Stella and prepare yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004839
text: Defeat High Officer Domantas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004840
text: High Officer Domantas of the Order of the Tree of Truth was a demon. Defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004841
text: You have succeeded in defeating High Officer Domantas. Talk to Monk Stella to discuss future plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004842
text: Defeat High Officer Domantas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004843
text: Monk Stella seems to be sensing something different about this place that was not here before. Ask her about what is bothering her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004844
text: Examing Hermit's Tomb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004845
text: Stella says that she no longer feels the divine power that filled this area. Go and check the Hermit's Tomb to see if there is anything strange there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004846
text: You have found a Mysterious Device in front of the tomb. Return to Stella and tell her what you have found.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004847
text: Stella seems to have thought of a way to lure people from the Order. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004848
text: Destroy the Divine Power Suppression Device at the Hermit's Tomb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004849
text: Stella wishes to lure the Order of the Tree of Truth out by destroying the Divine Power Suppression Device at the Hermit's Tomb. Destroy the Divine Power Suppression Device with Oasseu Tree Sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004850
text: The device fell apart as soon as the sap with the divine power touches it. Return to Stella and tell her what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004851
text: Stella is certain there are more Divine Power Suppression Devices and wishes to destroy them as well. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004852
text: Retrieve Oasseu Tree's Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004853
text: Stella has asked you to destroy the Device at Rijekavi Fields as well. Go there after gaining Oasseu Tree Sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004854
text: Talk to Monk Mattas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004855
text: You are ready to destroy the Device. Go to the Divine Power Suppression Device at Rijekavi Fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004856
text: Go to Rijekavi Fields after preparing %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004857
text: Monk Mattas is stopping you from destroying the Divine Power Suppression Device. Talk to him and try to find a way to persuade him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004858
text: Take Mattas to Stella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004859
text: Mattas does not beleive that Monk Stella is alive. Take him to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004860
text: Mattas has gone to lure High Officer Medea of the Order. Talk to Stella to see if there is anything else that needs to be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004861
text: Stella seems to be prepared to destroy the other Divine Power Suppression Devices. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004862
text: Destroy the Divine Power Suppression Device at Rijekavi Fields

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004863
text: Stella has asked you once more to destroy the Device at Rijekavi Fields. Destroy the Divine Power Suppression Device as she requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004864
text: You have succeeded once more in destroying the Device. Return to Stella and tell her about your success.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004865
text: Monk Stella's attitude seems to have changed somewhat. Ask her about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004866
text: Collect Oasseu Tree Sap after talking to Monk Mattas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004867
text: Stella gave you a scroll asking you to amplify the Device at Krasjia Hill's instead of destroying it. Discuss this fact with Monk Mattas as this does not feel right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004868
text: Use the scroll on the Device at Krasjia Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004869
text: Mattas has warned you to prepare for the worst. Now that you have Oasseu Tree Sap, go to Krasjia Hill and use the scroll on the Device as Stella requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004870
text: Prepare Oasseu Tree Sap after discussing with Monk Mattas before going to examine the Device at Krasjia Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004871
text: Use the scroll on the Divine Power Suppression Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004872
text: Use the scroll on the Device at Krasjia Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004873
text: Defeat the Demons summoned by Medea

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004874
text: High Officer Medea had transformed into Monk Stella. Defeat the summoned demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004875
text: Talk to High Officer Medea

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004876
text: You have defeated all of the demons. Ask High Officer Medea where the real Stella is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004877
text: Defeat High Officer Medea's minions

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004878
text: High Officer Medea has suspiciously surrendered without too much of a fuss. Try talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004879
text: Take Medea to Mattas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004880
text: You could not simply leave Medea. Take her to Mattas to place under surveillance. Be careful not to let her fall behind as she may run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004881
text: You have succeeded in bringing Medea. Talk to Mattas to decide her fate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004882
text: High Officer Medea is now under Monk Mattas's surveillance. Talk to Mattas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004883
text: Rescue Monk Stella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004884
text: Monk Stella is being held at the left of Stjeva Intersection. Hurry over there and save her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004885
text: You have successfully rescued Stella. Ask if she is okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004886
text: Monk Stella seems to have found a more secure way of restraining High Officer Medea before she left. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004887
text: Collect Divine Power Suppression Device's Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004888
text: Stella wishes to restrain Medea with a Magic Circle but says that she does not have enough strength. Collect the Divine Power Suppression Device Fragments which should still have energy from the Hermit's Tomb, Rijekavi Fields and Krasjia Hill. You can find two fragments per location.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004889
text: You have collected all of the fragments. Return to Stella and give her the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004890
text: Examine the Unnamed Monk's Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004891
text: You have found a Tombstone that seems to be different from the others. Examine it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004892
text: It seems as if the Tombstone's owner wished for someone to defeat the demons. Defeat the nearby Demons and fulfill the wishes of the deceased.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004893
text: You have defeated enough Demons. Return to the Tombstone and see if anything special has happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004894
text: Defeat the demons at Oasseu Memorial

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004895
text: Monk Stella is now heading towards Maven Abbey. Talk to her and head to the sbbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004896
text: Defeat the enemies in front of the abbey

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004897
text: Stella has asked you to defeat the enemies in front of the sbbey. Defeat all of the enemies in front of the sbbey one step ahead of Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004898
text: Investigate the area in front of the door

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004899
text: You have defeated all of the monsters in front of the door. Investigate the door while waiting for Stella to arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004900
text: Wait for Monk Stella while investigating the door.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004901
text: Stella has opened the door with her key. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004902
text: Monk Stella wishes to check if the information you heard is true. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004903
text: Guard Stella to the Hall of Honor

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004904
text: Stella wishes to check the Barrier herself. Go with her to the barrier in front of the Hall of Honor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004905
text: The Hall of Honor is blocked by a barrier. Talk to Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004906
text: Monk Stella seems to be pondering on how to get rid of the barrier. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004907
text: Find a book in the Library with Stella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004908
text: Stella says that there is a Book related to Demon Barriers in the library. Go and help her find the book from the Library and return to the Barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004909
text: You have safely returned to the Barrier. Now talk to Stella about the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004910
text: Monk Stella seems to want to search the book for information. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004911
text: Protect Stella while she is reading

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004912
text: Stella is searching the book for information about the Barrier. Protect her while she is reading the book.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004913
text: It seems as if Stella has found some useful information. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004914
text: Defeat the monsters attacking Stella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004915
text: Monk Stella seems to be preparing something based on her discoveries. Ask her if she requires any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004916
text: Find an orb near the stoup

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004917
text: Stella says that she requires an orb to hold the divine power that will be used to destroy the barrier. Find the orb beneath the Stoup and take it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004918
text: You have found the orb. Hurry back and give it to Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004919
text: Retrieve %s from beneath the Stoup

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004920
text: Monk Stella is preparing something with the orb. Ask what she is planning.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004921
text: Protect Stella while she is gathering divine power

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004922
text: Stella is attempting to gather Divine Power in Orb at the Central Fountain. Guard her from monsters as she gathers the divine power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004923
text: It seems as if Monk Stella has finished her preparations to break the Barrier. Talk to her after preparing yourself for battle and finish the fight with Deimantas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004924
text: Defeat High Officer Deimantas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004925
text: High Officer Deimantas has shown himself. Defeat him and liberate Maven Abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004926
text: You have defeated Deimantas. Talk to Stella about what she will do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004927
text: Monk Stella has become worried after discovering her colleagues on the ground. Ask her how you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004928
text: Collect Edible Food

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004929
text: Stella wishes to help them recover their energy. Collect edible food from the pantry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004930
text: There is more edible food than you initially expected. Hurry back and give Stella the food-stuffs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004931
text: Monk Stella wishes to help her colleagues even further. Ask how you can help her this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004932
text: Collect Herbs from the Prayer Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004933
text: Stella has asked you to retrieve Herbs from the Prayer Room. Gather intact Herbs from the three Prayer Rooms located in the lower levels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004934
text: You have found an ample amount of Herbs. Take them to Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004935
text: Monk Stella seems to have another request for the Revelator other than helping her colleagues. Ask her what she wants.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004936
text: Defeat the demons in the abbey

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004937
text: Stella is worried about Demon Stragglers still in the abbey. Defeat the Red Nuo that are still wondering around in the abbey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004938
text: You have defeated a large number of straggling demons. Return to Stella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004939
text: Defeat the remaining Red Nuo

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004940
text: There may be important information in those notes.{nl}He lost the notes towards the Juice Collection Site, so try searching that area first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160811_004941
text: You would need serious skill to make these cuts.{nl}And to handle such powerful evil energy, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004942
text: I knew well what destiny awaited Zanas...{nl}And I knew he himself was ready to accept it,{nl} yet I had no choice but to trust him with the Revelation.{nl}The power that led Zanas, a mere boy, unto the Revelation...{nl}His last breath, his last prayer... were but for your own and our world's salvation.{nl}He shall be remembered for as long as I live.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004943
text: We were determined to refuse when the demons offered to give us supplies in exchange for killing the Revelator, but when they threatened to kill us instead if we didn't do it, we had no choice but to obey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004944
text: I am planning to develop various recipes using the barks.{nl}Whenever I eat meats, my gum starts to bleed and I feel weakened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004945
text: {nl}I cannot help but to doubt his innocence.{nl}Why were they here and where was he at the time of the murder.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004946
text: We had to ask the help from Klaipeda in order to save the abbey.{nl}If the Revelators were there, things would have been different.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004947
text: The Grubus Highway owl sculpture is also asleep... Hm.{nl}This won't do. We need to do something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004948
text: I feel so sorry for the owl sculptures inside...{nl}We can only try and stop such a thing from happening again...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004949
text: I'm glad I at least got my carving knife back.{nl}Us Dievdirbys can do anything as long as we have our carving knives.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20160925_004950
text: They destroy all the tools and the wood, they even attack people.{nl}The Ridimeds, that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004951
text: As the last head of this family, it is my wish to lead it with renewed glory.{nl}Find me the seal in the Legwyn Family Residence and I will teach you the ways of the Squire.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004952
text: If you could help me, I think the investigation would be done sooner.{nl}It will be also a great chance to test your skills as an Alchemist.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004953
text: Do you understand what I am trying to tell you?{nl}With that being said, let's see your skills as a Templar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004954
text: Now stop stalling and go power up the Transmutation Magic Circle.{nl}All you have to do is put the ingredients on the circle {nl}and emancipate the magic from the tombstone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004955
text: I have no memory of where all the gems are nor the location of the revelation..{nl}Perhaps, my other soul piece would have that information.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004956
text: Either activating secret devices to attack demons... {nl}Or destroy demon devices or magic circles. Do whatever you seem fit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004957
text: Huh?{nl}A human... here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004958
text: Are you...{nl}...the Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004959
text: {nl}It's you!{nl}The other Kupoles and I have all heard about you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004960
text: I'm investigating the Three-Layered Castle Wall with the other Kupoles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004961
text: The wall was built a millennium ago after the prediction of Goddess Laima.{nl}We didn't know what it meant then...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004962
text: But I started to wonder about the true purpose of the wall...{nl}And so now we're looking for clues about the goddess' prediction.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004963
text: Unfortunately it isn't easy investigating with all these monsters around.{nl}But we did discover something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004964
text: We found one of the many unknown devices hidden here.{nl}We were investigating it just now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004965
text: {nl}I wonder if you could help...{nl}Anything related to Goddess Laima's prediction ought to help you too, isn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004966
text: I knew we could count on you!{nl}Thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004967
text: I will give you something to note down the clues.{nl}Write down anything you find in here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004968
text: Maybe you can start with... the warehouse in District 8?{nl}There ought to be many things to look at there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004969
text: You might find things like Broken Magic Circles and magic stones there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004970
text: Are you back?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004971
text: {nl}Hm...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004972
text: {nl}Those magic circles and stones can't have been for defending the castle...{nl}There must have been some other purpose to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004973
text: Let's gather some more clues.{nl}If we find enough useful traces, they could lead us to an important clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004974
text: You can go to the document archive.{nl}I'll go and look somewhere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004975
text: Meet me here again after the investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004976
text: You're back.{nl}Did you find anything useful?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004977
text: {nl}Shall we have a look, then?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004978
text: You've collected a lot of materials.{nl}I think we can work something out from this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004979
text: Let me show you what I found first.{nl}Tell me what you think.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004980
text: Then the wall was built to prepare for Medzio Diena...{nl}We should have listened to Goddess Laima then...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004981
text: {nl}Truth is, there is nothing we can do about it now...{nl}If anything, you should tell my fellow Kupole in District 9 about the wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004982
text: {nl}The Kupole working there is called Liepa.{nl}Please go and tell her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004983
text: Are you here to see me?{nl}Who might you be?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004984
text: The Revelator!{nl}Yes, do tell me more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004985
text: So the wall was to prepare us for Medzio Diena...{nl}If you were able to find that much in District 8, you might be able to find something here as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004986
text: {nl}Would you investigate a little further with us?{nl}We want to know how the preparations for Medzio Diena took place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004987
text: To investigate Inner Wall District 9 you'll need some documents from the Command Center.{nl}The problem is the room is occupied by monsters, so it won't be easy to access.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004988
text: You'll join our investigation?{nl}That's wonderful, thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004989
text: In the Command Center, you'll find record documents with information about the installations.{nl}You may bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004990
text: Just be careful, the monsters there are vicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004991
text: The records...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004992
text: {nl}Oh, you've found them!{nl}Let me have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004993
text: According to these records, there should be some places nearby worthy of investigating.{nl}Also...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004994
text: {nl}While I read the rest of the documents, will you find me a Scroll of Projection?{nl}We will need one to continue our investigations.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004995
text: I'll be sorting out important information from these documents meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004996
text: The records might be able to tell us where to look next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004997
text: Good to see you found it.{nl}I was actually worried it had disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004998
text: {nl}To tell you the truth, there weren't as many monsters when we first started investigating.{nl}That's why we didn't take the Scroll of Projection right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_004999
text: {nl}But then, just when we needed to use it, the monsters had already taken over...{nl}I'm glad you were here to help this time!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005000
text: I've marked all the sites we need to search and all the important information on the documents.{nl}You may use it to continue investigating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005001
text: And do take the Scroll of Projection with you.{nl}You'll need it to investigate the first item, the Impact Absorption Magic Circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005002
text: I'll just finish preparing some things and then go the opposite direction.{nl}Meet me after the investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005003
text: Things sure are moving along more quickly with you here, Revelator...{nl}You truly are amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005004
text: You've returned.{nl}I've also just arrived.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005005
text: {nl}Did you search all the sites I noted?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005006
text: We should be able to induce something from here.{nl}Let's have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005007
text: This means the castle wall wasn't enough for Medzio Diena.{nl}All the preparations were done, they just weren't used correctly, it seems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005008
text: {nl}But I wonder what went wrong, exactly.{nl}We must have missed something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005009
text: I do have a hunch about one location.{nl}I haven't been able to investigate it yet because of the monsters but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005010
text: {nl}I wonder what else is left there.{nl}The meeting room over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005011
text: The monsters made a complete mess out of that meeting room.{nl}They could very well be holding clues... Would you hunt them?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005012
text: They knew the date, and they were ready, but nothing was set in motion...{nl}The preparations for Medzio Diena, that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005013
text: It all seems very strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005014
text: These are... written orders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005015
text: But it's strange.{nl}No matter how I read them, I can't understand these orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005016
text: {nl}It's almost as if they were trying to separate the people managing and protecting this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005017
text: {nl}It looks like someone might have interfered with the plans on purpose.{nl}If these orders were meant to stop the preparations for Medzio Diena from being carried out...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005018
text: That means the wall core shown in those classified manuals must contain something important.{nl}Go to Outer Wall District 9 and show the manual to the Kupole there.{nl}Her name is Milda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005019
text: Kupole Milda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005020
text: So this wall was built to prepare for Medzio Diena...{nl}But for some unknown reason the preparations weren't carried out as they should.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005021
text: {nl}Oh, sorry, I didn't even introduce myself.{nl}I'm Milda, I'm in charge of investigating Outer Wall District 9.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005022
text: {nl}As you know, in this area there's something called the core.{nl}We think investigating this core will tell us the reason why the preparations for Medzio Diena never took place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005023
text: {nl}The problem is that the core is highly protected, and for several other reasons... It hasn't been easy investigating it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005024
text: Yes.{nl}That's why I need to be careful around here.{nl}We can talk more after the monsters' numbers have been reduced a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005025
text: I'm worried about the monsters.{nl}There's something else going on here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005026
text: We'll never see the end of it at this pace.{nl}Something keeps attracting monsters to Outer Wall District 9.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005027
text: {nl}There must a reason for it to happen...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005028
text: I'll give you my investigation notes.{nl}I recorded everything in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005029
text: It's hard for me to move around because of the monsters...{nl}But you should be able to investigate the core using my notes and the equipment manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005030
text: Just be careful.{nl}More and more strong monsters are gathering.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005031
text: What could be making the monsters gather like that?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005032
text: You've brought the core!{nl}I can feel the strong energy of Goddess Laima in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005033
text: {nl}This looks powerful enough to destroy the entire castle wall...{nl}But...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005034
text: {nl}Something feels strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005035
text: {nl}There is demon energy in this.{nl}This means the core was contaminated by evil energy after it was created...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005036
text: {nl}It must have been the demons!{nl}You must tell Jore about this!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005037
text: I'll stay here and look for a way to purify the core.{nl}This may very well be our key to ridding the world of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005038
text: Did you find anything else?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005039
text: I hope the power of Laima in the core can still be restored...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005040
text: A core containing Laima's powerful energy...{nl}But you say it was contaminated with evil energy?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005041
text: {nl}Looking at your notes, you seem to have found a lot.{nl}Let's get them organized, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005042
text: Let's see what we have so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005043
text: Goddess Laima predicted Medzio Diena... and the castle wall was built to prepare for it...{nl}But the demons prevented any measures from being put into practice...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005044
text: {nl}I wonder if you coming here and helping us discover this information was also in her predictions...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005045
text: {nl}Us Kupoles must now purify the dark magic inside the core.{nl}If we can use the power of Laima in the core, we may just find something to use against the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005046
text: {nl}On behalf of all of us, I would like to thank you for letting Laima lead you to us, Revelator.{nl}You'll come see us again, won't you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005047
text: I'm very certain that there is something hidden in the castle wall.{nl}That is what I am investigating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005048
text: Ah... We should have all listened to Goddess Laima then...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005049
text: In any case, Her predictions aren't final.{nl}The actions of humans can always produce different outcomes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005050
text: {nl}In my opinion, predictions can never be definitive.{nl}Only an extremely passive and apathetic being can be predicted with absolute certainty.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005051
text: Not even Goddess Laima's predictions are definitive.{nl}The actions of humans can always produce different outcomes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005052
text: {nl}If you think about it, predictions can never be definitive.{nl}Only an extremely passive and apathetic being can be predicted with absolute certainty.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005053
text: {nl}In any case I believe that might be the reason why Laima put Her trust in humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005054
text: What could have happened here at the castle wall...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005055
text: I can't believe the demons had a hand in this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005056
text: The clues we found at Inner Wall District 8 are important evidence, we should show them to the other Kupoles.{nl}I'm worried that the monsters will try and damage them, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005057
text: Will you?{nl}Thank you, I'm really glad you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005058
text: I can see why Goddess Laima chose you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005059
text: Thank you.{nl}That should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005060
text: You're in danger here.{nl}Hurry up and leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005061
text: What Ebonypawn did can never be forgiven.{nl}For the sake of those who died in his hands, you must...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005062
text: Come see me if you meet anyone working for the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005063
text: I'd be glad to see you again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005064
text: Supply Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005065
text: I thought there was no one left here but other spirits wandering away from the goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005066
text: {nl}But if you're here, won't you listen to my request?{nl}Before I died I was a supply soldier, I transported materials to the castle wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005067
text: {nl}I was on my way to transporting some goods requested by the families of the soldiers working at the castle wall.{nl}That day was Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005068
text: {nl}I died that day... and so did all the soldiers at the wall...{nl}The goods I was transporting are still strewn around Uzsmirsote Way...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005069
text: {nl}I would like to deliver the supplies I was transporting then to the soldiers who died with me.{nl}If you can... Would you gather those supplies?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005070
text: Thank you.{nl}You will see the boxes containing the supplies spread around Uzsmirsote Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005071
text: {nl}I would help find them if I could, but after I became a spirit I'm unable to move away from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005072
text: Even in the care of the goddess, those soldiers' objects will mean something to them.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005073
text: Did you gather them all?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005074
text: Hm... Is this all there was...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005075
text: I suppose with time a lot of them went missing.{nl}Most of the boxes seem to be gone now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005076
text: I've seen the monsters go through the boxes sometimes...{nl}They must have stolen some of the supplies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005077
text: Would you search the monsters for other supplies, too?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005078
text: Sigh... I'm really sorry to be asking this to a stranger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005079
text: A lot of soldiers in this area didn't survive Medzio Diena, as far as I can tell.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005080
text: Yes, this is everything as I remember it.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005081
text: {nl}I will take these supplies and return to the goddess now.{nl}Finally I can complete my last mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005082
text: Castle Wall Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005083
text: Hey. What's a human doing here...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005084
text: I used to be a soldier working here at the castle wall.{nl}As you can see I kicked the can and all that's left is my spirit now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005085
text: So many other soldiers I used to work with didn't make it...{nl}No idea what happened to those guys now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005086
text: I want to think they're with the goddess, but what if they're not, you know?{nl}So I was thinking, would you do me and my buddies a favor?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005087
text: You're a... nice fellow, aren't you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005088
text: I wanna help guide their spirits to the goddess.{nl}But as you can see, I can't move much in this state.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005089
text: Okay. First, if you go to Deengo Hill, you'll see their stuff lying around.{nl}Just bring it all over.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005090
text: Can you believe they left without even taking their stuff?{nl}Not that it's any of my business but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005091
text: Did you bring the stuff?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005092
text: Now, here's what you to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005093
text: There's a sanctum in Kule Peak that's full of forest energy.{nl}I want you to dump the stuff into the sanctum and pull all that forest energy to get the sanctum running.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005094
text: {nl}It's what they do to soldiers who die at the castle wall, after gathering all their remains and stuff.{nl}Like a memorial service, you know?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005095
text: {nl}I know it's been a long time now, but it's the least I can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005096
text: Okay, but first you need to find this sanctum.{nl}The forest energy went a little crazy after Medzio Diena so I can't be sure where it is anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005097
text: There's gonna be a place in Kule Center where you can really feel the forest energy.{nl}It's gonna be stronger than in any other spot around there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005098
text: It was by the water, if I'm not mistaken...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005099
text: You did it.{nl}My buddies are gonna thank you for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005100
text: {nl}Glad I finally got that out of my chest, guess I'll be going to the goddess now.{nl}Thanks a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005101
text: Scout Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005102
text: There are many soldiers whose lives were sacrificed on Medzio Diena here.{nl}I am one of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005103
text: {nl}But there's something I can't let go of until this day.{nl}That's why I still haven't found my way to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005104
text: {nl}I was on my way to scout Kule Peak when I saw something...{nl}The shock of dying must have been too great, because I can't remember very well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005105
text: {nl}I wrote everything on my report, but it's lost now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005106
text: Thank you so much for helping me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005107
text: Some time ago I saw the monsters at the Dead-End Road carrying around scraps of paper.{nl}I think they're from my report.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005108
text: You should be able to find some if you search the monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005109
text: It's funny how I remember the moment I died so vividly.{nl}I would rather have forgotten it...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005110
text: Yes, that's it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005111
text: Let's see...{nl}Hmm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005112
text: Oh, I remember!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005113
text: {nl}I noticed some sculptures scattered in Sugrizimas Way.{nl}They were glowing and giving off a strange energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005114
text: I didn't know what they were, so I didn't try to handle them, but I was going to report it to my superiors.{nl}I suppose there's no one to report it to now, so why don't we investigate ourselves?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005115
text: I hope I'll finally be able to solve this mystery.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005116
text: First, go to Sugrizimas Way and collect the glowing sculptures.{nl}We should be able to find out something about them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005117
text: Run if you see anything that looks dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005118
text: Did you bring the sculptures?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005119
text: Oh! This is...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005120
text: The divine bead of Kule Peak.{nl}It looks broken, but I'm certain this is it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005121
text: This was at the goddess' altar which was forgotten after the castle wall was built.{nl}I heard it had belonged to a goddess who no one remembers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005122
text: It's a shame an object like this has ended up broken.{nl}It should be restored and placed back on the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005123
text: It should be more resistant now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005124
text: {nl}It would be best to clear out some monsters near the altar first, just to be safe.{nl}Defeat the monsters in Lychimas Fields before returning the bead to the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005125
text: {nl}It's time for me to return to the goddess now.{nl}Thank you for helping me resolve my issue.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005126
text: I am sure the forgotten goddess will want to bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005127
text: I was just about to arrive at the castle wall with the goods...{nl}I felt the earth shake and, next thing I know, I was like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005128
text: I wonder if my buddies are with the goddess...{nl}I sure hope they're not still wandering around somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005129
text: The day I died is what people call Medzio Diena now.{nl}I can say I was the first victim.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005130
text: Forest Keeper Brunonas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005131
text: I've never seen the leaves fall like this in my many years working as a forest keeper.{nl}I really haven't.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005132
text: Let me know if you find anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005133
text: Herbalist Cesaris

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005134
text: I don't know what it is.{nl}The leaves just keep falling.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005135
text: {nl}It's only happening here, from what I heard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005136
text: It's been like this since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005137
text: Lumberjack Dowedas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005138
text: When the weather is nice and dry, it's good for lumberjacks like me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005139
text: No idea why the leaves keep falling.{nl}I mean, as a lumberjack I'm glad the weather's nice and dry but.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005140
text: Chronomancer Ida

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005141
text: My mentor sent me here to investigate the foliage problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005142
text: She believed the flow of time in this region was twisted...{nl}So she sent me here to investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005143
text: {nl}And she was right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005144
text: Kupole Lina

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005145
text: The Kupoles alone aren't enough to handle this many trees.{nl}So I've decided to use nutrition supplements.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005146
text: Kupole Aeglei

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005147
text: Tell Lina this if you see her.{nl}If she ever does anything like this again, she'll regret it!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005148
text: Refugee Representative Morcus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005149
text: My brother and I were both soldiers...{nl}But I was injured during training and had to be discharged early...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005150
text: {nl}That's why it's still hard for me to move around.{nl}I don't whether to call this injury a blessing or a curse...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005151
text: Ejuidas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005152
text: The foliage situation in this forest is serious.{nl}It can be hard for people with poor mental conditions to endure.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005153
text: {nl}That's why I'm here anyways...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005154
text: A child? The little one is called Willitte?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005155
text: {nl}Oh, I remember.{nl}I saw them crying, waiting for their dad, so I told them to make a leaf whistle and pray to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005156
text: {nl}Didn't think the little one would believe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005157
text: Little Willitte

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005158
text: My daddy will come if I make a leaf whistle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005159
text: {nl}That man said so.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005160
text: You delivered the information to my mentor.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005161
text: {nl}Brunonas was also interested in the results of my investigation.{nl}He is the forest keeper, after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005162
text: {nl}Please tell him, too.{nl}And thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005163
text: Gotta do things in the right order.{nl}Go and tell Ida first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005164
text: You should read the notes I put together when you can. It will help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005165
text: I've worked as a forest keeper for decades and I'd never seen the trees like this.{nl}Time must be really twisted here, then...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005166
text: Tell my mentor about the results of the investigation, she'll have something to tell you too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005167
text: Brunonas will be waiting.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005168
text: You only need to tell Ida.{nl}I'll write the summary of the investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005169
text: Refugee Hilda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005170
text: I came here as a refugee but...{nl}It's very hard out here, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005171
text: {nl}I guess, for people who lost everything, anywhere will be hard.{nl}This world or another world, does it make a difference?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005172
text: The forest isn't dying.{nl}The foliage is what's keeping the trees safe from the vegetation problem.{nl}But one Kupole hasn't figured that out yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005173
text: This strange feeling won't go away.{nl}Let me go back to the bonfire.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005174
text: So Victoras wants to know the contents of the document...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005175
text: The situation in Nheto Forest had been reported to affect the minds of refugees in nearby areas as well.{nl}I thought it was important to study the forest and the irregularities in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005176
text: {nl}And so, as a user of time magic myself, I formulated a hypothesis.{nl}I sent out Ida to investigate based on that hypothesis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005177
text: {nl}I will reorganize the information in this report.{nl}Please let Ida know on your way back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005178
text: I fought with Ruklys against the traitors until the very end at the Fortress of the Land.{nl}I wished to accompany him in his final moments, but he requested that I clear his name.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005179
text: {nl}And so, I took proof of his innocence and fled south with a few subordinates.{nl}I had wanted to tell those who resented the tyranny of Kadumel about Ruklys' innocence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005180
text: {nl}I had hoped we could join forces to take revenge on the king and his advisor.{nl}However, Eminent assigned elite troops to General Victoras to chase after us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005181
text: {nl}Then, a tormented soldier on our side surrendered the box of documents to Victoras.{nl}That is when I decided to face Victoras and fight him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005182
text: {nl}Alas, our battle ended in a tragic mutual casualty.{nl}As much as time may have passed, I have yet to ammend the injustice perpetrated upon Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005183
text: Kupole Siute

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005184
text: I was barely able to succumb to the power of the darkness...{nl}But I am really glad you're here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005185
text: {nl}I'm sorry... and also grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005186
text: The Tri-Layered Castle Wall is composed of the inner, outer and central walls.{nl}As I mentioned before, it was built under the instruction of Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005187
text: {nl}The other Kupoles and I were investigating the wall.{nl}We figured there must be something hidden there, a clue to the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005188
text: I demand to know!{nl}But first to tell the people at the village...!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005189
text: {nl}My legs may be mangled but I will find out where my brother is, so help me the goddess!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005190
text: I guess Lina and I wanted the same thing after all.{nl}To save the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005191
text: {nl}We just had different ways to do it. I still think I was right though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005192
text: Believer Jaonus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005193
text: I belong to a small order that worships the goddesses.{nl}I came after the refugees of this site reported feeling an evil energy in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005194
text: {nl}If you have the chance, won't you come and join our order?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005195
text: Believer Costas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005196
text: So you met Jaonus?{nl}We belong to a small order that worships the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005197
text: We couldn't just stand by and look as the forest withered on.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005198
text: I've lost my honor as member of the Royal Army, and my own life now.{nl}If I keep you safe, will I be able to repent?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005199
text: Please, I beg you{nl}Rid us of the cursed statues and the demons, and cure us of this disease.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005200
text: There, it's finished.{nl}I had to rush it so it's a little rough; please be careful with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005201
text: The seeds... they look different.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005202
text: Oscaras?said he was going to get Vink flowers and left.{nl}And the symptoms keep getting worse... I hope nothing happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005203
text: Oscaras is gone.{nl}We should go find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005204
text: I'm tired beyond exhaustion.{nl}I didn't know it would be this hard...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005205
text: According to the legends, the Flower of Vaivora will only bloom before a very special aura.{nl}So I brought it here hoping to find somewhat special people but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005206
text: {nl}All I found were frauds and con artists.{nl}This whole ordeal has been more than tiring...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005207
text: {nl}But I think I finally found someone!{nl}If only you will help me, Vaivora's Koru will finally bloom!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005208
text: You are very kind.{nl}Who might you be?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005209
text: {nl}...{nl}Hm?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005210
text: {nl}A revelator?{nl}Are you saying you're a revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005211
text: {nl}Oh... Well if that's so...{nl}Will you listen to my story?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005212
text: {nl}After Medzio Diena, the goddesses would no longer answer our prayers.{nl}Because of this, many started to doubt or deny the very existence of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005213
text: {nl}I, for one, was certain that there must be a reason why the goddesses weren't answering.{nl}A legend is told of a flower that grows in Arcus Forest. Ask this flower anything, and it will answer you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005214
text: {nl}This flower is called Vaivora's Koru.{nl}I came here to make Vaivora's Koru bloom and find out where the goddesses are.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005215
text: {nl}But now... I don't even know where its seeds are...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005216
text: You're right!{nl}Those could be the seeds of Vaivora's Koru!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005217
text: {nl}To tell the truth... Having the seeds alone isn't enough to make the flower bloom.{nl}According to the legend, the special one must hold the seeds in their hand and submerge them in a pool of water to claim them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005218
text: {nl}If that's you...!{nl}You, the revelator...!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005219
text: {nl}Down here is a puddle of water.{nl}Go there and submerge the seeds!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005220
text: If you really are the special one told in the legend, the seeds will react and change.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005221
text: Oh... The seeds have been claimed...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005222
text: {nl}The legend became true!{nl}After all the frauds and tricks...!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005223
text: The legend says that, once claimed, the seeds will feed off the energy of the special one.{nl}They will disappear if touched by anyone other than the special one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005224
text: {nl}Won't you help me grow Vaivora's Koru?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005225
text: Go to Juzmitas Altar and plant the seeds there.{nl}The legend says Vaivora's Koru requires divine energy to blossom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005226
text: {nl}In the past, Arcus Forest was the place where worshipping ceremonies for Goddess Vaivora were held.{nl}Some of that divine energy is still present in the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005227
text: {nl}Go there and plant the seeds.{nl}I will go first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005228
text: {nl}Moving around hasn't been easy because of the monsters, but I feel safe with you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005229
text: Oh... I'm afraid the divine energy here won't be enough for Vaivora's Koru...{nl}It seems to have been damaged...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005230
text: And fully repairing the altar would take far too much time.{nl}Unless...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005231
text: {nl}Hm, yes.{nl}Around this altar there are several remains of collapsed stone pillars.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005232
text: {nl}Those pillars were used to cleanse away evil energies during worshiping ceremonies to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}They may be only remains, but some of their past divine energy will still be present.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005233
text: {nl}If we could find a way to transfer the divine energy from the pillars to the altar...{nl}We may be able to restore its power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005234
text: You've collected the Lyecorn Essences.{nl}This should be enough for the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005235
text: {nl}We'll need to purify the evil energy, but I can do that myself.{nl}I might need more materials, however...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005236
text: I will cleanse the Lyecorn Essence and transfer the divine energy from the pillar remains to the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005237
text: This much should suffice.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005238
text: There is one more thing I need to purify the Lyecorn essence...{nl}Arcus braken, the type that grows in Arcus Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005239
text: The stems of Arcus bracken are covered in dense hairs and they're very firm.{nl}Stems that have been steeped in divine energy can purify evil forces.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005240
text: Arcus braken seemed to grow mostly at the Meilan Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005241
text: I'll use this Arcus bracken to purify the Lyecorn essence.{nl}Just a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005242
text: The Lyecorn Essence is now purified and the orb is completed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005243
text: Now you'll need to imbue the essence with divine energy.{nl}Use it near the pillar fragments and an orb of divine energy will appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005244
text: {nl}The orb will contain the divine energy in the essence and transmit it.{nl}If the orb disappears, you'll need to use more of the essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005245
text: {nl}I will stay at the altar and prepare it for the energy transmission.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005246
text: Use the essence near the pillar fragments.{nl}The orb that appears in the essence will deliver the divine energy contained in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005247
