text: You've brought the divine energy.{nl}I am also finished with preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005248
text: I have created a magic circle to transfer the divine energy from the essence to the altar.{nl}You can place the essence onto the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005249
text: {nl}Also, don't forget to plant the Koru seeds!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005250
text: After you place the essence on the magic circle, the divine energy will move towards the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005251
text: The essence is placed on the magic circle, but it doesn't react...{nl}I don't think there's anything wrong with the circle...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005252
text: {nl}What could be the problem...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005253
text: Oh, when you were placing the essence on the magic circle, that flower over there looked a little strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005254
text: {nl}Would you...{nl}Remove that flower for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005255
text: It looks suspicious somehow.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005256
text: A flower that draws divine energy, how strange...{nl}My life would have been in danger if it weren't for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005257
text: {nl}The claimed seeds have started to react as told in the legend.{nl}Soon the Flower of Vaivora will bloom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005258
text: {nl}I will pray now and ask to know the whereabouts of the goddesses.{nl}Help me so I may focus on my prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005259
text: Vaivora's Koru has answered me and told me about the goddesses.{nl}I'm sure you too will want to know where they are.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005260
text: Of course.{nl}I will tell you where the goddesses are.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005261
text: You have strengthened my faith in the goddesses ever so more.{nl}I will now find a way to prove to the people what the Koru has revealed!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005262
text: {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005263
text: In the past, Phamer Forest was affected by a deadly disease that caused high fevers.{nl}This disease was never completely eradicated, so you should avoid staying long.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005264
text: {nl}I am researching the period when the disease first struck.{nl}I'm doing so as a pupil of the Plague Doctor Master, who investigates infectious diseases himself...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005265
text: {nl}Sigh, the thing is...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005266
text: {nl}If it's alright, do you mind if I share my predicament?{nl}My research hasn't really been leading anywhere, and it's making me miserable...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005267
text: {nl}The information I was given when I first arrived was far too little.{nl}Date of occurrence, number of casualties, symptoms... that was it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005268
text: {nl}It was impossible arriving at any conclusions with this little information...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005269
text: {nl}All I learned was that the disease started manifesting differently after Medzio Diena.{nl}In this state, if I don't talk to someone about this I feel as if the disease will take over my own self...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005270
text: I feel much better knowing someone is willing to help.{nl}Though I understand you have no knowledge of the disease...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005271
text: {nl}Oh, by the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005272
text: {nl}I should tell you something before we start.{nl}We don't know how one becomes infected with this disease, so you must be careful at all times.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005273
text: {nl}Alright, first we need to collect substances likely to cause the disease to occur.{nl}You may bring some Bunkeybo and Bunkeyto skins, along with Phamer bracken and Tulups.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005274
text: {nl}You'll find Phamer bracken and Tulups growing by the Atvis Falls, to the right side of the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005275
text: There will be plenty of Phamer bracken and Tulups by the Atvis Falls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005276
text: This should be enough to study the causes of the disease.{nl}Alright, now...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005277
text: We need test subjects that we can put in contact with the materials you collected.{nl}There are a few monsters I selected as subjects; I would like you to bring them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005278
text: I would like Bunkeytos and Bunkeybos to use as test subjects and some water.{nl}You may bring the water from the Atvis Falls nearby, but the monsters need to be hunted.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005279
text: {nl}Use this tranquilizer on monsters after weakening them.{nl}It will knock them down instantly so you should have no trouble capturing them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005280
text: While you gather the test subjects, I will make a cage for the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005281
text: The cage for the monsters is completed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005282
text: {nl}Please put the monsters inside the cage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005283
text: We can get started on the experiments now...{nl}I just hope the monsters will cooperate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005284
text: Have the Bunkeybo smell the Phamer bracken.{nl}Then feed the Tulup flower to the Bunkeyto.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005285
text: Meanwhile I'll be observing the substances released from the monsters' skin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005286
text: Let's wait and see how the monsters react.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005287
text: I ran some tests and... My condition doesn't seem right...{nl}I think I might have been infected with the disease...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005288
text: {nl}This can't be happening...{nl}I can't have this disease...{nl}I must have made a mistake checking the results.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005289
text: {nl}I can't be sick... I was so careful...{nl}It can't be!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005290
text: {nl}No!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005291
text: Sigh...{nl}I need to calm myself down...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005292
text: {nl}Hold on a second... Sigh...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005293
text: {nl}Did...{nl}... you have the Bunkeybo smell the Phamer bracken?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005294
text: {nl}The last time I tested there was no reaction, but this time the disease manifested.{nl}It seems the substances that cause the disease are found in some of the Phamer bracken.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005295
text: {nl}I would like you to bring me all the Phamer bracken you can, in all stages of development.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005296
text: I'm planning to separate the bracken into younger specimens and more developed ones to test.{nl}I'm really glad to have someone here to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005297
text: {nl}If this were to happen when I was all alone...{nl}I can't even imagine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005298
text: I'll analyse the bracken.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005299
text: I've got the test results.{nl}It seems the spores of developed bracken are harmless to the human body.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005300
text: {nl}But in the respiratory system of Bunkeybos, they become deadly.{nl}Humans who are bitten by them or otherwise come into contact with their bodily fluids can become infected as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005301
text: As for the cure... the answer is in the Bunkeytos!{nl}The disease still manifests in them, but I noticed it disappeared rather quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005302
text: {nl}It turns out the magic of Bunkeyto essence, when combined with another material, generates a substance that gives them immunity!{nl}This can be used to create a cure!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005303
text: I will just need to find out what the magic in the Bunkeyto essence is reacting with.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005304
text: I'm starting to have the symptoms.{nl}Be careful not to become infected yourself...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005305
text: The amount you brought should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005306
text: While you were away I found the substance that reacts with the Bunkeyto Essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005307
text: {nl}It's Vink flowers.{nl}The combination of these flowers and Bunkeyto Essence creates an antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005308
text: {nl}The problem is that creating enough antidote to cure one person requires a large amount of Vink flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005309
text: Vink flowers are scarce even in Phamer Forest, and they're rather hard to spot.{nl}However, when they react to Bunkeyto Essences, a pearl of red light appears.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005310
text: {nl}If you use the magic in the Bunkeyto Essence, you'll be able to find Vink flowers where the pearls of light appear.{nl}Hurry on to Tarnis Falls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005311
text: My symptoms are getting worse, I'm having difficulty standing up.{nl}It could be the fever... I'm getting chills too...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005312
text: {nl}You brought the Vink flowers.{nl}We need to go to back to camp to make the medicine, but in my condition...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005313
text: I'm worried that you'll become infected if you carry me all the way to camp.{nl}I... would rather you make the medicine at the camp and then bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005314
text: All you need to do is mix the Bunkeyto essence and the Vink flowers in a 3:7 ratio.{nl}It's not too difficult, you should be able to get it done quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005315
text: The Bunkeyto essence and Vink flowers should be mixed in a ratio of 3:7.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005316
text: Did you finish the antidote?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005317
text: Oh, it seems the antidote is working already.{nl}I feel a lot better.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005318
text: {nl}I'm so thankful.{nl}You helped me progress so much in my research, and now I even have an antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005319
text: {nl}If it weren't for you I would've been miserable with no such thing as a cure.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005320
text: {nl}I will go back to camp now and prepare to report everything to the Plague Doctor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005321
text: No... We can't lose Dalia...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005322
text: Placed the knocked out monsters inside the cage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005323
text: I'm researching new ways to use monster corpses in battle.{nl}And I need a lot of magic infused blood for my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005324
text: {nl}If you're here, it's because you wanna advance as a Necromancer, am I right?{nl}Then give me a hand with the research and get me that magic infused blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005325
text: {nl}It ain't an easy task, of course.{nl}What do you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005326
text: Cool.{nl}I'm gonna give you an orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005327
text: {nl}Use the orb on monsters and they'll be branded with something called the Seal of Disinter.{nl}Defeat the monsters with the seal and they'll leave behind a pool of magic infused blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005328
text: {nl}One thing, though. The Seal of Disinter goes away after a while, so remember that.{nl}And don't be too bummed if you don't see the seal, it can fail sometimes if you don't control your magic right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005329
text: I made this orb especially hard to handle for regular Necromancers.{nl}I'm gonna see the way you deal with it and judge your skills from that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005330
text: Yup, I think you're good enough for me to teach you my more advanced stuff.{nl}I'm surprised, actually.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005331
text: Ah, you came at the right time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005332
text: {nl}Crystal Mine Lot 2 has Vubbes even more vicious and powerful than Lot 1.{nl}I'm trying to think of a way to keep the Vubbes in Lot 2 from going out into the Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005333
text: {nl}Blocking the entrance would be the surest way, but also the most dangerous.{nl}So I am planning to create a scent to scare away the Vubbes and place it in Lot 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005334
text: {nl}I'll work a lot faster with your help.{nl}And it'll be a good chance to test your Alchemist skills, wouldn't you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005335
text: There are three more materials I need.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005336
text: {nl}Blue Beetow salivary glands, half-digested grass and monster parasites.{nl}You can obtain these from the monsters in Khamadon Forest, Nheto Forest and Inner Wall District 9, respectively.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005337
text: You can obtain the items by defeating the monsters in Khamadon Forest, Nheto Forest and Inner Wall District 9.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005338
text: Well done.{nl}As promised, I will allow you to achieve a higher level as an Alchemist.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005339
text: {nl}And then you may create the scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005340
text: Warlocks must know how to rule over and control evil spirits.{nl}Your control skills do not seem fully developed yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005341
text: {nl}Use my Seal of Dominance to find hidden evil spirits and absorb them.{nl}I will teach you my techniques if you can prove your expertise in using the Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005342
text: Use my Seal of Dominance to find hidden evil spirits and absorb them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005343
text: Impressive.{nl}You fared better than I expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005344
text: {nl}Let's help you take the next step as a Warlock, then.{nl}But don't get comfortable just yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005345
text: {nl}No creature likes being controlled.{nl}Always remember that the one you're trying to control may also try to control you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005346
text: I think I know why you're here.{nl}I can help you reach the next level as Featherfoot if you help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005347
text: {nl}Have you ever been to Khonot Forest?{nl}The forest is home to the wandering spirits of soldiers who died fighting each other a long time ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005348
text: {nl}We believe that's the reason why their belongings are cursed with resentment.{nl}I worry that someone will get hurt if they do something with their objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005349
text: {nl}I would like you to gather all their belongings and bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005350
text: {nl}A curse is still a curse, no matter how weak... There's a chance you'll be cursed too when you try to pick up their objects.{nl}If so, you can use my Seal of Disarmament to clear the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005351
text: You must use the Seal of Disarmament right away if the curse falls on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005352
text: You're back with the soldiers' belongings.{nl}Let's help you onto your new stage as a Featherfoot, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005353
text: I don't know if you're aware, but I commune with plants spiritually.{nl}I can feel the plants at the Oasseu Memorial suffering from evil energies this very instant.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005354
text: {nl}Help me purify the evil forces away from these plants and I will teach you about the next stage of the Druid.{nl}I will give you the Orb of Purification you need for this task.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005355
text: To advance as a Druid you must be able to commune with nature and listen to it.{nl}The plights of the Oasseu Memorial plants fill me with sorrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005356
text: I no longer hear the cries of the plants in the Oasseu Memorial!{nl}I was worried I had asked you far too much, but you did so well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005357
text: {nl}As promised, I will help you then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005358
text: I am well aware why you're here.{nl}I will grant you your wish, should you provide me with your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005359
text: {nl}Recently, a place once guarded by divine energy has been overtaken by demons whose evil energy is growing stronger.{nl}It has come to the point where clairvoyance has no effect there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005360
text: {nl}I will ask you to rid that place of the evil energy.{nl}Help me do this and I will help you achieve the next level of Oracle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005361
text: Your target is the Workshop.{nl}What you need to do is defeat the demons there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005362
text: I'm afraid having demons run rampant is a common occurrence in these troubled times.{nl}Please rid the Workshop of its demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005363
text: I knew you were the right person to do this.{nl}As promised, I will lead you to the next level of the Oracle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005364
text: Lately there have been several reports of people falling ill after being attacked by monsters.{nl}Those affected have all been attacked by the same species of monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005365
text: {nl}We suspect it might be either beast or plant type monsters.{nl}The symptoms can be cured rather easily, but it pains me to see the people falling ill to the disease.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005366
text: {nl}That is why I plan to develop a vaccine.{nl}Bring me the samples I need for the vaccine and I shall teach you the ways of the Plague Doctor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005367
text: You may hunt the monsters in any region.{nl}They simply need to be beast and plant type monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005368
text: For samples I need the blood of beast monsters and the body fluid of plant monsters.{nl}They can be from any region.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005369
text: You collected the samples.{nl}I can use them to develop my vaccine now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005370
text: {nl}Without the grace of the goddesses we once had, us humans need to develop our medical practice.{nl}I urge you to make good use of the Plague Doctor techniques I have taught you and contribute to our science.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005371
text: A Kabbalist is required to understand the meaning behind the numbers hidden in every being and substance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005372
text: {nl}As such, I would like to give you a somewhat difficult task.{nl}Are you prepared?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005373
text: Use my crystal sphere at the Inner Wall District 9 and you will see numbers.{nl}Those numbers will signify a particular monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005374
text: {nl}Solve the mystery hidden in the numbers and defeat the target monster.{nl}You must find the meaning behind the numbers and how they relate to this monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005375
text: {nl}Use the sphere again if you are uncertain.{nl}The numbers may signal a different monster and you may infer the rules from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005376
text: Defeat the monster told by the numbers of the crystal sphere at Inner Wall District 9.{nl}Finding out the monster behind the numbers is a task you must complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005377
text: When you realize it, it's nothing special. But it is a duty of the Kabbalist to study on the process.{nl}If you keep trying, you will realize the meanings of the numbers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005378
text: Sage Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005379
text: My duty involves recovering works of knowledge and reestablishing the study of magic.{nl}With the kingdom library destroyed and our science undermined, it's what we as Sages must do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005380
text: {nl}Help me and I shall teach you the spatial magic of the Sages.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005381
text: Your task starts with finding the books in Mage Tower 2F, Elgos Monastery Main Building and Inner Wall District 9.{nl}The books I'm looking for are titled Sage Baseline, The Goddess' Abode of Mount Monderor Volume I and Book of the Void.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005382
text: Find the three books I'm looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005383
text: The Book of the Void is one that I personally need as Sage Master.{nl}As a token of appreciation for your dedication, I will teach you the magic of the Sages.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005384
text: Enchanter Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005385
text: Enchanters work by applying or extracting magic from objects.{nl}But to become one, you must first pass a small test.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005386
text: It's still a little too early to ask you to fully extract magic from objects.{nl}Instead, go to Fedimian and absorb the magic of the memories and desires contained in its pots.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005387
text: {nl}Use my Absorption Orb for this task.{nl}Your score will depend on how much magic you can bring me in this orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005388
text: The pots in Fedimian contain the memories and desires of many people.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005389
text: {nl}With the Absorption Orb you can obtain those memories in the form of magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005390
text: You've gathered more magic than I expected.{nl}You shouldn't have any problems learning enchanting techniques at all, it seems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005391
text: {nl}As promised, let's take you to the higher stage of Enchanter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005392
text: Taoist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005393
text: I'm afraid I can't tell you about the higher stage of Taoist without prior preparation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005394
text: {nl}I will give you an amulet.{nl}Return after you have used it on the monsters of Nheto Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005395
text: {nl}Only then will you be prepared as a Taoist.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005396
text: Use the amulet against the monsters of Nheto Forest and experience its effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005397
text: Have you made sufficient use of the amulet?{nl}Then I shall help you become the brilliant Taoist you desire.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005398
text: Inquisitor Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005399
text: Inquisitors are judges, we deliver judgements.{nl}And with the goddesses disappeared, we must also take up Their obligations.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005400
text: {nl}This places even heavier responsibilities upon us as judges.{nl}The day Inquisitors are unable to withstand these burdens is the day our world will collapse into turmoil.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005401
text: Make sure to read carefully and understand the Inquisitor's Creed and Decree.{nl}Then, find the objects instilled with heretic energy and prove your talent as judge.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005402
text: Make sure to read carefully and understand the Decree I wrote.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005403
text: You have proven your talent and passion for judgement.{nl}Always remember the Inquisitor's Creed and Decree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005404
text: There were reports of people whose mental condition was affected by the foliage phenomenon.{nl}I believe some compromise is needed to save those who are still healthy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005405
text: Kupole Leda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005406
text: This place is too dangerous for travelers.{nl}If you have nothing else to tend to, I suggest you avoid coming here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005407
text: Devries Controller Spell Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005408
text: [Spell Source Activation Guide]{nl}Please, read the following instruction carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005409
text: {nl}1. Insert the spell of the user into the source.{nl}2. If the user's spell is not sufficient, please follow Step. 3.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005410
text: {nl}3. Minute spell is accumulated in the monsters roaming around in this facility.{nl}Overpower them and collect the essence of spell and inject it to the source.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005411
text: Central Laboratory's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005412
text: {nl}3. There are objects containing magic scattered around the Central Laboratory.{nl}Look for things around the area to recharge it with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005413
text: Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005414
text: {nl}3. Refill the discharged generators with magic from the surrounding area.{nl}You will be able to use the Source for a long time if you use a fully charged generator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005415
text: You've came just in time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005416
text: {nl}I am researching another route to Fanstasy Library where Goddess Vaivora resides.{nl}However, my duties as a master hinder the process to a certain degree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005417
text: {nl}I have heard that you are looking for goddesses.{nl}Help me now and I will help you get to Goddess Vaivora in Fantasy Library.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005418
text: {nl}What do you think of my offer?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005419
text: There is one thing I need to tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005420
text: {nl}The crystal of Goddess Gegute cannot be used for a long period of time.{nl}The power source that can supply spell is necessary.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005421
text: {nl}Such spells are littered in Zima Suecourt.{nl}It will tell you when it needs recharging.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005422
text: Do you wish to see the event of the past?{nl}They will appear like phantoms to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005423
text: {nl}Use this crystal to see the past events that occurred in Zima Suecourt.{nl}Before we get going. I need to let you know on certain things...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005424
text: I have set the crystal to the era when Agailla Flurry was alive.{nl}Take the crystal to Zima Suecourt.{nl}You will be able to have a glimpse of Agailla Flurry from the past.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005425
text: {nl}Remember the things you see about Agailla Flurry in the crystal and tell me what you saw.{nl}However, you must be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005426
text: {nl}The crystal's magic will lure the monsters of Zima Suecourt.{nl}They will continue to hinder your work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005427
text: Feel free to do the research on your own terms.{nl}There isn't anything there that will be destroyed or explode anyways.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005428
text: If I summerize what you have told me...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005429
text: {nl}I thought the other entrance to the Fantasy Library would be a gap in space somewhere.{nl}It seems as if Agailla Flurry... made the entrance with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005430
text: {nl}If so, how about using the Kaleidoscope of Time?{nl}Maybe it will allow us to see what Agailla Flurry did in the Agailla Flurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005431
text: {nl}Of course, it doesn't have anything to do with my research, but you could use it for your own interests if you are intruiged as a Revelator.{nl}Please use it while you are with colleagues for your own safety though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005432
text: {nl}There are many transportation devices within Zima Suecourt for convenient travel.{nl}They are still usable if you charge them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005433
text: {nl}I would also appreciate it if you would keep these facts to yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005434
text: To find the route to the Fantasy Library, you must find the trace of grand wizards.{nl}You will find the traces on the way from here, Stele Road to Zima Suecourt.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005435
text: {nl}To find out the secret history of these traces, the crystal of Goddess Gegute.{nl}The crystal allows you to see the past events of a place and nearby objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005436
text: {nl}Do you want to try it out here?{nl}I have already set the time period.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005437
text: {nl}It would be a mystical experience.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005438
text: How could he just abandon his duty as a servant of the kingdom?{nl}Our duty is to  protect the magic circle regardless of what happens.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005439
text: As a soldier, I feel uncomfortable receiving help from an ordinary person like you, but...{nl}Horace who was helping us is lying in the tent at the moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005440
text: Thank you for saving my life.{nl}I'm worried for the monastery, however. I wonder if my brothers are safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005441
text: I can't see my own breath, but I'm freezing.{nl}This doesn't make any sense. Brrrr...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005442
text: This is grave, we have demons hiding among our Order.{nl}You don't suppose our chiefs will know about this...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005443
text: We have reasons to believe this person is the culprit.{nl}Try and convince the other pilgrims if you believe otherwise.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005444
text: If you can't prove that this person is innocent...{nl}We have no choice but to leave their faith up to the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005445
text: That must have been a visual trickery. {nl}That brother was born in the Abbey and has lived there his entire life.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005446
text: Only a handful of brethren including me managed to escape... {nl}I am deathly worried about all of them. I have no way of knowing what happened to the others.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005447
text: Fine, whatever.{nl}Let's go meet him then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005448
text: I... don't know who I am... or where I am.{nl}I simply remember the name Hayatin...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005449
text: I feel something I can't quite explain when I see those glowing monsters.{nl}For some reason, I feel as if there is someone I must save... but who...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005450
text: I believe we can restore Ruklys' honor if we reveal to the world the documents in his box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005451
text: I beg of you.{nl}Please, find Ruklys' document box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005452
text: I am forever thankful to you for proving Ruklys' innocence to the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005453
text: Soon the day will come when Ruklys and the rest of us are free of all false charges.{nl}I am eternally grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005454
text: Traveler.{nl}Will you listen to my story?{nl}Though I may remember nothing but the name Hayatin...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005455
text: {nl}Seeing the blue glowing monsters musters in me a feeling I can't quite explain.{nl}That is why I believe they're the key to recovering my memories.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005456
text: Thank you.{nl}Being dead, there is not much I can do...{nl}Please, defeat the Blue Tanus and Blue Doyors for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005457
text: I remember it all!{nl}What's important to me... My duties...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005458
text: I am Hayatin, Ruklys' comrade.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005459
text: {nl}I was asleep for a long, long time, until I suddenly awoke four years ago.{nl}Alas, I did not know who I was or what I ought to do, so I merely wandered.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005460
text: {nl}But I remember it all now.{nl}I must find the document that proves Ruklys is innocent!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005461
text: {nl}Dead as I am, there isn't much I can do.{nl}Please, be my help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005462
text: There was nearly no one left from Victoras' troops.{nl}However the document box could still be at the location where they were stationed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005463
text: {nl}I ask you to search Carejvines Hill, where his troops were stationed.{nl}I will be waiting at the place where we first met.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005464
text: Yes. I am Victoras, a general of the Kingdom.{nl}I should first of all thank you for setting me free from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005465
text: {nl}I do not know what you seek in this decrepit place, but you have my help if you need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005466
text: I had lost my sense of self and was running wild with the monsters like a beast.{nl}If anything I ought to thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005467
text: I wonder how many years have passed... Nothing looks the same as it once was.{nl}The bracken itself looks bizarre. What on earth happened here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005468
text: The entire world looks to have perished before a devious calamity.{nl}You must wonder why, during such calamity, I would plot to dishonor a hero like Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005469
text: I was merely following orders as a member of the army, though it led to the disgrace of a hero.{nl}It was unfortunate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005470
text: Hayatin... A name I missed.{nl}I do remember one of his subordinates handing me the document box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005471
text: {nl}I will help you find the box.{nl}But first, there is something I must do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005472
text: The spirits you see wandering nearby were once royal soldiers under my command.{nl}After conscription and a meaningless death, they seem to have been left wandering pointlessly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005473
text: {nl}As their superior, I feel like sending them to rest with the goddess is the least I can do.{nl}If it's not much to ask, would you build them a memorial stone?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005474
text: {nl}Something simple will suffice.{nl}There are remains from the castle wall you can use which ought to work just fine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005475
text: Use the materials from the ruins to raise a simple sign on a stone base.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005476
text: I simply want to honor them, rather than impress anyone.{nl}And I must say I'm grateful to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005477
text: Now that the memorial stone is complete, would you guide their spirits to it?{nl}I don't think I should be the one to do it, seeing as I'm the one they likely resent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005478
text: Thank you.{nl}I will tell you more after their spirits are resting in comfort.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005479
text: Please guide my subordinates' wandering spirits to the memorial stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005480
text: I cannot thank you enough.{nl}Let me start by telling you what I know about the document box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005481
text: I willingly sacrificed my own life to follow the orders I was given.{nl}I believe my loyalty to the kingdom has been more than proven.{nl}There is no reason for me to keep any more secrets.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005482
text: {nl}I received orders from Premier Eminent to obtain an important object Hayatin had in his possession when he fled.{nl}After a long pursuit, one of his subordinates surrendered the document box to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005483
text: {nl}I hid the box under a sign only I recognize.{nl}The land may have changed with time, but I believe we can discover the box if only we find the sign.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005484
text: I'm afraid I can no longer be certain of its exact location.{nl}Although I know it is in Carejvines Hill...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005485
text: {nl}It will likely be in a spot with abundant bracken.{nl}I would start by burning the piles of bracken and checking for what's underneath them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005486
text: I, too, harbored my own suspicions about our quest to punish Ruklys.{nl}As the first disciple of Maven, he proved to be nothing less than a hero.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005487
text: {nl}But as members of the army, our very lives depend on our orders.{nl}From where I stood, I had no choice but to follow the directions of the Premier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005488
text: {nl}It happened before the Fortress of the Land was overtook.{nl}We thought they were attacking, when it was confirmed that a detached force had fled southwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005489
text: {nl}It was Hayatin and his soldiers.{nl}Our mission to pursuit Hayatin had only gotten longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005490
text: {nl}Eventually one of his soldiers did surrender the document box to our side, but he could not be spared.{nl}You see, the Premier's second command was to eliminate all of Hayatin's forces.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005491
text: {nl}My first command was to deliver the box directly to the Premier.{nl}That is why I hid it in a place unknown even by my subordinates.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005492
text: It won't be easy skimming through the tangled bracken.{nl}Burning it is a better solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005493
text: {nl}If you do find the document box, there is something I want to ask.{nl}I'm curious about the contents of the document the Premier was so keen on keeping secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005494
text: {nl}If you will, please find out what the document contains. I want to know the truth.{nl}I want to know if Ruklys and Hayatin were in fact traitors...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005495
text: Time may have worn it out, but I have no doubts.{nl}This is the document box Hayatin had in his possession.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005496
text: If Hayatin seeks to recover this box, it is only right to return it to him.{nl}But first, I want to know the contents of the document.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005497
text: Would you perhaps open it for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005498
text: As dead as I am, I'm afraid there isn't much I can do.{nl}If it's locked, we'll have no choice but to ask Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005499
text: Did you find the document box?{nl}I'm very glad to hear that, but how exactly did you find it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005500
text: {nl}You were helped by the spirit of Victoras?{nl}Does that mean his spirit still lives?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005501
text: {nl}And he's seeking the truth about the past...?{nl}I can't say I resent him entirely, given that he was simply following orders...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005502
text: {nl}Very well.{nl}We need the document either way to prove Ruklys was innocent. Let us open the box, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005503
text: The inside of the box seems intact despite the years that passed.{nl}I can only imagine what important secrets it holds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005504
text: {nl}I didn't imagine it to be locked like this. I never once tried to open it.{nl}I'm afraid we have no choice but to ask Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005505
text: A key is required to open the document box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005506
text: {nl}I held this key until the day I died.{nl}I imagine it will have remained buried with my dead body until this very day.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005507
text: {nl}But I'm afraid far too long has passed and I have forgotten where my body is buried.{nl}I believe it could be at Musiz Pond, where he and I fought our last battle...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005508
text: Fortunately, the document box is enchanted.{nl}It and the key will glow in each other's presence, to prevent the key from being lost.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005509
text: {nl}The Blue Gosarus that inhabit these lands are said to grow magic stones in their bodies.{nl}We may be able to use their stones to activate the document box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005510
text: Obtain the magic stones from the Blue Gosarus and use the box by Musiz Pond.{nl}Should the key be buried nearby, it will react.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005511
text: You've found the key.{nl}Would you open the box and have a look at the document?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005512
text: The document seems intact. Indeed, it was sealed before it was buried.{nl}You may show it to Victoras and return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005513
text: It can't be...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005514
text: {nl}Premier Eminent had evidence that proved Ruklys was to be suspected of treason.{nl}The fact that he enlisted in the army and built the Fortress of the Land, that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005515
text: {nl}But this document...{nl}It's an order of the king commanding the construction of the Fortress of the Land and the deployment of defense forces!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005516
text: {nl}Does this mean Ruklys followed the orders of the king, but was made to be a traitor for it?{nl}I can't imagine what King Kadumel and Premier Eminent's intentions could have been.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005517
text: {nl}All I did was follow orders, and yet I, too, ended with blood on my hands...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005518
text: {nl}Something needs to be settled, then.{nl}I must apologize to Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005519
text: You may go to Hayatin.{nl}I will meet you there soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005520
text: Welcome, traveler.{nl}Did you come to tell new stories of your adventures?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005521
text: {nl}Do you mean you found a document that proves Ruklys was innocent?{nl}If you don't mind, would you let me have a look at it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005522
text: Hm... The contents of this document are surprising indeed.{nl}I will report this to the Wings of Vaivora immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005523
text: {nl}If it is proven that Ruklys was accused of false charges, he will be named a hero once again.{nl}Your name, too, will be remembered for your great contribution to our history.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005524
text: {nl}Pyromancer Master Abreh will be glad to hear about this. She has always been interested in Ruklys.{nl}If I ever compile materials on him, I'll make sure to send her a copy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005525
text: You must show this document to someone who can help spread the truth to the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005526
text: Many of my subordinates are still possessed by the monsters.{nl}Would you free them as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005527
text: I can still see some of their altered spirits.{nl}I'm sorry, but would you free some more?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005528
text: Many spirits are now free thanks to you.{nl}May I ask you for one more favor?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005529
text: Defeat the monsters surrounded by blue light and free the spirits they are possessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005530
text: Thank you.{nl}But it seems many of my subordinates are still possessed, unaware of who they are.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005531
text: I can only be grateful.{nl}All my soldiers look to have been freed now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005532
text: This is not good.{nl}If the monsters get out, who knows what terrible things they will do...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005533
text: After this region suddenly lost its balance, my personal research was pushed to the background.{nl}I just wish my colleagues would bring a talented assistant from one of the big cities.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005534
text: It was all our fault.{nl}That's why I want to make things right again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005535
text: No one thought a single Centaurus could change so much...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005536
text: We can't let the Centaurus be.{nl}We need to take measures.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005537
text: If it weren't for you, all the cities nearby would be in great danger.{nl}Thank you. I mean it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005538
text: I'm going to stay here and apply all measures necessary.{nl}I'll make sure the Moglans and Duckies stay within the region to maintain balance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005539
text: Oh, just when I thought I was hopeless, a traveler appears!{nl}I'm so glad.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005540
text: {nl}Traveler, I need your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005541
text: {nl}Three different species of monsters live in this region: Duckies, Moglans and Beetows.{nl}Among those, the Duckies and the Moglans hunt and kill each other.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005542
text: {nl}If one species exterminates the other and goes beyond Khamadon Forest, it'll soon be out of control.{nl}So please, traveler, help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005543
text: First...{nl}I should introduce myself.{nl}My name is Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005544
text: {nl}I've been researching with my colleagues ways to recover from the aftermaths of Medzio Diena.{nl}Recently we found a reaction in bracken that's different from other types of vegetation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005545
text: {nl}Since then, we started to investigate different types of bracken.{nl}That's how we ended up in the depths of Khamadon Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005546
text: {nl}Like I said before, the Red Duckies and the Blue Moglans are at war with each other.{nl}Even though they're both dangerous species, this is the first time they venture to other regions.{nl}Them being rivals is what kept the balance of the region, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005547
text: {nl}But recently that balance was lost.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005548
text: {nl}Red Duckies reproduce at a very fast rate.{nl}They're hunted by Ceuntaurus, however, so their population had been under control so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005549
text: {nl}The problem started when Centaurus fell in a deep sleep and the Ducky population started to increase.{nl}They started to outnumber the Moglans, going as far as to reach beyond Khamadon Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005550
text: {nl}My colleagues left for the big cities nearby to warn the people there and I stayed here alone.{nl}I beg you, traveler, help me stop the Red Duckies from multiplying.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005551
text: If we're going to stop the Duckies, first we need to find out as much as we can about them.{nl}The problem is my colleagues and I can't face them on our own.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005552
text: {nl}But you seem strong enough. Won't you defeat a few Red Duckies and bring them over?{nl}Meanwhile I'll collect the fragments for investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005553
text: Thank you. I just need you to defeat a few Duckies.{nl}I'll follow after you and pick up the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005554
text: {nl}I sprayed some monster repellent on myself, so don't worry.{nl}I wish I had some more... I'm really sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005555
text: I was able to collect a lot of samples.{nl}All thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005556
text: {nl}I'm going to study the samples and find a way to stop the Duckies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005557
text: But we can't depend on a single method to control the Duckies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005558
text: {nl}While I analyze the collected fragments, there's something I want to ask you.{nl}Can you help me a little more?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005559
text: Thank you.{nl}I want to test whether destroying their nests will have any impact in reducing the population.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005560
text: {nl}I'm going to give you a powerful solvent.{nl}Go to the deeper parts of the forest and use it to destroy the nests of Red Duckies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005561
text: Use the solvent at the Duckies' habitat to destroy their nests.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005562
text: Good job.{nl}I also finished analyzing the fragments.{nl}But I'm afraid the results aren't exactly positive...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005563
text: I ran several tests, but besides confirming that the Duckies have very high vitality, there was nothing else I could find.{nl}Destroying their nests doesn't seem to have worked either.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005564
text: {nl}The more you destroy them, the more new ones appear.{nl}What can we do about this...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005565
text: That's a good idea!{nl}I think I know a way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005566
text: {nl}We found a type of brown bracken growing in Gemyn Cliff and Loba Fields called Yega Bracken.{nl}Its spores have been shown to increase the abilities of animals in previous tests.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005567
text: {nl}It could very well have the same effect on Blue Moglans.{nl}I can prepare the refining process while you collect the Yega Bracken spores.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005568
text: All you need to do is gather the spores of any Yega Bracken you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005569
text: Good, good.{nl}I'm all set for the refining process too, I'll get started on the drug right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005570
text: So I've refined the spores, but I don't know if the quantities are right.{nl}We need to test the drug in a few different ratios to be sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005571
text: {nl}Once again, I'm going to need your help.{nl}Can I count on you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005572
text: Thank you. First I will need you to weaken the Blue Moglans to about 1/3.{nl}Then, use this sleep powder on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005573
text: {nl}Once the Moglans are asleep, test the drugs on them and check the results.{nl}They live in the region stretching from Virszutinis Stream to Apatynis Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005574
text: The results were outstanding.{nl}Thanks to your help, we found the ideal mix ratio to make the Blue Moglans more powerful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005575
text: The strength enhancer for the Blue Moglans is ready.{nl}Supposedly Blue Moglans have a habit of gathering all their food in one place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005576
text: {nl}We can use that to our advantage.{nl}We just need to mix in the drug with their food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005577
text: Thank you.{nl}These are the refined spores that'll enhance the strength of the Blue Moglans.{nl}Just put this drug in the places where they gather their food.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005578
text: {nl}They keep the food deep within the areas of their habitat.{nl}You can search around Apatynis Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005579
text: {nl}Meanwhile I'll keep looking for ways to weaken the Duckies.{nl}I'm really sorry to be asking all these favors to someone I just met, but thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005580
text: If we mix the refined spore drug with the Blue Moglans' food, they'll become stronger and help stop the Duckies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005581
text: Good job.{nl}Now we wait for the results.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005582
text: The Moglans have definitely become stronger, but they're still outnumbered by the Duckies.{nl}Sigh... I was hoping it wouldn't come to this, but I guess I have no choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005583
text: I have to confess something to you.{nl}Everything I'm doing right now is actually to correct a mistake my colleagues and I did...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005584
text: {nl}There's a reason the Centaurus is asleep.{nl}It was our fault. We didn't want it to interfere with the research so we lured it far away from here and drugged it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005585
text: {nl}But if the Duckies start spreading to the outside, we'll be in even deeper trouble.{nl}If we're going to try and stop it, we have no choice but to wake the Centaurus...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005586
text: {nl}I do have something in mind.{nl}Are you familiar with Astrus herbs?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005587
text: {nl}Burning these herbs releases a scent so strong people say it can wake up the dead.{nl}I think we can use these herbs to wake up the Centaurus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005588
text: {nl}I'm really sorry for all the trouble, but this is the only way.{nl}Please go to Virszutinis Stream and gather the Astrus herbs that grow there.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005589
text: I'll try and gather as much I can myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005590
text: Thank you.{nl}If we add the amounts we gathered, we should have enough herbs to wake up the Centaurus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005591
text: You'll find the Centaurus sleeping in Loba Fields.{nl}To wake it up, burn the Astrus herbs in five places around it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005592
text: Thank you so much.{nl}Just know that it could be dangerous. It's best to hide immediately after you burn all the herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005593
text: Please burn the Astrus herbs around the sleeping Centaurus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005594
text: I was waiting for you!{nl}The Centaurus went running to the region where the Duckies live.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005595
text: {nl}Luckily I heard it roar and was able to hide just in time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005596
text: {nl}It was acting a lot more vicious than I expected.{nl}Are you sure you used the Astrus herbs right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005597
text: {nl}It's calling our for other Centaurus now.{nl}This could make matters a lot worse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005598
text: Judging by how it went running to the Duckies, I'm sure their numbers are reduced by now.{nl}But the Centaurus is still not showing any signs of calming down...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005599
text: {nl}On top of that it's even calling Centaurus from other regions.{nl}This could have serious repercussions.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005600
text: {nl}I feel so sorry to you for all these mistakes.{nl}I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask you for one last thing...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005601
text: {nl}Please understand that you're my only hope.{nl}Will you defeat the Centaurus?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005602
text: I really don't know how to thank you enough.{nl}The problem now is that I don't know how I'm going to deal with all the Red Duckies with the Centaurus gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005603
text: {nl}I remember the Centaurus had a special way to overpower the Red Duckies.{nl}It would shine a red light from the crystal on its head to knock them out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005604
text: {nl}It's like they would be suddenly smitten by something.{nl}They can't recover from that state either...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005605
text: {nl}So I'm thinking; if you can get me the crystal from the Centaurus' head I could use it to control the Duckies.{nl}I think it went to Uplink Wall. I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005606
text: Defeat the Centaurus in Uplink Wall.{nl}And please bring me its crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005607
text: I'm relieved to see you're as powerful as I thought.{nl}I'm going to study the Centaurus crystal you brought and find a way to control the Duckies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005608
text: I had thought the crystal on the Centaurus' head was a single mass, but it turned out to be made of condensed particles.{nl}So the thing smiting the Duckies wasn't light, but dust coming from the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005609
text: {nl}I'm going to grind part of the crystal into a powder.{nl}Take the powder and spread it around Centrynis Field, where the Duckies are concentrating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005610
text: {nl}I want to make sure their entire habitat is affected though, so it's best if you mix the powder in with the dirt there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005611
text: I'm so sorry I keep bothering you.{nl}But if this works I can keep controlling the Ducky population with Centaurus powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005612
text: Go to Centrynis Field and mix the powder in with the dirt there.{nl}I'll be counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005613
text: Very good.{nl}I just hope this time it works.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005614
text: Success!{nl}The number of new Red Ducky nests was reduced by a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005615
text: {nl}I've noted down the components of the crystal powder.{nl}I can't replicate it exactly, but I think I can work up something similar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005616
text: {nl}But the materials...{nl}Would you do me another favor?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005617
text: {nl}I need dry bracken leaves and Blue Beetow Wings.{nl}If you bring me those materials I can make sure the Ducky population is under control for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005618
text: You can get the dry bracken leaves from Loba Fields.{nl}And don't forget the Blue Beetow Wings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005619
text: Thank you.{nl}I should get started on the Centaurus powder alternative now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005620
text: I feel so bad for all the trouble I put you through.{nl}We almost destroyed the natural balance of this region, my colleagues and I.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005621
text: {nl}In trying to stop the vegetation problem and save the people, we put everyone in even more danger.{nl}I don't even want to think what would've happened if you weren't here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005622
text: {nl}Still, offsetting the balance of the forest was my fault...{nl}From now on I'm only going to focus on maintaining Khamadon Forest the way it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005623
text: I have to thank you for all the help you've given me.{nl}I hope your path is blessed by the grace of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005624
text: Hmm?{nl}I didn't realize civilians we allowed here...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005625
text: {nl}Although, if you came all the way here, you can't be just anyone, can you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005626
text: {nl}My name's Ella.{nl}I'm here on behalf of Beikeol to collect records of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005627
text: {nl}Would you be able to help us?{nl}We're having a bit of trouble because of the Green Goblins...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005628
text: Taniel I Avenue was home to the royal library and the many bookshops that kept the ever-growing knowledge of the time.{nl}Of course, all of it was destroyed during Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005629
text: {nl}All the people with royal jobs who survived Medzio Diena are preparing for the restoration of the Kingdom.{nl}Beikeol is one of those people.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005630
text: {nl}Beikeol is working to build a foundation for the Kingdom by recovering old records lost during Medzio Diena.{nl}That is why my assistants and I are here collecting records.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005631
text: {nl}The problem is... I don't know.{nl}People are being pestered by monsters everywhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005632
text: {nl}And I realize how important these records are, but right now aren't there more important issues?{nl}I just feel like it's a waste of manpower sometimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005633
text: Recently we found some old parchment documents in the area.{nl}But for some reason the Green Goblins are also after those parchments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005634
text: {nl}My assistants were able to hide them inside some pots nearby but...{nl}We're having trouble going back for them because of the Green Goblins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005635
text: {nl}I was wondering if you could retrieve the parchments we hid in those pots.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005636
text: You'll see the pots where we hid the documents here and there.{nl}I simply need you to retrieve the documents and bring them over.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005637
text: Thank you.{nl}There really wasn't much we could do surrounded by Goblins like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005638
text: I counted all the parchments you brought but... it seems a lot of them are still missing.{nl}I assume the Goblins must have taken them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005639
text: {nl}So I was wondering...{nl}Would you defeat the Green Goblin Wizards and get back the parchments they took?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005640
text: I suspect the Green Goblins took the parchments and gave them to the Green Goblin Wizards to keep.{nl}I know it won't be easy, but please try and get the parchments from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005641
text: Thank you.{nl}I think you've recovered all the parchments now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005642
text: I still can't help but think it's all very strange though.{nl}I wonder why the Green Goblins were so interested in those parchments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005643
text: {nl}I mean, it's not like they can even read them...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005644
text: {nl}I think we should investigate the reason why they were after our documents.{nl}If anything, it could lead us to other lost parchments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005645
text: {nl}First, I want to make fake parchments to trick them.{nl}I do need chemicals for that... some contaminated tree root sap should be a good alternative.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005646
text: Take this handknife.{nl}Use it to make cuts in the roots of contaminated trees and obtain their sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005647
text: {nl}Make cuts in the tree roots with the knife to collect their sap.{nl}The sap is highly toxic though, so don't carry it for too long.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005648
text: You weren't affected by the sap, were you?{nl}I knew you could do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005649
text: With your help I finally have the fake parchments ready!{nl}It's time to go and test them on the Goblins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005650
text: {nl}If we place the fakes somewhere the Goblins can easily see them, I'm guessing they'll take them.{nl}Then, we follow them and hopefully we'll find out why they're so interested in our documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005651
text: {nl}First, I was hoping you could set up the fake parchments for the Goblins to find.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005652
text: You can put the fake parchments in place after you defeat all the Goblins around.{nl}They may not be the brightest creatures, but we can't set up the fakes with them watching.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005653
text: {nl}After that, my assistants will be in charge of following them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005654
text: I have five locations in mind for this operation.{nl}First you'll need to clear out all the Goblins in each area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005655
text: {nl}We can't let them see us plant the fake parchments.{nl}Alright, I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005656
text: Well done.{nl}We should be receiving reports from the assistants who followed the Goblins any time now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005657
text: While we wait for the reports, may I ask you a favor?{nl}I don't feel safe with all these Goblins around.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005658
text: {nl}Not only do they take our parchments, but they always end up interfering with our investigations.{nl}Can I ask you to take care of any Goblins nearby?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005659
text: Thank you.{nl}You can get rid of any Green Goblins you see wandering around.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005660
text: Please take care of the Green Goblins wandering around here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005661
text: Thank you.{nl}I've just received the reports from the assistants who went out to follow the Goblins that took our fake parchments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005662
text: According to them...{nl}The Goblins took the fake parchments to the roof of the library annex.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005663
text: {nl}The Goblins must be doing something there.{nl}We should investigate the roof of the annex.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005664
text: {nl}Although first we should stop any more documents from disappearing...{nl}If anything's causing them to disappear, I want you to take care of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005665
text: {nl}And just let me know then.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005666
text: I can't help but have a bad feeling about this.{nl}You never know when something is going to jump out at us, so be very careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005667
text: There is definitely something happening at the roof of the library annex.{nl}Go there and investigate, but make sure you're prepared first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005668
text: I never would have guessed there was a Basilisk threatening the Green Goblins...{nl}But I guess, with their main concern gone, they should leave the parchments alone now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005669
text: {nl}I really don't know how to thank you.{nl}I'll make sure to tell Beikeol all about you and your precious help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005670
text: {nl}Also, this is from me personally.{nl}I'm trying to collect all the books I can get my hands on... so I end up with more than one copy sometimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005671
text: {nl}This is a book about all past kings.{nl}It's an abridged version, and it was published before the 15th generation, so there's no information from the periods after that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005672
text: {nl}Still, all the important historical facts are in it.{nl}If you're interested in the history of the kingdom, I suggest you give it a read.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005673
text: {nl}Alright then, I hope the the grace of the goddesses will follow you on your path.{nl}And if you meet any of my assistants, please help them in any way you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005674
text: Abridged Royal Lineage

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005675
text: Zachariel: Establishes capital and initiates its construction, Orsha and Fedimian are formed and the Royal Mausoleum erected.{nl}-{nl}Jeromel: Klaipeda is founded and the Crystal Mine inaugurated, Hamondale river crossing incident occurs{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005676
text: {nl}Jeromel II: Lays the foundation for the kingdom's bureaucratic{nl}and legal system, as well as its nobility regime. Goddesses' Abode in Mt. Monderor disappears.{nl}-{nl}Taniel I: Begins construction of Tri-layered Castle Wall, polishes legal system. Kedora Merchant Alliance is established. Period of the tale of Barconsi and the gold veins.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005677
text: {nl}Taniel II: Completes construction of Three-Layered Castle Wall,{nl}inner regional frontiers nearly settled. Discovery of the Barbarian society.{nl}-{nl}Malkiel: Ascends to the throne as indirect successor after the discontinuation of King Zachariel's lineage. Nearly settles Kingdom borders and successfully wins over outside communities. The first gladiator match is hosted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005678
text: {nl}Jonael: Reigns from years 177 to 185 of the kingdom. Promulgates bill regarding nobility succession.{nl}-{nl}Sejel: Established nobility laws of previous king. First musem is founded. Folktale

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005679
text: Fedimian's Silver Coins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005680
text: takes place during his reign.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005681
text: {nl}Rowmel: Expands kingdom territory{nl}settled during King Malkiel's reign. Cultivates exchanges with foreign societies.{nl}-{nl}Rowmel II: Begins systemization of clerics by order and job.{nl}-{nl}Themomel: Introduces first systems{nl}of military-religious wizards and military clerics.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005682
text: {nl}Themomel II: Begins assignment of local governments{nl}to regions not ruled by lords. Places jurisdiction of Klaipeda and Fedimian under a mayor, rather than the aristocracy.{nl}-{nl}Chaspael: Reigns from years 329 to 348 of the kingdom. Goddess Laima's whereabouts become uncertain.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005683
text: {nl}Baltinel: Reigns from years 348{nl}to 363 of the kingdom. Era of internal instability and development of the royal army through reform of the military system.{nl}-{nl}Jusel: Greatly reorganizes the court of previous king Baltinel. Beginning of the Winterspoon family reform.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005684
text: {nl}Heathgel: Reigns for 41 years from 382 to 423. Pleads with the goddess to extend his life and thus his ownership of the throne. Wise man Maven is born.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005685
text: {nl}Ousel: Generally considered by historians{nl}as an uneventful reign, besides the fact that Kadumel was the heir to the throne. Maven builds the Great Cathedral and Ruklys begins construction of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005686
text: {nl}Kadumel: Reigns from years 450 to 478 of the kingdom. Ruklys' civil war takes place. Several prisons are constructed, including Kalejimas. Lydia Schaffen begins construction of the Astral Tower on year 470 of the Kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005687
text: {nl}Barynwell: Grants rights over{nl}the Astral Tower built by Lydia Schaffen and nearby lake. Greene family is reformed and the best wizard known to history, Agailla Flurry, is born.{nl}-{nl}Rael: Allows privileges to the Mage Tower built by Agailla Flurry. Lydia Schaffen dies of natural causes and a protocol defining the relations between templars and clerics is released.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005688
text: {nl}Rael II: Founds royal education institute.{nl}Announces measures to limit privileges to monasteries{nl}and other religious facilities but concedes to the wishes of clerics. The founder of the Hutton family is born.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005689
text: {nl}Rael III: Reigns from years 595{nl}to 601 and dies young, having denied receiving divine treatment. Tenston riot remains as the biggest incident of his short reign.{nl}-{nl}Cosomel: Ascends to the throne after dispute among heirs and appoints the shinobi who contributed to his victory to the role of master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005690
text: {nl}Gliehel: Succeeds to Cosomel{nl}after another throne dispute. Valnus and Agailla Flurry die during his reign.{nl}Lucid Winterspoon is born.{nl}-{nl}Comurel: Ascends to the throne 2 years after the demise of King Gliehel. Rimgaudas, who would become the greatest Paladin Master in history, is born.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005691
text: {nl}Sawsel: Reinforces the succession system{nl}created during King Malkiel's reign and eliminates the disputes of the previous 3 generations.{nl}Reestablishes the power of the kingdom to that of Rael II's reign. First Paladin Master signs the Gele Treaty and Tenet Church is completed.{nl}-{nl}Sawsel II: Gunpowder is discovered during his reign.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005692
text: {nl}Damiel: Not a son of Sawsel II,{nl}but ascends to the throne as the closest relative to King Zachariel's discontinued lineage, under the succession system established by Sawsel I. Nominates not his son but relative Frienel as successor in his later years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005693
text: {nl}Frienel: Era of scientific and artistic prosperity.{nl}Not a direct descendant of King Damiel, he was the one among his relatives to be fostered as his successor. Despite this, he later proclamates a law to forbid the nomination of successors.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005694
text: {nl}Nachel I: Regarded by historians as a period of national restoration. More of the world is discovered and part of the expeditions succeed.{nl}-{nl}Nachel II: Current monarch of the year 816 of our kingdom. May our king rule wisely under the guard of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005695
text: They want us to bring all the books we find around here but... easier said than done.{nl}I mean, how are we supposed to fight those Green Goblins?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005696
text: {nl}Hey.{nl}Now that I look at you...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005697
text: {nl}You seem like you could handle a few Goblins...{nl}Can you get the books for me?{nl}I'll make sure to repay you, of course.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005698
text: Wow, thanks.{nl}I really owe you one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005699
text: {nl}Alright, I'm counting on you.{nl}Just check the piles of books and, if you see any with the pages still intact, bring them over.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005700
text: Bring be any books you find still intact from the piles.{nl}And remember to be careful with those pesky Green Goblins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005701
text: Let me see... Not so shabby, these books you brought, huh?{nl}Our boss is gonna be happy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005702
text: You know, there was actually another group that came here before us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005703
text: {nl}But when we got here, we couldn't even find any traces of them, can you believe?{nl}Green Goblins must have wiped them out immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005704
text: {nl}I saw the Green Goblin Warriors and Chargers carrying their stuff around, you know?{nl}I had friends in that unit, I can tell it was their stuff.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005705
text: {nl}Unfortunately I'm way too outnumbered by them to do anything.{nl}Would you do me a huge favor and get their belongings back from the Green Goblin Warriors and Chargers?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005706
text: The Goblins that took my friends' things are the Warriors and the Chargers.{nl}The others weren't interested in their stuff, apparently.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005707
text: Just hunt the Green Goblin Warriors and Chargers and get the things that belonged to the others.{nl}I gotta pay them respects, it's the least I can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005708
text: You got back my friends' belongings.{nl}Shame what happened to them...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005709
text: {nl}This oughta calm their spirits at least.{nl}Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005710
text: Did I tell you about the other group though?{nl}There was an investigation group that came here before us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005711
text: {nl}They were a bunch of smart guys, I'm sure they found something...{nl}But with the Goblins running wild, anything they found they must have hidden somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005712
text: {nl}Us investigators have a kind of saying.{nl}If something's hidden, there's always a way to find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005713
text: Have you ever used a pendulum?{nl}This one is used only in our investigation team.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005714
text: {nl}It's a magic tool that lets you find anything hidden by another investigator in a case of emergency.{nl}I was hoping you could use it to find whatever the other group hid.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005715
text: The pendulum is gonna make other objects react to it.{nl}Just look through anything that shows a reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005716
text: A-ha...!{nl}I knew they would've hidden something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005717
text: {nl}These look like the ancient stone slates that were being stored in the library.{nl}They sure look valuable.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005718
text: {nl}Thanks.{nl}I'll make sure to tell our boss you helped.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005719
text: Thanks a lot. It if wasn't for you I'd still be hiding out here doing nothing...{nl}I wanna make it up to you, but I dunno... do you like books?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005720
text: Take this one.{nl}It's on me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005721
text: {nl}They're Lucid Winterspoon's notes.{nl}The book's a little worn out but worth the read.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005722
text: {nl}We have a few copies of this book, they won't notice if one's missing.{nl}Just don't go telling everyone I gave you the book.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005723
text: {nl}Again, thanks so much for helping.{nl}I should be on my way back to camp as soon as I can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005724
text: Lucid Winterspoon's Memoranda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005725
text: Some day in the year 679 of our kingdom{nl}-{nl}I had the chance to engage in conversation with Tesla recently. He told me his sculptures serve as a reminder of his own history, giving him the strength to continue living. Then, he asked if I, too, had such a record of my life.{nl}I told him not, and he advised me to create one myself. After carefully pondering Tesla's words, I have decided to follow his advice, as my sole elder in this world.{nl}That is how I came to start writing these records that I shall call my memoranda.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005726
text: {nl}Some day in the year 700 of our kingdom{nl}-{nl}Rimgaudas came to consult me on a church to be constructed in Gele Plateau. He had expected me to remember an architectural style I merely saw a few times before and that has since disappeared.{nl}He looks keen on suggesting I perform time navigation. I plan on telling him that, if a church is to be built behind such secrecy, it might be wiser to create something new rather than follow an old style.{nl}He seems to favor the look of Maven's Great Cathedral, however, so I don't believe he will reconsider. Construction is planned to take 7 years. I suppose I can go and congratulate him then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005727
text: {nl}Some day in the year of 749 of our Kingdom.{nl}-{nl}After ruling for 40 years, our King Sawsel's condition looks to have deteriorated. I don't expect His Highness to survive another 2 or 3 years.{nl}The work I have completed under the wisest ruler known to history in the past decades will certainly remain as a precious memory of mine for as many years as I live.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005728
text: {nl}Some day in the year of 872 of our Kingdom{nl}-{nl}Our King Nachel III's reign of half a century seems to slowly be reaching its end. I can't be certain due to the lack of records, but I don't believe a king as ever lived, or will live, to rule as long as Nachel III.{nl}While not as peaceful as the reign of Sawsel I, few are those who remember his era. Regular folk are bound to think of this as the first true period of peace in the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005729
text: {nl}Some day in the year of 876 of our Kingdom{nl}-{nl}It seems Owyn Dilven, unable to refuse our former king, has at last taken up the position of royal wizard, he who was so keen on declining the role... This ought to be the start of an interesting era.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005730
text: {nl}Some day in the year of 879 of our Kingdom{nl}-{nl}Owyn came and asked me when I plan to stop living like a hermit, away from everything. Now that the royal court has caught him, he's trying to drag me with him... I was slightly taken aback, I must say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005731
text: {nl}Yet, after he begged and insisted,{nl}I did agree to donate part of the records of my achievements to the kingdom.{nl}My first donation will be this collection of memoranda. Although I can't be sure when...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005732
