text: {nl}Some day in the year of 884 of our Kingdom{nl}-{nl}It has come to my attention that a few young magic learners are discussing whether or not{nl}I am the greatest wizard alive.{nl}Owyn Dilven is who they think of as my closest match. He is indeed the quintessential wizard of our times, as well as the court's elite wizard. He may be almost 100 years short of practice, but his skill is enough to rival my own.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005733
text: {nl}If the two of us were to battle, however,{nl}I certainly don't think he would be a match for me. But, should we continue living, that is, by using magic to lengthen our lives without dying of murder or suicide, I do believe he is bound to overpass my capacities in every sense.{nl}Although that would require another century or so to become true.{nl}The Necromancer Master is also often mentioned as our rival, but even with 100 years of training she will never outplay me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005734
text: {nl}Some day in the year of 890 of our Kingdom{nl}-{nl}Someday I wish to add something to what I've written in these records. The wizards have been discussing duels, but neither I, Owyn, nor anyone is as powerful as Agailla Flurry at the moment. And it isn't simply a question of magical power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005735
text: {nl}She is exceptionally robust, and her vision{nl}broader than anyone's. The rest of us can only look to her in reverence.{nl}A few episodes little known to the world perfectly illustrate the extension of her capacities.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005736
text: {nl}There was the time she unprecedentedly came{nl}to be the successor of a goddess to fulfill the request of another divinity. Another time, she developed a plan to overthrow a demon lord's grandiose and cruel plans to hurt humanity by signing a contract.{nl}In the end, she eradicated the demon lord entirely and became the sole person, aside from the goddesses and other transcendental beings, to ever enter the Fantasy Library. This incident in itself allowed her to then thwart Giltine's plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005737
text: {nl}In her quest to do good, she brought{nl}the goddess to the Mage Tower, and using a Demon Lord she obstructed the plans of the Demon Goddess herself. This alone should suffice to prove her greatness to the world, I believe.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005738
text: {nl}Perhaps not now, but someday the entire{nl}world will know of her feats. If not these, then other, higher achievements{nl}that will further heighten the reputation of Agailla Flurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005739
text: I am Investigator Horatio.{nl}I came after receiving orders to collect the records of Nigine Bazaar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005740
text: {nl}I believe I already collected everything worth gathering up here.{nl}It wasn't easy avoiding being sighted by the Green Goblins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005741
text: {nl}Thought I do think most of the useful records will be inside the building.{nl}Would you perhaps help me investigate the interior?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005742
text: First, I'm going to need some rope to pull the books with.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005743
text: {nl}The vines growing on the roof of the Lazsmo Workshop are rather sturdy and long, they ought to work.{nl}Would you gather some vines and bring them to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005744
text: You can find the vines growing on top of the Lazsmo Workshop roof.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005745
text: This should be enough to work out a rope.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005746
text: It's the first time I see a traveler here.{nl}Although, you must have your reasons to come all the way to such a dangerous place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005747
text: {nl}Myself, I received orders to search this building for royal records.{nl}I can't search the inside without some source of light, however...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005748
text: {nl}I've seen the Goblin Shamans use a sort of gem before.{nl}I don't know what type of powers they have, but they seem to emit light.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005749
text: {nl}I'm wondering if those gems wouldn't help me see inside the building.{nl}Would you hunt the Green Goblin Shamans and bring me their gems?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005750
text: Thank you.{nl}I will be taking care of other preparations meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005751
text: {nl}Only the Green Goblin Shamans seem to carry the gems.{nl}Hunt them and bring me some of their glowing gems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005752
text: Well done.{nl}I should have nothing to worry about now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005753
text: I'm all set to start.{nl}I'll begin investigating the inside of the building now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005754
text: {nl}I wonder if you could clear out any Green Goblins nearby while I investigate.{nl}I can't risk one of them cutting my vines.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005755
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll be going down now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005756
text: Thank you.{nl}A lot of materials were are kept inside as I thought.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005757
text: {nl}I need to report to our chief so we can begin proper investigations inside the building.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005758
text: I would never have dared to search the inside of the building without your help.{nl}I don't know how I can repay... Oh, come to think of it, there is something I can give you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005759
text: This is the tale of Barconsi and the gold vein goblin.{nl}The Kedora Alliance believes this tale is true... tricking a demon isn't that hard after all, or so it seems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005760
text: {nl}Oh, don't worry. This is only a manuscript.{nl}We're keeping the original for reporting purposes, so you can have it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005761
text: {nl}I'm very glad you accept my gift.{nl}I hope the grace of the goddesses accompanies you in your travels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005762
text: Barconsi and the Gold Vein Goblin

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005763
text: This story takes place in the time of King Taniel I.{nl}While never recorded as part of the history of the kingdom, this tale was passed down in documents belonging to the Kedora Merchant Alliance until 150 years ago, during the reign of King Wardel, when it became registered in the royal archives.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005764
text: {nl}The story is believed to have been registered{nl}by archivists of the time under the assumption that it was merely a folktale.{nl}I, for one, would say otherwise. Thinking about this story at the time of the millenary, 50 years after the reign of King Wardel, I can't help but wonder if it isn't in fact a record of true events.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005765
text: {nl}Year 1002 of the Kingdom{nl}By Royal Recorder Dena Jonas{nl}There stood Barconsi, head of the Kedora Merchant Alliance, fearless before the enraged demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005766
text: {nl}Ever so brazen, he confronted the demon.{nl}[I told you before and I'll tell you again.{nl}Are you so keen on disregarding the words of humans?{nl}The gold veins of this mountain belong to the Kedora Merchant Alliance.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005767
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin was more than bewildered{nl}by Barconsi's audacious stance.{nl}[I have lived for many, many years,{nl}but never have I seen a human so impertinent.]{nl}[What good is it, really?{nl}I am telling you the gold veins are ours.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005768
text: {nl}[I'll concede you partial rights to them{nl}as fellow explorers of the mountain. But claiming they are all yours doesn't make the slightest sense. You have no way to prove you were the first to find the gold veins.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005769
text: {nl}To this, Barconsi replied:{nl}[What you say is true, and I will not try to prove it. On the other hand, are you sure that finding something first grants you the rights to it? I can't seem to remember any such laws existing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005770
text: {nl}Furthermore, my philosophy as head of the Alliance is that the way one uses wealth is more important than how one earns it. Based on that, I believe it is only right for us to keep this gold, as we would give it the most proper use. In other words, you may have claimed the beginnings,{nl}but we will claim the end.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005771
text: {nl}[How is that anything more than absolutely groundless?]{nl}[You, my friend, are the one known for fooling others with your twisted logic. It doesn't sound{nl}like you have any authority to accuse me of groundless arguments, wouldn't you say?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005772
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin tried as he could to calm himself, not wanting to show any signs of backing down. A few moments passed before he took a step back and spoke.{nl}[Very well. What are your plans for the gold, then?]{nl}[I don't see a reason to tell you what we will be doing with our gold, but if you insist... What will you give me if I tell you?]{nl}[Why would I give you anything?]{nl}[I'm the head of a merchant alliance. You didn't think you could get information from me for free, did you?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005773
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin, for a brief moment,{nl}break the centuries-old tradition and crush this insolent human. However, his even greater love of a good fargument brought his spirit up. He in turn, welcomed such a fearless challenger in ages.{nl}[Alright, I will tell you what I would be do with the gold when I obtain the gold vein.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005774
text: {nl}At that point, Baroconsi replied.{nl}[Huh? Are you trying to purchase our gold?]{nl}[What do you mean?]{nl}[Like I have said before, you don't listen, do you? You said you will tell me what you are going to do with the gold veins when you obtain them. Obtaining implies that you are not in possession of the object. Am I right?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005775
text: {nl}What he has just heard turned his stomach around once more{nl}but decided to endure it and asked again.{nl}[These gold veins shall be used to build the walls around the capital of the Kingdom.]{nl}[Ah that plan of Taniel a human king.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005776
text: {nl}[You are correct. We will use the gold from these veins{nl}as our fund and start a business of selling supplies and building materials to the Kingdom and make profit from the practice.]{nl}[If that is your purpose, I can never let you have them.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005777
text: {nl}[If that is your answer.{nl}let's settle this through a game or a bet that you love so much.]{nl}Once the word 'game' came out, Rumpelstiltskin's eyes gleamed with interest.{nl}[A game. I admit, you got my interest. I must warn you I rarely lose in games.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005778
text: {nl}Once Baroconsi heard this. he replied.{nl}[Since you are so confident, it wouldn't matter if I choose the game right? Since you are good at everything.]{nl}[It doesn't bother me.{nl}Let's start already.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005779
text: {nl}[Okay. Let's. As for the game,{nl}how about we ask each other questions about the veins. A true owner of these veins must be able to answer without any hesitation, right?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005780
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin thought about the proposal for a moment.{nl}The opponent is a human who have just discovered them. There was no way a powerful demon like him{nl}could ever be beaten by an ordinary human. He accepted the proposal.{nl}[Alright. I like it. Go on.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005781
text: {nl}Once Rumpelstiltskin accepted the idea, a further discussion on some ground rules and details went on and finally they reached an agreement. One of the terms was one could ask three questions to the other. Baroconsi started his question.{nl}[How many carriages would be needed to transport all of the gold in these veins?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005782
text: {nl}A powerful demon like Rumpelstiltskin{nl}could not even begin to fathom the answer even if he had clairvoyance, he wouldn't be able to answer it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005783
text: {nl}He thought about it but after a while, he figure{nl}even Baroconsi would not answer this question so he gave up. His reasoning was{nl}if Baroconsi doesn't know the answer as well, the round is a draw.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005784
text: {nl}But as soon as Rumpelstiltskin gave up, Baroconsi answered{nl}[One carriage as big as these veins would certainly carry all the gold. So the answer is one.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005785
text: {nl}This, of course, infuriated Rumpelstiltskin and protested that that was not fair.{nl}Baroconsi did not even flinch and silently started at the giant demon who can easily squahs him with a tip of his finger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005786
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin eventually calmed down a bit. It was not in his nature to stop a game once it started. Furthermore, he took great pleasure from defeating his opponent no matter the circumstances or conditions. So he continued.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005787
text: {nl}Baroconsi asked another question{nl}[My second question is this. You and I guess the amount of gold these veins would produce in a year and the one to guess the closest wins this round.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005788
text: {nl}At the question, Rumpelstiltskin added.{nl}[This time no trick with the scales. I will not tolerate such cheap trick anymore. And if you still do, I win.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005789
text: {nl}Baroconsi stared at Rumpelstiltskin straight in the eyes.{nl}Showing no sign of fear. {nl}Even when standing before a demon with infernal flame coming out of his head and razor sharp teeth gleaming with cruelty.{nl}[I give you my word on it. No scale trick this time.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005790
text: {nl}[I wil go first this time.{nl}By human technology, the amount of gold that can be mined from these veins will be the same as the amount of 17,200 people can carry. With a margin of error of 3 people. If you say a number close to what I have just said and claim that your number is closer. I will take that as a forefeit.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005791
text: {nl}Baroconsi replied.{nl}[I am not quite sure how that would make it a win for you but it's irrelevant for I have a different number. My number is 0.]{nl}[What?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005792
text: {nl}[0. Nil. Nada. To be more precise,{nl}for next year, the veins will not yield any gold. 0 of any scale is still 0.]{nl}[That only applies if you are in charge. If I am the master, I can simply make that answer incorrect by taking a small chunk right now!]{nl}[Be my guest, if you can.]{nl}[What makes you think I can't?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005793
text: {nl}[Well, you have a habit of not listening to other people.{nl}I have already told you that the Kedora Merchant Alliance has the ownership of these gold veins{nl}and the Alliance always back its claim with evidences. Simply put we were aware of this place long before you came along.{nl}Frankly, we were waiting for you to arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005794
text: {nl}We have set up a barrier that no demon can ever cross{nl}The barrier will last for a year from now.{nl}That means you cannot ever touch the gold here.{nl}These facts make my guess not a guess but an accurate answer.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005795
text: {nl}[I will not have it. The second question is null.{nl}Or at least a draw.]{nl}Baroconsi did not argued with the demon's claim at all and continued.{nl}[Alright, the round is a draw. That means the next question will be a tie-breaker. I asked the questions twice in a row, so, it's only fair you do the question.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005796
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin was puzzled by his calm acceptance.{nl}But he did get what he wanted and it was his turn to ask. so his mind quickly became occupied with making a question. He thought about it for a moment and asked{nl}[Who will be the owner of these gold veins in one year?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005797
text: {nl}The question was immediately followed by a stern warning from Rumpelstiltskin.{nl}[If you say the Kedora Merchant Alliance or any other person or entity, I will devour every single one of you. Of course, such task could not be done instantly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005798
text: {nl}but a year worth of time is enough. Enough to end you{nl}or any other fool who dares to claim the ownership. That fear would spread and the fools will stop. Besides, the barrier you claimed to have put will be over by then. No matter what the circumstance is the answer is absolute and only one. Isn't it?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005799
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin glowing with a sense of victory looked at{nl} Baroconsi. The countenance of Baroconsi did not alter at all. As if to show he has been expecting the demon's answer all along simply answered.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005800
text: {nl}[The owner of the gold veins in one year's time would be you,{nl}Rumpelstiltskin.] Rumpelstiltskin was somewhat troubled by lack of disappoinment in Baroconsi's face but was joyous and said.{nl}[Yes, you admitted yourself. I am the owner of this place! So I win! Haha!]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005801
text: {nl}[Not necessarily.]{nl}[What do you mean?]{nl}[I win two rounds and one was a draw. The score is 2 to nil. We won the game and we are the owner of this place.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005802
text: {nl}The demon countered. {nl}[Even if that is true, you've said it yourself, I will be the master in one year. That means, the gold veins become mine.{nl}And furthermore, you are bound by your own words that you will not be able to mine any gold from here. That means, I de facto own them.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005803
text: {nl}[Indeed. Now, let's get down to business.{nl}Literally. Let's negotiate.]{nl}[What's the meaning of this?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005804
text: {nl}[Business negotiation. We, the Kedora Merchant Alliance, will sell you{nl}this gold mine to you for a price.{nl}Name your price right, we will even disable the barrier. That could technically make the amount of gold extract more than 0, as we've previously established.{nl}The result of this game might change but that's just a simple paradox puzzle...]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005805
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin saw the man, Baroconsi, before his very eyes{nl}talking quite vaguely about pros and cons of the deal, the method of the transaction and a simple logical solution to the simple paradox puzzle mentioned before. The demon said to himself.{nl}[Contrary to what you've said, perhaps I am too trusting of people's words.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005806
text: {nl}Not much is known how the deal went down exactly.{nl}According to one version of the story, Rumpelstiltskin paid a massive amount of silver to the Kedora Merchant Alliance and bought the gold mine. The demon did not touch the gold for he considered the deal to be his defeat.{nl}Rumpelstiltskin who has been almost unbeatable in a game or a bet had only three losses. This story was his first and the last was with Lydia Schaffen.{nl}As it is known by many, after the game with Lydia Schaffen, Rumpelstiltskin became unable to win or lose, not even participate in a game.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005807
text: I'll be able to restore damaged regions like Orsha or the Thorn Forest back to normal...{nl}It might even open a path to being able to prevent a second Medzio Diena from happening.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005808
text: That's why I want you to go get some red demon blood.{nl}As a recruit you can do this much, no?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005809
text: Should I just join the Order of the Tree of Truth?{nl}If I did, would I be able to escape this hunger?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005810
text: Don't underestimate the power of the sinister idol.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005811
text: The demons are acting quite peculiar...{nl}I worry for Goddess Dalia...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005812
text: Goddess would have wanted us to stay in the cave and stay on post.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005813
text: I wonder Serija is okay.{nl}Her health is not in the prestine condition, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005814
text: Thank you, Savior.{nl}All your hard work shall never go unnoticed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005815
text: Perhaps, Goddess Dalia is watching over us even now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005816
text: I am truly sorry.{nl}I should have kept Goddess Dalia safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005817
text: Ah...if I had kept Goddess Dalia safe...{nl}She wouldn't have made that decision...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005818
text: I cannot apologize enough for Goddess Dalia drunk with darkness.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005819
text: It's no use...{nl}I can feel the darkness filling up inside me again...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005820
text: Leave me alone, I beg you...{nl}I am bound to be consumed by chaos.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005821
text: Remember, Savior.{nl}The one who can save Goddess Dalia is you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005822
text: You came, Savior.{nl}You've fought well for us and for Goddess Dalia.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005823
text: Goddess Dalia's decision...I expected it.{nl}She did what she thought was for the best.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005824
text: Do not ever forget our promise.{nl}Save Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005825
text: What deliberate cruelty!{nl}They even tampered with the teleportation magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005826
text: Oversight...{nl}Didn't expect a surprise attack from behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005827
text: Who could have done this?{nl}Could it be a demon or someone with other intents?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005828
text: A traveler to a place like this? Now that's a rare occasion.{nl}My name is Jaonus.{nl}I belong to a newly-formed small order to uphold the will of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005829
text: {nl}I came to this place when I heard that the refugees are in danger.{nl}I suspect the evil energy of this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005830
text: {nl}It is the will of the goddess to wipe out the monsters and help the refugees.{nl}How about joining our order?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005831
text: Good.{nl}Now, help me a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005832
text: We will talk more about joining our order after we take care of the evil energy here.{nl}The monsters here are not only pestering the refugees but hinder my research on the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005833
text: {nl}A clean up might be in order.{nl}Please, wipe out a horde of pags.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005834
text: I am counting on you.{nl}Having them out will greatly help the purification process.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005835
text: You've came back.{nl}Good work.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005836
text: Hm.... you saw a ghost after cleaning up the monsters?{nl}I believe they are those who have perished by the monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005837
text: Poor souls.{nl}We need to stop this atrocity as quickly as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005838
text: Even with your help, oncoming hordes of monsters continue.{nl}They need to be wiped out so that we can purify and set up a new base of our order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005839
text: A different approach might be in order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005840
text: {nl}Inside the Room of Consciousness, there is our altar.{nl}We've built it to worship Goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005841
text: With the power of the altar, we can drive out those monsters.{nl}But it still lack the divine energy yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005842
text: {nl}Could you defeat monsters and retrieve their cores? They can be used to charge up the altar.{nl}Pam Clamper's core might be ideal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005843
text: Well, there might be some relevance.{nl}Offer Pag Clamper cores, the divine energy of the altar will charge up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005844
text: Please, bring pag clamper cores from pag clampers.{nl}Again, thank you for your service.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005845
text: After this mission, let's get straight to business of processing your application to the order.{nl}Pag Clamper Core, remember.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005846
text: Ah...{nl}Welcome back, but...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005847
text: It seems it's not enough.{nl}It's for the best to do it once and do it right. Further preparation is in order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005848
text: There is a coffin in the Hunne Memorial Room.{nl}Inside it, there are some objects. Could you get them?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005849
text: Well... they are...{nl}Souls of the followers will add the divine energy to the altar.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005850
text: So please, retrieve the keepsakes inside the coffin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005851
text: With this mission, we can definitely drive out the monsters away with the power of the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005852
text: Hmm...well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005853
text: All set.{nl}It's all going smoothly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005854
text: Now, go to the altar and let's test it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005855
text: Failed again...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005856
text: Huh? Were are there?{nl}Never mind what just happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005857
text: Well, I did notify other followers about you and how you wish to join us.{nl}I have some unfinished business to resolve. I believe you are needed at Tymeris Sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005858
text: {nl}A beliver called Costas will be waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005859
text: Costas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005860
text: You must be the one whom Jaonus has been talking about.{nl}I am Costas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005861
text: {nl}Just a couple of things you need to do and then you are welcome to join us.{nl}Firstly, we need to gather the scattered Doctrine chapters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005862
text: {nl}Doctrine has been scattered when the monsters attacked.{nl}As you know, the recent upsurge in monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005863
text: Then, godspeed.{nl}This won't be too difficult.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005864
text: I want to help you on the quest but I have urgent business to take care of....{nl}Just retrieve non-damaged ones, please.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005865
text: They are scattered around.{nl}Some might have been torn up by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005866
text: You've found all the important sections of Doctrine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005867
text: {nl}Ah, this one is far too damaged. There is no need for it.{nl}Thank you for you hard work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005868
text: All we need to do now is,{nl}light up a campfires that detects and purify the evil energy at in Nagyt Stone Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005869
text: {nl}We set up the place, so all that is left is oil to keep the holy fire burning.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005870
text: {nl}As for the oil, Blue Pag Dopers near the room.{nl}Please, gather the oil from them and light the campfires.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005871
text: There aren't that many of the campfires so securing the oil is the main task.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005872
text: I need to finish up inscribing on the wall...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005873
text: Thank you so much.{nl}Now, you are part of the order!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005874
text: There is an order that worships Goddess at Tymeris Temple?{nl}Never heard of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005875
text: {nl}That so-called Doctrine is... blasphemous.{nl}All those heretics, ever since the disappearance of Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005876
text: {nl}Take that Doctrine to Judge Rymis in Fedimian suburbs.{nl}He will know something about this "order."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005877
text: Welcome, what brought you to this place, my child?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005878
text: {nl}Ah..{nl}The Priest Master sent you to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005879
text: Based on what I have read from that Doctrine. It is certainly not orthodox.{nl}Please, make haste and consult with Rymis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005880
text: {nl}Rymis is in Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005881
text: The writings are partially unintelligible but what I can make out are phrases like Giltine...Death....Praise.{nl}They certainly are not normal order that worship Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005882
text: Welcome back.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005883
text: Book of Judgement, when seen, running away is the usual response.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005884
text: Well done.{nl}Failure would certainly slow them down.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005885
text: On that day,  the Order of the Tree of Truth problem will be solved and I will deal with this myself.{nl}Thank you for your service.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005886
text: My friends all seem to have fallen asleep, no one is responding{nl}It wasn't a monster attack, was it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005887
text: A suspicious group of heretics in Tymeris Temple...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005888
text: {nl}So, this is their Doctrine, eh?{nl}Heavily damaged but some parts are intelligible.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005889
text: {nl}I did hear there was a group that broke away from the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}They were said to be too radical even for the Order of the Tree of Truth. When I said they 'broke away' it was more like 'they were casted out'

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005890
text: {nl}They are trying to set up a headquarter that.{nl}But I cannot leave this place because of the whole Order of the Tree of Truth business...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005891
text: Please, reform those heretics.{nl}Take this book with you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005892
text: They are fairly new. There won't be that many people.{nl}The book reacts to the heretics that refuse to be reformed. It will guide you in your task.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005893
text: May Goddess watch over your path.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005894
text: Doctrine is far too damaged.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005895
text: Something is covering the page, rendering it unreadable.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005896
text: The ink is smudged.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005897
text: Something written on the wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005898
text: What are these souls?{nl}What happened, here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005899
text: What chaos...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005900
text: {nl}Oh hello.{nl}My name is Hilda.{nl}I somehow survived and came to be here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005901
text: {nl}Could...could you help us?{nl}There are two cupoles, not a day go by without their constant bickering with each other.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005902
text: {nl}There is nothing we could to about it and we are looking for someone to help us on this.{nl}Could you either make them be friends with each other or resolve the conflict?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005903
text: You would do that for us? Oh thank you so much.{nl}The cupoles can be see at Dvynai Hills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005904
text: I trust you would do a great job.{nl}We don't know what they would do and when.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005905
text: A traveler to this place? That is something rare.{nl}I am Lina.{nl}I am in charge of leading souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005906
text: {nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, the autumn leaves are not as they seem.{nl}Usually, the autumn leaves represent hope of new leaves and the well-deserved rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005907
text: {nl}However, these autumn leaves have stopped growing and went into eternal dying.{nl}I have been searching for a way to bring life back to those trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005908
text: {nl}This, I believe, is for the best.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005909
text: I am in charge of providing trees with supplements.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005910
text: {nl}Why am I not using the Kupole power? I alone cannot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005911
text: {nl}Thank you for volunteering to help us.{nl}To get what we need to craft, obtaining Nutta Fluid from Nuttafly and Nuttabug would be in order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005912
text: The forest is far too big for me to do it alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005913
text: That was quite quick.{nl}Thank you so much for your service.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005914
text: That seems to be sufficient.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005915
text: Now, could you gather up the leaves that will be used as main ingredients for making the supplement?{nl}The piles of leaves can be easily found at Netting Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005916
text: Those leaves combined with the fluid you've brought can be mixed and make the supplement.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005917
text: Please, be safe.{nl}I will prepare the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005918
text: Making the supplements is not hard, at least I have gotten used to it but gathering materials on the other hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005919
text: That seems to be enough leaves.{nl}Please, wait a moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005920
text: I will mix the leaves with the processed materials to make the supplements.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005921
text: The supplements are all ready.{nl}Could you get these to Popot Stream?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005922
text: There, you will find a bottle that I have set up.{nl}Just fill it in with the supplement.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005923
text: I will await for your triumphant return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005924
text: A traveler? What business would you have with me?{nl}Why I broke the bottle?{nl}Well these should not be here!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005925
text: {nl}I don't know why Lina keeps trying to reverse the path of nature?{nl}The leaves keep the plants down. Reviving them will unleash the plants.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005926
text: {nl}Who is going to deal with that, eh?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005927
text: You think so too, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005928
text: I just don't understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005929
text: Just for a moment, I was away. She creates more mess.{nl}What am I going to do with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005930
text: So you've met Aeglei?{nl}Did he break the bottles again, I presume.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005931
text: {nl}Aeglei says that I will unleash the plant outbreak but if we leave it alone, it won't be just leaves.{nl}Every single plant life will fall as if it is in the middle of particularly harsh Winter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005932
text: {nl}I must protest Aeglei's thoughtless action.{nl}I just don't understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005933
text: {nl}But thanks anyway.{nl}If you don't want to be involved with the whole Aeglei and I situation, you can stop helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005934
text: You came back?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005935
text: You want to help me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005936
text: What are you really up to?{nl}I don't need your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005937
text: I saw you helping Lina, why don't you go back to her?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005938
text: You're still here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005939
text: Alright, if ya really wanna help, drive away nearby monsters.{nl}They pester me while I am fixing the mess left by Lina.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005940
text: If you can't, go back to Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005941
text: I got my hands full fixing her mess.{nl}But if not me, who will?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005942
text: What? You really drove them off?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005943
text: You are serious, aren't you?{nl}If that is the case, let me ask you a favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005944
text: {nl}Lina has messed around with this place quite a bit and I cannot do it alone.{nl}Please, check up on Bethez and Tjibes Refuges and see if any more of Lina's business is there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005945
text: She sent you here that must mean she did something here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005946
text: When will I ever stop cleaning up after her.{nl}So frustrating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005947
text: Ah welcome back.{nl}Hmm... nothing suspicious was found, eh.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005948
text: Well, thank you for checking up on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005949
text: Ah, this is a communication device to communicate with other kupoles while out staying here tending the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005950
text: Jaonus disappeared without any answer.{nl}Let's go to the Consciousness Room, he talked about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005951
text: This supplement bottle is full.{nl}Let's find another one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005952
text: Aeglei and Lina still constantly bicker with each other but neither the autumn leaves nor plant outbreaks are happening anywhere.{nl}As if the forest has found an equilibrium.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005953
text: There is no sign of Lina's devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005954
text: I thought regularly injecting the trees with supplements will revive the dying autumn leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005955
text: In the name of Thomas Iquinostasys, the day of judgement upon all the heretic will come.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005956
text: The forest is dying.{nl}The autumn leaves are the proofs.{nl}We must save the trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005957
text: I cannot thank you enough.{nl}Thanks to you, we have found a way to keep the forest's equilibrium.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005958
text: I will maintain it along with Aeglei and keep the townspeople away from harm.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005959
text: You feel strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005960
text: Ha...I just cannot understand Lina.{nl}Plant outbreaks will put all of the townspeople in danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005961
text: Her heart is in the right place, I admit but she doesn't have any foresight.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005962
text: A travel, I see.{nl}Welcome.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005963
text: I am Brunonas a forest keeper.{nl}I came here to help Chronomancer Ida on investigating the autumn leaves phenomenon in this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005964
text: I mean, my life as a forest keeper made me curious also.{nl}So I asked the woodsmen and herbalists nearby to help our investigation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005965
text: From what I know, the whole thing started after Medzio Diena.{nl}Ida thinks it goes further than that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005966
text: {nl}I don't know why she would think like that.{nl}If you are so keen to find out, how about helping me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005967
text: Good to hear.{nl}I am a mission from Ida to check up on Raffye Crossroads among other things.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005968
text: While I take care of the other tasks, could you go and check up on Raffye Crossroads for me?{nl}You might have to defend yourself on your way there from the monster, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005969
text: Come back to me, after you check it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005970
text: You came back.{nl}Did the monsters give you any trouble?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005971
text: Ah yes.{nl}The autumn leaves themselves display nothing unusual.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005972
text: {nl}The same goes for the ones I have search as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005973
text: If possible, could I ask you one more favor?{nl}You might have seen some patches of moss on Raffye Trail.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005974
text: They are hidden behind the rocks, I presume.{nl}Could you grab some samples for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005975
text: Thanks.{nl}Now, I need to write down what I have found here for Ida.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005976
text: {nl}Ida asked for the findings in a report form.{nl}If I can just determine the type of moss, I can send this in right away. So, could you please gather some moss samples?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005977
text: I will be finishing up my report.{nl}Thank you for doing this for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005978
text: Ah, you've came back.{nl}Let me see.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005979
text: {nl}Hmm, these are Blue Nheto Moss. The kind only grows in autumn.{nl}Just as I thought.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005980
text: {nl}Then, here is the report Ida asked me to write.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005981
text: {nl}On your way to Ida, could you retrieve the reports from the aforementioned woodsman and herbalist?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005982
text: {nl}Ida will tell you about a thing or two regarding the cause, when she get these reports.{nl}After that, could you bring them back to me as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005983
text: Brunonas told me to go?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005984
text: {nl}As you heard, I am doing what Brunonas asked me to do.{nl}That is also Ida's request.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005985
text: {nl}As for me, I cannot refuse such request.{nl}My livelihood is in jeopardy with this prolonged autumn, after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005986
text: {nl}I just need a couple more of herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005987
text: You will help me?{nl}Now, that's really good news.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005988
text: The tricky ones, I will handle them. So, all you have to do is get some yellow Lyciu Herbrs at Pjama Resting Place.{nl}Just finding something yellow in middle of red would not be that difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005989
text: Lyciu Herbs.{nl}Their yellow color do make them stand out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005990
text: LI wish you all the good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005991
text: You've got them alright.{nl}That seems to be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005992
text: Now, just one for thing and we are done here.{nl}I would have to finish up my report so could you get them for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005993
text: For naked human eyes, they are hard to find. But with the help of Iyran.{nl}It's not too bad.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005994
text: Vhelis is a root of some sort. Not leavess, nor flowers. Roots.{nl}It has a distinctive scent but undetectable by humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005995
text: {nl}Let Iyran works its magic.{nl}If he doesn't follow you, use this whistle. This'll bring call him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005996
text: Iyran is smart and he will let you know straight away.{nl}And you can call it straight away via the whistle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005997
text: Iyran is a smart boy, isn't he?{nl}Of course, he is. Look at the amount he got.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005998
text: Now. Let me just finish the report.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_005999
text: Here you go. All done.{nl}like Brunonas said go to the woodsmans and he will give you the other report.{nl}Godspeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006000
text: Ah, you are here for the report, aren't you?{nl}I did hear it from Brunonas but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006001
text: Recently, chopping down the trees have been booming. And I cannot keep up the demand.{nl}That slowed me down a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006002
text: If the matter is that urgent, could you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006003
text: Well, with you on my team, I feel relieved.{nl}Go to the Kunck Logging Area and you will find the piles of woods I have made.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006004
text: {nl}Just check up on them, would ya?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006005
text: Just make sure the piles of firewood are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006006
text: Ah, well come back.{nl}Huh? Strange powder?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006007
text: {nl}Those are from me. mushroom spores.{nl}The dry atmosphere dried them up quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006008
text: {nl}It certainly is a good day to chop woods.{nl}Not so much for growing mushrooms though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006009
text: I will be finishing up my report for Ida.{nl}So, could you do the check up for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006010
text: Lately, there have been some strange incidents, though.{nl}Like trees with strange rings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006011
text: On Yvass Hill, please check the rings of trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006012
text: Just have a glance at them would be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006013
text: I have been a lumberjack for quite a long time.{nl}I will put it in my report.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006014
text: How were the tree rings?{nl}As I expected, none at the outer region right?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006015
text: {nl}Just as I thought.{nl}Now, take this report.{nl}Along with the other report, take them to Ida.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006016
text: You have already checked this pile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006017
text: What do I owe the pleasure?{nl}Ah, the reports from Cesaris, Dowedas and Brunonas/{nl}Thanks for all your trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006018
text: {nl}I am Ida an apprentice to the Chronomancer Master.{nl}The Master has requested me to investigate the autumn leave anomaly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006019
text: {nl}I have already asked the nearby native workers here.{nl}The refuges are not all that familiar with the anomaly after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006020
text: {nl}Hmmm like what the master has expected.{nl}If possible, could you help me on a couple of experiments?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006021
text: Firstly, could you retrieve some blood samples from the monster?{nl}I need to test my master's theory.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006022
text: Then, I will leave the blood samples up to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006023
text: That was rather fast.{nl}Now, show me the blood samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006024
text: That is more than enough for the experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006025
text: The blood is not going through clotting. As I have expected.{nl}Under normal circumstances, they should have been clotted quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006026
text: {nl}The master said that Medzio Diena is not the sole cause of the autumn leave anomaly.{nl}The axis of time itself is broken.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006027
text: {nl}Only one last thing to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006028
text: Take this bloom sample and go to a place outside the autumn leaves forest.{nl}If it gets clotted, then verification is complete.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006029
text: {nl}Could you take this sample at get to Outer Wall District 8?{nl}That is the nearest exit after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006030
text: How did the blood samples react?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006031
text: Just as we expected.{nl}The master was right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006032
text: {nl}This proves that the time itself is broken and this place is frozen at autumn.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006033
text: {nl}The flow of time is broken and autumn continues.{nl}In other areas, the plant growths have experienced anomalies on their own.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006034
text: {nl}That means that Medzio Diena did not only affect the plant growths but also the flow of time itself.{nl}As a proof, the autumn leaves persist in this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006035
text: {nl}I should finish up the report.{nl}One last favor to ask of you. Could you give the report to my master?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006036
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I have some more tasks left for me here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006037
text: Just let my master know of the report.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006038
text: The report will do the talking.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006039
text: Ah, what seems to be the matter?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006040
text: You came in Ida's stead?{nl}So the results, how were they?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006041
text: Just as I expected. Medzio Diena is not the direct cause after all.{nl}The passage of time in that specific region is experiencing a some sort of freezing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006042
text: {nl}Medzio Diena not only caused the overgrowth of the plants but also the time itself.{nl}The problem is limited to that specific area though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006043
text: What did Ida think of all this?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006044
text: Ah, she as well?{nl}The time of autumn is frozen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006045
text: I hope the Chronomancer Master and Ida sort this whole thing out.{nl}Autumn is killing the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006046
text: Thank you for letting me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006047
text: Monsters using the divine energy... I cannot begin to understand but I am to do as told.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006048
text: Ah, a traveler I see.{nl}My name is Morkus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006049
text: {nl}I represent all the good people who have settled down here after Medzio Diena.{nl}What worries me is that the soldiers with whom we have been together so far have disappeared. And we are currently investigating their whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006050
text: {nl}The soldiers are the family of the refuges.{nl}Even my brother is one of them. Fortunately, the journal he left is the clue at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006051
text: {nl}I came here cause I heard the soldiers were stationed here.{nl}The journal contains some clues but it is difficult for me to move about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006052
text: Thank you for doing this for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006053
text: {nl}We are about to despair because we did not have any help.{nl}Some are even on the brink of madness. Worried sick about their friends and families' whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006054
text: Head Villager Morkus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006055
text: Then, let's look at the jounral for clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006056
text: Where did all the soldiers go?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006057
text: How can I even begin to relay the news to the villagers?!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006058
text: One of the early entries say this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006059
text: This is madness. Autumn leaves don't grow back even if you paint them green.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006060
text: It seems that they were trying to make the leaves green again by painting them.{nl}I will give you the organic solvent to verify this. Could you check them for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006061
text: {nl}If only, the leaves regain their true color...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006062
text: If the journal is accurate, something happened to the soldiers during the mission.{nl}If painting the leaves green is indeed true.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006063
text: I will pray for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006064
text: Whatever happened to the soldiers?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006065
text: The leaves were indeed painted green!{nl}That verifies the conent of the journal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006066
text: According to the jounral's other entries, it talks of a tree with all the leaves fallen out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006067
text: Now, they are stitching the leaves back on the tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006068
text: Going insane... or perhaps already have.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006069
text: The state of soldiers is exacerbating.{nl}Cursed or affected by something?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006070
text: Please, let me know if the claim is true.{nl}If you come across a strange looking tree. Give it a shake...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006071
text: {nl}Now, the leaves didn't flutter, eh? The journal must be telling the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006072
text: The soldiers must have been in a terrible situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006073
text: I pray they are safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006074
text: The leaves stayed on?{nl}As if they were sewn?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006075
text: {nl}The contents of the journal are true...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006076
text: {nl}The soldiers have become irreparably strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006077
text: There is no way of knowing now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006078
text: It's getting worse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006079
text: Not just sewing the leaves but making a ragdoll and ripping them apart? That is not normal by any standard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006080
text: What if the people get harmed?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006081
text: The last entry on the journal.{nl}I have searched the vicinity but have not found the ragdoll it speak of.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006082
text: That must be the last trace...{nl}Could other traces be erased by the monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006083
text: The nearby monsters might have something on them. Could you check them out?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006084
text: I cannot do it myself due to the injury.{nl}I am truly sorry but could you check them out for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006085
text: If the traces were not erased by the monsters that means we don't have any leads.{nl}Where to start.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006086
text: That ragdoll!{nl}Did you get it from the monster?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006087
text: Thank you so much for your hard work.{nl}Based on the journal, the soldiers were slowly going mad.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006088
text: What happened to them...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006089
text: Ah, I did find a necklace while searching.{nl}The soldiers did say there was a mysterious man. Perhaps it belongs to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006090
text: {nl}Evne a small clue is a big help. {nl}I will tell the others what we found here. Could you look for that mysterious man?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006091
text: Thank you.{nl}Here is the necklace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006092
text: I hope, this time, we get to find out what happened to those soldiers.{nl}Not knowing what happened to one's own family is devastating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006093
text: {nl}I will go to the soldiers' base camp and find something else.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006094
text: {nl}Even with my injury, it is not that far off. I can reach it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006095
text: I haven't seen you around here before.{nl}What can I do for you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006096
text: You've got my necklace!{nl}That thing will call out monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006097
text: You must have been through a lot to get here.{nl}I offer my sinceresy apology.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006098
text: I was actually looking for it myself.{nl}But how did you know it belong to me in the first place?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006099
text: Ah, you've met the representative.{nl}You must be searching for what happened to the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006100
text: Hm..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006101
text: They are not just done.{nl}In fact, I lead them to somewhere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006102
text: The minds and bodies of those soldiers were broken.{nl}In their conditions, the forest's anomaly would have only caused further problems for them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006103
text: I could not risk infecting other villagers nor allowing something horrible happening to them by the soldiers.{nl}I had no choice but to lead them to a different place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006104
text: {nl}It is better than risking everyone...{nl}I am truly sorry but I cannot tell you where they are for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006105
text: I am fully aware of the fact that some of the soldiers are from the families of the refuges but...{nl}I did what I had to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006106
text: I take the full responsibilities and resentments from the refuges. Even their curses.{nl}If you want to know the whereabouts of the soldiers. Please, deliver this fact to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006107
text: Even though, it had to be done. The guilt, I still feel.{nl}I am a human being. I do know the pain of losing a family.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006108
text: The soldiers have already gone mad...?{nl}And the man took them to somewhere else?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006109
text: {nl}... do you expect me to deliver such news to the village?{nl}To those who could not eat or sleep because they are worried sick about their families?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006110
text: Please, let the others know.{nl}I am sorry for giving you such a burden.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006111
text: Th-thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006112
text: I followed my mummy and daddy here.{nl}But I cannot find my daddy so I came out looking for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006113
text: My dad is a soldier. He didn't return home one day.{nl}A man said if I make thousand leaf whistles, Goddess Zemyna will grant my wish.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006114
text: So, I got out to make leaf whistles.{nl}But once I came here the monsters scared me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006115
text: {nl}Umm... could you help me make a whistle?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006116
text: Please, I need plant roots for my whistles.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006117
text: I did bring a shovel with me but the roots are far too sturdy for me do get them.{nl}I have heard the paringhetti resting place has a lot of them underground.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006118
text: Again, thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006119
text: Thank you so much.{nl}These seem to be more than enough!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006120
text: My daddy will return when I offer thousand leaf whistles I make, right?{nl}The man said so.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006121
text: When will daddy come home.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006122
text: It's better than nothing. Let's hold on to this damaged Doctrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006123
text: When will we be able to complete the altar and worship the glory.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006124
text: A traveler?{nl}It's too dangerous here. I urge you to leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006125
text: I knew you are no ordinary one.{nl}If you are truly the savior, please, help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006126
text: {nl}Recently, strong-looking demons have emerged around here.{nl}Perhaps they came here looking for the thing like I am.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006127
text: {nl}The thing I am looking for is in fact, the trace of Goddess.{nl}I am looking for the traces left by Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006128
text: {nl}We need to find the traces before the demons do.{nl}If we ever want to know the whereabouts of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006129
text: We need to be absolutely sure if what the demons are doing is related to Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006130
text: {nl}I have seen a demon ordering his subordinates a while back. An elder demon, I presume.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006131
text: {nl}There must be written orders or documents regarding the order.{nl}Could you check if the demons might have something of that kind?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006132
text: You probably won't be able to read the demon language.{nl}If you find them, just bring them back to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006133
text: I will decipher them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006134
text: Of course, there was an written order.{nl}I will read it through.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006135
text: Stone fragments are here. Now to make a detector orb, the demon energy is required.{nl}You seem surprised.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006136
text: {nl}I can put my divine energy and find the objects related to Goddess.{nl}But we need the demon energy to activate the orb in the first place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006137
text: {nl}I am the only one here so, my divine energy is not enough to power them both. That is why we need the demon energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006138
text: I will make the detector orb.{nl}Defeat monsters while carrying this will absorb the demon energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006139
text: The crystal will glow when it's full.{nl}I will pray for your safe and triumph return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006140
text: Ah, well done.{nl}This will be enough to activate the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006141
text: Now, let me thoroughly look at the written orders you have secrued.{nl}While I examine this, there are things I want you to get for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006142
text: {nl}I am more than convinced that Ausrine's traces are the same thing as the demons are seeking.{nl}That is why I will make a detector orb that can sense the faint energy Ausrine left behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006143
text: {nl}Please, get me those materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006144
text: Jeromel Square is the place blessed by the goddess.{nl}That is why even a stone fragment is blessed with the power of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006145
text: {nl}They are easy to acquire so perfect for our use.{nl}Please, get them for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006146
text: Just look around the goddess statue in Jeromal Square.{nl}I will be reading through the orders while you do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006147
text: {nl}With you helping me, it is going so smoothly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006148
text: Well done.{nl}These will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006149
text: Thank you so much for retrieving them!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006150
text: You've found a new order?{nl}Let me have a look.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006151
text: I think it's only a bit different from the previous one.{nl}It says that it should be retrieved from Diena instead of Demon Queen Gesti.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006152
text: Ah, that must be that demon I saw. Diena.{nl}Hmm, Diena...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006153
text: A Demon King, not a Demon Lord. Hmmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006154
text: I have just finished reading through them.{nl}Just as I thought, they are searching for the traces of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006155
text: {nl}And... the one who ordered is Gesti, the Demon Queen.{nl}It is no surprise since from the demon perspective, such is quite important.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006156
text: {nl}it says if any of them find something resembling a trace, bring it straight to Gesti.{nl}Three places are mentioned on the orders. Let's start with the nearest one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006157
text: Park Residential Area is the closest among the three places.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006158
text: I will be inspecting the movment of the demons at different place.{nl}Use the divine energy detector orb near the Park Residential Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006159
text: Please, get to Jeromel Park Residential Area and please hurry.{nl}We must find the trace of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006160
text: What you have retrieved is indeed the trace of Ausrine.{nl}That is why the demons attacked.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006161
text: {nl}Now, let's see.{nl}At first glance, it looks like a part of a device. I will hold on to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006162
text: {nl}No time to waste.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006163
text: I have seen the demons rushing to Jeromel Park Management Office.{nl}Could you get there as soon as possible?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006164
text: We know they are after the traces of Ausrine.{nl}We must now find out why.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006165
text: {nl}If we beat them to the punch. We will know why as well.{nl}Also, we will get a glimpse of why Ausrine did what and why.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006166
text: I am really sorry to rush you.{nl}But we must find the trace before the demons do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006167
text: Ah, this time the demons got their hands on it first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006168
text: {nl}It is quite disappointing but there is no point crying over split milk. Then we must get the other one.{nl}We must hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006169
text: The only place left is Shopping Street Entrance.{nl}Please, inspect the Shopping street.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006170
text: They also have lost one so the fight won't be easy.{nl}So be very careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006171
text: Please, be safe.{nl}I am very grateful for your help. It really sped things up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006172
text: {nl}We will soon find the whereabouts of Goddess Ausrine as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006173
text: Prepare for the strong demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006174
text: I have inspected the traces you have found.{nl}Not counting the one taken by the demon, of course.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006175
text: {nl}They are parts of a device that is designed to control some sort of energy.{nl}We need to find more traces to be sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006176
text: {nl}The divine energy detector orb has ran out of its juice. It needs recharging.{nl}Just like what you did when we were making it. Fill it up with the demon energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006177
text: Deadborn you've just defeated must have exuded the magic around it when it died.{nl}I am pretty sure the spell is still there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006178
text: {nl}It's much faster this way.{nl}I will keep an eye on the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006179
text: The next stop, Jonael Memorial.{nl}Let's get prepared and get to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006180
text: You've came back rather quickly.{nl}It seems that this time it will last longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006181
text: The outbreak of plants at Jonael Memorial was rather severe than most places.{nl}On top of that, the demons will not take this lying down. They will attack with full force.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006182
text: I will be waiting for you there.{nl}As soon as you are ready, please, follow me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006183
text: You've came.{nl}Let's find the trace quick.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006184
text: By the time I got here, the demons were heading towards Jonael Memorial.{nl}That's where we need to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006185
text: {nl}The path leading there will be infested with the demons.{nl}Be safe and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006186
text: Defeating the monsters along the way would be wise.{nl}Now, please head towards Jonael Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006187
text: Clearing the path to Jonael Memorial would be in order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006188
text: We cannot do this any more.{nl}Please, get to the memorial first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006189
text: While you are removing the magic circles, I have been grasping the movements of the demons.{nl}Then suddenly, they all headed towards Jonael Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006190
text: {nl}They probably lured us in by setting up those magic circles and try to beat us to the punch.{nl}Be haste and go to the Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006191
text: I am counting on you again to retrieve the trace.{nl}We need more than two traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006192
text: {nl}I will be on the look out for the demons.{nl}I need to monitor them carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006193
text: Thank you doing this.{nl}We must get those traces of Goddess Ausrine before the demons do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006194
text: What happened to the trace?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006195
text: {nl}Nummer.{nl}Now the score is even.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006196
text: {nl}With these only, I cannot figure out the whereabouts of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006197
text: All done.{nl}Next stop, the residential area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006198
text: The evil magic is exuding nearby. But no worries, the divine energy detector orb will work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006199
text: Godspeed.{nl}I will pray hard for your safe and triumphant return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006200
text: Not much is known about Demon Lord Diena.{nl}My guess is that Diena is a silent and obedient type. It's only my guess, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006201
text: {nl}But Diena do work for Gesti directly.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006202
text: I have examined the traces.{nl}I do have a hunch but too early to tell.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006203
text: {nl}I am terribly sorry but could you investigate the rubbles in the area?{nl}The fragments of processed stones or the altar might be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006204
text: Please, investigate the rubbles.{nl}The rubbles in Jonael Memorial the area where the trace was found. They are the ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006205
text: {nl}I need more rubbles to turn my conjecture into conviction.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006206
text: If my expectation does not betray me...{nl}Something astounding happened even before Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006207
text: Have you find something from the rubbles?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006208
text: You retrieved them.{nl}Let me examine them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006209
text: These fragments...I knew it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006210
text: Yes, these are indeed from the altar of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006211
text: She arrived here right before Medzio Diena.{nl}If I am remembering correctly, she began her journey here shortly before Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006212
text: {nl}The traces are from different objects.{nl}Ritual devices or fragments of the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006213
text: {nl}Regardless, they are related to the altar.{nl}These traces not only contain her power but also faint energy of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006214
text: {nl}Just as I thought, Goddess Ausrine has built altars at five different places.{nl}She used her divine energy and these ritual tools to set up a barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006215
text: {nl}When Medzio Diena occurred, she like all the other goddesses, lost her power.{nl}But the barrier she set up drew its power away from the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006216
text: {nl}Transferring the energy gained back to Goddess Ausrine.{nl}That probably... no certainly made it possible to retain her power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006217
text: {nl}That is why the demons were seeking these traces so badly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006218
text: {nl}Thank you so much.{nl}Without your help. these truths never have been discovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006219
text: {nl}We cannot fully determine her location but...{nl}This news will certainly appease other goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006220
text: The important fact is that Goddess Ausrine retained her power. But still her whereabouts is a mystery.{nl}Further investigation of this area might yield some results.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006221
text: {nl}If the clues are here, the demons will continue to swarm in.{nl}I am fully aware that you have done so immensely for me but could you help me a bit further?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006222
text: {nl}If we set up an alarming device, we will be able to detect the demons immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006223
text: If then, could you get some of demon energy?{nl}I need to make the device that can recognize the energy pattern and sound the alarm.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006224
text: {nl}I do have the crystal but I need the demon energy to calibrate.{nl}Oh the task wouldn't be that difficult for you, Savior.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006225
text: {nl}Attack and stun ragbirds and ragged butchers and absorb their energies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006226
text: When the demons are weakened, seal their power.{nl}I will, like always, await your triumphant and victorious return.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006227
text: That seems to be enough.{nl}I will put them into the alarm crystal right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006228
text: Thanks to you, the alarm crystal is complete.{nl}And it works beautifully.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006229
text: Now, all that is left is installing it at the sight of the traces.{nl}Just placing it would do the trick.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006230
text: There are still some demons left around here, so please be careful.{nl}The crystal itself has a barrier of its own but it activates after its initial installation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006231
text: Before you install this, wipe out the vicinity.{nl}After that merely placing it will work itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006232
text: I will examine further into the traces.{nl}Also, I will see if the alarm gets here without a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006233
text: Thank you so much for your hard work.{nl}I pray we could get some information on her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006234
text: But at least knowing the fact that she has retained her powers is a great discovery.{nl}The all matter involving Demon Lord Diena does trouble me but it's not our top priority for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006235
text: {nl}I pray your path is blessed by Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006236
text: Huh?{nl}I'm sorry, that was unexpected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006237
text: {nl}A fairy turning into Demon King, that is astounding.{nl}What is even more astounding is regaining its memory and co-operating with us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006238
text: {nl}And Diena was dragged away by  Rexipher?{nl}I sense an struggle and conflict inside the demon force.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006239
text: {nl}But thanks heavens for retrieving all the traces of Goddess Ausrine.{nl}These will help our investigation on the whereabouts of her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006240
text: I firmly believe that if we keep examine these traces, we will one day find her.{nl}Even if we don't, it is worth fighting for.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006241
text: Are you saying that they are having an arguement between themselves?{nl}A demon that has issues with Gesti...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006242
text: What do you think could have happened?{nl}Do you think this has anything to do with it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006243
text: We need to find the traces quickly.{nl}The demons have set up magic circles at the central square.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006244
text: They interfere with the divine energy detector orb.{nl}We need to disable them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006245
text: The interference magic circles are makeshifts.{nl}You can probably disable them just by stepping on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006246
text: We must retrieve the traces of Goddess Ausrine before they fall into the hands of the demons.{nl}We must hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006247
text: You've returned!{nl}Wait, something not right.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006248
text: The contents of the orders and the general vibe from the demons spell some inner conflicts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006249
text: {nl}But at the moment, the most important task is retrieval of the traces.{nl}The demons did take away the trace in the hall, after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006250
text: According to the document, there are five traces in total.{nl}We must get the remaining ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006251
text: One of the places mentioned is Jonael Residential area.{nl}The area certainly exudes a great amount of the divine energy. But unfortunately, the evil energy as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006252
text: Demon Lord Diena might be around.{nl}I will prepare for the worst. There might be more of those interference magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006253
text: I will enhance the divine energy detector orb so that it won't get affected by the interferences and{nl}make you undetectable by a Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006254
text: {nl}If possible, please, get me some of the fragments of the interference magic circles that you've disabled?{nl}I will use them to enchant the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006255
text: {nl}The magic stone fragments can be obtained from ragbirds and ragged butchers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006256
text: Please, be quick.{nl}We haven't got much time on our hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006257
text: You've gotten them all!{nl}Yes, yes. They are more than enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006258
text: You are now well trained enough to shoot the oncoming enemy fast and precise.{nl}My, you really have grown, haven't ya?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006259
text: Before I let you in on the last set of skills, you need to prove how much you have grown.{nl}If what I see in you is true, it won't be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006260
text: Some of companions for our mercenary group have fallen ill.{nl}From what we know, the Hackapell Master is the person to visit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006261
text: {nl}But the medicine supply is not abundant. And we got left out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006262
text: {nl}As luck would have it, the Pardoner Master said there was some debt between them and if you help the Pardoner Master.{nl}The cure is secured.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006263
text: {nl}It's a bit unnerving but the most important aspect of being a Schwazer Reiter is mobiliuty derived from our trusty companions.{nl}At the moment, the group needs some mediating, so, I cannot go myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006264
text: {nl}It would be great if you can carry out the Pardoner Master's request.{nl}The task is not too daunting and it would be a great opportunity for you to prove your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006265
text: {nl}I did hear that there are some drifted onto Cranto Coast, Igti Coast and Vera Coast.{nl}The coins were found but most of them were taken by the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006266
text: {nl}The Pardoner Master wants you to retrieve the old commemorative coins.{nl}10 of them would be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006267
text: On Igti Coast, the biggest drifter has been found.{nl}Incidentally, it is the most difficult places of all three. So, the choice is yours.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006268
