text: Let us not waste time, we cannot let our companions suffer anymore.{nl}Besides, speed is the life of a mercenary, after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006269
text: Excellent!{nl}You are earlier than I expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006270
text: I must approve of your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006271
text: I don't doubt you will do great hunting along with your partner.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006272
text: Go to Khonot Forest and you will find a giant monster called Gosal. Defeat it and get its horn.{nl}It will not be too difficult for you and your partner.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006273
text: Now, that is impressive.{nl}That is why I will teach you the high end skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006274
text: Prove that how well you can handle your hawk to me.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006275
text: The target is Gosal of Khonot Forest.{nl}It is a giant bull-like monster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006276
text: Get his horn.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006277
text: How did it go?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006278
text: Hmm... this is Gosal Horn.{nl}I never doubted you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006279
text: Now, let the final lesson begin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006280
text: Ah, there you are.{nl}You are just in time. I have a favor to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006281
text: I have received a request but I am frankly overwhelmed by other tasks.{nl}I was searching through the suitable candiates for the job and your name came up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006282
text: I have complete faith in you.{nl}But don't let the monsters surround you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006283
text: Like always, you did not betray my faith in you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006284
text: Hard work must be compensated, right?{nl}I will teach you new skills of a cannoneer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006285
text: Are you interested in the combat skills of a hackapell?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006286
text: {nl}We charge straight to the front line along with our companions.{nl}Our path is somewhat different from that of other archers who support the team from behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006287
text: {nl}But first I must test whether you have got what it takes.{nl}So I am currently working on the request from the Pardoner Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006288
text: {nl}So, could you help me concentrate on that task by taking care of the rest?{nl}From what I see, it would be a great opportunity for you to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006289
text: On Grynas Hills, you will find an old sanctuary.{nl}Now, it is a training ground for Dievdirbys. The forest energy will gather up around the sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006290
text: {nl}While you are busy filling up the forest energy, I will take care of the Pardoner Master's request.{nl}The task involving the forest energy itself is not difficult but I have got too many at hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006291
text: {nl}Moreover, nowadays the monsters in the forest have gone feral. A perfect opportunity to prove yourself, isn't it?{nl}Here, take this crystal and fill it up with the forest energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006292
text: You are wondering about what does the crystal have to do with the Pardoner's request , aren't you?{nl}Well, let me tell you firstly about the purpose of the crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006293
text: The forest energy boosts up the companion medicine's performance.{nl}Well, even without the boost, I only make the best in the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006294
text: I am counting on you on the matter regarding the crystal.{nl}Please, don't slack off.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006295
text: Do it for the companions. Please do the best.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006296
text: You've filled it up.{nl}Now onto the subject of your compensation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006297
text: I will teach you the combat skills of a hackapell.{nl}For you at the moment, that is on your mind, I presume.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006298
text: Mergen Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006299
text: Do you wish to learn the archery of a mergen?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006300
text: {nl}A mergen proves through archery.{nl}Now, prove your will and skills. Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006301
text: I like the determined look on your face.{nl}A true mergen utilize archery and arrows effectively to shoot down the oncoming monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006302
text: {nl}Monsters at Alemeth Forest or Nahash Forest shall be your targets. Of course, you are welcome to strike down even stronger targets.{nl}What I will be looking for is your speed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006303
text: {nl}Defeat one monster and within 8 seconds, strike down another one.{nl}Defeat eight monsters in this way and I will prove your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006304
text: It doesn't matter which monster, as long as it is as strong or stronger than that of Nahash or Nahash Forest.{nl}Remember, defeat a monster within 8 seconds of defeating another one.{nl}8 of them successively.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006305
text: You are successful.{nl}I approve that you have what it takes to learn the archery of a mergen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006306
text: Mergen archery is the ultimate stage of archery.{nl}Shoot different types of arrows to eliminate the target.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006307
text: That is the true intention of purpose of any form of archery.{nl}No other form of archery can match the efficiency and the number of foes one can strike down like mergen archery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006308
text: You seems to have gotten the hang of leading people.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006309
text: {nl}Good.{nl}Show me your leadership and charisma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006310
text: The location nor types of monsters matter.{nl}Defeat 300 monsters with your comrades or followers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006311
text: If a monster is defeated by your party member or a member of your guild that you lead. I will count it as a triple score.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006312
text: You could do it alone but that somewhat defeats the whole purpose.{nl}The number of monsters defeated by your guild members will count as triple.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006313
text: {nl}A taks is done much faster if you are with someone whom you can trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006314
text: Great work.{nl}Impressive.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006315
text: Now, I will let you in an advanced stage of a templar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006316
text: Your blade has become more precise and sharp.{nl}But the actual proof is needed for your final advancement.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006317
text: Remember your first trial?{nl}It's fitting that your last one would resemble it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006318
text: This time, it shall take place not in Forest of Prayer. Instead you will fight the monsters with the similar levels as you.{nl}Are you prepared to partake in your final trial?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006319
text: Anyway, defeat monsters of similar levels.{nl}You can double the count by defeating stronger ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006320
text: Monsters weaker than you don't count.{nl}I will await good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006321
text: Show me how you have sharpened your fencer skills.{nl}What I would like you to do is defeat 80 of monsters as strong as you are. I believe the task won't be that difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006322
text: My, you get stronger by the seconds.{nl}I will teach you the final skills, now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006323
text: You've shown me your great determination so far.{nl}Now, it is time for you to prove your ultimate strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006324
text: Are you ready to be acknowledged as a true Doeppelsoeldner?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006325
text: Good.{nl}Confidence is the basic virtue of a mercenary.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006326
text: Go to Khonot Forest and defeat 5 monters. Simple, innit?{nl}But the catch is that you need to defeat one within 10 seconds after your previous takedown.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006327
text: Defeat five monsters in succession and I will give you the final lesson, you deserve.{nl}For the task tests your speed and agility that are vital to a Doppelsoeldner like yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006328
text: Remember. We always stand victorious against all odds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006329
text: Be confident and sweep them off.{nl}Lure them in and defeat them all. Five is frankly not a challenge at all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006330
text: My eyes did not deceive me about you.{nl}You are one good mercenary.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006331
text: Now, your final lesson as a Doppelsoeldner.{nl}Get ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006332
text: Welcome. You are just in luck.{nl}I actually have a request to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006333
text: Few days ago, a member of my family clan, Brockal Himil, sent a messenager.{nl}The messenger got missing around Vedas Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006334
text: {nl}We need to find out what happened to the messenger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006335
text: I believe the messenger was attacked.{nl}Take this red crystal with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006336
text: The crystal has been handed down in our family for generations.{nl}It is paired with the blue crystal. When they get close to each other they react.{nl}The messenger has the blue one.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006337
text: {nl}If anything happens to the messenger, we would know by using this crystal.{nl}Please, get to Vedas Plateau and use the red crystal to find the whereabouts of the messenger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006338
text: I am counting on you.{nl}I hope it was an attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006339
text: I beg of you to look for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006340
text: Only the blue crystal remained in snow?{nl}The messenger is either kidnapped or attacked.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006341
text: I will sent out a rescue party.{nl}We cannot lose a loyal messenger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006342
text: {nl}Thank you for your troubles.{nl}As a compensation, I will teach you the new dragoon skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006343
text: Lancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006344
text: Monsters are the problem any where.{nl}What seems to be the problem?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006345
text: You want to be a lancer?{nl}You came this far, so you are not completely devoid of some skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006346
text: Let's test your might.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006347
text: I am currently examining the intel I have received about the Order of the Tree  of Truth who attacked the prince.{nl}I am far too occupied with the task at hand. So I have sent another lancer in my stead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006348
text: But the one who was supposed to go met with some problem.{nl}If you are willing, could you go to Nheto Forest and search the area for the traces of the Order?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006349
text: The monsters and those who threaten the royal family must be eliminated. For the glory of thew kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006350
text: {nl}So, could I ask you to get to Nheto Forest and find the traces of those heretics?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006351
text: Hmm the seal matches that of the Order.{nl}It is a bit smudged but it will serve as a big clue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006352
text: This needs to be seen by the Inquisitor Master.{nl}Well done, I must say.{nl}Now, I will let you in on the art of Lancery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006353
text: Murmillo Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006354
text: You came here to be a murmillo?{nl}A murmillo don't rely on flashy skills but pure strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006355
text: How does that sound? Interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006356
text: Your confidence is admirable.{nl}I will give you a simple task to prove yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006357
text: The mission involves a giant monster. How about you take care of it?{nl}If you succeed, I will teach you to become a murmillo.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006358
text: The monster is called Silva Griffin.{nl}The monster is attacking the people on Grynas Trails.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006359
text: {nl}If what you say is true, you can take it down.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006360
text: You are not scared are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006361
text: Hmm, you came earlier than I expected.{nl}I was a bit worried about you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006362
text: I will keep my end of the promise.{nl}Be warned, I am a stern teacher.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006363
text: The life as a gladiator is not a cake walk.{nl}The scars on your body are like your medals.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006364
text: Good. I knew you have the guts.{nl}Near the kingdom camp on Steel Heights, recently there has been sightings of strange objects.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006365
text: They are impervious to any sword or spear attacks.{nl}So they came to us, the cannoneers. For the demolition work.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006366
text: You catch my drift?{nl}I would like you to go to Steel Heights and destroy strange objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006367
text: You have already learnt how to fire from a distance.{nl}Now, it's time to learn precision and speed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006368
text: {nl}A musketeer needs fire weapon mastery.{nl}Taking your enemies before they even approach you. What more could you want from a battle?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006369
text: {nl}Ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006370
text: Good.{nl}When you go left from here, there is a pole to practice your marksmanship.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006371
text: When the light reflects off from the pole, attack the pole accurately.{nl}You should not attack it too late nor when the light doesn't shine.{nl}You get three tries.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006372
text: More you miss, more you have to hit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006373
text: Precision and speed.{nl}You cannot bring back the speeding bullet, after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006374
text: Fire when the pell shines.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006375
text: Your marksmanship is impressive.{nl}Now, let the lesson begin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006376
text: Laima and Triple-Layered Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006377
text: What are you doing here?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006378
text: None of my business, it seems like.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006379
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006380
text: Let's investigate together.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006381
text: It would be a waste of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006382
text: About the Triple Layered Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006383
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006384
text: We need to find some clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006385
text: I'm sorry I can't help you with that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006386
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006387
text: The magic circle is destroyed so there is no way of knowing.{nl}Like it is said on the Inner Wall District 8 Management manual. Find the magical eye.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006388
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006389
text: Checking the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006390
text: The chest is not opening.{nl}Grab the stuff in Joint Security Area and make a makeshift hammer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006391
text: Destroying the Material Storage Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006392
text: There is Magic Circle Maintenance Department near the magical eye.{nl}Check the content.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006393
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006394
text: Reading

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006395
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006396
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006397
text: No more clues can be found in the laboratory.{nl}Get to the War Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006398
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006399
text: Release the spell from the magic stone when the lamp magic stone gleams.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006400
text: Investigate Inner Wall District 8 (9)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006401
text: The Meaning of Inner Wall District 8

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006402
text: Explaining your findings

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006403
text: Hmm, let's see.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006404
text: I can't be bothered, frankly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006405
text: Preserve the Evidence of the Inner Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006406
text: There is no way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006407
text: Inspect Inner Wall District 9 (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006408
text: Explain what happened on the District 8 and deliever Jore's message.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006409
text: It's nothing, really.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006410
text: Explaining Kupole Jore's deduction

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006411
text: Inspect Inner Wall District 9 (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006412
text: I will go myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006923
text: How to Operate the Flamethrower Magic Stone: Infuse magic into the stone and the fragments of ignition appear around it. They are all of different sizes and destroy them from the smallest to the largest. Once they are all destroyed the flamethrower magic stone activates. At first, the stone is not that dangerous but once it gets going flame erupts. Be very careful.
