name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006928
text: Check the secret storage chest in the command room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006929
text: According the soldier's journal, something very important was in the commander's room. Go to the commander's room and inspect the secret chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006930
text: Unlock Secret Storage Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006931
text: According to the document, to open the chest, you must disable the lock magic. Use the Scroll of Projection on the chest and only touch the blue letters that appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006932
text: Check the Secret Storage Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006933
text: You've dispelled the Secret Storage Chest's magical lock. Now open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006934
text: Why on Medzio Diena...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006935
text: Acquired all the clues marked by Kupole Liepa. Now, visit Kupole Liepa.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006936
text: Deduce what happened with Kupole Liepa

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006937
text: Take the clues so far and deduce the situation with Kupole Liepa.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006938
text: The answer has emerged. Talk with Kupole Liepa again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006939
text: The deduction is complete from the clues found at the inner wall district 9, but still something is bugging Kupole Liepa. Talk with Kupole Liepa.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006940
text: Check the conent of the emergency order after obtaining it from the monsters in the meeting room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006941
text: Kupole Liepa says that due to the sheer number of monsters in the meeting room, couldn't  check it properly. Defeat the monsters in the meeting room and gather clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006942
text: On the Emergency Orders, there are some outrageous contents that cannot be fully comprehended by common sense. Show it to Kupole Liepa.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006943
text: Obtain %s by defeating monsters at Meeting Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006944
text: Listen to what Kupole Milda has to say in order to find the core at the outer wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006945
text: Repair the Emergency Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006946
text: The power to the emergency magic circle has been cut and, perhaps because of Medzio Diena, are now shielded by devices that protect the core. Supply the power from the Magic Generating Stones to the emergency magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006947
text: Disarm the Primary Core Protection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006948
text: The Primary Core Protection Device Disarmament: Remove the orb of light generated by magic. The orb spawns randomly around the place. Vital to find and disable it quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006949
text: Check the Defensive Wall Maintainer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006950
text: The Primary Core Protection Device has been disabled. Now, disable the defensive wall maintainer to get to the next device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006951
text: The barrier must be disable to get to the next device. Check the defensive wall maintainer again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006952
text: Move to the Office

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006953
text: According to the District 9 classified equipment manual, the Red Ignition Magic Stone can disable the barrier. Get to the Office, where the Red Ignition Magic Stone is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006954
text: Search for Red Ignition Magic Stone in the Office

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006955
text: Find the Red Ignition Magic Stone in the Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006956
text: Disarm the Wall Maintainer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006957
text: Use the Red Ignition Magic Stone on the Wall Maintainer to disable the wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006958
text: Check the Secondary Core Protection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006959
text: Check the Primary Core Protection Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006960
text: Remove all magic sources

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006961
text: The Secondary Core Protection Device can be disabled by removing the magic source that supplies it with spell. Remove the sources of the magic around the device. The sources must be disabled in 10 seconds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006962
text: Disarm the Secondary Core Protection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006963
text: Disarm the Secondary Core Protection Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006964
text: Check the Tertiary Core Protection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006965
text: Check the Tertiary Core Protection Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006966
text: Destroy Magic Regeneration Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006967
text: According to the classified equipment manual for district 9, Magic Generating Stones must be removed to disable the Tertiary Core Protection Device. Remove the magic generating stones around the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006968
text: Disarm the Tertiary Core Protection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006969
text: Magic Regeneration Stones have been destroyed. Time to disarm the Tertiary Core Protection Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006970
text: Check the Outer Wall Core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006971
text: You've successfully disarmed all the core protection devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006972
text: Defeat goblins lured in by the core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006973
text: A Gremlin has been attracted by the Outer Wall's Core. Defeat the Gremlin

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006974
text: Retrieve the  Outer Wall Core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006975
text: The gremlin has been defeated. Now, retrieve the  Outer Wall Core.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006976
text: Defeat %s drawn to the  Outer Wall Core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006977
text: Incident on Triple-Layerd Castle Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006978
text: Deliver the  Outer Wall Core to Kupole Milda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006979
text: Acquired the  Outer Wall Core.{nl}Return to Kupole Milda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006980
text: Kupole Milda says that the  Outer Wall Core is corrupted by the demon energy. Tell Kupole Jore about the state of the Outer Wall Core.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006981
text: You've told Kupole Jore about what happened at outer wall. Now, talk to Kupole Jore again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006982
text: Deduce with Kupole Jore

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006983
text: Deduce along with Kupole Jore based on what you have found about the demon energy and the  Outer Wall Core.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006984
text: You've uncovered all the incidents in the triple layered wall. Talk with Kupole Jore.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006985
text: The Supply Soldier's Last Mission

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006986
text: Talk with the Soul of the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006987
text: Talk to the Soul of the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006988
text: Retrieve the lost supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006989
text: The soul of the supply officer begs you to retrieve the scattered supplies. Bring back the supplies scattered on Uzsmirsote Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006990
text: Deliever to the soul of supply officer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006991
text: Deliver the supplies to the soul of the supply officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006992
text: You've gathered and delivered lost keepsake at the castle wall to the Soul of the Supply Officer but seems to be a bit short. Talk to the Soul of the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006993
text: Retrieve the lost supplies from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006994
text: The soul of the supply officer has the supplies are not enough yet. Some must have been taken away by the monsters. Defeat the monsters on Uzsmirsote Way and bring them back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006995
text: Acquired the supplies. Bring them back to the soul of the supply officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006996
text: Castle Wall Soldier's Unfinished Business

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006997
text: Talk with the Soul of Castle Wall Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006998
text: Talk to the Soul of Castle Wall Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_006999
text: Gather the keepsake of soldiers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007000
text: The soul of the soldier wants you to gather up the keepsakes of the fallen comrades. Find the keepsakes on Deengo Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007001
text: You've collected all the keepsakes. Return to the soul of the castle soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007002
text: Upon seeing the keepsakes of his fallen comrades, the soul of the soldier is saddened. Talk further with the soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007003
text: Find the Sanctuary of Kule Peak

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007004
text: The soul of the soldier asks you to place the keepsakes on the sanctuary of Kule Peak. Find the sanctuary of Kule Peak where the forest energy is the strongest in Kule Center.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007005
text: Place the keepsakes in the middle of the sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007006
text: You've found the sanctuary, place the keepsakes in the middle of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007007
text: Activate the Sanctuary of Kule Peak

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007008
text: In order to activate the sanctuary of Kule Peak, you need to raise three forest energies. They get weak quickly therefore, you must raise them before they get weaker.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007009
text: The forest's energy is gathering around the sanctuary at Kule Peak. Return back to the soul of the soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007010
text: Something's Bugging You, Scout?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007011
text: Talk with the Soul of the Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007012
text: Talk to the Soul of the Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007013
text: Find the Scout report from the wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007014
text: The soul of the scout asks you to retrieve the report. Defeat the monster at the dead end and find the report.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007015
text: Deliver to the soul of the scout

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007016
text: You've found the report. Return it back to the soul of the scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007017
text: The report reminded the soul of the scout of something. Talk with the soul of the scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007018
text: Gather the fragments with the divine energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007019
text: The soul of the scout says that he died while on his way to report on the strang glowing sculptures on Sugrizimas Way. Gather the glowing sculptures on Sugrizimas Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007020
text: You can sense the divine energy from the glowing sculptures. Return to the scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007021
text: The soul of the scout seems to know what the fragments mean. Listen to him further.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007022
text: The soul of the scout wants you to return the divine bead on the forgotten altar of Goddesson on Lychimas Fields. Firstly, defend the altar from the monsters of Lychimas Fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007023
text: Place the bead on the forgotten altar of Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007024
text: You've defeated nearby monsters enough. Now, it's time to place the bead on the forgotten altar of Goddess at Kule Peak.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007025
text: Back in time

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007026
text: The Chronomancer Master is waiting for someone's help at Stele Road

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007027
text: Use Goddess Gegute's crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007028
text: The Chronomancer Master advised to use Goddess Gegute's crystal to see what happened in the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007029
text: You have used Goddess Gegute's crystal. Report back to the Chronomancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007030
text: The Chronomancer Master has proposed that you research the way to the Fantasy Library while giving you Goddess Gegute's crystal. Ask the Chronomancer Master if there is anything else you need to prepare to get into Zima Suecourt.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007031
text: Entering Zima Suecourt

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007032
text: The Chronomancer Master has asked you to observe the illusion of Agailla Flurry by using Goddess Gegute's crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007033
text: Removing Orb fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007034
text: You have discovered that you must remove the Orb fragments in order to use chronomancy thanks to Agailla Flurry's illusion. Try using Goddess Gegute's crystal after removing all of the Orb fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007035
text: Collect Time magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007036
text: Destroy the magic devices near the Magic Observatory and collect Time Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007037
text: Use Goddess Gegute's crystal while avoiding the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007038
text: Use Goddess Gegute's crystal while avoiding the monsters. You won't be able to use the crystal if you are near the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007039
text: Use Goddess Gegute's crystal while avoiding the monsters. You won't be able to use the crystal if you are near the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007040
text: Deal with the monsters in the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007041
text: You have observed Agailla Flurry's illusion. It seems as if the monsters had interrupted Agailla Flurry's experiment. Deal with the monsters and check the Kaleidoscope of Time that Agailla Flurry mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007042
text: Check the Kaleidoscope of Time

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007043
text: You have dealt with enough monsters just as Agailla Flurry's illusion mentioned. Now go and check the Kaleidoscope of Time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007044
text: You have observed Agailla Flurry's illusion for long enough. Tell the Chronomancer Master of what you have learned.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007045
text: Swift Movement

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007046
text: Check the Devries Controller Spell Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007047
text: Go and check the Devries Controller Spell Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007048
text: Collect Magic Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007049
text: You must activate the Devries Controller Spell Source first in order to activate the movement device in the lounge. Gather magic essence from the monsters nearby in order to provide magic to the Devries Controller Spell Source.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007050
text: Activate the Devries Controller Spell Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007051
text: You have gathered enough magic essence. Now go and supply the Devries Controller Spell Source with magic to activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007052
text: Check the Central Laboratory's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007053
text: Go and check the Central Laboratory's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007054
text: Collect faint magic sources

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007055
text: You must now activate the Central Laboratory's Magic Source in order to activate the movement device in the lounge. Collect faint magic sources from the nearby area in order to supply magic to the Central Laboratory's Magic Source.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007056
text: Activate the Central Laboratory's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007057
text: You have collected enough faint magic sources. Now go and use them to activate the Central Laboratory's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007058
text: Check the Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007059
text: Go and check the Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007060
text: You must activate the Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source in order to activate the movement device in the lounge. Take the depleted magic source and collect faint magic from nearby and use it to supply the Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007061
text: Activate the Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007062
text: You have collected enough magic. Now go and supply the Researcher Auditorium's Magic Source with magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007063
text: Talk to the Soul of Hayatin

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007064
text: There is a lone soul who remembers only one's own name but nothing else. Talk to the Soul of Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007065
text: Defeat blue tanus and doyors

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007066
text: Hayatin believes that by defeating the monsters with blue glows he might be able to regain his memory. Defeat the monsters with blue glows on Valle Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007067
text: Hayatin seems to remember now. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007068
text: The soul of Hayatin wants you to find the document chest and is eager to explain why. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007069
text: Hayatin insists on retrieving the document box no matter what. Talk to the soul of Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007070
text: Investigate Carejvnes Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007071
text: The soul of Hayatin asks you to investigate the site that was the Victoras' camp. Go to Carejvines Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007072
text: Defeating Yellow Polibu

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007073
text: On the place where the soul of Hayatin told you about, there were only Yellow Polibus. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007074
text: Talk to the soul of Victoras

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007075
text: The soul of Victoras regained senses. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007076
text: The soul of Victoras wants to comfort his former subordinates. Ask him how.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007077
text: Erect a makeshift memorial monument by collecting the rubbles of the ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007078
text: Victoras wants at least some sort of a makeshift memorial monument for his fallen subordinates. He beseeches you. Make a memorial monument from the rubbles of the ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007079
text: Victoras is grateful. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007080
text: The soul of Victoras wants to comfort his former subordinates further. Ask him how.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007081
text: Lead the souls to the memorial monument

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007082
text: Victoras wants you to lead the souls of his subordinates to the memorial monument. Talk to the souls and lead them to the monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007083
text: Nearby wandering souls seem to found their peace. Return to Victoras.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007084
text: The soul of Victoras had hidden the document box under the rock with a special insignia. Ask him how to find the rock with the insignia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007085
text: Burn the bracken pile to find the rock with the insignia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007086
text: Victoras guesses one of the bracken piles raised high up is covering the stone with the insignia. Find the stone with the insignia by burning the piles of bracken. When the stone is found, inspect the stone and locate the document box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007087
text: You've found the Ruklys' Document Chest. Show the chest to Victoras.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007088
text: The soul of Victoras wants to check the content inside the document box. But first talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007089
text: Open the document box

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007090
text: Open the chest and speak to Victoras again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007091
text: The document box is not opening, Victoras suggests asking for Hayatin's help. Return to the soul of Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007092
text: Proof of Innocence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007093
text: The soul of Hayatin seems to know how to open the document box. Ask him how.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007094
text: Use the crystalized magic stone to find the key

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007095
text: Hayatin says the document chest and the key are linked by magic. They react to one another when they are near. The chest is out of spell. We must do with crystalized magic stones obtainable by defeating Blue Gosarus. Hayatin suspects that Musiz Pond where he and Victoras battled is the most likely.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007096
text: You've found the key. Return to the soul of Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007097
text: The soul of Victoras wants to know the truth of Ruklys. Hand the document to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007098
text: The soul of Victoras has found out the content of the document. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007099
text: Victoras seems to be shocked. Now, return to the soul of Hayatin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007100
text: Talk to Lena in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007101
text: Hayatin requested you to send the documents to someone who can make them widely know. Go back to Klaipeda and send them to Lena of Wings of Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007102
text: The soul of Hayatin is still troubled by the souls of his subordinates who are maddened inside the monsters. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007103
text: Hayatin wants you to free the souls from the monsters with blue glows, just like the last time.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007104
text: You've managed to free the souls. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007105
text: Talk with Alchemist Sophia

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007106
text: Alchemist Sophia says the area is too dangerous. Ask her what makes her think that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007107
text: Alchemist Sophia is asking for your help. Calm her down and ask her what needs to be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007108
text: Alchemist Sophia firstly wants to examine the red ducky. Ask how you can help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007109
text: Defeat red ducky

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007110
text: Sophia says the fragments of red ducky is needed. Defeat the duckies and she will gather the fragments herself. Go down Ohffozkyja Fork and defeat the red duckies along the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007111
text: You've found all the necessary amount of fragments. Return to Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007112
text: Alchemist Sophia wants you to do something while she examine the fragments. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007113
text: Destroy the egg nest of red ducky

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007114
text: Sophia wants you to destroy the eggnests of the duckies while she examine the fragments. Use the solvent she gives you and destroy egg nests on Uplink Wall and Centrynis Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007115
text: You've destroyed the egg nests she asked you to. Report this to Sophia and see how far she has progressed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007116
text: Not much has been found. Ask Sophia if there is other ways.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007117
text: Collect Yega Bracken Spores

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007118
text: Sophia plans to strengthen moglans who are fighting against the duckies. Just like she said, bring back brown Yega Bracken Spores from Loba Fields and Gemyn Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007119
text: You've gotten enough amount of spores. Deliver them to Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007120
text: Collect and deliver %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007121
text: Alchemist Sophia has finished processing the spores. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007122
text: Weaken and make blue moglans asleep

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007123
text: Sophia wants you to test the processed chemical. She wants you to attack and weaken a blue moglan to one-third of its health and use the sleeping powder on it. Then use the chemical on the moglan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007124
text: Sophia seems to have gotten enough results she wanted. Return to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007125
text: Alchemist Sophia has produced the right chemical for blue moglans based on the experiment. Consult with her on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007126
text: Mix the chemical in the food pile for blue moglans

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007127
text: Sophia wants you to mix the chemical on the food piles deep inside the blue moglan habitat.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007128
text: You've sprinkled the chemical on all the food piles. Return and report to Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007129
text: Alchemist Sophia is disappointed with the results. Ask her what should we do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007130
text: Collect Astrus Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007131
text: Sophia says as the last resort. Awaken sleeping centaur. Like she said bring back Astrus herbs near Virszutinis Stream.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007132
text: That seems to be enough. Bring them back to Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007133
text: Rip %s to awake the Centauri

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007134
text: Effect Too Strong

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007135
text: Alchemist Sophia is planning on awakening centaur. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007136
text: Burn Astrus Herbs around Centaurus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007137
text: Sophia says if we burn astrus herbs which are known for their spicy scent when burnt, centaur is sure to wake up. Burn five patches astrus herbs around Centaurus on Loba Fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007138
text: Go to Centaurus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007139
text: You've burnt all the astrus herbs. Watch Centaurus waking up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007140
text: Centarurus, as expected, ran off wildly to somewhere. Report to Alchemist Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007141
text: Alchemist Sophia is worried about violent Centaurus. Ask her if she has any plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007142
text: Collect crystals from Centaurus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007143
text: Sophia says what's done is done. We must defeat Centaurus. Moreover, she asks you to bring Centaurus Crystal to deal with red duckies. Go to Uplink Wall and take down bewildered centauri.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007144
text: Acquired the crystal by defeating all centauri.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007145
text: Collect %s from Centaurus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007146
text: Alchemist Sophia is crushing the crystal and making the pieces into fine powder. Ask her what's she going to do with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007147
text: Mix Centaurus dust into the dirt of Centrynis Field

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007148
text: Sophia requested you to sprinkle the centauri powder around Centrynis Field, the center of red ducky habitat. Do what she says and scatter the cetauri powder on Centrynis Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007149
text: Mix the dust through Centrynis Field. Return to Sophia wait for the result.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007150
text: This time, the result is satisfactory. Ask Sophia if she has further plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007151
text: Collect wings of blue beetows and dried out brackens

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007152
text: Sophia says she needs make chemicals similar to that of centauri powder. In order to produce them, dried out bracken leaves and wings of blue beetow are needed. Get the requested by gathering bracken leaves and defeating blue beetows on Loba Fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007153
text: Acquired all requested materials. Deliver them to Sophia.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007154
text: Collect %s from Blue Beetows

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007155
text: Collect the fallen %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007156
text: Alchemist Sophia seems to be at ease now. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007157
text: Sophia is extremely grateful for helping out. Say goodbye to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007158
text: Talk with Investigation Team Head Ella

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007159
text: Investigation Team Leader Ella is having some troubles with her mission. Ask her what is her mission and what can you do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007160
text: Retrieve the parchment from the pot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007161
text: Ella wants you to retrieve the parchments hastily hidden away from green goblins. Investigate pots nearby for parchments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007162
text: There is no more parchment to be found. Hand the parchments back to Ella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007163
text: Find %s in pots

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007164
text: Investigation Team Leader Ella wants the parchment stolen by the green goblins. Talk with her first.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007165
text: Retrieve the parchment from green goblins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007166
text: Defeat the green goblin wizards and bring back the parchment from them. Do what she said and obtain the parchments from the goblin wizards.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007167
text: You have successfully retrieved a considerable amount of parchment from the green goblin wizards. Hand the rest back to Ella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007168
text: Collect %s from Green Goblin Wizards

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007169
text: The Investigation Team Ella suspects there is something behind the green goblins' obsession with the parchment. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007170
text: Extract Juice from Contaminated Tree Root

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007171
text: Ella wants to discover why the green goblins are after the parchment. She is planning to make fake parchment to lure them in. Gather up the roots juice that is the main ingredient for making fake parchment. Use the handknife Ella gave you and scratch the surface of an exposed root and get its juice.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007172
text: Ella has all she needs now. The sickening smell is too much. Hand it over to Ella quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007173
text: Collect %s by using the handknife

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007174
text: Investigation Team Leader Ella has made fake parchment. Now, aks her how to use the thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007175
text: Place false parchment on somewhere noticeable

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007176
text: Ella wants you to place the fake one somewhere visible and let her men follow them. Place the parchment on the designated spot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007177
text: You've placed five sheets of false parchment. Now, return and report to Ella of this findings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007178
text: Leader Ella seems to have a favor to ask of you while waiting for the report. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007179
text: Defeat nearby goblins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007180
text: Investigation Team Leader Ella is wary of the wandering goblins nearby. Do what she says and drive them away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007181
text: You've defeated a horde of green goblins. Return to Ella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007182
text: Investigation Team Leader Ella has received the intel from her men. Ask her about the report.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007183
text: Eliminate the culprit seeking the parchment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007184
text: Ella says the goblins, once they obtained what they think to be parchment. Went straight to Library Annex Roof. Investigate the place and if you see the cause of all this take it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007185
text: You've defeated Fallen City Vasilisk that loved parchment. Return and tell it to Ella.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007186
text: Talk with Gasper

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007187
text: Investigator Gasper is afraid of green goblins and unable to continue the investigation. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007188
text: Collect the relatively-undamaged books

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007189
text: Investigator Gasper wants you to find relatively undamaged books from the piles of books. Defeat the nearby goblins and bring the books back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007190
text: You were able to collect more books than expected. Hand them over to Gasper.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007191
text: Collect %s from the book pile

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007192
text: Investigator Gasper, while in sheer terror, still wants to retrieve keepsakes from those who came before. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007193
text: Retrieve keepsakes from green goblin warriors and chargers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007194
text: The first investigation team must have been wiped out by the green goblins. Gasper want to retrieve the keepsakes of the fallen comrades. Defeat the green goblins and obtain the keepsakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007195
text: Acquired all the keepsakes. Return the keepsakes to Gasper.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007196
text: Retrieve %s from Green Goblin Warriors and Chargers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007197
text: Investigator Gasper says the first investigation team has discovered something and hidden it somewhere safe. Ask him how to find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007198
text: Use the Investigation Team Pendulum to find the hidden artifact

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007199
text: Gasper handed you a pendulumn specifically designed for the investigation teams. Use the pendulumn to find the hidden relics.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007200
text: You have found all the ancient stone slates the first team has hidden in the ground. Hand them over to Gasper.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007201
text: Dig up the relic from the area detected by the pendulum

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007202
text: Investigator Gasper wants to repay you. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007203
text: Talk to Investigator Horatio

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007204
text: Investigator Horatio wants to investigate inside the fallen building. Ask him how you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007205
text: Get the strong vines

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007206
text: Horatio says a rope of some kind is needed to get inside the building. There are some sturdy-looking vines at Lazsmo Workshop Roof.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007207
text: The vines seem to be enough. Hand them back to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007208
text: Retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007209
text: Investigator Horatio is preparing for the expedition. Ask him what you should do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007210
text: Collect the Goblin Shaman's Jewels

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007211
text: Horatio says a light source is needed. Fortunately, the green goblin shaman's jewels glow magically. Gather up the goblin shaman's jewels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007212
text: You've collected enough jewels that will last for the expedition. Hand them over to Horatio and begin the expedition.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007213
text: Collect %s from green goblin shamans

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007214
text: Investigator Horatio is beginning his expedition inside the building. Ask him what he can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007215
text: Defeat nearby green goblins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007216
text: Horatio has gone inside the building. Defeat nearby green goblins while he is away.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007217
text: Horatio came back finishing all the searches and investigations. Ask him how it went.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007218
text: Investigator Horatio wants to express his gratitude to you on helping his investigation. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007219
text: Talk to Believer Jaonus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007220
text: Jaonus is plotting something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007221
text: Drive away nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007222
text: Jaonus wants you to drive the nearby monsters away. Drive nearby monsters off.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007223
text: You've successfully driven away nearby monsters like Jaonus asked you to. Tell him of the result.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007224
text: Not everything went down as smoothly as Jaonus expected. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007225
text: Collect clamper cores by defeating pag clampers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007226
text: Jaonus wants to try a different approach. Defeat pag clampers, obtain their cores and use them to charge the altar with the divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007227
text: You've gathered enough pag clamper cores. Hand them over to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007228
text: Jaonus seems there is one more thing you should do. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007229
text: Collect he dead's objects of resentment from the coffin

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007230
text: Jaonus says the cores are not enough. He asks you to bring back the keepsakes from the coffin in Hunne Memorial Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007231
text: You've gathered all the keepsakes containing the resentment of the dead. Talk to Jaonus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007232
text: Sacred or Secular

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007233
text: Ask Believer Jaonus what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007234
text: Go to the altar Believer Jaonus talked about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007235
text: Believer Jaonus disappeared right after saying something significant. Go to the altar he talked about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007236
text: The explosion from the altar drove off the oncoming monsters. Ask Believer Jaonus what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007237
text: Re-Confirm

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007238
text: Talk to Costas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007239
text: Jaonus told you to finish the application process with Costas. Find Costas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007240
text: Collect the scattered Doctrine

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007241
text: Costas says he lost some pages from the Doctrine due to monster attack. He asks you to gather up the pages.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007242
text: You've collected all the page of Doctrine. Bring them back to Costas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007243
text: Costas says he will give you the final trial. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007244
text: Light the campfire by obtaining oil from Green Pag Nurse

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007245
text: Like Costas said, light the campfire with the oil from Green Pag Nurse.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007246
text: You've lit all the campfires. Return to Costas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007247
text: Check the inscription on the wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007248
text: You light the area and you see the inscription on the wall. Read what it says.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007249
text: Talk with the Priest Master at Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007250
text: Must find someone who knows about the suspicious order. Consult with the Priest Master on the suspicious order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007251
text: Talk to Judge Rymis at the Fedimian Outskirts

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007252
text: The Priest Master says that Judge Rymis is the leading authority in the inquisition. Talk to him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007253
text: Ask Judge Rymis about the heretics.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007254
text: Drive Away the Heretics At Tymeris Temple

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007255
text: Judge Rymis wants you to drive the heretics away from Tymeris Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007256
text: Judge Rymis wants you to purify the heretics at the Tymeris Temple. Find the heretics.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007257
text: The heretics run away at the sight of the Book of Judgement! Fend off the oncoming horde of monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007258
text: You've driven out all the heretics out. Return to Judge Rymis in Fedmian outskirts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007259
text: Inspect the Hidden Chamber

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007260
text: The heretics are gone but the evil energy lingers. There is something exuding the insidious power.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007261
text: Inspect the Hidden Chamber

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007262
text: In the hidden room of the temple, the heretics must have been up to something. Investigate the hidden room.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007263
text: Deadborn awakes.{nl}Defeat Deadborn.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007264
text: Talk to Kupole Lina

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007265
text: Kupole Lina seems to be one of two kupoles, the villager Hilda talked about. Talk to Kupole Lina about what is going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007266
text: Extract and gather fluids from the nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007267
text: Kupole Lina says she is making supplements to help the growth of plant life. Lina asks you to collect fluids from the monsters that will be used in making the supplements.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007268
text: You've collected all the fluids that was requested by Kupole Lina. Return to her along with the fluids.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007269
text: Some more materials are needed. Talk to Kupole Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007270
text: Gather the leaves from the piles on Netting Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007271
text: Kupole Lina also states that she needs the leaves as main ingredients for the supplements. She asks you to gather leaves from the piles on Netting Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007272
text: You've gathered leaves like Kupole Lina asked you to. Return to her with the leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007273
text: Kupole Lina made her supplements. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007274
text: Fill up the bottles on Popot Stream with the supplements

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007275
text: Kupole Lina says the supplements are complete. She asks you to fill the bottles at Popot Stream with the supplements.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007276
text: You've successfuly filled the supplements into the bottles. Return to Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007277
text: You've successfuly filled the supplements into empty bottles. Return to Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007278
text: Talk to Kupole Aeglei

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007279
text: Just as you were about to return to Kupole Lina. Another kupole showed up and destroyed the bottle. Ask Kupole Aeglei, what is going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007280
text: It is a bit awkward. Tell Kupole Lina about what happened with Aeglei.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007281
text: Kupole Aeglei and Lina are the two bickering kupoles Hilda has talked about. To know what Kupole Aeglei is doing, talk to Aeglei.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007282
text: Defeat nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007283
text: Kupole Aeglei is not trusting you that much. Gain Aeglei's trust by defeating all the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007284
text: You've successfully mop-upped the area. Return to Aeglei.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007285
text: Defeat nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007286
text: Talk to Forest Keeper Brunonas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007287
text: Forest Keeper Brunanos is investigating something.{nl}Ask him what is he investigating.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007288
text: Inspect the Raffye Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007289
text: Forest Keeper Brunonas says he will search the other area, and you should check one of the areas Chronomancer Ida asked you to. He also says the path is filled with monsters. Defeat them along the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007290
text: You've checked the area like Brunonas asked you to. Return and report to Brunonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007291
text: Ask Forest Keeper Brunonas about the autumn leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007292
text: Investigate Moss on Raffye Trail

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007293
text: Forest Keeper Brunonas says that moss that is supposed to grow only during the autumn has appeared on Raffye Crossroads. {nl}Brunonas requested you to bring back the samples of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007294
text: The moss, requested by Forest Keeper Brunonas, has been extracted. Return to him along with the moss.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007295
text: Extract and examine moss from rock

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007296
text: Talk to Herbalist Cesaris

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007297
text: Go to Herbalist Cesaris whom Brunonas has talked about.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007298
text: Gather Herbs from Pjama Resting Place

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007299
text: Herbalist Cesaris has requested you to gather herbs of Pjama Resting Place while he gather the ones here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007300
text: You've gathered enough herbs for Herbalist Cesaris. Return to him with the herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007301
text: Ask the herbalist what is he going to do with the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007302
text: Dig up the vhelis roots that Iyran finds

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007303
text: Herbalist Cesaris says that you should take his dog Iyran with you while digging up the vhelis roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007304
text: You've gathered enough roots of Vhelis for Herbalist Cesaris. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007305
text: Extract %s Vhelis Iyran found

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007306
text: Talk with Lumberjack Dowedas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007307
text: Hebalist Cesaris says get the last report from Lumberjack Dowedas and get the reports to Chronomancer Ida. Talk to Lumberjack Dowedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007308
text: Investigate the wood piles on Kunck Logging Area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007309
text: Lumberjack Dowedas says he could not continue the investigation. He says, if you could investigate the wood piles on the Kunck Logging Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007310
text: You've inspected the wood piles like the lumberjack asked you to. Bring back the brown powder from the pile to Dowedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007311
text: Inspect the piles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007312
text: Ask Dowedas, what is left to investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007313
text: Investigate the tree stump on Yvass Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007314
text: Lumberjack Dowedas says he saw a tree with unusual rings. Inspect the stumps on Yvass Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007315
text: You've checked all the stumps. Report back to Dowedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007316
text: Talk to Chronomancer Ida

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007317
text: You've got all three reports. Bring them to Chronomancer Ida.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007318
text: Obtain the Blood Sample

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007319
text: Chronomancer Ida wants you to defeat the nearby enemies and retrieve their blood samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007320
text: You've collected enough blood for which Chronomancer Ida has asked. Bring back the blood samples to Ida.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007321
text: Chronomancer Ida is trying to conduct some sort of an experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007322
text: Take the blood sample at get to Outer Wall District 8

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007323
text: Chronomancer Ida says is strange that the blood is not immediately clotted. Take the blood outside the anomalous area. Perhaps the inner wall district 8 would be a good place to test this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007324
text: As soon as you arrive at other region, the blood instantly got clotted. Bring the blood samples back to Chronomancer Ida.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007325
text: Chronomancer Ida has something to ask you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007326
text: Chronomancer Ida asked you to deliver the findings to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007327
text: Tell the Chronomancer Master about the findings of Ida the Chronomancer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007328
text: Assure Ida that you have reported to the Chronomancer Master without a hitch.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007329
text: Forest Keeper Brunonas asks you to report the findings to Chronomancer Ida.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007330
text: Inspect the Suspicious Looking Rock

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007331
text: Inspect the Suspicious Looking Rock.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007332
text: Defeat Velochard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007333
text: When the suspicious rock breaks, Velochard appears. Defeat Velochard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007334
text: Talk to Refugee Representative Morkus

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007335
text: Refugee Representative Morcus is looking for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007336
text: Refugee Representative Morcus says there is a story about green leaves on the journal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007337
text: Use the Orgain Solvent on the green tree

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007338
text: Refugee Representative Morcus says there are trees with green leaves on them. According to the journal, the leaves are painted green. Use the organic solvent to verify the claim.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007339
text: You've used Organic Solvents on green leaves. Return and report to Refugee Representative Morkus or the result.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007340
text: Refugee Representative Morcus says there is a story about the fallen leaves in the journal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007341
text: Inspect the strange autumn leaved tree

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007342
text: Refugee Representative Morcus says there are trees with sewn leaves. Test the story's claim.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007343
text: You've check the strange tree like Refugee Representative Morcus has asked you to. Report the findings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007344
text: Refugee Representative Morkus is looking for the missing traces. Talk to Morkus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007345
text: Find the trace of rag doll at the Lereth Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007346
text: Refugee Representative Morcus checked the perimeter but was unable to find the rag doll. He thinks monsters might have erased the traces of it. He wants you to investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007347
text: You've found the rag doll like Refugee Representative Morcus asked you to. Return to Morcus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007348
text: Collect %s from monsters at Lereth Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007349
text: Refugee Representative Morcus has found something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007350
text: Find the Mystery Man

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007351
text: Refugee Representative Morkus is in search of finding the mystery man and ask him about whereabouts of the soldiers. Talk to the Mystery Man.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007352
text: Defeat the attacking monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007353
text: The monsters suddenly attack you. Defeat them and find the mystery man.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007354
text: Talk with Ejuidas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007355
text: You've found the mysterious man. Ask him about where did the soldiers go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007356
text: Talk to Ejuidas the Mystery Man

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007357
text: You've met with Ejuidas the mystery man. Hand him the necklace and ask the whereabouts of the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007358
text: Talk to Ejuidas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007359
text: You need to tell Refugee Representative Morcus what you've heard from Ejuidas. Return to Morkus.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007360
text: Talk with Little Willitte

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007361
text: Little Willitte is in need.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007362
text: Rescue Little Willitte

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007363
text: Little Willitte is surrounded by monsters. Rescue Little Willitte!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007364
text: You've defeated all the monsters. Talk to Little Willitte.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007365
text: Little Willitte seems to ask you a favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007366
text: Extract Sturdy Roots

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007367
text: Little Willitte wants you to gather sturdy roots to make a leaf whistle. Use the shovel and dig the area!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007368
text: You've gotten Sturdy Roots that Little Willitte has you to. Return to Little Willitte.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007369
text: Talk with Kupole Leda

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007370
text: Kupole Leda is finding something here. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007371
text: Kupole Leda wants to ask you of a favor regarding the demons who are searching for something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007372
text: Collect Demon orders

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007373
text: Kupole Leda has seens the demons who were leading other demons.{nl}She thinks they might have some written orders and wants you to get them.{nl}Defeat monsters at Jeromel Square and find if they are carrying the written orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007374
text: You've secured the demon order, that Kupole Leda asked for.{nl}Give it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007375
text: Kupole Leda seems to want you to do something while she reads the orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007376
text: Collect small stone fragment from Jeromel Square

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007377
text: Kupole Leda has yet to examine the orders thoroughly but what is certain at this point is that what the demons are seeking are related to Goddes Ausrine. She says that in order to find the objects related to Goddess Ausrine, you must gather small stone fragments on Jeromel Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007378
text: You've gathered all the Small Stone Fragments Kupole Leda asked you to. Return to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007379
text: Kupole Leda needs your help in making the detector device. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007380
text: Collect the Demon Power

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007381
text: Kupole Leda says the power source is needed to activate the detector. She has handed you a crystal and told you to defeat the monsters nearby and gather their demonic energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007382
text: You've filled up the orb, given by Kupole Leda, with the demon power. Return to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007383
text: Investigate the trace

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007384
text: You've found the trace at Shopping Street Entrance. Investigate the trace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007385
text: The moment you retrieved the trace, Deadborn appears and tries to take it away from you. Defeat Deadborn.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007386
text: You've defeated Deadborn. Return and report to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007387
text: You've successfully helped Kupole Leda on making the divine energy detector orb. Ask Kupole Leda about the orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007388
text: Find the trace of Ausrine at Park Residential Area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007389
text: Kupole Leda says that the demons are looking for the traces of Goddess Ausrine. Go to the residential area and find Goddess' trace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007390
text: Retrieve the Trace of Ausrine

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007391
text: You've found the trace of Goddess Ausrine by using the divine energy detector orb Kupole Leda made.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007392
text: Demons appeared the moment you were trying to retrieve the trace of Ausrine. Fend off the demons and retrieve the trace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007393
text: You've successfully defeated the demons and retrieved the trace. Bring the trace back to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007394
text: You've succeeded in securing the first trace. There are others still left to be found. Ask Kupole Leda about the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007395
text: Find the second trace at Jeromel Park Management Office

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007396
text: Kupole Leda says that there are still traces of Goddess Ausrine to be found. She asks you to go to the second place on the list, Jeromel Park Management Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007397
text: The second trace of Ausrine has been taken by Riteris the demon . Return ad report to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007398
text: Ask Kupole Leda about the other traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007399
text: Search for the Trace at the Shopping Street Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007400
text: Kupole Leda says to find the last piece, you should go to Shopping Street Entrance. Search the area to find the third trace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007401
text: Kupole Leda has realized something about the trace of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007402
text: Collect the Demon Power

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007403
text: Kupole Leda says the detector orb needs recharging. She asks you to charge it once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007404
text: Once again, you've collected all the demon power. Return to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007405
text: Kupole Leda seems to have something to say to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007406
text: Kupole Leda says that there is no more trace to be found on Jeromel Square and it's time for us to meet up at Jonael Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007407
text: You've reached Jonael Memorial District. Consult with Kupole Leda on the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007408
text: Mop up nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007409
text: Kupole Leda says the monsters are keep coming. It's not safe to carry on like this. Defeat the monsters to make the trip safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007410
text: Look around the Jonael Memorial

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007411
text: Kupole Leda asked you to have a look around at Jonael Memorial after sweeping up the nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007412
text: There are demons at Jonael Memorial. Listen to what they are saying.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007413
text: Talk with Kupole Leda about Demon Lord Diena and his officers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007414
text: Move to Jonael Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007415
text: Kupole Leda witnessed the demons moving to Jonael Hall. Hurry and get to the hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007416
text: Dullahan appeared and taken the trace with him. Fend off the oncoming demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007417
text: The fourth trace of Ausrine has been taken by the demons. Return to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007418
text: Inspect Demon Lord Diena

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007419
text: At the same time, Demon Lord Diena is speaking with his officer Dullahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007420
text: Kupole Leda seems to want to talk about the trace.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007421
text: Investigate Jonael Residential Area

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007422
text: Kupole Leda asks you to inspect the Jonael Residential Area mentioned on the orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007423
text: You've heard the story behind the trace of Goddess Ausrine and regained all the traces taken away by Demon Lord Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007424
text: Talk to Demon Lord Diena

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007425
text: Demon Lord Diena is acting strange. As if to communicate with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007426
text: Kupole Leda wants you to do something to examine the nature of the traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007427
text: Find the Clue to the Trace

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007428
text: Kupole Leda says more evidences are needed to verify the traces.{nl}Other fragments, despite being less vivid, still retain the divine energy in them. She asked you to search Jonael Hall and the residential area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007429
text: You've gathered all the things Kupole Leda asked you to. Return to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007430
text: Inspect the Rubbles

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007431
text: Kupole Leda seems to have found out what the trace of Ausrine is.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007432
text: Kupole Leda is preparing something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007433
text: Obtain Demon Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007434
text: Kupole Leda wants to set up an alarm in case the demons approach. She asks you to gather demon essence to use for the calibration sample. The essence can be extracted by weakening demons. Attack ragbirds and ragged butchers, stun them and extract their essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007435
text: You've collected all the demon essence and made Kupole Leda happy. Return to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007436
text: Obtain %s from Ragged Butchers and Ragbirds

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007437
text: Kupole Leda seems to have finished making Alarm Crystal. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007438
text: Install Alarm Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007439
text: Kupole Leda wants you to install the alarm crystal at the points where trace was found. Install the alarm crystals at Jeromel Park and Jonael Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007440
text: You've installed all the Alarm Crystals like Kupole Leda asked. Return to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007441
text: Kupole Leda is experiencing some difficulties in finding the next trace. Talk to Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007442
text: Destroy the interferance magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007443
text: Kupole Leda says that the interference magic circles set up by the demons are obstructing the detector. Leda further claims that you can simply stop them by standing on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007444
text: You've removed all the interference magic circles. Return and report to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007445
text: Gather the materials to enhance Orb of Divine Detection

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007446
text: Kupole Leda wants you to gather materials to enchant the divine energy detector orb with. Defeat the nearby demons and gather fragments of magic stone and remains of the interference magic circles.{nl}They can obtained from ragbirds and ragged butchers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007447
text: You've gathered all the materials Kupole Leda asked you to. Return to Kupole Leda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007448
text: The Doppelsoeldner Master says to test your might and skills by going down to Khonot Forest and defeat a monster within 10 seconds after defeating another one. Repeat the process for 5 monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007449
text: Report to the Doppelseldner Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007450
text: Defeat monsters that are of the similar levels as you are

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007451
text: The Fencer Master wants you to prove the strength and skills you have acquired so far. Regardless of types or locations, defeat 80 monsters with the levels similar to that of your own. Weaker ones do not count. But a stronger one counts as double.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007452
text: Find the Missing Orders

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007453
text: The Dragoon Master says the orders sent to the Astral Tower have not came back. The master asked you to go to the last point , Vedas Plateau, and retrieve them. The order is about finding the blue orb used by Hermillga. The Dragoon Master says that using this red orb will react to the blue orb nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007454
text: Return to the Dragoon Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007455
text: The Templar Master claims that in order to prove your worth, you must fight against monsters along with your guild members. Doesn't matter which kind but 300 of them would be enough. If it is defeated by a guildmember it counts as 3.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007456
text: You've defeated all the monsters. Return to Knight Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007457
text: Talk with the Lancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007458
text: Talk with the Lancer Master at Inner Enceinte District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007459
text: Find the traces of the Order of the Tree of Truth

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007460
text: The Lancer Master says the traces of the Order of the Tree of Truth who has attacked the prince have been found. There are two places, so, you are to go to the second one. Go to Nheto Forest and find any traces related to the Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007461
text: Report to the Lancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007462
text: You've found the document related to the Order of the Tree of Truth. Return to the Lancer Master at Inner Enceinte District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007463
text: Talk with the Murmillo Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007464
text: Talk to the Murmillo Master at Inner Enceinte District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007465
text: Defeat Silva Griffin

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007466
text: The Murmillo Master wants to test you if you can become a gladiator or not. Go to Grynas Trail and defeat Silva Griffin.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007467
text: Report to the Murmillo Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007468
text: Silva Griffin has fallen. Return to the Murmillo Master at Inner Enceinte District.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007469
text: Defeat Gosals at Khonot Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007470
text: The Falconer Master wants to test you. Go to Khonot Forest and defeat gosals and retrieve their horns as proofs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007471
text: Acquired the Gosal Horn. Return to the Falconer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007472
text: Collect the old coins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007473
text: Schwarzer Reiter has relayed the task of finding old coins from the Pardoner Master to you. You are told that the monsters in the areas like  Vera Coast, Cranto Coast and Igti Coast. Obtain 10 of Old Commemorative Coins.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007474
text: Vera Coast, Cranto Coast, Igti Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007475
text: Return to the Schwarzer Reiter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007476
text: Destory Observation Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007477
text: The Canoneer Master asked you to destroy observation orbs found at  Steel Heights. The master is far too busy to do it.  The orbs can be found at Ghresmei Passage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007478
text: You've destroyed the surveillance sphere. Return to the Cannoneer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007479
text: Hit the practice pole of Musketeer at right times

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007480
text: The Musketeer Master wants you to attack at the right moments. Move to the practice pole and attack when the pole shines. If you make three mistakes, you start anew.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007481
text: Go to the Hackapell Master at Istora Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007482
text: Filling the crystal of restoration with the forest energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007483
text: The Hackapell Master is occupied with developing a cure for the companions requested by the Pardoner Master. There is one simple task you could do which can be done if you got the basics. Go to Grynas Hills and find the old altar. Around it, fill up the crystal of restoration with the forest energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007484
text: Report to the Hackapell Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007485
text: You've filled the Crystal of Restoration with the forest's energy. Return and report to the Hackapell Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007486
text: Talk with the Mergen Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007487
text: Go to the Mergen Master at Istora Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007488
text: Defeat a monster within 8 seconds of defeating another monster

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007489
text: The Mergen Master says the crucial point of being a mergen is defeating a number of foes in a short period of time. Defeat two monsters within the range of 8 seconds. Repeat the process until you have defeated total 8 monsters. The monsters  as strong or stronger than those at Alemeth Forest or Nahash Forest are the best candidates.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007490
text: Alemeth Forest, Nahash Forest and areas higher than them

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007491
text: Report to the Mergen Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007492
text: The Mergen Master would be pleased. Return and Report to the Mergen Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007493
text: The Goddess' Flower

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007494
text: Talk with Priest Gherriti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007495
text: Talk to Priest Gherriti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007496
text: Immerse the Seeds under water

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007497
text: Priest Gherriti asks you to immerse the seeds under water in your hand and take them out again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007498
text: Talk with Priest Gherriti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007499
text: Move to the place where the divine energy still remains along with Priest Gherriti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007500
text: Get to the place where the divine energy still remains along with Priest Gherriti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007501
text: Obtain Lyecon essence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007502
text: Priest Gherriti says much time is needed to restore the pillar. Instead, we should place the divine energy from the pillar near the altar. Lyecorn essence is needed as the vessel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007503
text: Obtain %s from Lyecorns

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007504
text: Talk to Priest Gherriti

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007505
text: Get the arcus bracken

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007506
text: Priest Gherriti says that in order to purify the Lyecorn essence, arcus bracken is needed. Go to Meilan Intersection and obtain Arcus Bracken.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007507
text: Fill it up with the divine energy from the pillar

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007508
text: Priest Gherriti asks you to take the clean essence and fill it up with the divine energy from the pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007509
text: Place the essence on the altar after filling it with the divine energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007510
text: Priest Gherriti asks you to place the essence filled with the divine energy on the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007511
text: Burn the flower near the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007512
text: The flower grown around the altar is absorbing the divine energy. Burn it with fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007513
text: Help Priest Gherriti Concentrate

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007514
text: Priest Gherriti says that before the koru of Vaivora is fully open, one must only concentrate on the question. Only then one can get the answer. Help Priest Gherriti concentrate.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007515
text: Ask whereabouts of Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007516
text: Ask Priest Gherriti on whereabouts of Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007517
text: Danger the Lurks in the Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007518
text: Talk with Oscaras

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007519
text: Talk to Oscaras.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007520
text: Obtain the Materials needed for the experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007521
text: Oscaras wants to examine the possible infectants. Gather Bunkeybo's Skin, Bunkeyto's Skin, Phamer Bracken and Tulup Flower.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007522
text: Obtain Experiment Subjects

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007523
text: Oscaras is conducting an experiment testing whether the contact with possible cause substances cause the disease. Oscaras says that the monsters need to be captured alive. You can do that by using the tranquilizer on the weakened monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007524
text: Contact the experimental substance on the captured monster

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007525
text: Oscaras says now make the subject come in contact with the substance and wait for the result. Rub the substance on the subject.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007526
text: Talk to Oscaras

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007527
text: Gathering different types of phamer brackens

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007528
text: Oscaras wants to conducts an experiment based on the previous account that bunkeybos did not get infected by smelling phamer bracken. He makes a conjecture that perhaps one of various types of phamer bracken is responsible for the disease. Bring back samples of various types of Phamer Bracken.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007529
text: Obtain Bunkeyto essence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007530
text: Oscaras requested you to bring back enough Bunkeyto Essence to make the cure.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007531
text: Use Bunkeyto essence to Obtain Vink Flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007532
text: Oscaras says that vink flowers are the substances that react to the spell infused in the Bunkeyto Essence. He asks you to get them for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007533
text: Find Oscaras

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007534
text: Find Oscaras

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007535
text: You've returned with vink flowers but Oscaras is no where to be seen. Find him before his condition worsens. Check the marked spots on the map for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007536
text: Make the cure

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007537
text: Oscaras cannot move so he asks you to make the cure instead. He says you can make one by mixing the Bunkeyto Essence with the vink flowers with ratio of 3:7. 3 being the essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007538
text: press the key to stop.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007539
text: Grab the cure on the experiment table

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007540
text: Grab the completed cure from the experiment table

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007541
text: Deliver the cure to Oscaras

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007542
text: The monster attack makes it very difficult to deliver the cure to Oscaras. Give the cure to him when there are no monster interference.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007543
text: Talk to the Necromancer Master at Mellers Passage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007544
text: Use the magic orb to obtain Magic Infused Blood

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007545
text: The Necromancer Master is conducting an experiment with the magic infused blood. Use the magic orb given by the master and mark the monster with the seal of disinter to obtain the required blood. The procedure must be followed to get the right blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007546
text: You've collected all of the magic infused blood. Return to the Necromancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007547
text: Meet with the Alchemist Master at Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007548
text: Collect the materials to make the incense

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007549

text: The first and foremost thing for an inquisitor is to be able tell between a heretic and a believer, says the Inquisitor Master. Read the decree and use the Book of Judgement and retrieve the belongings of the heretics.
