name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161005_007603
text: You have raised enough water for the experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007604
text: You've really defeated Ebonypawn, the owner of the dagger?{nl}I knew there was something about you but you exceed my expectation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007605
text: This is... It definitely is my comrade's handwriting....{nl}You say you've found it in Knidos Jungle, eh?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007606
text: {nl}I must wait for my comrades.{nl}I want you to follow the trace of the one who left this note.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007607
text: Let's start searching in Bellai Rainforest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007608
text: The note found in Dingofasil District is the last one.{nl}Thank you for the help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007609
text: {nl}My comrade... Was being chased and heading towards the location stated in the note.{nl}The full details...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007610
text: {nl}I am sure we will know of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007611
text: The Shinobi Master of the First Battle for the Throne - Volume 1

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007612
text: Night had fallen. A man of some years rested his tired legs on a small rock by the forest road. He had left with an adequate vehicle and plenty of luggage, yet he now carried nothing but the weight of his own body.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007613
text: A young boy no older than twenty stood guard behind him, a single sword in his hands. Six servants, men and women, had found a comfortable place to sit and rest nearby.{nl}Surrounding them was an armed group of nine men and women, seemingly soldiers or warriors. They too enjoyed a break, each sitting or standing at their positions.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007614
text: It was a cold early Spring in the year 601 of the Kingdom; times were as restless as the news coming from the kingdom's capital.{nl}Beside the man, another man gazed steadily at him. He was several decades older and supported his weight on a cane. The elder was armed with a single visible sword.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007615
text: He faced the resting man and spoke quietly.{nl}"A year ago we commemorated the 600 years of our Kingdom; now we can barely be certain of what future awaits us. Your Highness."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007616
text: "Yes, I too believed we would be far from trouble if only His Highness was treated with the priests' divine cure. I too never thought we would end up roaming the woods, unable to so much as attend His funeral. But Sir Sederberg, remember I haven't yet become the official heir to the throne."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007617
text: "Rael III has passed, and the late king left no sons or daughters. Who else but Your Highness would ascend in such conditions? Neither Duke Techel nor Duke Varchel are fit for the throne."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007618
text: "Under the law, they and I are the same in the line of succession. Our ties may be distant, but we all descend from the royal lineage of Great King Zachariel. I do not wish to escalate this into a civil war. One civil war in the reign of King Kadumel was more than enough for the history of our nation."{nl}The young man holding the sword behind the two joined the conversation.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007619
text: "I'm afraid there will be no other way to decide the heir but by force. Not even for King Malkiel and King Chaspael before us have the goddesses taken a side in our political disputes.{nl}What's more, the three of you are under equal footing before the law. Chancellor Roibuos is merely looking over His Higness' funeral and kingdom affairs, he does not have a say in the sucession."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007620
text: Sederberg reacted to his words.{nl}"Anyone attempting to interfere with such matters would be infringing our national laws. They would be guilty of treason, Sir Alfred."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007621
text: The young Alfred Hutton spoke again.{nl}"Precisely. This cannot be resolved by the law or judged by all the officers in the kingdom, neither can we leave it to the will of the goddesses. What else then, other than force, is the answer?...  ... Who is there!"

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007622
text: Alfred Hutton suddenly fell silent and withdrew his sword. Cosomel, the man at the center of the conversation, remained undisturbed and merely said,{nl}"Mora."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007623
text: At once, a woman appeared by Cosomel's side.{nl}Alfred Hutton sheathed his sword, protesting,{nl}"We know you're a Shinobi, but there's no need to startle us like that, Mora Saizo."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007624
text: Shinobi Mora told Hutton without looking.{nl}"You are far too proud and reliant on your swordsmanship. It might not be enough to keep His Highness safe. It would be wise for you to mind your surroundings. I was here before you could even sense me."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007625
text: Cosomel started to speak before their conversation began to lengthen.{nl}"Stop. Give me the report."{nl}Mora Saizo began to speak.{nl}"There is good news and bad news."{nl}"Continue."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007626
text: "The good news is that you have the Winterspoons' support. As a sign of their support, Riena the house's head wizard will arrive to aide you."{nl}"That is indeed good news. Surely, the endorsement from the Winterspoons will be of great help when all the other families are too scared to get involved. Now, let me hear the bad one."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007627
text: "Duke Varchel will endorse Duke Techel. Furthermore, Marquis Tenstun will also be endorsing Duke Techel." Sederberg said,{nl}"Duke Varchel showed no real interest in the throne so we can assume he would not take actions himself. But still, his involvement... could the Tiberinas' influence in play here?" Alfred Hutton continued where Sederberg left off.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007628
text: "At the moment, no royal official, clergymen or Magic Association are taking any actions. That being said, if such endorsement is put forward, Chancellor Roibuos will step forward to give his endorsement openly in order to prevent any further chaos.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007629
text: At the moment, no royal official, clergymen or Magic Association are taking any actions. That being said, if such endorsement is put forward, Chancellor Roibuos will step forward to give his endorsement openly in order to prevent any further chaos."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007630
text: Mora followed after Hutton.{nl}"Gaining the support of another influential family would certainly balance out the situation. Securing the endorsement of two families, however, could tilt the scale of public recognition in our favor."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007631
text: Cosomel pondered briefly before speaking.{nl}"We are on the way to meet with the Black family to solicit their support. Should we succeed to persuade them by tonight, we can solve at least half of our impediment. That would leave one other family to approach, but who?"

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007632
text: It was Hutton who replied,{nl}"What does Your Highness say of appealing to Marquis Tenstun? He might have sided with Duke Techel, but I don't believe he is particularly fond of him."{nl}Sederberg opposed vehemently.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007633
text: "We shan't go to Tenstun. Have you forgotten about the quarantine uproar that happened in his lands? Had that disaster not aggravated His Highness' condition, His Highness could very well still be among us.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007634
text: As I see it, the mere fact that Techel is supported by someone as despicable as Tenstun makes him unfit for the throne. I say, should His Higness Cosomel become king, the titles and lands of the Tenstuns ought to be impounded. I see no need to forge ties with such a vile human."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007635
text: Hutton nodded and said,{nl}"I still believe the Tenstuns' wealth will become a great threat to us. As much as it may have been accumulated through corrupted means, that is."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007636
text: Then, Sederberg spoke. "If wealth is your concern, is there no family to surpass the Tunstons? The family owning the vastest lands in the kingdom."{nl}"Do you speak of the Green family? I was under the impression they concerned themselves solely with their farms and orchards. They consider any additional profit gained from their crops a blessing of the goddesses, every year donating it to religious orders or the poor. Is that not their custom? I don't believe they would take interest in our affairs."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007637
text: Cosomel replied, laughing.{nl}"And yet, with their support, we may just end this ordeal without shedding a drop of blood."{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007638
text: Sederberg agreed.{nl}"The Winterspoons boast a long tradition of alchemy and science, the Blacks have gathered a roster of military connections since the days of Lydia Schaffen, and the Greens, along with their wealth, have the trust of the people. Should all three families endorse our cause, I'm certain this dispute will cease before a war arises."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007639
text: Cosomel spoke.{nl}"Then it shall happen. Should a war occur, the few noblemen supporting Techel and myself will summon their troops. But regardless of who wins, the royal army is bound to intervene if the battles persist.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007640
text: If so, either the royal army decides the successor, or one ascends by action of their supporting troops. Both cases are undesirable. Victory must be assured before this dispute turns into a war.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007641
text: Be it I or Techel, whoever loses must be exiled to the Woodlands for the rest of his days. Not doing so will endanger the future of the kingdom, regardless of who succeeds."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007642
text: Hutton reacted as such:{nl}"I'm certain of our victory, but I believe the defeated should be exiled to Kalejimas, not the Woodlands."{nl}Cosomel laughed heartily and replied,{nl}"I'm well aware of your dislike for Techel, but that seems rather harsh, no? Either way, who shall we send to meet with the Greens?"

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007643
text: Sederberg spoke.{nl}"As the eldest, I believe I myself should go."{nl}Cosomel shook his head.{nl}"No. The Blacks are virtuous people. They will not be convinced lest the future Chancellor of the kingdom is present."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007644
text: Hutton came forward instead.{nl}"I shall go, then."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007645
text: Cosomel had begun to ponder on Hutton's proposal when Mora spoke.{nl}"Hutton is too young. What's more, he will be needed to escort Your Highness. The Blacks are a family of military tradition. I believe Hutton's swordsmanship could earn us their recognition. I shall go to the Greens."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007646
text: Hutton spoke again.{nl}"I don't intend to dismiss Mora's judgment, but I do believe a Shinobi would be somewhat of a stranger to the court. Would someone with a certain degree of nobility such as myself not be better suited for the task?"

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007647
text: Mora, once again, objected.{nl}"Hutton may be bright, but brightness alone does not suffice to persuade the Greens, considering their position. Shinobis are masters of information and strategy. Trust me with this task and I shall earn the support of the Greens."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007648
text: Cosomel hesitated.{nl}"One must be cautious not to let any strategies end up smearing our names."{nl}Mora Saizo replied.{nl}"Trust me. I can assure you I will not let anything hinder Your Highness' dignity. I only require a letter to prove my status to the Green family."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007649
text: "I am  counting on you. If I obtain the throne, Shinobis shall come out of the shadows and get the recognition and the master they deserve. Of course, the First Master shall be Mora Saizo. Moreover, those who pick up your mantle shall work for the royal court."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007650
text: "It's an honor, Your Highness. I have a long journey ahead of myself, I make haste and start. Sir Alfred Hutton, His Highness' safety depends on your sword. Be wise."{nl}Without waiting for the others to reply, Mora Saizo vanished.{nl}Hutton was left muttering to himself after the already-absent Mora.{nl}"If that is such a concern, why not take the skills of someone who defended His Highness from assassination several times and go to Duke Techel instead..."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007651
text: Sederberg did not hesitate to retort.{nl}"Must we really follow Techel?  Nobody wants the King to ascend by assassination less than I do."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007652
text: "Yes, sir."{nl}Cosomel spoke over Hutton's soft reply.{nl}"I may not have Mora by my side, but I am accompanied the best swordsman in the Kingdom. I have no reason to fear danger.  We've rested enough. Shall we continue our journey?"

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007653
text: Hutton could not help but to strongly agree.{nl}"Yes!" Your Highness."

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007654
text: Ah, you must be a Revelator.{nl}Perhaps,

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007655
text: Encyclopedia of Masters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007656
text: , have you seen that book?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007657
text: {nl}There are other important tasks besides magic studies and restoring written works from the royal palace.{nl}Recording the events of our era for the posterity is one of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007658
text: compiles important contemporary information.{nl}I am currently writing the next volume.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007659
text: {nl}So far I've collected and organized the materials, and part of it is completed.{nl}Now I only need confirmation from each Master about the contents.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007660
text: {nl}Unfortunately, I've been rather busy with the restoration of an important document.{nl}My pupils are focused on this work as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007661
text: s contents still need to be confirmed. May I ask for your help?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007662
text: Oh, thank you.{nl}The faster the book is complete, the better.{nl}The meaning will be lost if I take too long, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007663
text: {nl}I need confirmation from four Masters, but the Sapper Master has already sent in his reply.{nl}I only need you to check with the three other Masters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007664
text: {nl}One of my pupils has already delivered the letter to the Druid Master on the way to Fedimian, so I simply need her reply.{nl}As for the Fencer and Necromancer Masters, I will ask you to deliver them these letters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007665
text: {nl}Hopefully I receive their replies soon, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007666
text: I was in dire need of an extra hand, thank you for offering your help.{nl}I'll be counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007667
text: Thanks to your help, work was completed faster than I thought.{nl}The Masters have all agreed to the contents, now I can finish the book and hand you a copy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007668
text: Please, wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007669
text: Thank you so much for helping me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007670
text: Encyclopedia of Masters, Chapter 2

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007671
text: What can I do for you?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007672
text: Oh, the request from the Sage Master.{nl}I meant to send in my reply, but it somehow was delayed until now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007673
text: I see no problem with the contents.{nl}My childhood was indeed spent in the lands of the Greene family, feeling and communing with nature.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007674
text: All our lands are sold away now.{nl}It wasn't my intent, but thanks to that decision we were able to help many others after Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007675
text: You may take my reply to the Sage Master.{nl}I ought to have sent it earlier, I'm sorry for making you come all the way here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007676
text: If it's from the Sage Master, it must be about

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007677
text: , is it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007678
text: We did discuss it last time we met, but I didn't think he would contact me so soon.{nl}You see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007679
text: I was on my way to find the fencing textbooks donated by my family to the kingdom.{nl}It seems some thieves took advantage of Medzio Diena to steal a few books from the royal archives.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007680
text: I do recall some of our textbooks being stolen then.{nl}Rumor has it the thieves hid them at the Guards Graveyard, so that's where I was planning to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007681
text: {nl}The books aren't all that special, but I feel it's my duty to retrieve them as they belong to my family.{nl}Would you maybe...  go and check the Guards Graveyard while I write my reply?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007682
text: {nl}If what I heard about you is right, it should be an easy task.{nl}Remember it's only a rumor, so you can return if you happen to find nothing there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007683
text: The Sage Master truly outdid himself, his research is impressively extensive.{nl}I'll be counting on you to check up on the Guards Graveyard.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007684
text: I hope this time I can finally retrieve our books.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007685
text: Year XX, XX of XX.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007686
text: {nl}I finally succeeded in hiding all the stolen books.{nl}This fencing textbook is the last, but there has been a problem.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007687
text: I avoided a huge monster and hid the books in the deepest corner of Guards Graveyard.{nl}As I was about to leave, a strange device was activated and I was trapped there for a good while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007688
text: I barely managed to escape.{nl}I can't move my legs properly, most likely from being trapped for so long.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007689
text: {nl}To make matters worse, I was attacked by a group of monsters.{nl}I'm so close to the exit...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007690
text: You brought it back.{nl}It's severely damaged, but it is the Hutton's fencing textbook without a doubt!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007691
text: {nl}It seems the rumor was true after all.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007692
text: {nl}Thanks to you I was able to retrieve one of my family's lost textbooks.{nl}This is the letter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007693
text: {nl}It's my reply to the contents of the Sage Master's book.{nl}The next volume of Encyclopedia of Masters...  Please tell him I look forward to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007694
text: What can I do for you?{nl}A favor from the Sage Master?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007695
text: Hmm...  Yeah, he mentioned it.{nl}Alright, I'll write him an answer.{nl}But you gotta help me with a quick experiment, how does that sound?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007696
text: My experiment is about giving a spirit to objects to bring them to life.{nl}I left a few spirit-collecting machines at Carlyle's Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007697
text: {nl}There must be a ton of spirits around them by now.{nl}You catch the spirits and collect them with the machine. Then behind them is a doll where you cast them into.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007698
text: {nl}What you need to do is use my machines to catch the spirits.{nl}When a machine is full, then you can turn it on again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007699
text: {nl}Do that and the spirits are gonna be cast into the doll.{nl}But you need to be careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007700
text: {nl}There's gonna be a few innocent spirits in there, but you can't catch those.{nl}That's the one condition the grave keeper told me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007701
text: {nl}So make sure you only get the red spirits.{nl}Alright, I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007702
text: The machines are pretty simple, you'll know what to do.{nl}Just remember to catch only the red spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007703
text: So the doll went completely kaput after the spirits went in?{nl}Hmm...  Failed again, eh?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007704
text: Anyway, good work. Thanks for helping.{nl}Alright, here's my letter to the Sage Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007705
text: Oh, would you mind giving me a hand?{nl}There's a rumor saying a Yellow Gazing Golem has been spotted recently.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007706
text: {nl}It usually appears only in Demon Prison 1F, you see. I must make sure.{nl}Unfortunately I'm caught up in an investigation and can't afford to check everything myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007707
text: That's very reassuring.{nl}I'll ask you to first go check the Grynas Hills area.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007708
text: I'm counting on you.{nl}I'm worried that the rumor might be true...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007709
text: You've returned.{nl}How did it go?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007710
text: So there really was a Yellow Gazing Golem?{nl}Hm...  It seems the sightings of Gazing Golems really were true.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007711
text: But why would these monsters suddenly appear in other areas?{nl}I think this requires a more extensive investigation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007712
text: Would you be willing to help a bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007713
text: Then, set up this crystal in Demon Prison District 1 and defeat the Gazing Golems there.{nl}The crystal will automatically collect information on the Golems' magic flow and other data.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007714
text: This time it's Demon Prison District 1.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007715
text: Let's see, this looks sufficient.{nl}Very well done.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007716
text: I'm going to analyze the information collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007717
text: These Gazing Golems seem to be related to something else.{nl}Although I can't really tell what it is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007718
text: I need to investigate further.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007719
text: I would like to have a look at some Gazing Golem fragments.{nl}There may be traces of magic...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007720
text: There was a sighting in Knidos Jungle as well, would you mind looking there?{nl}If a Gazing Golem appears, I would like you to collect some fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007721
text: If they're appearing at Knidos Jungle as well, that means their area is lot broader... But why...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007722
text: You collected the fragments.{nl}May I have a look?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007723
text: If there's traces of mana, that means it's connected to a person.{nl}Someone could be using the Golems to cover up for something.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007724
text: {nl}I'm so sorry for the trouble, but would you check the Gazing Golems again?{nl}This time I need their magic cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007725
text: {nl}Please do me this favor, I'll be very grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007726
text: We're very close, this won't take too much of your time.{nl}I need you to attack the Gazing Golems and remove their magic cores before they are destroyed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007727
text: It should be fairly easy for someone of your talent.{nl}But keep in mind that the Golems will be destroyed after a few moments of being incapacitated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007728
text: Oh, and you can get the cores at either Knidos Jungle or Grynas Hills.{nl}I'll be investigating Demon Prison District 1 one last time meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007729
text: Thank you.{nl}Be careful not to let the magic cores be damaged.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007730
text: You're back.{nl}I've also just returned.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007731
text: I'll have a look at the magic cores, then.{nl}Hmm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007732
text: As I thought, this magic is connected to a person.{nl}It looks as if someone was using the Gazing Golems to inspect different areas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007733
text: This could be the work of demons...{nl}I need to trace this back to its source.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007734
text: From the information collected by analyzing the Golems in the Demon Prison...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007735
text: {nl}We can infer that the Gazing Golems were likely using a portal.{nl}If we can find traces of the person on the other side, we can follow the link.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007736
text: I've prepared two different devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007737
text: {nl}The first one is used to track the link of the Gazing Golems when a portal is created.{nl}The other is a camouflage crystal to hide you from the Golems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007738
text: {nl}As long as you're carrying the camouflage crystal, the Golems will not attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007739
text: {nl}Avoid the Golems and install the link tracking device in Demon Prison District 1.{nl}Don't worry, I will keep in touch with you through the camouflage crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007740
text: Be careful, it could be dangerous.{nl}Make sure the Gazing Golems don't see you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007741
text: {nl}The camouflage crystal needs to be out for some time to take effect.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007742
text: You installed the device!{nl}Seeing how it's reacting, it looks like a portal is about to open!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007743
text: Go back to the place where the device is installed!{nl}If you defeat the Gazing Golem there, the one linked to the Golems will appear!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007744
text: The tracking device will now temporarily link you with the owner of the Golems.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007745
text: {nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007746
text: Baiga

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007747
text: Wondering why you still can't see anything?{nl}There's nothing you can do about it, so keep quiet and listen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007748
text: It's funny to think a fool like you would dare to try me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007749
text: {nl}I am Demon King Baiga.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007750
text: I certainly heard a lot about you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007751
text: {nl}My curiosity is satisfied now, so I won't harm you.{nl}But make no mistakes, interfere with my plans again and I will end you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007752
text: Of course, everything will end eventually.{nl}Your prying could simply make things end a little sooner for you.{nl}Your status as a powerful Revelator won't help you then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007753
text: Bear this in mind.{nl}Not even the goddesses defy me, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007754
text: I lost contact with you for a while, I was so worried!{nl}What happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007755
text: {nl}Huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007756
text: {nl}So the one using the Gazing Golems wasn't just an ordinary demon but Demon King Baiga?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007757
text: And the warning he gave you...{nl}This is serious...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007758
text: Monsters controlled by a Demon King...{nl}With all the Gazing Golem sightings recently, could that mean Baiga is starting to take action?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007759
text: I've come to learn very important facts thanks to your help.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007760
text: So you're the one the Sage Master sent. Thought you looked familiar.{nl}If you have some time, would you mind giving me a hand?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007761
text: Like you read on the Sage Master's letter, before Medzio Diena I sold most of the land I had inherited.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007762
text: {nl}But as you know, with the chaos of Medzio Diena...{nl}The people who bought my land then are now going through serious hardship.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007763
text: I can't simply turn my back on their situation, so I want to do something for them.{nl}I already gave most of them a certificate signed by myself, but I'm still missing Herbalist Calsis.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007764
text: I was hoping you could help me find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007765
text: Thank you for your kindness.{nl}You may go to Orsha and ask about his whereabouts or someone who might have seen him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007766
text: {nl}I know he left his daughter in Klaipeda and went to Orsha, but that's the last I heard of him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007767
text: Please, I must find Calsis...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007768
text: So you heard he left for Knidos Jungle to collect herbs?{nl}But I thought all the herbalists were avoiding the jungle because of the demons lately...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007769
text: He even said he wanted to live as a farmer with his daughter when he bought the land from me...{nl}It really seems he's having trouble making ends meet after Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007770
text: If you don't mind, would you go to Knidos Jungle and look for him?{nl}I would go there myself, but I  need to see the other people who bought my land.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007771
text: {nl}You may just find something if you ask the other herbalists at Knidos Jungle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007772
text: Thank you.{nl}If you find Herbalist Calsis, make sure to deliver my certificate to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007773
text: Going back to Knidos Jungle at a time when most herbalists are escaping it...{nl}I'm a little worried for him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007774
text: I sure hope he's safe, for the sake of his daughter...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007775
text: You're looking for Mr. Calsis?{nl}He left a few weeks ago and hasn't returned since.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007776
text: I'm keeping hold of his belongings for now but... they still need to be organized.{nl}The monsters of Dadan Jungle have been wrecking havoc down here lately, so I didn't have the time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007777
text: If you can help me, I can get his belongings organized for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007778
text: Right now there's a group of monsters from Dadan Jungle causing all sorts of trouble at Neneva Yard.{nl}If you can defeat them, I can get Calsis' belongings meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007779
text: It's not easy collecting herbs anymore with all the demons around... The herbalists that used to work here all went back.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007780
text: {nl}I'm also thinking of going back after I finish organizing Mr. Calsis' belongings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007781
text: You defeated them!{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007782
text: {nl}First, there's something you should know before I tell you where his belongings are.{nl}Mr. Calsis returned to this jungle a few months ago to collect herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007783
text: {nl}When he first left, he said he had bought some land somewhere and was going to become a farmer, but after Medzio Diena he came back.{nl}Sometimes he visited his daughter in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007784
text: {nl}A few weeks ago, he said he found a very special herb and was very happy about it.{nl}Then he left and never came back. I assumed he had gone to see his daughter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007785
text: {nl}But then I received a letter from the daughter saying her dad never came back.{nl}She thought something had happened to him here in the jungle...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007786
text: This is all I know.{nl}I've gathered his belongings in a box.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007787
text: It's at the box pile in Croa Village.{nl}Hopefully it will help you find Mr. Calsis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007788
text: This looks like the pile of boxes mentioned by Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007789
text: Calsis' belongings are inside the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007790
text: There is a diary inside the box labeled 'Calsis'.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007791
text: Calsis' Diary

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007792
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}After long and hard days of thinking, I left Selphie in Klaipeda and came back to this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007793
text: This place ain't what it used to be. Now it is crawling with those darn monsters and demons.{nl

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007794
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}I miss the time of having a farm with Selphie. It was short but sweet like no other.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007795
text: The money I paid to get that land...{nl}Have Goddesses forsaken us?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007796
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}It has been weeks since I returned.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007797
text: I met with Selphie and handed her the money I have made.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007798
text: Next time, I oughtta go further deep.{nl}But those demons...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007799
text: Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}I arrived at the deep part of Dadan Jungle. Demons and mighty strange looking thingamabobs gave me a hell of troubles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007800
text: It was all worth it.{nl}Arzeli!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007801
text: The flower known to even raise the dead. This will do just fine for me and Selphie.{nl}It's a shame, it's not yet full grown. I gotta watch it grow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007802
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}i don't feel well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007803
text: I saw him leading a bunch of monster to the monastery...{nl}What on earth is going on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007804
text: Can't be distracted, in about a week from now, I can get that Arzeli.{nl}I got a little scratch from a monster. Better be careful next time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007805
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}i don't feel well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007806
text: Monsters more and more it worrys me{nl}must make the call{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007807
text: Get that arzeli and sell it so Selphie and i can live well and rest for a while{nl}Selphie, oh how i miss you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007808
text: Selphie

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007809
text: What?{nl}Do you mean my father's missing?{nl}He was supposed to be back already...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007810
text: {nl}Oh, these are the Druid Master's certificate and my father's diary.{nl}He will be glad to know about this...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007811
text: {nl}From the contents of his diary, it seems he went somewhere dangerous.{nl}More than once, too...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007812
text: {nl}After I told him not to go...{nl}Thank you for bringing back his diary.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007813
text: {nl}Thank you so much...{nl}I know my father will be back...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007814
text: Oh, I see.{nl}Calsis wasn't around so you delivered the certificate to his daughter.{nl}Very well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007815
text: {nl}Calsis, however...{nl}I can't help but wonder if something happened in the jungle...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007816
text: {nl}A tragic happening indeed.{nl}Could it have been prevented if I had helped a little sooner, I wonder?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007817
text: {nl}I can only pray that peace will soon return to our world.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007818
text: My father will be back...{nl}He will...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007819
text: Thank you for bringing back his diary...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007820
text: Found the arzeli, but Calsis is nowhere to be seen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007821
text: Now unto the next test!{nl}In the past, I have dashingly eliminated monsters for the sake of immigrants to the Lemprasa Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007822
text: Those monsters reared their ugly heads again.{nl}What I will do is give you this immensely powerful crystal hand-crafted by yours truly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007823
text: Bury it  underneath the entrance to the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007824
text: Ah, good question!{nl}Let me explain this crystal. It strikes fear into the hearts of monsters. For they are a cowardly and sperstitious lot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007825
text: How to make one is a trade secret, my dear would-be student.{nl}When the time comes and you earn your studenthood, I just might teach you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007826
text: Students are go!{nl}Prithee, be haste, those innocent immigrants are suffering from the monsters!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007827
text: Bury these crystals on suitable spots near the entrance to the village near Lamprasa Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007828
text: Use my brilliant invention to lift them of their predicament!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007829
text: Welcome back!{nl}What? Chupacabra jumped on you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007830
text: It happened while you were burying it right?{nl}Or perhaps, the terror was too much for Chupacabra to take and went insane.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007831
text: Haha! Well, the problem is no more, then all is good.{nl}My eyes did not deceive me when I chose you as my student-candidate!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007832
text: This test will be much harder, so be prepared.{nl}I am to deliver the reagent, again, made by the Greatest Problem-Solver of all time to the Miners' Village Mayor. But alas, the trouble be!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007833
text: Dried leaves, one of the key ingredient, they ran out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007834
text: Hmm, what's that look on your face.{nl}This is no ordinary dried leaves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007835
text: In the Nheto Forest, the leaves are all red, after Medzio Diena.{nl}Grind them and put them into my reagent. It works wonders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007836
text: All you have to do is gather up those leaves.{nl}Why so easy, you might wonder. No worries, the monsters are quite ferocious there.{nl}Take care.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007837
text: The Great Muchhausen is not known for misjudging a person's capability. So I trust you and my own eyes!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007838
text: Now, the leaves.{nl}A bit dangerous but for you it won't be.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007839
text: {nl}My eyes never deceive me!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007840
text: You are earlier than I expected!{nl}I am a damn good judge of a character!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007841
text: Wait for a minute.{nl}I will just make the glorious reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007842
text: Voila!{nl}I sometimes surprise myself!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007843
text: Please, deliver this reagent to the mayor of Miners' Village.{nl}They must be waiting sick for this beauty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007844
text: Oh and please tell the mayor, Baron Munchhausen sends his regards.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007845
text: Ah, the good Baron Munchausen has sent you.{nl}We were waiting for it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007846
text: Its effect is quite good, even our healer lady is impressed.{nl}Because only the Baron knows how to make them, we constantly ask him for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007847
text: The mayor will be waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007848
text: Ah, you came!{nl}You return with the mayor's gratitude?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007849
text: All in the day's work of Baron Munchausen. Nothing to be alarmed about!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007850
text: Enough about me. Let's talk about your final test.{nl}Pass this one and you will have the honor of calling yourself a student to Baron Munchausen the Gr-rrr-reat Problem-Solver of all time!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007851
text: The rumor among the guards has it.{nl}There are ghosts on the Guards Graveyard.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007852
text: This gem will drive away those evil spirits. Go to the Guards Graveyard and drive them all away.{nl}Quite similar to your first test but this time it won't be as easy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007853
text: But the danger is expected when you are willing to be the student of the Great Mentor like myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007854
text: Please, be careful.{nl}Succeed in this and you are the student of Baron Munchausen!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007855
text: The moment you held out the gem, the leaf bug horde swarmed in?{nl}Perhaps, you who cannot see ghosts might have seen them as monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007856
text: Well, all seems to be in order.{nl}Like I have said, my eyes never deceive me!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007857
text: You are the student to Baron Munchausen the Grrreat Problem-Solver!{nl}You may take pleasure in spreading the word!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007858
text: Hmm, I have some important business to attend. I will be going.{nl}If Fate willing we shall meet again, my dear Student!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007859
text: Hm?{nl}You have a question?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007860
text: Yes, he is quite eccentric in his speech and manners but{nl}he is also one of the kindest souls I have ever seen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007861
text: He helps out many people both knowingly and unknowingly.{nl}His eccentricity and ego are quite strong...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007862
text: They are his charms, I think.{nl}Anyway, thanks for bringing it to us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007863
text: Please, send my gratitude to the Baron.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007864
text: Tell him. We owe him greatly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007865
text: Encyclopedia of Masters{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007866
text: 1. Sorsha Hutton{nl}{nl}The founder of the Huttons was born in the time of King Rael II and later made a significant contribution to King Cosomel in the Battle for the Throne. As a reward, received land and a nobility title.{nl}For several centuries, the Huttons focused on improving their own brand of swordsmanship. The house of the Huttons considered  noble education, land management and skills in combat of utmost importance. Those who did not meet the standard were sent out of the land. Great care and focus were on swordsmanship..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007867
text: Young Sorsha Hutton showed unparalleled talents even in the history of her family. She applied for the Fencer Master position.{nl}Not all the Fencer Masters have been from the Huttons but a Hutton applies and there is no one that could rival the Hutton. Full support was given to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007868
text: 2. Loreta Nimbus{nl}{nl}She was born in the later era of King Damiel and got on the master position in the era of King Frienel.{nl}Her greatest achievement that dwarves that of her foremasters is discovering a way to obtain longevity through absorbing the life force.{nl}The first beneficiary of this technique was of course herself and she became a member of Amjinas. These two factors rendered any need for successors to the  Necromancer Master position.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007869
text: 3. Gina Greene{nl}{nl}The house of the Greenes owns the largest amount of land.{nl}Gina Greene grew up in various parts of her family land and it was such experience that made her choose the path to the Druid Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007870
text: Furthermore, when she inherited the largest portion of the land, she sold the land for it was not right for a Druid Master to get tied to a specific location. The money she has made from the transaction is entrusted in the Kedora Merchant Alliance. Her wealth provokes envy even from the Pardoner Master.{nl}Her action was not based on any pursuit of financial gains nor did she expected or anticipated such but her decision was a highly profitable one given that after Medzio Diena wrecked almost all the land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007871
text: Of course, her interest was not in the money and she supported her kins and many other people who have suffered from Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007872
text: 4. Leonard Quicktongue{nl}{nl}Leonard Quicktongue the Sapper Master is not the name given to him by his parents.{nl}He achieved quite an infamy in his adolescence as a thief. He stole army supplies and his father who was a soldier took the blame.{nl}Because it was his son's deeds, he could not prove his innocence. It is said that he never met the Sapper Master until the day he died.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007873
text: Quicktongue reformed of his way and became a soldier himself. He served as an officer and made a name for himself. However, despite continuous visit requests, his father only replied that if it is an order from a superior officer, he will visit.{nl}Perhaps it is due to such background, the Sapper Master does subtle charity work.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007874
text: I am happy to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007875
