name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007928
text: Search the Chest of Materials for Neutralizer reagent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007929
text: The combination states that you require a reagent for the Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer. Look through the Chest of Materials to find a Neutralizer reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007930
text: Overgrowth Potion Neutralizer Combination : You can craft it by processing it at the Potion Mixing Magic Circle by using the Neutralizer reagent stored in the Chest of Materials. In order to use the Potion Mixing Magic Circle, input magic in the Magic Circle. You will be able to utilize it by activating the blinking lights in the correct order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007931
text: Defeat High Officer Deymantas Transformed into a Blue Riteris

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007932
text: The Sage Master is recently writing a book. Talk with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007933
text: Deliver the Letter to the Masters

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007934
text: The Sage Master's schedule is far too clustered.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007935
text: is not yet completed due to schedule complication. You've interviewed the Sapper Master. Now interviews with the Druid, Fencer and Necromancer Masters are left. Deliver the letters to them and obtain their replies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007936
text: Deliver the Letter to the Sage Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007937
text: You've obtained all the replies from the masters. Deliver the Reply to the Sage Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007938
text: The Sage Master has sent a letter to the Druid Master and has asked you to retrieve the Druid Master's reply. Ask the Druid Master about the reply to the Sage Master's letter.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007939
text: Deliver the Letter to the Fencer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007940
text: From the Sage Master to the Fencer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007941
text: s contents need to be confirmed. Deliver the Sage Master's Letter to the Fencer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007942
text: Find the Swordsmanship Textbook in the Guards Graveyard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007943
text: The Fencer Master will write the reply but in return she wants to investigate the Guards Graveyard. Find the trace of a thief that said to be in the Guards Graveyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007944
text: Inspect the Old Diary

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007945
text: You've found the suspicious old diary. Read the conents of the journal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007946
text: Check the  Location Stated in the Diary

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007947
text: According to the diary, the thief has hidden Hutton's Swordsmanship Textbook deep inside the Guards Graveyard. Search the room said to contain Hutton's Swordsmanship Textbook. Except, you would have to open the device that captured the thieft for awhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007948
text: Deliver the Textbook to the Fencer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007949
text: Found Hutton's Swordsmanship Textbook. But it is heavily damaged. Deliver the Textbook to the Fencer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007950
text: Deliver the Letter to the Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007951
text: Deliver the Sage Master to the Necromancer Master. Deliver the Letter to the Necromancer Master at Mullers Passage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007952
text: Activate the Mysterious Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007953
text: The Necromancer Master wants you to help her experiment while she writes up a reply. She has set up up some equipment in Carlyle's Mausoleum and asked you to activate it and gather evil spirits and monsters. But be careful, innocent spirits might appear as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007954
text: Report to the Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007955
text: The spirits have been collected via the Suscpisious Device but dolls have been destroyed. Report the findings to the Necromancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007956
text: The Linker Master is looking for someone to help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007957
text: Inspect Grynas Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007958
text: The Linker Master said that on Grynas Hills recently

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007959
text: has appeared. She wants you to confirm this. Search around in the Grynas Hills and find Gazing Golem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007960
text: Just like the Linker Master said about Grynas Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007961
text: encountered. Let the Linker Master know that the info she has received is true.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007962
text: Search and Defeat %s

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007963
text: The Linker Master seems to be continuing her research on Gazing Golem. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007964
text: Install the Spell Crystal at Demon Prison District 1

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007965
text: The Linker Master asked you to install the Spell Crystal and defeat the oncoming gazing golems. Defeat the oncoming gazing golems after installing the Spell Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007966
text: The Linker Master has completed the requested task. Return to the Linker Master with the Investigation Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007967
text: The Linker Master claims that it warrants further investigation. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007968
text: Collect the Fragments of Gazing Golem on Grynas Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007969
text: The Linker Master has a hunch and wants you to collect the fragments of Gazing Golem. And if you are not in a terrible hurry, go down to Knidos Jungle and check up on the eyewitness who claims to have seen Gazing Golem. That would be lovely.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007970
text: Just as the Linker Master has suspected, Yellow Gazing Golem was found in Knidos Jungle. Collect the Fragments from Yellow Gazing Golem and hand them to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007971
text: The Linker Master seems to have something to say to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007972
text: Collect Gazing Golem's Magic Core

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007973
text: The Linker Master says that Gazing Golem is sent by the demons to spy all around the world. The Linker Master is investigating what demon is behind all this. In order to find out, retrieve the core from Gazing Golem. Find Gazing Golem at Grynas Hills or Knidos Jungle and collect its core.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007974
text: You've obtained the Gazing Golem Core that the Linker Master asked you about. Report to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007975
text: The Linker Master's investigation seems to be completed to a certain degree. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007976
text: Install the Link Tracking Device and Avoid Getting Detected by Gazing Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007977
text: The Linker Master handed you Camouflage Crystal and asked you to avoid getting detected by Gazing Golem and get to the Demon Prison District 1. Once you are there, set up Link Tracking Device. Don't get too close to Gazing Golem. You will get detected.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007978
text: Contact with Linker Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007979
text: The Linker Master seems to have something to say to you. Camouflage Crystal sent you a message.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007980
text: Go to the Link Tracking Device

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007981
text: The Linker Tracker has detected something. Go to it immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007982
text: Check the Demon Sent by Gazing Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007983
text: You must find out which demon was sent by Gazing Golem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007984
text: Talk to the Linker Master about who is behind Gazing Golem.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007985
text: The Druid Master is looking for a helping hand. Talk to the Druid Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007986
text: Collect Information About Herbalist Calsis

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007987
text: The Druid Master wants to find Herbalist Calsis, who bought land from her in the past, to help him. Go to Orsha and find out about his whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007988
text: You have collected information about Herbalist Calsis. Report back to the Druid Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007989
text: The Druid Master seems to have remembered something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007990
text: The Druid Master believes that, if Calsis returned to collect herbs, the other herbalists could know something about him. Go to Knidos Jungle and ask Herbalist Ash about him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007991
text: Herbalist Ash seems to have something to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007992
text: Defeat the Monsters at Neneva Yard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007993
text: Herbalist Ash says that a few monsters from Dadan Jungle have started to appear in the area. He has asked you to defeat the monsters while he gathers the clues regarding Calsis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007994
text: You have defeated the monsters mentioned by Herbalist Ash. Report back to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007995
text: Ask Herbalist Ash about the clues regarding Calsis.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007996
text: Search the Old Pile of Boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007997
text: Herbalist Ash says he gathered Calsis' belongings in a box after he failed to return. Look through the old pile of boxes to find Calsis' belongings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007998
text: Investigate the Old Pile of Boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_007999
text: You have found the old box pile mentioned by Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008000
text: Find the Arzeli to Obtain Clues About Calsis' Whereabouts

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008001
text: Herbalist Calsis wrote about arzeli in his diary, which could lead to a clue about his whereabouts. Go to Dadan Jungle and find the arzeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008002
text: Collect the Arzeli and Look for Clues

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008003
text: You have defeated all the monsters. Collect the Arzeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008004
text: Deliver the Diary and Arzeli to Selphie

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008005
text: You have collected the arzeli. Take the herb and Calsis' diary to Klaipeda and deliver them to his daughter Selphie.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008006
text: You have delivered the Druid Master's certificate to Selphie. Report back to the Druid Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008007
text: Talk to Baron Munchausen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008008
text: The man who calls himself

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008009
text: the Great Problem-Solver

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008010
text: Talk to Baron Munchausen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008011
text: Investigate the box in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008012
text: Baron Munchausen out of nowhere declares you have to pass his tests in order to be his student. He wants you to investigate the phenomenon of recent supplies in East Siauliai Woods keep disappearing. He wants you to sprinkle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008013
text: Holy Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008014
text: on the box to drive away ghosts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008015
text: A weaver jumps out of the box when you sprinkled the powder given to you by Baron Munchausen. Perhaps it is this weaver who ate all the food inside. Report to Baron Munchausen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008016
text: Baron Munchausen has some other request in mind. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008017
text: Bury the Strange Crystals Under the Village

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008018
text: Baron Munchausen is worried about the recent monster infestation on the immigrant camp near Lamprasa Pond. He wants you to bury

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008019
text: near the entrances to the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008020
text: Report what happens afterwards to Baron Munchausen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008021
text: Baron Munchausen is pleased with what you can accomplish. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008022
text: Gather Dried Leaves of Nheto Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008023
text: Baron Munchausen is making something. And he wants you to gather up dried leaves from Nheto Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008024
text: You've gathered all the leaves the Baron asked for. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008025
text: The Baron made some reagent with dried leaves. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008026
text: Talk to the Miners' Village Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008027
text: Baron Munchausen asked you to deliver

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008028
text: Munchausen's Reagent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008029
text: to the mayor of Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008030
text: You've delivered the reagent like the Baron asked you to. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008031
text: The Baron is about to give you the final test. Talk with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008032
text: Exorcise the Guards Graveyard

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008033
text: The recent sightings of ghosts is the final test. He wants you to drive away ghosts on Guards Graveyard with his crystal. Go to Guards Graveyard and drive away those ghosts.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008034
text: The moment you use the crystal, leaf bugs approach! Report this to Baron Munchausen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008035
text: The Shinobi Master reads the note with a serious expression on her face. Talk to the Shinobi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008036
text: Follow the trace of the Shinobi Master's comrade.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008037
text: Find the whereabouts of the Shinobi Master's comrade by using the summon scroll given by the Shinobi Master at the point written in the note. When the summoned creature disappears, it can be summoned again by the Summon Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20161214_008038
text: The traces were found but could not find the Shinobi Master's comrade. Report this fact to the Shinobi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170213_008039
text: Global Event

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008040
text: Perhaps, asking help from the Winterspoons, the Alchemist Family, might be in order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008041
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth could have taken the treasures and properties from the villagers.{nl}That is why I am searching around in this monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008042
text: I am currently performing the task of delivering the souls of those who have been petrified. I cannot go to Dingofasil District.{nl}Instead, please install this gnyang spheres that will calm their nerves.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008043
text: Spheres could at least comfort their minds...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008044
text: You've installed them all.{nl}I thank you in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008045
text: The box is quite heavy...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008046
text: {nl}It must contain all that the Order of the Tree of Truth has stolen from the good villagers.{nl}But it's tightly locked so we cannot confirm what is inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008047
text: Of course! The Corsair Master!{nl}The Corsair Master once visited the monastery before.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008048
text: {nl}At the time, the key to the sacred box was lost and monks were having some difficulties with it.{nl}The Corsair Master saw our trouble and opened it without any problem whatsoever.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008049
text: {nl}He used some sort of needle on the key hole...{nl}Asking the Corsair Mater how he did it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008050
text: Take the Box and go to the Corsair Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008051
text: You want me to open the box?{nl}No problem, matey.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008052
text: The box should be open in the blink of an eye.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008053
text: The Corsair Master is opening the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008054
text: Aye, this is not a problem.{nl}Say, why is the box filled with such precious things... ah, they are stolen and taken from the villagers by those Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008055
text: {nl}Extorting people, in this economy? Now that's cruel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008056
text: You opened the box.{nl}What was in it?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008057
text: In tough times, we gotta help one another...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008058
text: Why do look at me like that, hey?{nl}I may not have been much of a helper, but I sure didn't steal from anyone.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008059
text: It was given to me at will.{nl}It's the truth, I'm telling ya!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008060
text: I wonder if the kingdom knows how much we suffer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008061
text: I just want to go home and have warm potato dumplings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008062
text: So my suspicions were right.. The Tree of Truth was after the wealth of the villagers.{nl}We ought to return these objects to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008063
text: I think I know what the commander is going to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008064
text: You should go.{nl}The demons could get you before you know it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008065
text: These are things we offered those heretics... I feel so ashamed...{nl}Thank so much for returning our valuables.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008066
text: Can I ask you to get me some strawberries?{nl}I just feel sorry for the other soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008067
text: If you can bring me some strawberries, I wanna share them with the other soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008068
text: Thank you so much for the strawberries.{nl}They're going to love it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008069
text: {nl}Although, we could make some iced punch if we had a little more...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008070
text: I need to study the Carnivore remains to find out why the reagent failed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008071
text: Thank you for accepting our request.{nl}Not many people are willing to these days...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008072
text: {nl}The Martuis Storage Room was only recently discovered and is still unexplored.{nl}I wish I could go and investigate myself but...{nl}The work here won't let me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008073
text: Thank you for carrying out our request.{nl}This is a very interesting type of magic I'm feeling.{nl}I need to study the dolls.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008074
text: I would have never guessed someone would do a favor like this for me again.{nl}I was gonna do it myself but...{nl}As you know, you put one foot outside the convent and it's your life that's at risk...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008075
text: {nl}Anyway, thank you.{nl}I can make some decent jewelry with this now!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008076
text: I heard someone left a message, it must have been you!{nl}I had no way of communicating with other wizards...{nl}Thank you so much for fixing the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008077
text: {nl}Anyway, just take care of yourself.{nl}Let me know if you need anything!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008078
text: I've been looking for something like this for so long.{nl}Now I can carry on with all the things I was doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008079
text: Finally I put my hands one something like this!{nl}I used to help the people who escaped from the capital.{nl}I was using this at my work and it was so useful.{nl}Thanks to you things just got a lot easier.{nl}Thank you so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008080
text: Many were those who left in search of the legend of Alembique, but nothing was ever heard of them.{nl}Then, I heard about the cave sap from one of such travelers.{nl}I was planning to travel there after my work here was finished...{nl}But thanks to you I might not have to.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008081
text: I was surprised that you contacted me.{nl}How did you get in there?{nl}Did you find anything interesting?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008082
text: {nl}I imagine you can't talk for long.{nl}Thank you for activating the device.{nl}Do tell me if you find anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008083
text: I've always been collecting one or two at a time, but it's first time someone has ever brought so many.{nl}I think this will be very useful to the sisters.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008084
text: I was searching for someone who could bring me these claws.{nl}Fortunately I didn't need to search too far.{nl}A bit more would be perfect, but I suppose I can do with this much.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008085
text: Are you here to help us stop the demons?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008086
text: {nl}Should you enter the convent here, you will be sent to one of the rooms currently under attack by the demons.{nl}If you succeed to keep them from reaching their goal, we will be happy to reward you.{nl}For one, this is where you can obtain Cubes of Blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008087
text: {nl}With the rewards from these cubes, you will be able to transcend your equipment and strengthen its features.{nl}But I must warn you, the demons in convent are very powerful.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008088
text: {nl}We strongly advise you not to proceed unless you are with other adventurers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008089
text: Listen to Monk Dorma's opinion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008090
text: Ask Monk Dorma about a way to learn about the members of the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008091
text: Collect the Magic in Salvia Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008092
text: Go to Salvia Forest. Find which magic collectors are full by consulting the map and collect their magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008093
text: Eyes That See Far

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008094
text: Go to Inner Wall District 8 and activate the Wizard Master's observation device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008095
text: Collect Cave Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008096
text: Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1. Find which magic collectors are full by consulting the map and collect their magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008097
text: Old Tool

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008098
text: Go to the Workshop and collect old tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008099
text: Someone's Good Will

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008100
text: Go to Rasvoy Lake and find the hidden treasure chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008101
text: Svalphinghas Forest in Trouble

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008102
text: Go to Svalphinghas Forest. Look for the mutated Tree Root Crystals and destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008103
text: Magic Horn

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008104
text: This Time For Sure

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008105
text: Go to Phamer Forest and find the hidden treasure chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008106
text: Underground Ecosystem

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008107
text: Defeat the monsters in Alembique Cave and collect cave sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008108
text: Seeing For The First Time

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008109
text: Go to Zima Suecourt and activate the Wizard Master's observation device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008110
text: Surrogate Observer

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008111
text: Move to the Martuis Storage Room, located in the Zima Suecourt underground region.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008112
text: At Pystis Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008113
text: Go to Pystis Forest. Look for the mutated Tree Root Crystals and destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008114
text: Secret of the Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008115
text: Go to Nobreer Forest and find the hidden treasure chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008116
text: Recover the Convent Records

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008117
text: The Lake Rafene

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008118
text: Placing the wooden pole...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008119
text: Since High Officer Medea could escape, be careful that she doesn't go too far.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008120
text: Have You Heard of the Saalus Convent?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008121
text: You can now use the Saalus Convent missions to obtain exclusive items!{nl}Press the F5 key to read the details in the Quest info window!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008122
text: It's Alright

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008123
text: I'll go and install the sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008124
text: Villagers' Valuables (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008125
text: Showing the box...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008126
text: I dunno, sorry, I gotta go.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008127
text: Talking about the box...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008128
text: Villagers' Valuables (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008129
text: I'll get those valuables back to the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008130
text: You can return them to the villagers yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008131
text: Returning the box to the villagers...

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008132
text: Just What I Was Craving

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008133
text: I can get you some strawberries.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008134
text: You should get some from the supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008135
text: A magic tracer map has appeared. The back of the map includes instructions by the Saalus Convent jewelry collector on how to use it. First, go to Salvia Forest and find the magic collectors. Restart the map to check which collectors are full and collect the magic in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008136
text: Talk to the Jewelry Collector

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008137
text: You have collected all the magic from the collectors. Bring it to the jewelry collector at the Saalus Convent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008138
text: Collect Power

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008139
text: The Wizard Master believes there was a problem with the observation device in the Inner Wall District 8. Go there and obtain power from the monsters that can be used to activate the device. Keep in mind that the power will disappear unless you collect a sufficient amount.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008140
text: Activate the Device at the Inner Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008141
text: You have collected enough power to activate the device. Activate the observation device and contact the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008142
text: Collect Magic at the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008143
text: A magic tracer map has appeared. The back of the map includes instructions by the Saalus Convent jewelry collector on how to use it. First, go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1 and find the magic collectors. Restart the map to check which collectors are full and collect the magic in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008144
text: Collect Old Tools

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008145
text: The Enchanter Master is looking for tools that can only be found at the Workshop. Defeat the monsters at the Workshop to collect old tools, then bring them to the Enchanter Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008146
text: You have collected enough old tools. Deliver them to the Enchanter Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008147
text: Open the Rasvoy Lake Treasure Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008148
text: Find the Rasvoy Lake treasure chest and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008149
text: Destroy the Mutated Tree Root Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008150
text: Destroy the mutated Tree Root Crystals in Svalphinghas Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008151
text: Collect Magic Horns

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008152
text: The Enchanter Master is looking for horns with magic properties. Join the Castle Dungeon battle and defeat the head monsters there to collect the horns.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008153
text: You have collected the magic horns. Deliver them to the Enchanter Master at the Saalus Convent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008154
text: Open the Phamer Forest Treasure Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008155
text: Find the Phamer Forest treasure chest and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008156
text: Collect Cave Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008157
text: The Enchanter Master is looking for a type of sap that only exists in Alembique Cave. Defeat the monsters there and collect the sap, then bring it to the Enchanter Master at the Saalus Convent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008158
text: You have collected the cave sap. Bring it to the Enchanter Master at the Saalus Convent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008159
text: The Wizard Master believes there was a problem with the observation device in the Zima Suecourt. Go there and obtain power from the monsters that can be used to activate the device. Keep in mind that the power will disappear unless you collect a sufficient amount.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008160
text: Activate the Device at Zima Suecourt

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008161
text: You have collected enough power to activate the device. Activate the observation device and contact the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008162
text: Investigate the Martuis Storage Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008163
text: The back of the scroll contains instructions from the Chronomancer Master. The instructions ask you to investigate the sources of magic at the Martuis Storage Room. Use the Shaman Doll Summoning Scroll there to investigate the type of magic present in the region, then report back to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008164
text: You have finished investigating the Martuis Storage Room as requested by the Chronomancer Master. Report back to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008165
text: Destroy the Mutated Tree Root Crystals of Pystis Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008166
text: Open the Nobreer Forest Treasure Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008167
text: Find the Nobreer Forest treasure chest and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008168
text: The Enchanter Master wants to recover the convent's old records. Enter the Convent Scriptorium Mission and defeat the monsters to obtain the convent's records, then deliver them to the Enchanter Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008169
text: The Enchanter Master is waiting for you at the Saalus Convent. Bring back the convent records you obtained from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008170
text: Obtain the Lake Rafene's Claws

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008171
text: The Enchanter Master is looking for a Lake Rafene claw to enhance a magic tool. Enter the Lake Mission and defeat the Rafene to obtain the claws, than deliver them to the Enchanter Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008172
text: You have obtained the material sought after by the Enchanter Master. Bring it back to the Saalus Convent.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008173
text: Brutus was a demon in disguise. Defeat Brutus in his real form.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008174
text: The Demon Assassins have appeared to defeat the two of you. Defeat them while protecting Monk Dorma.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008175
text: Defeat High Officer Domantas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008176
text: High Officer Domantas of the Order of the Tree of Truth was a demon. Defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008177
text: You have succeeded in defeating High Officer Domantas. Talk to Monk Stella to discuss future plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008178
text: Hayatin says the document chest and the key are linked by magic. They react to one another when they are near. The chest is out of spell. We must do with crystalized magic stones obtainable by defeating Blue Gosarus. Hayatin suspects that Musiz Pond where he and Victoras battled is the most likely.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008179
text: Elgos Abbot needs help to purify the spirits affected by the demons. He needs the Priest Master to provide holy water and speed up the process. Bring back 10 Holy Water. They can be purchased from the Priest Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008180
text: Talk to Sister Aiste at the Saalus Convent

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008181
text: You can now participate in a simple tutorial about Saalus Convent missions.{nl}Feel free to take this quest if you are unfamiliar with these missions.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008182
text: You are now allowed to play Saalus Convent missions and receive special items.{nl}{nl}Start by talking to Sister Aiste at the Saalus Convent.{nl}Type

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008183
text: in the chat window to see the location of the Saalus Convent missions, as well as the number of daily entries.{nl}{nl}First, find the Convent and speak with Sister Aiste.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008184
text: Ask Kupole Meile to Guide the Souls in Dingofasil District

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008185
text: Install the Sphere at Dingofasil District

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008186
text: Kupole Meile is delivering the petrified souls in Coastal Fortress first, then moving onto Dingofasil District. Kupole Meile wants you to install the Sphere to make them serene.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008187
text: Dingofasil

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008188
text: You've successfully installed the Sphere in Dingofasil District. Talk to Kupole Meile.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008189
text: Villagers' Valuables

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008190
text: You have found a box. Take it to the Elgos Monk to find out if it belongs to the Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008191
text: Unlock the Box

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008192
text: The chest is locked. The abbot believes the Corsair Master might be able to open it. Visit the Corsair Master at Akmens Ridge and ask for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008193
text: The box is open. Return to the Monastery Annex and talk to the Elgos Monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008194
text: The Elgos Monk would like to see the contents of the box. Talk to the Elgos Monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008195
text: Deliver the Box to the Villagers

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008196
text: The objects inside the box belonged to the villagers. Return the box to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008197
text: Talk to Soldier Heulen

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008198
text: Soldier Heulen still seems to be craving strawberries. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008199
text: Obtain Strawberries

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008200
text: Soldier Heulen wants to eat strawberries with the other soldiers. Obtain some strawberries.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170313_008201
text: You have obtained the strawberries. Bring them to Soldier Heulen.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008202
text: The Kabbalist Master told you that in order to become a Kabbalist, you should be able to understand all the numbers hidden in all properties of the world. Use the crystal sphere that has appeared at Cranto Coast and defeat the monster which the number on the sphere indicates.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008203
text: The Shinobi Master told you that you need an ability to escape safely without being detected by other enemies after defeating the target. Defeat the monster at Ruklys Hall and reach safety without being attacked by other monsters for 10 seconds.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008204
text: Zanas' Spirit says you need the Protection Magic that will protect you from the Demon Barrier. Go to the Protection Magic Circle in the Interrogation Room and complete the Protection Magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008205
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit in Storage

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008206
text: You have disarmed the Demon Barrier in the Kalejimas Visiting Room. Talk to Zanas' Spirit in Storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008207
text: Zanas' Spirit said you also need to disarm the Demon Barrier in Storage. Defeat monsters in the area to allow Zanas' Spirit to reach the barrier in safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008208
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit at the Solitary Cells

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008209
text: Zanas' Spirit wishes to go to the Solitary Cells. Go and talk to him there.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008210
text: Defeat the Demon Stragglers in the Solitary Cells

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008211
text: After defeating Grinende, all that is left now are stragglers. Defeat the demons in the Solitary Cells so they won't interrupt you while trying to obtain the King's Jewels.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008212
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit at the Reintegration Workshop

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008213
text: You have disarmed the Demon Barrier at the Solitary Cells. Go and talk to Zanas' Spirit at the Workshop.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008214
text: Zanas' Spirit should be able to follow you since you have defeated many monsters. Go to the Demon Barrier on the way to the Interrogation Room Entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008215
text: Talk to Zanas' Spirit in the Interrogation Room

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008216
text: You must go to the Interrogation Room in order to obtain the last King's Jewel. Go to the Interrogation Room and talk to Zanas' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008217
text: Tower of Discipline Magical Device: You must find and activate only Kadumel's Magic Circles after activating the Device. You must start over if you activate other Magic Circle as Kadumel's Magic Circles will lose their strength. If you activate the Device after activating all of Kadumel's Magic Circles, illusions will appear in the Interrogation Room and confuse enemies.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008218
text: Activate the Secret Device in the Interrogation Room Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008219
text: There is a mysterious Secret Device in the Interrogation Room Entrance. Check it to see what it does.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008220
text: Light the campfire by obtaining oil from Green Pag Nurses

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170330_008221
text: Like Costas said, light the campfire with the oil from Green Pag Nurses.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008222
text: Hm, how to describe Plague Doctors...{nl}It's a combination of the authority of the goddesses and the knowledge of humans.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008223
text: Enhancing the harmful effects even further and to cure allies who are hurt by these effects.{nl}To put it simply, we are experts in harmful effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008224
text: Of course I'd be willing to teach you all about it.{nl}But first, you must help me with something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008225
text: Many people have been falling ill recently.{nl}The disease itself isn't difficult to cure, but eliminating the source to keep others from contracting it is a much better solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008226
text: Please visit the King's Plateau, Viltis Forest, Goddess' Ancient Garden and Knidos Jungle and bring me the reports from each Disease Detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008227
text: Bring me the reports and I'll be glad to teach you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008228
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll need to have a closer look at these reports.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008229
text: Now, to pass onto you my Plague Doctor teachings.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008230
text: Disease Detector [Plague Doctor Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008231
text: Retrieve the Reports

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008232
text: The Plague Doctor Master wants to see the reports from his Disease Detectors. Retrieve the reports from the detectors at King's Plateau, Viltis Forest, Goddess' Ancient Garden and Knidos Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008233
text: You have obtained all the reports. Bring them to the Plague Doctor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008234
text: Retrieve %s from the Detector at King's Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008235
text: Retrieve %s from the Detector at Viltis Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008236
text: Retrieve %s from the Detector at Goddess' Ancient Garden

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008237
text: Retrieve %s from the Detector at Knidos Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20170510_008238
text: Talk to the Lonely Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008239
text: Bullet Marker Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008240
text: You better know, the path to Bullet Marker isn't over, it's just begun.{nl}Not only must you have steady skill and training, but understanding basic properties is a must.{nl}I've prepared everything so we'll start now.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008241
text: Follow this trail and you'll see the training grounds.{nl}I'll mark it on your map, so don't get lost.{nl}There's a special reward if you score high, so give it your all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008242
text: The way to train is easy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008243
text: Just attack normally but after one attack, the property will disappear.{nl}You can recharge the property at the training ground so simply recharge and train.{nl} Keep in mind to attack with the correct property.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008244
text: Ice against fire, fire against earth, earth against lightning, lightning against ice, divine against dark, and ace against all.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008245
text: Twirling our Capote to excite the monsters and avoid attack, is the elegant dance of the Matador.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008246
text: But if you want to get there, you'll need to practice.{nl}Oh ho, you really want to learn, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008247
text: I like your assertiveness.{nl}We'll start first with practicing how to twirl the Capote to lure monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008248
text: I've prepared a place where you can train in Stele Road.{nl}Go there and my assistant will fill you in on the details.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008249
text: Matador's Assistant

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008250
text: You came because you heard from the Matador Master that you can train your Capote skills here?{nl}You found the right place.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008251
text: I'll explain the training.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008252
text: Go to Stele Road and you'll hear a more detailed explanation from my assistant.{nl} Follow her instruction well and learn as much as you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008253
text: Hm..? Something seems different?{nl}Is it just my imagination?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008254
text: Somehow you seem more like a Matador.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008255
text: Finally I put my hands one something like this!{nl}I used to help the people who escaped from the capital.{nl}I was using this at my work and it was so useful.{nl}Thanks to you things just got a lot easier.{nl}Thank you so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008256
text: The shadow is your reflection like how eclipses are reflections on the world.{nl}When you are able to successfully train your own reflection, you'll be able to call yourself a Shadowmancer.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008257
text: It would be good if you did some training to become more comfortable with your shadow.{nl}I've prepared a training device at Lajidota Fields for apprentices who are still getting used to their shadows.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008258
text: {nl}Activate the device to begin your training.{nl}How well you train will decide your reward.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008259
text: There is one thing you need to know about training. Simply training will do no good.{nl}Instead, by your own effort the training will be successful. I recommend keeping that in mind when training.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008260
text: The training was hard, no?{nl}But if you don't put in the effort, your shadow will refuse to listen.{nl}Don't think about the difficulty, just keep at it. You'll succeed if you do.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008261
text: You worked hard. But you're still lacking in parts.{nl}Keep trying and devote yourself to the task. Talk to me whenever you want to train again.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008262
text: You came back to train again. The device is at Lajidota Fields.{nl}I'll be waiting to the see the fruits of your training.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008263
text: It's good to want to improve but intense training can harm your body.{nl}It's important to take breaks, of course.{nl}If you would like to train more, come back again after you've rested.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008264
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin thought about the proposal for a moment.{nl}The opponent is a human who have just discovered them. There was no way a powerful demon like him{nl}could ever be beaten by an ordinary human. He accepted the proposal.{nl}[Alright. I like it. Go on.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008265
text: {nl}Once Rumpelstiltskin accepted the idea, a further discussion on some ground rules and details went on and finally they reached an agreement. One of the terms was one could ask three questions to the other. Baroconsi started his question.{nl}[How many carriages would be needed to transport all of the gold in these veins?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008266
text: {nl}He thought about it but after a while, he figure{nl}even Baroconsi would not answer this question so he gave up. His reasoning was{nl}if Baroconsi doesn't know the answer as well, the round is a draw.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008267
text: {nl}But as soon as Rumpelstiltskin gave up, Baroconsi answered{nl}[One carriage as big as these veins would certainly carry all the gold. So the answer is one.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008268
text: {nl}This, of course, infuriated Rumpelstiltskin and protested that that was not fair.{nl}Baroconsi did not even flinch and silently started at the giant demon who can easily squahs him with a tip of his finger.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008269
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin eventually calmed down a bit. It was not in his nature to stop a game once it started. Furthermore, he took great pleasure from defeating his opponent no matter the circumstances or conditions. So he continued.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008270
text: {nl}Baroconsi asked another question{nl}[My second question is this. You and I guess the amount of gold these veins would produce in a year and the one to guess the closest wins this round.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008271
text: {nl}At the question, Rumpelstiltskin added.{nl}[This time no trick with the scales. I will not tolerate such cheap trick anymore. And if you still do, I win.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008272
text: {nl}Baroconsi stared at Rumpelstiltskin straight in the eyes.{nl}Showing no sign of fear. {nl}Even when standing before a demon with infernal flame coming out of his head and razor sharp teeth gleaming with cruelty.{nl}[I give you my word on it. No scale trick this time.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008273
text: {nl}Baroconsi replied.{nl}[I am not quite sure how that would make it a win for you but it's irrelevant for I have a different number. My number is 0.]{nl}[What?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008274
text: {nl}[I will not have it. The second question is null.{nl}Or at least a draw.]{nl}Baroconsi did not argued with the demon's claim at all and continued.{nl}[Alright, the round is a draw. That means the next question will be a tie-breaker. I asked the questions twice in a row, so, it's only fair you do the question.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008275
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin was puzzled by his calm acceptance.{nl}But he did get what he wanted and it was his turn to ask. so his mind quickly became occupied with making a question. He thought about it for a moment and asked{nl}[Who will be the owner of these gold veins in one year?]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008276
text: {nl}The question was immediately followed by a stern warning from Rumpelstiltskin.{nl}[If you say the Kedora Merchant Alliance or any other person or entity, I will devour every single one of you. Of course, such task could not be done instantly.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008277
text: {nl}Rumpelstiltskin glowing with a sense of victory looked at{nl} Baroconsi. The countenance of Baroconsi did not alter at all. As if to show he has been expecting the demon's answer all along simply answered.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008278
text: {nl}[The owner of the gold veins in one year's time would be you,{nl}Rumpelstiltskin.] Rumpelstiltskin was somewhat troubled by lack of disappoinment in Baroconsi's face but was joyous and said.{nl}[Yes, you admitted yourself. I am the owner of this place! So I win! Haha!]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008279
text: {nl}The demon countered. {nl}[Even if that is true, you've said it yourself, I will be the master in one year. That means, the gold veins become mine.{nl}And furthermore, you are bound by your own words that you will not be able to mine any gold from here. That means, I de facto own them.]

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008280
text: You need more training in the divine and the divine practices.{nl}From ancient times our order has grasped an understanding of evil energy and have trained here to develop our wisdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008281
text: We call this the Zealot's Trial.{nl} Have you prepared yourself?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008282
text: Good.{nl} Here, take this necklace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008283
text: This necklace will activate the training device.{nl}Use it when you arrive at the Trial site.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008284
text: You can complete the trial on your decided level of difficulty.{nl}Select the level that suits you best.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008285
text: When you activate the device, discs created by divine energy will appear.{nl}Use the necklace to discern which of these circles contains evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008286
text: The number of discs and amount of evil energy will increase depending on the level selected.{nl}Approach the discs and use the crystal necklace to active them.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008287
text: You fail the trial if a disc turns foggy. If not, you will know how many discs, in the adjacent 8 spaces, contain evil energy.{nl}Use your wisdom to avoid the evil energy and active only the normal discs.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008288
text: Prove your ability to the order.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008289
text: You have returned.{nl}I will give you a reward that best matches your abilities.{nl}{nl}I hope that you become a believer of deep devotion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008290
text: Bullet Marker's Property Application

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008291
text: I'll accept the training

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008292
text: I won't accept.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008293
text: Shadow Adaptation Training

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008294
text: I will train myself

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008295
text: Zealot's Trial

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008296
text: I will challenge the trail

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008297
text: Let me prepare

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008298
text: Matador's Knowledge

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008299
text: Talk with the Bullet Marker Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008300
text: The Bullet Marker Master has designed a training site to practice using properties quickly and precisely. He has opened the site to other developing Bullet Markers.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008301
text: Go to the training grounds the Bullet Marker Master mentioned

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008302
text: Go to the Master's training grounds.{nl}Attack the charged property with its weakness to gather points.{nl}After 1 attack the property will disappear. Go to the charger at the training grounds to recharge the property.{nl}-Property Relationship{nl} Ice=>Fire, Fire=>Earth, Earth=>Lightning, Lightning=>Ice, Divine=>Dark, Ace=> All{nl}- Success Criteria{nl}  Level 1 : 300 points{nl} Level 2 : 380 points{nl}  Level 3 : 460 points{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008303
text: Talk with the Shadowmancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008304
text: Shadowmancer Master has prepared a training location for you.{nl}Talk to the Shadowmancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008305
text: Starting Shadow Adaptation Training

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008306
text: Shadowmancer Master has created a device to help train those who have not adapted to their shadows.{nl}Activate the device at Lajidota Fields to start training.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008307
text: You've used the device to train.{nl}Report back to the Shadowmancer Master your results.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008308
text: Talk with the Zealot Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008309
text: It seems that the Zealot Master Aliza Tal has prepared a trial to test your abilities.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008310
text: Activate the discs that do not contain evil energy

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008311
text: The Zealot Master has selected a trial according to your abilities and has asked that you activate discs that do not contain evil energy. Use the crystal necklace to activate a disc and to find out how many, in the adjacent 8 spaces, contain evil energy. Avoid the evil energy and turn the remaining discs to green.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008312
text: You have passed the trial. Report back to the Zealot Master Aliza Tal.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008313
text: Talk to the Matador Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008314
text: Talk to the Matador Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008315
text: Complete the Matador Master's test

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008316
text: Complete the Matador Master's test

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171128_008317
text: Talk with the Matador Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20171207_008318
text: Shadowmancer Master has created a device to help train those who have not adapted to their shadows.{nl}Activate the device at Lajidota Fields to start training.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008319
text: The King's Yellow Jewel is stored in the secret device located in the Supply Room.{nl}There are four fragments each with unique properties such as Fire, Ice, Lightning and Poison, needed to open the secret device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008320
text: If you recover it, I'll be able to give those bluffers a good beating.{nl}Try Cranto Coast. When you find it, bring it back to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008321
text: Wow! You're better than average.{nl}With this I can be recongized as the Great Pirate. Hahaha! Thanks for the find!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008322
text: Anyway, thank you for helping me with my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008323
text: For Winterspoon Family matters you should look to the head of the family, Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008324
text: I do have a task for him. Would you be willing to help?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008325
text: Yes? Ah... I see. Thank you.{nl} Although I have another task to complete, I feel less stressed thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008326
text: What great records. You did well.{nl}Now take that and give it to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008327
text: You have already done so much, but I have one more favor to ask of you.{nl}I'm investigating the Crystal Mine, but toxic gas is leaking out again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008328
text: I'll be able to complete my investigation faster with your help.{nl}I also ask on behalf of the people of Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008329
text: It will take some time before I can extract the substances, but{nl} I cannot thank you enough for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008330
text: There is a task you can help me with. It's a personal issue, but...{nl}The Scout Master and I used be the best of friends.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008331
text: Yet, our relationship now is not like how it used to be.{nl} I want to give him a gift in the hopes of restoring our friendship...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008332
text: So I want to give the Scout Master something that he would love.{nl}With that in mind, would you mind hearing me out?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008333
text: You gathered everything just as I had wanted.{nl}Thank you. The rest I will do myself. Wish me luck!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008334
text: How about it? You'll be able to show your stuff.{nl}Will you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008335
text: Oh. I can tell how amazing it is just by looking at it.{nl}I can't want to start studying this arrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008336
text: Thank you. Once I study the arrow you've given me, I'll be able to make something even more amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008337
text: {nl}Oh, I'm sorry. I should have said thank you first... sincerely, thank you.{nl}I will see to the investigation from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008338
text: Wherever you look, monsters are causing trouble.{nl}What are you here for? You must be pretty capable to come this far...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008339
text: Okay... well, are you able to help me then?{nl} You've come this far, I should be able to trust you with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008340
text: I'll have to send this to the Inquisitor Master.{nl} Good job. You have done extraordinarily well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008341
text: If there is ever a time you need my help, come find me.{nl}I'm in your debt.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008342
text: {nl}There is a way for you to help us with our rebuilding.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008343
text: As the Sage Master, the one book I needed was the Book of the Void.{nl} I am grateful for your dedication... Would you mind waiting here just a bit longer?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008344
text: I apologize for making you wait.{nl} I simply wanted to return the favor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008345
text: This is a copy of the book you just brought me. I hope you enjoy it.{nl} Please come find me, if there comes a time where you need my help.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008346
text: Retiarius and the Net

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008347
text: Honor of the Old Sea

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008348
text: Eternal Amjinas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008349
text: The Alchemist's Inspection

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008350
text: Without a Trace

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008351
text: Lydia Schaffen and the Fletcher's Arrow

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008352
text: The Missing Orders

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008353
text: Make it Certain

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008354
text: You can tell me.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008355
text: You saw the wrong person.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008356
text: Rebuilding the Study of Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008357
text: Focus Training

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008358
text: I'll give it a shot.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008359
text: Sounds like too much trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008360
text: Talk with the Retiarius Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008361
text: The Retiarius Master wants you to train and improve your dexterity with the net to become a true Retiarius.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008362
text: Retiarius Master's Training Rules

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008363
text: Training Rules{nl}During training, you can only use your basic skills to capture monsters with your net that match the specified number.{nl} The closer you are to the specified number the higher your score, along with capturing the same type of monster.{nl}Goal.{nl}Level 1: 250 points, {nl} Level 2: 300 points{nl}Level 3: 450 points.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008364
text: Zanas' Spirit says that he has lost the four Shards of Fire, Ice, Lightning and Poison because they were taken by the Demons. All four are required to disarm the Secret Device in which the King's Yellow Jewel is hidden, so you must recover all of them to obtain the Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008365
text: The memories of Crystal Mine are recorded in the orb. Return to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008366
text: Give the Arrow to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008367
text: Defeat the Templeshooter Blocking Your Way

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008368
text: Talk with the Onmyoji Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008369
text: Focus Training

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180418_008370
text: To begin the training the Onmyoji Master has told you to go to Sventimas Exile.{nl}Use the Shikiban given to you by the Onmyoji Master to change the direction of the moving paper dolls counterclockwise.{nl}{nl}- If the paper dolls that collide are the same type{nl} 5 points per doll will be given.{nl} If they are not the same type{nl} 1 point per doll will be given. {nl} Success Criteria {nl} Level 1: 350 points{nl} Level 2: 450 points {nl} Level 3: 550 points{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008371
text: There may come a time of urgency when performing an exorcism.{nl}It is during these times that we need to make the most of our knowledge and experience.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008372
text: You will learn to handle such threats efficiently with growing experience.{nl}However, it is still a dangerous task for a novice such as yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008373
text: Training will help you prepare for such threats.{nl}Take these 4 Prayer Books to the Scout's Cemetery.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008374
text: Release the evil spirits trapped within the Binding Orb and banish the spirits by using the Prayer Books at the site of exorcism.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008375
text: Break the seal on the Binding Orb to release the evil spirits.{nl}Use the Prayer Books to banish the spirits at the site of exorcism.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008376
text: It's good to see that you have progressed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008377
text: You must master the flute to learn the techniques of a Pied Piper.{nl}This is the most difficult step in the apprenticeship.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008378
text: I've built a Drill Ground on Altar Way to assist the training of my apprentices.{nl}Training there has helped them master the flute.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008379
text: Even for you, Revelator, it will be no easy task.{nl}Why don't you take part in our training?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008380
text: The Drill Ground can be found on Branginti Hill in Altar Way.{nl}Play the old flute I gave you when you arrive on Branginti Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008381
text: This old flute is an essential tool for training.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008382
text: The Drill Ground is near Branginti Hill in Altar Way but it won't be visible to the naked eye.{nl}Play the old flute when you arrive on Branginti Hill and the Drill Ground will appear before your eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008383
text: Training is simple.{nl}You will find an obstacle course with moving platforms when you reach the Drill Ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008384
text: An apparition will take form in the starting area of the obstacle course.{nl}You must change the direction of the moving platforms to guide the apparition towards the finish line.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008385
text: The direction of the moving platforms can be changed using the old flute.{nl}It will be a difficult task to complete but please don't give up.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008386
text: Repetitious training can at times be exhausting.{nl}But one day you will come to see how far you've progressed.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008387
text: Revelator, your skills are improving at an astounding rate.{nl}It amazes me to see how quickly you've improved.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008388
text: It seems that repetition training has worn you down.{nl}Why don't we try again some other time when you're feeling better?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008389
text: How To Use The Flute

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008390
text: Yes, I need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008391
text: No, I don't need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008392
text: The Rituals of an Exorcist

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008393
text: I'll perform the exorcism.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008394
text: I won't do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008395
text: Talk to the Pied Piper Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008396
text: Flute Practice

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008397
text: Proceed to Brangiti Hill in Altar Way to begin your training.{nl}When you use the Old Flute near the Drill Ground a rhombus-shaped obstacle course will appear and your training will begin.{nl}Obstacles and moving platforms will be generated randomly and a starting area and a goal will be assigned on two of the four corners.{nl}The apparition formed in the starting area will move following the direction the platform is pointing to.{nl}Use the skills assigned to your quick slot to change the direction of the platforms and guide the apparition to the goal.{nl}{nl}[Shortcuts]{nl}- A key: Rotate the platform to face ↘ (cooldown 0.5 sec){nl}- F key: Rotate the platform to face ↙ (cooldown 0.5 sec){nl}- G key: Rearrange the Drill Ground (cooldown 5 sec){nl}{nl}- When the apparition reaches the goal, the number of successful runs will increase by 1{nl}{nl}[Requirements for Completion]{nl}Stage 1: Total of 6 successful runs{nl}Stage 2: Total of 8 successful runs{nl}Stage 3: Total of 10 successful runs{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008398
text: Dangers Hidden Within The Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008399
text: Talk to the Exorcist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008400
text: Talk to the Exorcist Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008401
text: Exorcise the Evil Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180629_008402
text: Break the seal cast on the Binding Orb to release the evil spirits and use the Prayer Books on spirits of the corresponding property to receive 1 point. On exorcising 10 spirits you will receive the Power of the Goddess buff and points received per spirit exorcised will increase to 5. The Exorcist Gem banishes 5 spirits regardless of their attributes.{nl}Requirements for Completion{nl}Stage 1: 400{nl}Stage 2: 450{nl}Stage 3: 500

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180827_008403
text: Set the Prayer Book to the quick slot before interacting with the Binding Orb to perform the exorcism.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20180914_008404
text: Use the teleportation magic inside the workshop cell and move to the cell on the opposite side.{nl}Then, get the Spirit Stones from the monsters and release my spirit from the watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008405
text: I thought you were simply a nosy adventurer, but you seem to be a cut above the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008406
text: Assassin Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008407
text: Assassins carry around with them various items made using the plant Hasisas.{nl}It can strengthen your body and also allow you to take advantage of the enemy depending on how it's used.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008408
text: When you are not used to the effects of such items, you are as good as dead on the battlefield.{nl}This is the easiest mistake a budding Assassin can make, one that puts one's own life at risk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008409
text: So I often tend to new Assassins to help them train...{nl}How about it? Are you interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008410
text: You've come back.{nl}Training under the influence is not an easy task.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008411
text: Do you want to try training again?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008412
text: This is a potion brewed using Hasisas.{nl}Go to Pasagos Cliff in Ramstis Ridge and drink the potion.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008413
text: Drinking the potion will make shadowy apparitions appear before you.{nl}What you need to do is defeat them when they appear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008414
text: I know you're wondering what the purpose of this training is.{nl}Hasisas does not permanently enhance your physical strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008415
text: Enhancing your physique can take a toll on the mind.{nl}An Assassin must be strong of both mind and body because of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008416
text: Hasisas can be used for different purposes depending on how it's brewed.{nl}However, you must be familiar with the brewing process and methods of consumption.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008417
text: I've underestimated you. I'm impressed.{nl}But remember that it will be much harder to pull off in an actual fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008418
text: It's always important to take care of one's health, even if you're an Assassin.{nl}I'd say you need to rest for a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008419
text: There's nothing that can hold us, Outlaws, back.{nl}But do remember that you can end up dead when you don't have what it takes.{nl}If you want to be one of us, you've gotta pay your dues.{nl}Visit the Seir Rainforest. I've prepared training grounds in Odur Backyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008420
text: To train, pick up the rocks and sand laying about on the grounds and

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008421
text: use Brick Smash while standing behind the monster

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008422
text: use Throw Sand while standing in front of the monster

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008423
text: to debuff monsters and defeat them with normal attacks. You will earn 1 point for each kill.{nl}The training grounds can be found in Odur Backyard at the Seir Rainforest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008424
text: Guild Foundation

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008425
text: The [Guild Foundation] quest will begin.{nl}Increase your guild contribution level to clear the quest!

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008426
text: Congratulations on completing the [Guild Foundation] quest!{nl}The [Guild Foundation] quest will be open again at 06:00 next Monday (server time).

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008427
text: The Art of Assassination

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008428
text: Can you tell me more...?

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008429
text: I'll have to pass, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008430
text: Techniques of an Outlaw

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008431
text: I accept.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008432
text: How to Train{nl}Pick up the stones and sand laying about the training grounds to debuff the monsters using 'Brick Smash while standing behind the monster' or 'Throw Sand while standing in front of the monster' and finish them off with a basic attack to earn 1 point{nl}Goal{nl}Stage 1

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008433
text: 20 points{nl}Stage 2

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008434
text: 30 points{nl}Stage 3

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008435
text: 45 points

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008436
text: Obtain contribution points by participating in guild quests.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008437
text: How to earn guild quest contribution points{nl}Defeat monsters +5{nl}Complete guild quest +100

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008438
text: Ends automatically on successful completion of Guild Quest.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008439
text: Talk to the Assassin Master

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008440
text: Combat Training

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008441
text: Begin your training by visiting the Pasagos Cliff in Ramstis Ridge as told by the Assassin Master.{nl}Using the vial near the training area will initiate the training.{nl}When traning starts and monsters spawn, defeat them by using the skills assigned to the shortcuts.{nl}{nl}[Shortcut]{nl}- A Key: Stab, ATK 1 (cooldown 1 sec){nl}- S Key: Slash to the Left, ATK 2 (cooldown 4 sec){nl}- D Key: Slash to the Right, ATK 3 (cooldown 6 sec){nl}- F Key: Power Stab, ATK 4 (cooldown 9 sec){nl}- G Key: Instantly reset the cooldown for all skills registered on A, S, D and F keys (cooldown 30 sec){nl}{nl}[Defeating monsters of below 5 HP]{nl}- Point +1{nl}- Reduces the cooldown for all skills registered on A, S, D and F keys by 1 sec{nl}{nl}[Objectives]{nl} Stage 1: 60 points{nl} Stage 2: 80 points{nl} Stage 3: 100 points{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008442
text: Talk to Outlaw Master Maea Kellefinker

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008443
text: Outlaw Master Maea Kellefinker stresses that the most important thing in combat technique for an Outlaw is efficiency.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008444
text: Follow the orders for combat training given to you by the Outlaw Master Maea Kellefinker

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008445
text: How to Train{nl}Pick up the stones and sand laying about on the training grounds and

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008446
text: to debuff monsters and defeat them with normal attacks. You will earn 1 point for each kill{nl}Objectives{nl}Stage 1: 20 points{nl}Stage 2: 30 points{nl}Stage 3: 45 points

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008447
text: Defeat the Specter

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20190104_008448
text: The Specter has escaped from its confinement in Tymeris Temple.{nl}Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008449
text: The magic circle has become broken due to the Soul Stone of Restrainment{nl}Talk to the spirit of Zanas

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008450
text: An alien presence

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008451
text: It's probably nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008452
text: You have received the King's Blue Jewel from Nebulas. Obtain the Revelation from the Confessional Secret Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008453
text: You could not find the trace of the Goddess, but successfully blocked off the demon portals. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008454
text: Kupole Serija says that Purified Zolem Cores can be used to absorb the demonic powers. Defeat the demons while their powers are absorbed so that Medena can read the demon's memories. Use the Zolem Core on Green Flamag and Green Flamme Archers to access their memories.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008455
text: There are auxiliary devices assisting the cave's main exorcising device. These secondary devices must be activated in order to use it. However, each auxiliary device must be turned on one minute after the previous one, or they will all be disabled.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008456
text: Kupole Serija wants to talk to you.{nl}Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008457
text: Go to the pathway leading to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008458
text: Kupole Serija says that an anomalous power can be sensed on the pathway to Section 5.{nl}Investigate the area with Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0300_20200129_008459
text: Investigate the pathway leading to Section 5 with Kupole Medena.
